articles.title: Thawhlehna 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan enfiah ang a, "Thawhlehna" kan insem ang.

Johana Bung 11, châng 21-25-ah Bible hi hawng ila, chhiar ṭan ila;

Marthi chuan Isua hnenah, "Lalpa, hetah hian awm ta la, ka unaupa hi a thi lovang. Tunah pawh hian Pathian hnenah i dil apiang chu pek che a ni ang tih ka hria ," Marthi chuan, "thawhleh hunah a tho leh ang," a ti a. Isuan a hnenah, "Kei hi thawhlehna leh nunna chu ka ni a, mi ringtu chu a thih pawhin a nung ang," a ti a.

Isuan: "Kei hi thawhlehna leh nunna chu ka ni! Tupawh mi ring chu thi mah se, a nung ang" a ti!

(1) Zawlnei Elija chuan Pathian hnenah a tawngtai a, naupang chu a nung ta a ni

Hemi hnu hian inchhung nula, a fapa chu a damlo ta a, a na lutuk a, a thaw thei lo (thi tihna a ni).
(Naupang thlarau chu a taksaah a la awm a, a nung reng bawk)

... Elija chu naupang chungah chuan vawi thum a tlu a, Lalpa hnenah chuan, "Aw Lalpa ka Pathian, khawngaihin he naupang thlarau hi a taksaah kir leh rawh se!" .A taksa, a nung. 1 Lalte 17:17,21-22

(2) Zâwlnei Elisa chuan Sunam hmeichhia fapa chu a kaitho leh a

Naupang chu a lo puitlin chuan ni khat chu a pa leh buh sengtute hnenah a lo kal a, a pa hnenah chuan, "Ka lu, a pa chuan a chhiahhlawh hnenah, "A nu hnenah hruai rawh," a ti a him, "A nu hnenah hruai rawh," tiin a hruai a, a nu hnenah a pe a, naupang chu a nu kawngah a thu a, chawhnu lamah a thi ta a ni.
...Elisa chu a lo kal a, in chhungah chuan a lut a, naupang thi tawh leh a khumah a muhil chu a hmu a.

....Chutah chuan a rawn chhuk a, pindan chhungah chuan a kal leh a, chutah chuan a chho a, naupang chu a muhil a, naupang chuan vawi sarih a thawk a, chutah a mit a meng ta a. 2 Lalte 4:18-20,32,35

(3) Mi thiin Elisa ruh a khawih chuan mitthi chu a tho leh ta a ni

Elisa a thi a, an phum ta a ni. Kumthar ni-ah chuan Moab-ho pawl pakhatin ram an rawn bei a nunna leh a ding chhuak ta a. 2 Lalte 13:20-21

(4)Israel ram a ni →→ Ruh thawhlehna

zâwlneite hrilh lâwkna a ni → Israel ram a ni → Chhungkaw pum pui chu chhandam an ni

Ka hnenah, "Mihring fapa, heng ruhte hi kaihthawhin an awm thei ang em?"
"Tin, ka hnenah, "Heng ruhte hi hrilh la, heti rawh:
Lalpa thu hi ngaithla rawh u, ruh ro ro u.
Hêng ruhte hi Lalpa Pathianin heti hian a sawi a ni.
"Thlarau ka luhtir ang che, ."
I nung dawn a ni.
Sinews ka pe ang che u a, tisa ka pe ang che u a, vunain ka khuh ang che u a, thaw ka pe ang che u, tichuan in nung ang a, kei hi LALPA ka ni tih in hre ang.

"....Lalpa chuan ka hnenah: "Mihring fapa, . Heng ruhte hi Israel chhungkua pumpui an ni . .. Ezekiela 37:3-6,11-ah hian en rawh

Unaute u, Israel fate hi eng emaw chen rilru khauh tak an ni tih thuruk (fing in inngai loh nan), hre lo in awm ka duh lo; Jentailte zat a kim hma loh chuan , . Tichuan Israel fate zawng zawng chu chhandam an ni ang . Thuziak angin:

“Zion ata Chhandamtu a lo chhuak ang a, Jakoba chhungte sual zawng zawng a la bo ang,” Tin: “Hei hi an sualna ka lak bo hunah an hnenah ka thuthlung a ni.”

Chu chu Israel hnam zawng zawng zîngah ka lo hria a Char A zat chu 144,000 an ni. Thupuan 7:4

(Hriat tur: Kar khat chhungin, kar chanve chhung! Israel fate chu Pathianin a chhinchhiahna → kum sangkhat an lut → chu chu zâwlnei hrilhlawknate thlen famkimna a ni. Qian Jubilee hnuah → Israel chhungkua zawng zawng chhandam an ni)

khawpui thianghlim jerhosalem →→ mo, beram no nupui

Vantirhkoh pasarih zinga pakhat, rangkachak bawm pasarih, hripui hnuhnung pasarih a khat chu ka hnenah a lo kal a, “Hetah hian lo kal la, mo, Beram No nupui chu ka entir ang che.
Israel hnam sawm leh pahnih hming
“Thlarau Thianghlim thâwk khum ka ni a, vântirhkohte chuan tlâng sâng takah min hruai a, Pathian hnên aṭanga vân aṭanga lo chhuk khawpui thianghlim Jerusalem chu min kawhhmuh a lung hlu tak, jasper ang mai, rangkachak ang mai a ni a, kulh sang tak, kawngkhar sawm leh pahnih nei a awm a, kulh kawngkaah chuan vantirhkoh sawm leh pahnih an awm a, kulh kawngkaah chuan Israel hnam sawm leh pahnih hming an inziak a.
Beram no tirhkoh sawm leh pahnihte hming

Khawchhak lamah kawngkhar pathum a awm a, hmar lamah kawngkhar pathum a awm a, chhim lamah kawngkhar pathum a awm a, chhim lamah kawngkhar pathum a awm bawk. Khawpui kulh hian lungphum sawm leh pahnih a nei a, a lungphumah hian Beram No tirhkoh sawm leh pahnih hming a inziak a. Thupuan 21:9-14

( Thil chhinchhiah: Israel hnam sawm leh pahnih + Beram No tirhkoh sawm leh pahnihte;
Israel Kohhran + Jentail Kohhran

Kohhran chu pakhat a ni!Khawpui thianghlim Jerusalem, monu, Beram No nupui a ni! ) .

Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?)

(5) Tawngtai hmangin: Tabitha leh Dorki thawhlehna

Joppa khuaah hian zirtir hmeichhia a awm a, a hming chu Tabitha a ni a, chu chu Grik tawngin Dorki tihna a ni (chu chu antelope tihna a ni); Chutih lai chuan a damlo a, a thi ta a ni.

...Petera chuan an zavaia chhuak turin a ti a, a bawkkhup a, a tawngtai a, chutah chuan mitthi lam chu a hawi a, "Tabitha, tho rawh!" . Tirhkohte 9:36-37,40

(6) Isuan Jaira fate a kaitho leh a

Isua a lo haw chuan mipuiin an lo nghak vek avangin an lo hmuak a. Inkhawmna in hotu pakhat Jaira a lo kal a, Isua chu a inah lo kal turin a ngen a; Isua a kal lai chuan mipui chu an rawn hual vel a.

.... Isua a ina a lo kal khan Petera, Johana, Jakoba leh a fanu nu leh pa tih loh chu tumah a ruala luh phal a ni lo. Mi zawng zawng chu fanu tan chuan an tap a, an hnute an vuak vek bawk. Isuan, "Tap suh! A thi lo va, a muhil a ni," a ti a a lo kal leh a, a tho nghal a, Isuan ei tur pe turin a hrilh a.

(7) Isuan: "Kei hi thawhlehna leh nunna chu ka ni," a ti.

1 Lazara thihna

Bethani khua, Mari leh a farnu Marthi khuaah damlo pakhat Lazara a awm a. .. Isuan heng thu a sawi zawh hnu hian an hnenah, "Kan thianpa Lazara chu a muhil tawh a, ka kaitho dawn a ni," an ti a Isua thusawi A thih thu a sawi a, mahse a hma ang bawkin a muhil niin an ngai a, chuvangin Isuan chiang takin a hrilh a, “Lazara chu a thi tawh a ni. Johana 11:1,11-14-ah a awm

2 Isuan, “Kei hi thawhlehna leh nunna chu ka ni.

Isua a lo thlen chuan Lazara chu thlanah ni li a awm tawh tih a hmu a.
...Marthi chuan Isua hnenah, "Lalpa, hetah hian awm ta la, ka unaupa hi a thi lo ang. Tunah pawh hian Pathian hnena i dil apiang chu Pathianin a pe ang che tih ka hria, " "I unaupa," a ti a a tho leh ang." Marthi chuan, "Mobai thawhleh hunah a tho leh dawn tih ka hria."

” Isuan a hnenah, “Kei hi thawhlehna leh nunna chu ka ni,” a ti a. Mi ringtu chu thi mah se, a nung leh ang, Johana 11:17, 21-25

3 Isuan Lazara chu thihna ata a kaitho a

Isua chu a thinlungah a rûm leh a, thlan chu a lo thleng a; Isuan, "Lung chu la bo rawh," a ti a.
Mithi unaunu Marthi chuan a hnenah, "Lalpa, tunah hian a rimchhia ngei ang, ni li a lo thi tawh a ni," a ti a ?" Ropuina?" Tin, lung chu an la ta a.

Isuan van lam hawiin a mit a han phar a, "Ka Pa, ka thu i hriat avangin lawmthu ka sawi e. Min ngaithla fo tih pawh ka hria a, mahse he thu hi ka sawi hi a chhehvela ding zawng zawngte tan a ni, chu chu an rin theih nan," a ti a min tir a ni towel. "Amah chu phelh rawh u," a ti a, "Johana 11:38-44."

Hmu : A chunga thuziak tarlan te hi Pathianin mi tawngtaina, dilna leh tihdamna hmanga mitthi a kaihthawh dan a ni! Tin, mi tinin Lal Isuan Lazara kaihthawh hi an mit ngeiin hmu rawh se.

Lal Isuan: "Kei hi thawhlehna leh nunna chu ka ni. Tupawh mi ring chu thi mah se, a nung ang," a tih ang khan.

articles.title: Thawhlehna 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan zir chhunzawm zel a, "Thawhlehna" kan insem bawk.

Thusawi 2-na; Isua Krista chu mitthi ata a tho leh a, min pianthar leh a

1 Petera Bung 1:3-5-ah Bible kan hawng a, kan chhiar dun a: Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se, A khawngaihna nasa tak angin, Isua Krista hmangin mitthi zing ata a kaitho ta a ni , min pe a ni piantharna beiseina nungah chuan rochan chhe thei lo, bawlhhlawh lo leh bo thei lo, vanah in tâna dah a ni. Rinna avanga Pathian thiltihtheihnain a vawn tlat chuan chhandamna inbuatsaih chu ni hnuhnûnga inpuanna chu i dawng thei dawn a ni.

1. Isua Krista chuan mitthi ata kaihthawh leh min siam thar leh a

zawt: Tupawh nung leh ringtu chu a thi ngai lovang. Johana 11:26 hi i ring em?
Isuan he thu a sawi hian eng nge a sawi tum?

Pathian Lehkha Thu pawhin mihringte vawi khat thih ruat a ni a, chu mi hnuah chuan rorelna a awm tih a sawi bawk si a. Hebrai mite 9.27

chhanna :Piantharna! Amen!

i pianthar a ngai a ni

Lal Isuan a sawi angin: Piantharna i nei tur a ni, mak ti suh. Johana 3:7 hi en rawh

Isua Krista chu mitthi zîng ata a tho leh ta!

Piantharna → → Keini:

1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang - Johana 3:5
2 Chanchin |ha thutak atanga piang - 1 Korinth 4:15 leh Jakoba 1.18

3 Pathian atanga piang - Johana 1;12-13

zawt : Adama piang?
Isua Krista atanga piang?
Eng nge a danglamna?

chhanna :A hnuaiah hian chipchiar takin a sawifiah ang

(1) Adama chu vaivuta siam a ni --Genesis 2:7 ah hian kan hmu

Adama chu thlarau (thlarau: emaw tisa) nei mi nung a lo ni ta a ni--1 Korinth 15:45

→→A fate pawh hi thil siam, tisa leh lei an ni.

(2)Adama Isua hnuhnung ber

→→Thu tisaa siam a ni--Johana 1:14;
A tir lamah chuan Thu a awm a, Thu chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Thu chu Pathian a ni - Johana 1:1-2
→Pathian chu tisaah a lo chang ta a;
Pathian Thlarau--Johana 4:24
→Thlarau chu tisa leh thlarauah a lo chang ta a;

Chuvangin Isua hi Pa atanga piang a ni - Hebrai 1:5 en rawh.

Isua Krista chu mitthi zîng ata a tho leh → min siam thar leh Amen!

Piantharna kan ni ( Mi thar a ni ) pawh hi Thu hmanga siam, Pathian siam, Thlarau siam a ni a, Thlarau Thianghlim atanga piang, chanchin tha rinna avanga Isua Krista thu dik atanga piang, Van Pa hnen atanga lo piang, thlarau taksa) kan nih vang a ni! a taksa peng hrang hrangte (hmanlai lehkhabu zial thenkhatah chuan: A ruh leh a tisa te chu an belhchhah a ni). Ephesi 5:30-ah hian en rawh

(3) Adama chuan Eden huana contract a bawhchhia - Genesis Bung 2 leh 3 en rawh
Adama chuan dan a bawhchhia a, thil a tisual → sualah hralh a ni.
Adama thlah kan nih angin tisa kan nih lai khan sualah hralh kan ni bawk - Rom 7:14 en rawh
Sual hlawh chu thihna a ni - Rom 6:23 en rawh
Mi pakhat zarah sual chu khawvelah a lut a, sual avanga thihna a lo thleng ang bawkin, mi zawng zawngin sual an tih avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. Rom 51:12 ah hian kan hmu
Adamaah chuan mi zawng zawng an thi ang.1 Korinth 15:22 en rawh
→Chuvangin, mi zawng zawng hi vawi khat thih vek tura ruat a ni ---Hebrai 9:27 en rawh
→A dintu Adama chu vaivut a ni a, leivutah a kir leh ang - Genesis 3:19 en rawh

→Kan mihring taksa hlui hi Adama atanga lo chhuak a ni a, chu pawh chu vaivut a ni a, vaivut ah a kir leh ang.

(4) Isua chu sual nei lovin a sual lo

sual a awm lo
Mihring sual lak bo turin Lalpa a lo inlar tih i hria a, Amahah erawh chuan sual a awm lo. 1 Johana 3:5

thil sual tih a ni lo

Sual a ti lo va, a kâah pawh bumna a awm lo. 1 Petera 2:22-ah kan hmu
A chhan chu kan puithiam lalber hi kan chak lohnate a khawngaih thei lo a ni lo. Keini ang bawka thlemna engkimah a awm a, chuti chung pawh chuan sual a nei lo. Hebrai 4:15 ah hian kan hmu

2. Isua Krista chu thihna ata a tho leh a

→→Naupang piangtharte hi sual nei lo leh sual an nei lo

1 Johana 3:9-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar ho ila:

Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan thil sual a ti lo, Pathian thu chu amaha a awm reng avangin a sual thei lova, Pathian laka piang a nih avangin.

zawt :Isua kha tho leh a ni→Mi thar piangtharte hian sual an la nei em?

chhanna : thiam loh chantir lo

zawt :Kristian piangtharte hian thil an tisual thei em?

chhanna :piantharna( Mi thar a ni ) chuan thil sual a ti lo vang

zawt :Engati nge?

chhanna :A hnuaiah hian chipchiar takin a sawifiah ang

(1) Pathian atanga lo piang tu pawh →→ (mi thar) .

1 Sual suh--1 Johana 3:9
2 I sual lo vang--1 Johana 5:18

3 A sual thei hek lo--1 Johana 3:9

(Mi thar piangthar tharte, engvangin nge in sual loh? Pathianin Bible hmangin thu a sawi ang! Thu sawi leh rinhlelh a ngai lo, a chhan chu i thusawi veleh tihsual i nei nghal mai dawn a ni. Thlarau lam awmzia i rin phawt chuan Pathian thu, a hnuaia Bible changte hian a chhang ang: ) .

4 Pathian thu chu amaha a awm reng avangin a sual thei lo 1 Johana 3:9
5 Pathian atanga piang a ni si a--1 Johana 3:9
(Pathian atanga piang thar apiang Kristaah an nung a, in thinlungah leh van hmunah Krista nen an thu dun a ni. Abba! Pa Pathian kut dinglam. Amen!)
6 Tupawh Amaha awm reng chuan sual a ti lo Johana - Josua 3:6
7 Thlarau chu nangmahniah a nung chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi in ni tawh - Rom 8:9
8 Nang (mi putar) chu i thi tawh avângin, i ( Mi thar a ni )’s nun chu Krista nen Pathianah thup a ni--Kolossa 3:3
9 Keini (mi thar) pawh min kaitho a, Krista Isua nen van hmunah min thuttir bawk - Ephesi 2:6
10 Taksa chu tuh a ni ( leilung a ni ), thawhleh chu thlarau taksa ( thlarau lam thil ). Taksa taksa a awm chuan thlarau taksa pawh a awm ngei tur a ni. 1 Korinth 15:44-ah kan hmu
11 Thilsiam thar a ni--2 Korinth 5:17 en rawh

12 Pathian piang ( Mi thar a ni ) hmuh theih a ni lo - 2 Korinth 4:16-18 en rawh

Hmu: Tirhkoh Paula chuan 2 Korinth 4:18-ah →Kan ngaihtuah lo si a en "Kan inhmu dawn nia( putar) . , mahse enkawlna hmun". en "Bo( Mi thar a ni ); Mit hian a hmuh theih avangin ( putar ), tisa chu Adama aanga lo piang leh tisa ta a ni a, tisa châkna leh châkna sualte thlêmna avânga sual a tih chuan zawi zawiin a lo sual ang a, a boral ang a tir chuan leivut a ni a, kum za hnuah pawh leivutah a la kir leh ang .

Zawhna: Kan mihring thar piang thar chu khawiah nge a awm?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Tin, hmuh theih loh ( Mi thar a ni )Wool puan a ni! A hmaa chipchiar taka kan sawi tawh ang khan: Isua Krista chu thihna ata kaihthawh leh piangthar a ni ( Mi thar a ni ) chu Kristaa awm reng te, Pathiana Krista nena inthup te, van hmuna Krista hnena awm te, Pa Pathian dinglamah leh in thinlunga thut te → Paulan Rom 7:22-a a sawi ang khan! A chhan chu ka chhungril awmzia (a original text chu mihring a ni) → in thinlunga cheng hmuh theih loh chu mihring thar piangthar a ni a, thlarau taksa a ni tih chu a chiang mit saruak.Thlarau taksa chu nunna nen a inzawm hmasa ber a ni Krista nunna, nunna thlarau lam chaw ei la, tuikhuah tui nung in la, ni tin Kristaah siam tharin, mihringah lo thang lian la, Krista famkimna san zawngin a khat ang lo kal rawh. Amen. Bee hian a hive-ah "queen bee" a siam ang bawkin he "queen bee" hi bee dang aiin a lian zawk a, a thau zawk bawk. Kan mihring thar pawh Kristaah chuan a tho leh ang a, kum sangkhat hmaah a lo lang ang a, kum sangkhat chhung chu Krista nen a lal ang. Amen.

Ringtu tu pawhin thutak hmutu, ngaithlatu leh hrethiamtu chuan min zawm chu a thlang zawk ang "Lal Isua Kristaa Kohhran chu". Thlarau Thianghlim awmna leh chanchin ha dik hriltu kohhran. A chhan chu nula thianghlim fing, an kuta khâwnvâr keng a, bêlah hriak lo buatsaih tawhte an nih vâng a ni . , nula thianghlim an ni a, sawiselna nei lo an ni! Beram No zuitu mi 144,000 ang maiin. Amen!

Laodikei kohhran ang bawkin Kohhran henkhatin Thlarau Thianghlim awmna an nei lo va, Chanchin |ha thurin dik tak an hril lo a, hei hian unau tam tak ṭhuin ngaithla turin a ti a ni kar tin, an thil hriatte chu an hrethiam thei lo. Chuvângin, Lal Isuan Laodikei ang kohhrante chu a zilhhau → Nang chuan: Hausa ka ni a, hausakna ka nei a, engmah mamawh ka nei lo; I hausak theih nan rangkachak meia thianghlim tak ka hnen atangin lei turin ka ngen che u a, in hmuh theih nan silhfen var te leh mittui tlakna tur i hmu thei ang. Thupuan 3:17-18

Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Inring: Beng nei chuan ngaithla rawh se!

Thlarau Thianghlim hruaia awmte chuan an hriat veleh an hrethiam mai ang, mahse mi thenkhat chuan an hriat pawhin an hrethiam lo Engvangin nge hetiang hi a nih? Mi rilru na tak tak leh kawng dik dodaltu, kawng dik tichhetu, Pathian fate tiduhdahtu an awm bawk a, a tawpah chuan Isua leh Pathian fate an phatsan dawn a ni.
Chuvangin, hrethiam lo an awm chuan inngaitlawm takin Pathian hnenah tawngtaiin zawng sela, a hmu ang a, a kiktu tan kawngkhar a inhawng ang. Amen
Mahse kawng dik i dodal tur a ni lo va, thutak hmangaihtu thinlung i dawng tur a ni lo. Chutiang a nih loh chuan Pathianin thinlung dik lo a pe ang a, dawt a rin tir ang. Thuhmahruai 2 Thessalonika 2:11
Chutiang mite chuan piantharna leh Krista chhandamna chu an hrethiam ngai lovang. I ring em, i ring lo em ni?

(2) Thil sual titu tu pawh →→ (Mi upa tawh tak a ni)

zawt : Kohhran thenkhat chuan...mi piangtharte hian an la sual thei tih an zirtir thin?

chhanna : Mihring philosophy hmangin thu sawi suh;

1 ...Tupawh thil sual titu chuan Amah chu a hmu lo - 1 Johana 3:6

Thil chhinchhiah: Tupawh Amaha awm reng (Kristaa awmte sawina, mitthi zinga Isua Krista thawhlehna atanga lo piang thar) chuan thil sual a ti lo → Bible thu hi i hmu tawh em? Pathian chanchin Bible Thusawiah! Isuan, "I hnena thu ka sawite hi thlarau leh nunna a ni! Chu chu in hmu em?"

2 Mi tisual apiang...amah an hre lo - 1 Johana 3:6

Thil chhinchhiah: Hei hi chatuan nunna a ni: nang Pathian dik awmchhun leh i tirh Isua Krista hriat theihna tur - Johana 17:3. Electronic Bible thenkhatah tihsual a awm a: "Know You, the Only True God" tih hian extra word "one" tih a nei a, mahse ziak Bible-ah chuan typo a awm lo.
Chuvangin, khawngaihin inzawt rawh, Lal Isua Krista hi i hria em? Krista chhandamna hi i hrethiam em? Chu kohhran rawngbawltute chuan engtin nge kaihthawh apiang ( Mi thar a ni ), i la sual dawn em ni? Hetianga zirtîrtu thuhriltute chungchâng Bible-in eng nge a sawi → Tupawh Amaha awm reng ( Mi thar a ni ), sual ti suh;

Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thlemna nei suh

Thil chhinchhiah: Ka fate u, midangte thlem suh u, chu chu fallacies leh doctrines hmanga thlem suh u, a chhan chu Mi thar a ni I tisa hlui, i taksa sual hluiah ni lovin, nangmahnia mihring thar, Kristaa cheng, leiah ni lovin, keimahniah chuan. Mi thar a ni Mit hmuh theih loh a ni". thlarau mihring ", Thlarau Thianghlim tihtharna zarah ni tin tihthar lehin, felna tiin mihringah lo chang rawh. Chumi awmzia chu felna titu chu mi fel a ni tihna a ni a, Lalpa chu a fel ang bawkin. Amen."

Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Tupawh amaha awm reng chuan thil a tisual lo va; Ka fate te u, thlem suh u. Felna titu chu a fel a ni, Lalpa a fel ang bawkin. 1 Johana 3:6-7-ah kan hmu

3. Khawvel pum hi mi sual kutah a awm

Thil sual titute chu Diabola mi an ni

Thil tisualtu chu Diabola mi a ni a, Diabola chuan a tir atangin thil a tisual tawh si a. Diabola hnathawh tichhe turin Pathian Fapa a lo inlar a. 1 Johana 3:8

(Khawvel hmun hrang hranga mihring, Dan hnuaia awm, Dan bawhchhia leh sual, mi sual! Mi sual kut hnuaiah an mu vek a ni. I ring em?)

Pathian atanga lo piang chuan engtikah mah sual a nei lovang tih kan hria a, tupawh Pathian atanga lo piang chuan amahin a vawng reng ang (hmanlai lehkhabu zial a awm: Pathian atanga lo piang chuan a venghim ang), mi sual chuan a tichhe thei lovang. Pathian ta kan ni tih kan hria a, khawvel pum hi mi sual thiltihtheihnaah a awm tih kan hria. Pathian Fapa a lo kal a, a dik tak hre turin finna min pe tih kan hria a, a dik, a Fapa Isua Kristaah chuan kan awm a ni. Hei hi Pathian dik leh chatuan nunna a ni. 1 Johana 5:18-20-ah kan hmu

articles.title: Thawhlehna 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa unau zawng zawngte tan remna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian lirthei kal dan kan enfiah chhunzawm zel a, "Thawhlehna" kan insem bawk.

Lecture 3: Mihring thar leh Mihring hlui thawhlehna leh piantharna

2 Korinth 5:17-20-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar ho ila:
Tu pawh Kristaa a awm chuan thilsiam thar a ni a; Engkim hi Pathian hnen atanga lo chhuak a ni a, Krista zara amah nen min inremtir a, inremna rawngbawlna min pe a ni. Hei hi Pathian chu Kristaah a awm a, khawvel hi amah nen a inremtir a, an bawhchhiatnate chu an chungah chhiar lovin, he inremna thuchah hi kan kutah a nghat a ni. Chuvângin, Pathianin keimahni zâra a ngenna che u ang maiin Krista tâna palai kan ni. Pathian nen inrem turin Krista aiawhin kan ngen che u a ni.

1. Chanchin tha tirhkoh kan ni

→→Anni chu dah suh ( putar )’s bawhchhiatnate chu an chungah a awm ( Mi thar a ni ), inremna thuchah min hlan tawh bawk.

(1) Mihring hlui leh mihring thar

Zawhna: Mihring hlui leh mi thar hi engtin nge kan thliar hrang ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Mihring hlui chu thuthlung hluia mi a ni a;
2 Mihring hlui chu Adama ta a ni a;
3 Mihring hlui Adama chu a piang a;
4 Mihring hlui chu leia mi a ni a, mi thar chu thlarau lam mi a ni--1 Korinth 15:44
5 Mihring hlui chu mi sual a ni a, mi thar chu mi fel a ni--1 Korinth 6:11
6 Mihring hlui chuan thil a tisual a, mi thar chuan thil a tisual lo vang - 1 Johana 3:9
7 Mihring hlui chu Dan hnuaiah a awm a;
8 Mihring hlui chuan sual dan a zawm a;
9 Mihring hlui chuan tisa thil a ngaihtuah a;
10 Mihring hlui chu a chhe zual zel a;
11 Mihring hlui chuan van ram a luah thei lo va;
12 Mihring hlui chu Krista rualin a thi a;

(2) Thlarau Thianghlimin tisa a do a

Zawhna: Thlarau Thianghlim hi khawiah nge a awm?

Chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlim chu kan thinlungah a nung reng a ni!

Fapa anga pawm kan nih theih nan Dan hnuaia awmte tlan turin. Fapa in nih avangin Pathianin a Fapa Thlarau chu in (literally, kan) thinlungah a tir a, “Abba, Galatia 4:5-6!”

Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi i ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. Rom 8:9

zawt : Kan taksa hi Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni an ti lo maw? --1 Korinth 6:19-ah hian kan hmu a
→→Hetah hian tisa mi i ni lo tih a sawi em? -- Rom 8:9

chhanna : A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Kan tisa chu sualah hralh a ni tawh

Dan chu thlarau atanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria a, kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh. Rom 7:14-ah hian kan hmu a

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Tisa chuan sual dan zawm hi a ngaina hle

Pathian hnenah lawmthu awm rawh se, kan Lalpa Isua Krista zarah kan tlanchhuak thei a ni. Hetiang aang hian ka thinlungin Pathian dan ka zawm a, ka tisa erawh chuan sual dan a zawm thung. Rom 7:25 ah hian kan hmu

3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Kan putar kha Krista nen khenbehin a awm a →→Sual taksa chu a boral a, he thi thei taksa atang hian i inthen ta a ni.

Rom 6:6-ah hian sual taksa chu tihboral a nih theih nan, kan nihna hlui chu a hnenah khenbehin a awm tih kan hria a;

4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thlarau Thianghlim chu piantharna ( Mi thar a ni ) chungah

zawt : Khawiah nge kan pianthar (mi thar)?

chhanna : Kan thinlungah! Amen

Chhungril mihring (original text) ang chuan Pathian danah hian ka lawm si a - Rom 7:22

Thil chhinchhiah: Paula chuan a ti a! Keimaha awmzia ang zelin (a original text chu mihring a ni) → hei hi ka thinlungah ( mi ) thihna ata Isua Krista thawhlehna chungchang ( thlarau mihring ) Thlarau taksa, thlarau mi chu keimahniah a nung a, hei hi hmuh theih loh ( thlarau mihring ) chu kei tak tak a ni a; Hlimthla ! Chuvangin Thlarau Thianghlim chu thlarau mi piangtharte zingah a cheng a ni! He piantharna ( Mi thar a ni ) Thlarau taksa hi Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni a, a chhan chu he taksa hi Isua Krista piang a nih avangin a member kan ni! Amen
Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

(3) Tisa châkna chu Thlarau Thianghlim nên a inhnial a

→→Putar leh mi thar an insual

Chutih lai chuan tisa anga piangte ( putar ) Thlarau anga piangte chu a tiduhdah thin ( Mi thar a ni ), tunah pawh hetiang hi a ni. Galatia 4:29-ah kan hmu
Kei chuan, Thlarauvah kal rawh u, tisa châknate chu in hlen chhuak lo vang, ka ti a ni. Tisa chuan Thlarau a châk si a, Thlarau pawhin tisa chu a châk si a, chung pahnihte chu an inhmachhawn a, chutichuan in duhzâwng chu in ti thei lo. Galatia 5:16-17-ah hian kan hmu a

Tisa anga nungte chuan tisa lam thilah an rilru an dah si a; Tisa lam ngaihtuah chu thihna a ni a; Tisa rilru chu Pathian hmêlma a ni si a, Pathian dân hnuaiah a awm lo va, a awm thei hek lo va, tisa mite chuan Pathian an tilâwm thei lo. Rom 8:5-8 ah hian kan hmu a

(4) Taksa chhungah emaw, taksa pawnah emaw

Kum sawm leh pali kalta khan Kristaa mi pakhat, van thumna thlenga hruai kai ka hria a (Taksaah a awm em tih pawh ka hre lo; taksa pawnah a awm em tih pawh ka hre lo; Pathian chauhin a hria; )... He Paradis-a hruai luh a nih avangin mi tumahin an sawi theih loh thu thup a hre ta a. 2 Korinth 12:2,4-ah hian kan hmu a

zawt : Paula mi thar nge a mihring hlui.
→→Van pathumna thlenga pawngsual i nih?

chhanna : 1.1. Mi thar piang thar a ni!

zawt : Engtin nge sawi ang?

chhanna : Paula lehkha thawn aangin

Tisa leh thisen hian Pathian ram a luah thei lo

Unaute u, ka hrilh a che u, tisa leh thisen hian Pathian ram a luah thei lo va, a chhe thei lo va, thi thei lo pawh a ni lo. 1 Korinth 15:50-ah hian kan hmu a

Thil chhinchhiah: Adama chu tisa leh thisen atanga lo piang a ni a, Pathian ram a luah thei lova, Lal Isuan a sawi a ni. Chuvangin, Paula mihring hlui, taksa emaw, thlarau emaw chu van pathumnaah hruaiin a awm tihna a ni lo va, Paula piantharna mihring thar ( thlarau mihring ) Thlarau taksa chu van pathumnaah chawisan a ni.

Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Thawhlehna leh piantharna chungchânga tirhkohte lehkha ziakte sawihoin:

[ peter ] Chi chhe thei aangin ni lovin, Pathian thu nung leh awm reng avang zawkin i piangthar ta zawk a ni... 1 Petera 1:23, Petera tan... Tin, zirtir dangte pawhin Isua thawhlehna chu an hmu a, Tirhkohte Thiltih bu-ah thu an sawi a Tirhkohte chuan, “A thlarau chu Hades-ah a awm lo va, a taksa pawhin chhiatna a hmu hek lo.
[ Johana chuan ] Thupuan inlarnaah hian Beram No zuitu mi 144,000 kan hmu a, nula thianghlim leh sawiselna nei lo an ni a, 1 Johana 3:9-ah chuan: "Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan sual a ti lo va, thil a tisual thei hek lo," a ti.
Chungte chu thisen a piang lo, châkna aanga piang ni lo, mihring duhzâwnga piang ni lo, Pathian laka piangte an ni. Isuan, "Tisa atanga piang chu tisa a ni; Thlarau atanga piang chu thlarau a ni. Johana 3:6 leh 1:13," a ti
[ Jakoba ] Isua hi a hmain a ring lo - Johana 7:5-ah Isua chu a mit ngeia Isua thawhlehna a hmuh hnuah chauh a ni tih a ring a duh angin thutak thu a sawi."

[ paul ] Thupuan dawn chu tirhkoh dangte aiin a ropui zawk - 2 Korinth 12:7 kalta khan van pathumnaah leh paradis-ah hruai a ni!

Amah ngei pawhin: "He mi Kristaa awm hi ka hria; (taksaah emaw, taksa pawnah emaw, ka hre lo, Pathian chauhin a hria.) tiin a sawi.
A chhan chu Paula ngeiin Pathian hrin a tawn vang a ni ( Mi thar a ni ) chu paradis-ah hruai luh a ni ta!
Chuvângin, thlarau lam lehkha a ziahte chu a hausa zâwk a, a thuk zâwk bawk.

Mihring hlui leh mi thar chungchângah chuan:

( Mi thar a ni ) Tu pawh Kristaa a awm chuan thilsiam thar a ni a; 2 Korinth 5:17-ah hian kan hmu a
( putar ) Krista nen khenbehin ka awm tawh a, keimah hi ka nung tawh lo... Galatia 2:20; nangmah ah a cheng a, tisa mi i ni lo ( putar )...Rom 8:9 → Tin, (mihring hluiah) kan awm reng hian Lalpa nen kan inthen tih kan hria. 2 Korinth 5:6-ah hian kan hmu a
( Thlarau Thianghlim ) Tisain Thlarau a châk si a, Thlarau pawhin tisa a châk si a: chung pahnihte chu an inhmachhawn a, chutichuan in tih duh chu in ti thei lo. Galatia 5:17-ah hian kan hmu a
( Thlarau taksa anga Krista nena thawhleh ) .
Tuh chu tisa taksa a ni a, tho leh chu thlarau taksa a ni. Taksa taksa a awm chuan thlarau taksa pawh a awm ngei tur a ni. 1 Korinth khua
15:44 ah a awm
( Mi thar inthuam la, Krista inthuam rawh ) .
Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. Kristaa baptisma chang tawh zawng zawngte chuan Krista in inthuam a. Galatia 3:26-27-ah hian kan hmu a
( Thlarau leh taksa chu humhalh a ni ) .
Remna Pathianin tithianghlim vek che rawh se! Tin, kan Lalpa Isua Krista lo kal hunah hian i thlarau, i thlarau leh i taksa chu sawisel bovin humhimin awm rawh se! A kotu che chu a rinawm a, a ti ngei ang. 1 Thessalonika 5:23-24-ah hian kan hmu a
( Piantharna, mihring thar taksa a lo lang ) .

Kan nunna Krista a lo lan hunah nangni pawh ropui takin a hnenah in inlar ve ang. Kolossa 3:4 ah hian kan hmu a

Tirhkoh Paula ngeiin a tawn ( Thawhlehna leh Krista nena piantharna ) chu van paradis pathumnaah chuan chawisan a ni ta! Thlarau lam lehkha hlu tak tak tam tak a ziak mai a, chu chu a hnua min ringtute tan chuan hlawkna nasa tak a ni a, mihring thar piangthar leh mihring hlui, hmuh theih mihring leh hmuh theih loh thlarau mihring, pianpui taksa inzawmna chu kan hrethiam thei a ni tin, thlarau taksa, sualna nei lo leh sual nei lo, thil sual ti tawh leh sual lo tur.

Mi thar angin Krista nen kan tho leh a ( thlarau mihring ) hian thlarau, thlarau leh taksa a nei! Thlarau leh taksa pawh hi venhim a ngai a ni. Amen

Chuvangin keini Kristiante tan chuan nei mi pahnih , mihring hlui leh mihring thar, Adama piang leh Isua piang mihring, Adam hnuhnung ber, tisa atanga lo piang tisa leh Thlarau Thianghlim atanga lo piang thlarau mi;

→→Nunna rah chhuah chu thinlung atanga lo chhuak a nih avangin Lal Isuan: “I rin dan ang zelin Matthaia 15:28

Tunlai kohhrana thuhriltu tam tak chuan thawhlehna leh piantharna hnua mi pahnih an awm tih hi an hrethiam lo. Thu hriltu pakhat chauh a awm →Mihring hlui leh mihring thar, pianpui leh thlarau lam, sual leh sual nei lo, sual leh sual lo Mixed preaching zirtirna pe tur che , putarin thil a tihsual hunah nitin a sualte tifai thin ang che, . Krista thisen hi thil pangngai angin en rawh . Bible chângte i en a, i tehkhin hian, an thusawi chu a dik lo niin i inhria fo a, mahse an thusawiah eng nge dik lo tih i hre lo? A chhan chu " Yes leh no tih kawng ", dik leh dik lo, Thlarau Thianghlim kaihhruaina tel lo chuan a danglamna i hre thei lo."

Putar sual hmachhawn dan tur "Ni leh Ni lo Thu" leh "Thlarau Thianghlima kal" tih te hi en la.

2. Krista Chanchin |ha palai ni rawh

→→Ni lo putar bawhchhiatnate chu Mi thar a ni I taksa chungah!

Hei hi Kristaa Pathian a ni a, khawvel hi amah nen a inremtir a, anmahni a inhlat lo ( putar )’s bawhchhiatnate chu an chungah a awm ( Mi thar a ni ), inremna thuchah min hlan tawh bawk. 2 Korinth 5:19-ah hian kan hmu a
Unaute u, tisa chunga bat nei kan ni lo niin a lang ( A chhan chu Kristan sual leiba a rulh tawh vang a ni ) tisa anga nung turin. Rom 8:12-ah hian kan hmu

Tunah chuan heng sualte hi ngaihdam a ni tawh a, sual avanga inthawina a awm tawh lo. Hebrai 10:17-18 ah hian kan hmu

3. Thawhleh mihring thar a lo lang ang

I thi tawh a, i nun chu Krista hnenah Pathianah thup a ni si a. Kan nunna Krista a lo lan hunah chuan nangni pawh ropui takin a hnenah in inlar ang. Kolossa 3:3-4 ah hian kan hmu a

Philippi 3:21-ah hian kan hmu a

articles.content:
Isua Krista a lo piang ta

---Rangkachak, rimtui, myrrh---

Matthaia 2:9-11 Lal thu an hriatin an kal ta a. Khawchhak lama arsi an hmuh chu an hmaah a kal nghal a, naupang awmna hmunah chuan a lo thleng a, a chungah chuan a ding ta a. Arsi an hmuh chuan an lawm em em a, Inchhungah chuan Nausen leh a nu Mari chu an hmu a, an ro hlute chu an hawng a, rangkachak, rimtui leh murra thilpekte an hlan a.

pakhat: rangkachak

Q: Rangkachak hian eng nge a entîr?

Chhanna: Rangkachak hi ropuina, zahawmna leh lal chhinchhiahna a ni!

rangkachak aiawhtu a ni inrintawkna →Call che ". inrintawkna "Isua Krista a lo lan hunah fakna te, ropuina te, chawimawina te in dawn theihna turin rangkachak meia fiahin boral thin ai chuan in hlu zawk a ni - 1 Petera 1:17 en rawh."

“Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun, chu zawng zawng chu a pe ta a ni lehkhathawn A ta chu a boral lo vang a, chatuan nunna a nei zawk ang. Johana 3:16-ah a awm

pahnih: mastic a ni

Zawhna: rimtui hian eng nge a entîr?

chhanna:" mastic a ni "A rimtui tihna a ni a, thawhlehna beiseina entirna a ni! Krista taksa a entir a ni!"

(1) Pathian ngaihsakna thuruk, tumah hnial theih loh chu a va ropui tak em! Tisa lama inlan Pathian a ni ( krista taksa ), Thlarau Thianghlimin thiamchantir, vantirhkohte hmuh, Jentailte hnena thu hril, khawvela rin, ropuinaa pawm - 1 Timothea Bung 3:16 en rawh.

(2)Pathian hnenah lawmthu awm rawh se! Kristaah min hruai fo thin a, keimahni hmang hian Krista hriatna rimtui chu hmun tina kan hriattir thin. Chhandam mekte leh boral mekte zingah pawh Pathian hmaah Krista rimtui kan neih vang a ni. He class (mi putar) tan chuan thihna rimtui (Krista nena thih) a ni a; mi thar piang thar leh ), a tan chuan rimtui nung a lo ni ta a ni ( krista nên nung rawh ). Hei hi tuin nge tuar thei ang? 2 Korinth 2:14-16-ah hian en theih a ni

articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan zir a, sawma pakhat chungchang kan sawi dun bawk!

Thuthlung Hluia Leviticus 27:30 hi han en ila, i chhiar dun ang u:
“Leia thil awm zawng zawng, .
Leia chi emaw, thing chunga rah emaw pawh ni se, .
Sawmna chu Lalpa ta a ni a;
LALPA tan a thianghlim a ni.

-------Sawmna hmun khat------

1. Abrama inpekna

Tin, Salem lal Melkisedeka (remna lal tihna) chu chhang leh uain kengin a lo hmuak a;
Abrama chu mal a sawm a, "Lei leh van Lalpa, Pathian Chungnungbera chuan Abrama chu malsawm rawh se! I hmelmate i kuta a hlan avangin Pathian Chungnungbera chu fakin awm rawh se!"

"Chutichuan Abrama chuan a hlawh zawng zawng hmun sawma ṭhena hmun khat chu Melkisedeka hnenah a pe ta a ni. Genesis 14:18-20."

2. Jakoba Inpumpêkna

Jakoba chuan thutiam a siam a: “Pathianin ka hnênah a awm ang a, ka kawngah min vêntîr ang a, ka pa ina thlamuang taka ka kîr leh theih nân ei tûr leh silhfên min pêk chuan Lalpa chu ka Pathian ka siam ang . Pathian.

Lung lungphun atana ka dinte hi Pathian biak in a ni bawk ang a, i thil pek zawng zawng chu hmun sawma thena hmun khat ka pe ang che. ”---Genesis 28:20-22 ah hian kan hmu a

3. Israelte Inpumpêkna

Israela thlahte rah chhuah hmun sawma ṭhena hmun khat, LALPA tana thilhlan chu Levi-hote hi roluah atan ka pe si a. Chutichuan, an hnênah, ‘Israel thlahte zîngah ro a awm lo vang. ’” tih a ni.
LALPAN Mosia thu a pe a, “Levi-hote hnênah sawi la, ‘Israel thlahte hnên aṭanga sâwma ṭhena hmun khat, in ro luah tûra ka pêk che u zînga hmun sâwma ṭhena hmun khat dang chu rochan atân in la leh tûr a ni LALPA—Number 18:24-26
Thilpêk pêk zawng zawng zînga a ṭha ber, tihthianghlimte chu LALPA hnêna hlan tûr thilhlan atân in hlan tûr a ni. --Number 18:29 ah hian kan hmu

4. Mi retheite hnenah hmun sawma ṭhena hmun khat pe rawh

"Kum thum danah sawma pakhat pek kum a ni. Ram zawng zawng hmun sawma ṭhena hmun khat i la tawh a ni."
Levi-ho (thil thianghlim thawktute) leh mikhualte, pa nei lote leh hmeithaite hnenah pe ula, in kulh kawngkaa ei tur an neih theih nan. Deuteronomy 26:12-ah hian kan hmu a

“Leia thil awm zawng zawng, .

---Leviticus 27:30-ah hian kan hmu a

I thil neih i hman a ngai a ni
tin, in rah hmasa berte chuan LALPA chawimawi rawh u.
Tichuan in thil dahkhawmna hmunte chu a tam zawkin a khat ang;

I winepress-te chu uain tharin a khat a. --Thufingte 3:9-10

7. "Tianku"-ah hmun sawma ṭhena hmun khat dah tum ang che.

Ka inah chaw a awm theih nan in sâwma pakhat ṭhena hmun khat chu bungruaah rawn keng la, mi fiah rawh, tiin Sipaihote LALPA thu chhuak a ni.
Vanram tukverhte a hawng ang em, i tan malsawmna a leihbuak dawn em ni, dawng tur hmun awm lo mah se? ---Malakia 3:10-ah hian kan hmu

articles.content:

Vawiin hian fellowship kan zir chhunzawm zel a, Kristian inpekna chungchang kan sawi chhunzawm zel bawk!

Bible Thuthlung Thara Matthaia 13:22-23 hi han en ila, chhiar ho ila: Hling zinga tuh chu thu ngaithlatu a ni a, mahse chutih lai chuan khawvel lungkhamna leh sum bumna chuan thu chu a tichhe ta a ni rah a chhuah thei lo tih . Lei thaa tuh chu a thu ngaithlatu leh hrethiamtu a ni a, a rah a chhuah a, a then chu a let za, a then sawmruk, a then chu a let sawmthum a ni. " "

1. Khawchhak lam atanga Doctor te inpekna

... Mi fing thenkhat chu khawchhak lam atangin Jerusalem-ah an lo kal a, "Khawiah nge Judate lal nia piang chu a awm? Khawchhak lamah a arsi kan hmu a, amah chibai buk turin kan lo kal a ni," an ti a.

2. Mi chi hnih inpekna

(1)Kaina leh Abela

Kaina → Ni khat chu Kaina chuan leia rah aangin LALPA hnenah thilhlan a rawn keng a;
Abela → Abela pawhin a berâm rual fa tîr leh an thau chu a hlan bawk. Lalpa chuan Abela leh a thilhlan chu a ngaihsak a, Kaina leh a thilhlan erawh a ngaihsak lo.

Kaina chu a thinrim hle a, a hmel pawh a danglam ta. Genesis 4:3-5 ah hian kan hmu a

zawt :Engvangin nge Abela leh a thilhlan chu fancy i lak?

chhanna : Rinnain Abela (a berâm rual zinga tîr ṭha ber berte leh an thau ber berte a hlan) chuan Kaina aia inthawina ṭha zâwk Pathian hnênah a hlan a, chutiang chuan thiamchantîr a nih thu, Pathianin a fel tih a târ lang tih hriattîrna a dawng a ni. Thi mah se, he rinna avang hian thu a la sawi reng a ni. Thuhmahruai Hebrai 11:4 ;

Kaina thilhlan chu rinna, hmangaihna, leh Pathian zahna tel lo a ni a, Jehova chu leia a rah chhuah chu a hlan mai a, a rah tha hmasa berte chu thilhlan atan a hlan lo had already rebaked him A thilpek chu a tha lo va, pawm tlak a ni lo tih a sawi bawk.

→Lalpa chuan Kaina hnenah: "Engvangin nge i thinrim? Engvangin nge i hmel a danglam? I tih that chuan pawm i ni dawn lo em ni? I tih that loh chuan kawngka bulah sualin a lo inkhuar a. Chu chuan a duh ang che. Nang, nang." a thunun ang,” Genesis 4:6-7.

(2) Mi vervêkte chuan sâwma pakhat an pe a

(Isua) chuan, “Nangni lehkhaziaktute leh Pharisaite u, mi vervêkte u, in chung a pik e!

Chu ai chuan, dana thil pawimawh zawk, rorelna dik, khawngaihna leh rinawmna te chu pawm theih a ni tawh lo. Hei hi i tih tur pawimawh zawk a ni a; Matthaia 23:23-ah a awm

Pharisai chu a ding a, a rilruin heti hian a tawngtai a: ‘Pathian, mi dang, mi rukru, mi fel lo, uire, leh he chhiahkhawntu ang ka nih loh avangin lawmthu ka sawi e. Kar khatah vawi hnih chaw nghei ka ni a, ka hmuh zawng zawng hmun sawma ṭhena hmun khat ka pe bawk. ’ Luka 18:11-12-ah kan hmu a

(3) Dân anga hlante chu Pathianin a duh lo

Halral thilhlan leh sual thawina i duh lo.
Chutih lai chuan heti hian ka ti a: Pathian, hetah hian ka lo kal a, .
I duhzawng ti turin;
Ka thiltihte chu lehkhabu zialah a inziak a.

Chutah chuan: “Inthawina leh thilpek, halral thilhlan leh sual thawina, in duh loh leh in duh loh (hengte hi dan ang a ni)” a ti a;

zawt : Engvangin nge dan anga thil hlan chu i duh loh?

chhanna : Dan anga hlan chu thupek a ni a, duhsak taka thilhlan ai chuan, thupekte kalpui a ngai a ni.

Mahse heng inthawinate hi kum tin sual hriatrengna a ni a, bawngpa leh kêl thisen chuan sual a la bo thei ngai lo. Hebrai 10:3-4 ah hian kan hmu

(4) "Sawma ṭhena hmun khat" pe rawh.

“Leia thil awm zawng zawng, .

Thil chhinchhiah: A chhan chu Abrahama leh Jakoba te hian an thinlunga an dawn zawng zawng chu Pathian pek vek a ni tih an hriat avangin za zela sawm pek an inhuam a;

Pharisaite erawh chu dan hnuaiah an awm a, dan inrelbawlna angin an pe chhuak vek a, an sum leh pai zawng zawng chu anmahni fing takin an hmu vek a, "ka hlawh zawng zawng" hmun sawma ṭhena hmun khat chu an pe chhuak a, chu chu chhiah pek ngei ngei tur a ni.

3. Hmeithai rethei tak inhlanna

Isuan a han hawi a, mi hausa chuan a thawhlawm chu sum dahnaah a dah a, hmeithai rethei tak pakhatin tangka te te pahnih a dah a, "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, he hmeithai rethei tak hian midang zawng zawng aiin a tam zawk a, mi zawng zawng tan a dah lut a ni," a ti a an neih aia tam a nei a ni." , thilhlanah chuan a dah a, hmeithainu erawh chuan a tlin lohna (Pathian hmangaihna rinna) avângin a nunna tûr zawng zawng a dah a ni.”

4. Mi thianghlimte hnenah pawisa thawh

Mi thianghlimte tâna thilpêk chungchângah, Galatia khuaa kohhranhote hnêna thu ka pêk ang khân, nang pawhin in ti tûr a ni. Kar tin ni khatnaah chuan mi tinin mahni sum lakluh dan azirin pawisa dah hran tur a ni a, chutiang chuan ka lo kal hunah an khawn a ngai tawh lo ang. 1 Korinth 16:1-2 ah hian kan hmu a
Mahse thil tha tih leh thawhlawm thawh theihnghilh suh u, chutiang inthawina chuan Pathian a tilawm si a. Hebrai 13:16 ah hian kan hmu

5. Thawhlawm pe duh rawh

zawt : Kristiante hian engtin nge an thilpek?

chhanna : A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) duhsak takin

Unaute u, Makedonia rama kohhranhote chunga Pathianin khawngaihna a pek chungchang hi ka hrilh a che u, fiahna leh hrehawmna nasa tak an tawh lai pawh khan, retheihna nasa tak karah pawh, thilpek kawngah ngilneihna nasa tak an la lantir a ni. An theihna ang leh an theihna aia nasain a thlawna leh duhsak takin an pe tih ka nemnghet thei a, 2 Korinth 8:1-3

(2) Duh loh vang ni lovin

Chuvangin, chu unaute chu in hnena lo kal hmasa a, a hmaa thawhlawm lo tiam tawhte chu buatsaih turin ka ngen a ngaiin ka hria, chutiang chuan in thawhlawm thawh chu duhthusam vang a ni lo va, nawr luih vang a ni lo tih a lantir ang. 2 Korinth 9:5-ah hian kan hmu a

(3) Thlarau lam hlawknaah tel ve rawh

Mahse, tunah chuan, mi thianghlimte rawngbawl turin Jerusalem-ah ka kal ta a ni. Makedonia mite leh Akaia mite chuan Jerusalem-a mi thianghlimte zinga mi retheite tan thawhlawm an khawn duh si a.
Hei hi an duhthusam ni mah se, a takah chuan leiba anga ngaih a ni (Chanchin |ha hril leh mi thianghlimte leh mi retheite tlin lohnate phuhrukna avanga leiba neih a ni a, a chhan chu Jentail-te hian an thlarau lam hlawkna an chan ve avangin, chutiang thilte chu an hmang tur a ni); an hriselna thlawp rawh. Rom 15:25-27 ah hian kan hmu a

Thlarau lam hlawknaah tel ve rawh:

zawt : Thlarau lama hlawkna chu eng nge ni?

Thil chhinchhiah: Chuvangin, Pathian ina hna thianghlim, Chanchin |ha hriltu chhiahhlawhte, leh mi thianghlim zinga unau rethei tak takte anpui turin hahnemngai takin thawhlawm i thawh chuan Pathian nen i thawk ho a, i thawhrimna leh thawhlawm i thawhpui a nih chuan Krista chhiahhlawhte, Pathianin a hre reng ang. Lal Isua Krista chhiahhlawhte u, nunna thlarau lam chaw ei leh in turin an hruai ang che u, tichuan in thlarau nun a hausa zawk ang a, nakin lawkah thawhlehna tha zawk in nei ang. Amen!

Isua i zui a, chanchin ha dik i ring a, chanchin ha hriltu chhiahhlawhte i thlawp bawk! Isua Krista nen hian ropuina, lawmman leh lallukhum inang an chang →→ Chu chu nangmah ang tho i ni tihna a ni: ropuina te, lawmman te, lallukhum te, thawhlehna tha zawk te, kum sâng hmaa thawhlehna te, kum sângkhat chhûng Krista lalna chu dawng khâwm rawh u , Van thar leh lei thar Isua Krista chatuanin rorelna nen. Amen!

articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Matthaia 25:1-13-ah hian kan Bible hi hawng ila: “Tichuan, van ram chu nula thianghlim sawm, an khâwnvâr la a, mo hmuak tûra chhuakte nên tehkhin a ni ang Mi fingte chuan an bêlah hriak an la lo va;

articles.title: Thlarau lam ralthuam bun rawh 7
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian inpawlhona leh insemna kan zir chhunzawm zel a: Kristiante hian Pathianin thlarau lam ralthuam a pek chu nitin an inbel tur a ni.

Lecture 7: Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhan la, engtik lai pawhin tawngtai la, dil rawh

Kan Bible hi Ephesi 6:18-ah hawng ila, i chhiar ho ang u: Engtik lai pawhin Thlarauva dilna leh dilna chi hrang hrang nen tawngtai ula, mi thianghlim zawng zawngte tan dilna siam turin hahdam lovin he thilah hian fimkhur rawh u.

1. Thlarau Thianghlimin nung la, Thlarau Thianghlimin che rawh

Thlarauva nung kan nih chuan Thlarauvah pawh kan kal zel tur a ni. Galatia 5:25-ah hian kan hmu a

(1) Thlarau Thianghlimin nung rawh

Zawhna: Thlarau Thianghlimin nunna chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Piantharna - chu Thlarau Thianghlima nun hi a ni! Amen

1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang - Johana 3:5-7
2 Chanchin |ha thutak atanga piang - 1 Korinth 4:15, Jakoba 1:18

3 Pathian atanga piang - Johana 1:12-13

(2) Thlarau Thianghlim hmanga kal

Zawhna: Thlarau Thianghlimin engtin nge i kal?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Thil hlui chu a liam tawh a, thil engkim chu thil thar a lo ni ta.

Tu pawh Kristaa a awm chuan thilsiam thar a ni a; 2 Korinth 5:17-ah hian kan hmu a

2 Mi thar piangthar chu mihring hlui tisaah a tel lo

In thinlungah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan nangni (mihring thar) hi tisa (mihring hlui) mi ni tawh lo, Thlarau lam mi in ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. Rom 8:9

3 Thlarau Thianghlim leh tisa châkna inkâra inhnialna

Kei chuan, Thlarauvah kal rawh u, tisa châknate chu in hlen chhuak lo vang, ka ti a ni. Tisa chuan Thlarau a châk si a, Thlarau pawhin tisa chu a châk si a, chung pahnihte chu an inhmachhawn a, chutichuan in duhzâwng chu in ti thei lo. Nimahsela Thlarau hruaia i awm chuan Dan hnuaiah i awm lo. Tisa thiltih chu a chiang hle: uirena, bawlhhlawhna, bawlhhlawhna, milem biakna, dawithiamna, huatna, inhnialna, inhuatna, thinrimna, pawl hrang hrang, inhnialna, thurin dik lo, leh inhuatna , zu ruih, lawmna, etc.. Ka sawi tawh che u a, tunah hian ka hrilh che u a, hetiang thil titute hian Pathian ram an luah lo vang. Galatia 5:16-21 ah hian kan hmu a

4 Taksa thiltih sualte chu Thlarau Thianghlimin tihlum rawh u

Unaute u, tisa anga nung turin tisa lakah bat kan nei lo niin a lang. Tisa anga i nun chuan i thi ang a, Thlarauvin taksa thiltihte i tihhlum chuan i nung ang. Rom 8:12-13 leh Kolossa 3:5-8

5 Mahni thar chu inbel la, mahni hlui chu dah bo rawh

In dawt sawi suh u, in nihna hlui leh a thiltihte chu in dah bo a, in nihna thar chu in inbel ta a ni. Mi thar chu a Siamtu anpuiah hriatnaah siam thar leh a ni. Kolossa 3:9-10 leh Ephesi 4:22-24-ah te pawh a awm

6 Mihring hlui tisa chu a chhe zauh zauh a, mihring thar erawh chu Kristaah chuan ni tin tihthar a ni.

Chuvang chuan kan lungngai lo. Pawn lam taksa (mihring hlui) chu tihchhiat zel mah se, chhungril mihring (mihring thar) chu ni tin tihthar zel a ni. Kan hrehawm tawrhna êng leh hun rei lote chhunga kan tawrhnate hian chatuan ropuina rit tak, tehkhin rual lohin min thawk ang. 2 Korinth 4:16-17-ah hian kan hmu a

7 Lu Krista hnenah lo seilian rawh

Rawngbâwlna hna thawk tûra mi thianghlimte thuam tûr leh Krista taksa siam ṭha tûrin, rinna leh Pathian Fapa hriatna inpumkhatna kan thlen hma loh chuan, mipa puitling tûrin, a san zawng tehna thlengin Krista famkimna,... Hmangaihna chauhvin thutak a sawi a, engkimah a lo thang lian a, Lu, Kristaah chuan a lo thang lian a, chu chuan taksa pum pui chu a vawn khawm a, a inzawm khawm a, inzawmna tin hian a thiltum rawngbawlin, a duh angin an in thlawp tawn a ni taksa peng tinte hnathawh, taksa chu a lo thanglian a, hmangaihnaah a insiam tha a ni. Ephesi 4:12-13,15-16-ah hian kan hmu a

8 Thawhlehna duhawm zâwk

Hmeichhia pakhat chuan a mitthi ngei pawh a kaihthawh a. Mi dangte chuan tihduhdahna nasa tak an tuar a, thawhlehna ṭha zawk an neih theih nân chhuah an duh lo (a thu bul chu tlanna a ni). Hebrai 11:35 ah hian kan hmu

2. Engtik lai pawhin tawngtai la, dil rawh

(1) Tawngtai fo la, rilru hah lo la

Isuan tehkhin thu a sawi a, mite chu tawngtai fo tur leh rilru hah lo turin a zirtir a. Luka 18:1

Tawngtainaa i dil apiang ring mai la, i dawng ngei ang. ” Matthaia 21:22 ah hian kan hmu a

(2) I duhzawng Pathian hnenah tawngtaina leh dilna hmangin hrilh rawh

Engmah lungngai suh la, engkimah tawngtaina leh dilnain lawmthu sawiin Pathian hnenah i dilnate hlan rawh u. Tin, Pathian thlamuanna, hriatthiamna zawng zawng aia nasa zawk chuan Krista Isuaah chuan in thinlung leh in rilru a veng ang. Philippi 4:6-7 ah hian kan hmu a

(3) Thlarau Thianghlimin tawngtai rawh

Nimahsela, unau duh takte u, rinna thianghlim ber ah insiam ula, Thlarau Thianghlimin tawngtai rawh u.

Kan Lalpa Isua Krista zahngaihna chu chatuan nunna lam hawiin, Pathian hmangaihnaah in vawng reng rawh u. Juda 1:20-21-ah a awm

(4) Thlarau nen tawngtai ang bawkin hriatthiamna nen

Paula chuan, "Hei hi engtin nge ni ang?" Thlarau nen tawngtai ka duh a, chubakah hriatthiamna nen pawh ka zai duh a, chubakah hriatthiamna nen pawh zai ka duh bawk. 1 Korinth 14:15-ah hian kan hmu a

(5) Thlarau Thianghlimin min tawngtaisak thin

#Thlarau Thianghlim chuan Pathian duh danin mi thianghlimte tan a tawngtai thin#

Chu bâkah, kan chak lohnaah Thlarau Thianghlimin min ṭanpui a, ṭawngṭai thiam lo mah ila, Thlarau Thianghlim ngeiin a ṭawngṭaisak ṭhîn. Thinlung zawngtu chuan Thlarau ngaihtuahna a hria a, a chhan chu Thlarau chuan Pathian duh danin mi thianghlimte tan a tawngtai thin a ni. Rom 8:26-27 ah hian kan hmu a

(6) Fimkhur la, fimkhur la, tawngtai rawh

Engkim tawpna chu a hnai ta. Chuvangin fimkhur leh fimkhur la, fimkhur la, tawngtai rawh. 1 Petera 4:7-ah kan hmu

(7) Mi felte awngaina hian tihdamna kawngah a angkai hle.

Nangni zînga tu pawhin hrehawm a tuar a nih chuan ṭawngṭai sela; Nangni zînga tu emaw damloh chuan kohhran upate chu kovin Lalpa hmingin hriak an hnawih thei ang a, an ṭawngṭaisak thei ang. Rinna tawngtaina chuan damlo chu a chhandam ang a, Lalpan a kaitho ang a, thil sual a lo tih tawh chuan (tar tisa sualte) ngaihdam a ni ang. (Hebrai 10:17 en rawh) Chuvângin, in tihdam theih nân in sualte chu inpuang ula, in ṭawngṭai tawn ula. Mi fel tawngtaina hian nghawng nasa tak a nei a. Jakoba 5:13-16-ah a awm

(8) Damlote dam turin tawngtai la, kut nghat rawh

Chutih lai chuan Publius-a pa chu khawsik leh dysentery natnain a muhil a. Paula chu a lut a, a tan a tawngtai a, a chungah a kut a nghat a, a tidam ta a. Tirhkohte 28:8
Isua chuan chutah chuan thilmak engmah a ti thei lo va, damlo tlemte chungah kut a nghat a, a tidam chauh a ni. Marka 6:5

Midang kut i nghah hian hmanhmawh suh; 1 Timothea 5:22-ah hian kan hmu

3. Krista sipai tha tak ni rawh

Krista Isua sipai tha tak angin ka hnenah hrehawm tuar rawh. 2 Timothea 2:3-ah hian kan hmu

Tin, ka han en a, Beram No chu Zion tlângah a ding a, a hnênah mi sîngkhat leh sângli leh pali, an hmaiah a hming leh a Pa hming ziak a awm tih ka hmu a. ...Hêngte hi hmeichhiain an tibawlhhlawh lo va; Beram No chu a kalna apiangah an zui thin. Pathian leh Beram No tana rah hmasa ber atan mihring zinga lei an ni. Thupuan 14:1,4

4. Krista nena thawhho

articles.title: Thlarau lam ralthuam bun rawh 6
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian inpawlhona leh insemna kan zir chhunzawm zel a: Kristiante hian Pathianin thlarau lam ralthuam a pek chu nitin an inbel tur a ni.

Lecture 6: Chhandamna lukhum bun la, Thlarau Thianghlim khandaih chu chelh rawh

Kan Bible hi Ephesi 6:17-ah hawngin, chhiar ho ila: Chhandamna lukhum bun ula, Thlarau khandaih, Pathian thu chu la rawh u;

1. Chhandamna lukhum bun rawh

(1) Chhandamna

Lalpa chuan a chhandamna a siam chhuak a, hnamte mithmuhah a felna a lantir a;
LALPA hnenah zai ula, a hming chu fak rawh u! Nitin A chhandamna thu hril rawh! Sam 96:2-ah hian kan hmu a

Chanchin tha, remna, chanchin tha leh chhandamna thlentu chuan Zion hnenah: I Pathianin ro a rel ang! He mi tlang lawn ke hi a va mawi em! Isaia 52:7 ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Engtin nge miten Pathian chhandamna an hriat?

Chhanna: Sual ngaihdamna - tichuan chhandamna i hre ta!

Note: I sakhaw lam "chhia leh tha hriatna" hian thiam loh a chang reng a nih chuan misual chhia leh tha hriatna chu a thianghlim lovang a, ngaihdam a ni lovang! Pathian chhandamna chu i hre lo vang - Hebrai 10:2 en rawh.
Pathianin a thusawi ang zelin Bible-a a sawite hi kan ring tur a ni tih hi a dik a, a dik bawk. Amen! Lal Isuan a tih angin: Ka beramte hian ka aw an hria a, kei pawhin ka hria a, min zui bawk - Reference Johana 10:27
A mite’n an sual ngaihdamna hmanga chhandamna an hriat theih nan...

Tisa zawng zawngin Pathian chhandamna an hmu ang! Luka 1:77,3:6-ah kan hmu a

Zawhna: Engtin nge kan sualte ngaihdam a nih?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(2) Isua Krista chhandamna

Zawhna: Kristaa chhandamna chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Isua ring rawh! Chanchin tha hi ring rawh!

(Lal Isua) chuan: "A hun a thleng ta, Pathian ram chu a hnai ta. Sim ula, Chanchin |ha chu ring rawh u!"

(Paula chuan) Chanchintha hi ka zak lo, ringtu zawng zawng tan, Juda tan leh Grik mite tan pawh chhandamna atan Pathian thiltihtheihna a ni. Pathian felna chu he Chanchin |haah hian a lang si a; Thuziak angin: “Mi felte chu rinnain an nung ang.”

Chuvangin Isua leh chanchin tha i ring! He chanchintha hi Isua Krista chhandamna a ni. Amen.

Zawhna: He chanchin tha hi engtin nge i rin?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

[1] Isua chu nula thianghlim, Thlarau Thianghlim rai leh piang a ni tih ring rawh - Matthaia 1:18,21
[2] Isua chu Pathian Fapa a nih rinna-Luka 1:30-35
[3] Isua chu tisaah a lo kal tih ring rawh - 1 Johana 4:2, Johana 1:14
[4] Isua rin hi nun dan bulpui leh nun êng a ni - Johana 1:1-4, 8:12, 1 Johana 1:1-2
[5] Kan zavaia sual Isua chunga nghattu Lalpa Pathian chu ring rawh - Isaia 53:6

[6] Isua hmangaihna hi ring rawh! Kan sualte avangin kraws-ah a thi a, phum a ni a, ni thum niah a tho leh a. 1 Korinth 15:3-4-ah kan hmu

(Hriat tur: Krista chu kan sualte avangin a thi a ni!

1 sual lak ata kan zalenna turin - Rom 6:7;

2 Dan leh a ânchhe lak ata chhuah zalen - Rom 7:6, Galatia 3:13;
3 Setana thiltihtheihna ata chhanchhuah - Tirhkohte 26:18
4 Khawvel ata chhanchhuah - Johana 17:14
Tin, phum a ni bawk!
5 Mihring hlui leh a thiltih dan ata min chhuah zalen rawh - Kolossa 3:9;
6 Mahni inhriatchhuah aangin Galatia 2:20
Ni thum niah a tho leh ta!

7 Krista thawhlehna chuan min siam thar leh a, thiam min chantir ta! Amen. 1 Petera 1:3 leh Rom 4:25-ah te kan hmu

[7] Pathian fa anga pawm-Galatia 4:5
[8] Mahni thar inbel la, Krista inbel rawh - Galatia 3:26-27
[9] Thlarau Thianghlim chuan kan thlarau nen Pathian fa kan ni tih a hriattir a - Rom 8:16
[10] Keini (mi thar) hi Pathian Fapa duh tak ramah min letling rawh - Kolossa 2:13
[11] Kan nun thar siam thar chu Krista nen Pathianah thup a ni - Kolossa 3:3
[12] Krista a lo lan hunah chuan keini pawh ropui takin a hnenah kan lo lang ang - Kolossa 3:4

Hei hi Isua Krista chhandamna a ni. Amen.

2. Thlarau Thianghlim khandaih chu chelh rawh

(1) Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chu dawng rawh

Zawhna: Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chu engtin nge kan dawn theih ang?

Chhanna: Chanchin tha, kawng dik chu ngaithla la, Isua hi ring rawh!

Amahah chuan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahna i nei a, chu chu thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin tha i hriat lai khan Krista pawh i rin lai khan. Ephesi 1:13-ah hian kan hmu a
Entirnan, Simon Petera chuan "Jentail" Kornelia inah thu a hril a, heng Jentailte hian thutak thu, an chhandamna chanchin tha chu an lo hria a, Isua Krista chu an ring a, a ngaithlatu zawng zawng chungah Thlarau Thianghlim a tla ta a ni. Thuziak Tirhkohte 10:34-48

(2) Thlarau Thianghlimin Pathian fate kan ni tih kan thinlungin a hriattir a

Pathian Thlarau hruaia awm apiang chu Pathian fate an ni si a. Hlauhna nei reng turin bawih nihna thlarau i dawng lo va, chutah chuan, “Abba, Pa” tiin kan au a, Thlarau Thianghlim chuan kan thlarau nen Pathian fa kan ni tih a hriattir a; fate, Chu chu ro luahtu, Pathian ro luahtu, Krista ro luahpuitu tihna a ni. Amah nena kan tuarpui chuan Amah rualin kan chawimawi bawk ang.
Rom 8:14-17 ah hian kan hmu a

(3) Ro hlu chu lei bêlah dah a ni

He thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi keimahni aanga lo chhuak ni lovin Pathian hnen aanga lo chhuak a ni tih lantir nan leia bêlah he ro hlu hi kan nei a ni. 2 Korinth 4:7-ah kan hmu

Zawhna: He ro hlu hi eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Thutak Thlarau Thianghlim a ni! Amen

"Mi hmangaih chuan ka thupekte in zawm ang. Tin, Pa hnenah ka dil ang a, Thlamuantu dang (a nih loh leh Thlamuantu; a hnuai lam ang bawk kha) a pe ang che u, chu chu chatuan in hnena a awm theih nan, chu chu thutak a ni. Khawvel hi." Thlarau Thianghlim chu a pawm thei lo va, Amah chu a hmu lo va, a hre lo bawk a, nangni erawh chuan Amah chu in hria a ni, nangmahniah a awm reng a, nangmahniah a awm ang Johana 14:15-17.

3. Pathian Thu a ni

Zawhna: Pathian Thu chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Chanchin |ha hril che kha Pathian thu a ni!

(1) A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a

A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, Tao chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Tao chu Pathian a ni. He Thu hi a tir lamah Pathian hnenah a awm a. Johana 1:1-2

(2) Thu chu tisaah a lo chang ta a

Thu chu tisaah a lo chang a, khawngaihna leh thutakin a khat a, kan zingah a awm ta a ni. Tin, a ropuina, Pa fa mal neih chhun ropuina chu kan hmu ta a ni. Johana 1:14

(3) Chanchin |ha ring la, pianthar leh rawh He Chanchin |ha hi Pathian thu a ni.

Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! A khawngaihna nasa tak ang zelin Isua Krista mitthi zing ata thawhlehna zarah beiseina nungah min pianthar leh ta... Chi chhe thei lo ni lovin chi chhe thei lo aangin i piangthar ta a, Pathian thu nung leh awm reng aangin. ...Lalpa Thu chauh hi chatuanin a awm.

Hei hi in hnena Chanchin |ha hril kha a ni. 1 Petera 1:3,23,25-ah kan hmu

Unaute u!

Khawlkhawm hi hre reng ang che.

articles.title: Thlarau lam ralthuam bun rawh 5
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian inpawlhona leh insemna kan zir chhunzawm zel a: Kristiante hian Pathianin thlarau lam ralthuam a pek chu nitin an inbel tur a ni.

Lecture 5: Rinna hi phaw atan hmang rawh

Kan Bible hi Ephesi 6:16-ah hawngin, chhiar ho ila: Chu bâkah, mi sual thal kang zawng zawng timit thei rinna phaw chu la rawh u;

(Hriat tur: Paper version chu "vine" a ni a; electronic version chu "shield" a ni)

1. Rinna

Zawhna: Rinna chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: "Rinna" tih awmzia chu rinna, rinawmna, thutak leh amen tihna a ni a;

2. Inrintawkna

(1) lehkha thawn

Zawhna: Lehkha chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Rinna chu thil beisei tak takte thupui, thil hmuh lohte finfiahna a ni. Hmanlai mite chuan he lehkhaah hian finfiahna mak tak tak an nei a.
Rinnain khawvelte hi Pathian thuin a siam a ni tih kan hria a; (Hebrai 11:1-3)

Entirnan, loneitu pakhatin buhfai a phun mek a, buh chi khat leia tla a, phun a nih chuan nakin lawkah buhfai tam tak a chhuah ngei a beisei. Hei hi thil beisei tak takte thupui, thil hmuh lohte finfiahna a ni.

(2) Rinna leh rinnaah innghat

Pathian felna chu he Chanchin |haah hian a lang si a; Thuziak angin: “Mi felte chu rinnain an nung ang” (Rom 1:17)

(3) Rinna leh thutiam

Isua ring la, chatuan nunna chang rawh:
“Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe a, amah ring apiang an boral lova, chatuana nunna an neih zawk nan (Johana 3:16)
Rinna aangin rinna lamah:
Rinna atanga innghat: Isua ring la, chhandam la, chatuan nunna nei rawh! Amen.
Rinna phawt chuan: Isua zui la, Chanchin |ha hril turin a hnenah leng la, ropuina, lawmman, lallukhum leh thawhlehna tha zawk dawng rawh. Amen!

Fa an nih chuan ro luahtu, Pathian ro luahtu leh Krista ro luahpuitu an ni tihna a ni. Amah nena kan tuarpui chuan Amah rualin kan chawimawi bawk ang. (Rom 8:17) tih a ni.

3. Rinna chu phaw anga lak

Chu bâkah, rinna phaw chu keng la, chu chuan mi sual thal kang zawng zawng chu i timit thei a ni (Ephesi 6:16)

Zawhna: Engtin nge rinna chu phaw atan kan hman ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1)Rinna

1 Isua hi nula thianghlimin a rai a, Thlarau Thianghlimin a piang tih ring rawh - Matthaia 1:18,21
2 Isua chu Thu tisaa siam a ni tih ring rawh - Johana 1:14
3 Isua chu Pathian Fapa a ni tih rinna-Luka 1:31-35
4 Isua chu Chhandamtu, Krista leh Messia anga ring rawh - Luka 2:11, Johana 1:41
5 Lalpa rinna hian kan zavaia sualna chu Isua chungah a nghat a - Isaia 53:8
6 Isua chu kan sualte avangin kraws-ah a thi a, phum a ni a, ni thum ni-ah a tho leh tih ring rawh - 1 Korinth 15:3-4
7 Isua chu mitthi zîng ata a tho leh a, min siam thar leh tih rinna - 1 Petera 1:3
8 Isua thawhlehna rinna hian thiam min chantir - Rom 4:25
9 Thlarau Thianghlim keimahniah a awm avangin kan nihna thar hi kan nihna hlui leh tisa hlui a ni tawh lo - Rom 8:9
10 Thlarau Thianghlim chuan Pathian fate kan ni tih kan thlarau nen a hriattir thin - Rom 8:16
11 Mahni thar inthuam la, Krista inbel rawh - Gal 3:26-27
12 Thlarau Thianghlim hian thilpek hrang hrang, thuneihna leh thiltihtheihna hrang hrang (Chanchin |ha hril te, damlo tihdam te, ramhuai hnawhchhuah te, thilmak tih te, tawng dang sawi te, etc.) min pe tih ring rawh - 1 Korinth 12:7-11
13 Lal Isua rinna avanga hrehawm tuarte chu amah rualin chawimawiin kan awm ang - Rom 8:17
14 Taksa tha zawk neia thawhlehna-Hebrai 11:35

15 Kum sângkhat leh chatuan Krista nên rorêl rawh! Amen-Thupuan 20:6,22:5

(2) Rinna hian mi sual thal kang zawng zawng tihmit turin phaw angin a thawk a ni

1 Mi sual bumna chu hrethiam rawh - Ephesi 4:14
2 hian Diabola ruahmannate a do thei - Ephesi 6:11
3 Thlemna zawng zawng chu hnawl rawh-Matthaia 18:6-9
(Entirnan: khawvel nunphung, milem, computer game, mobile network, artificial intelligence... tisa leh thinlung duhzawng zawm - Ephesi 2:1-8)
4. Harsatna nia hmelma do turin - Ephesi 6:13
(Bible-a chhinchhiah angin: Setana’n Joba chu a vuak a, a ke atanga a lu thlengin boils a pe - Joba 2:7; Setana tirhkoh chuan Paula tisaah hling a dah - 2 Korinth 12:7)
5 Ka hrilh a che u, "Farisaite (Danin thiam chantirte) leh Saddukai-ho (mitthi thawhlehna ring lo) dawidim lakah hian fimkhur rawh u i hrethiam em? ” Matthaia 16:11 ah hian kan hmu a
6 Khawvêl puma in unaute pawhin chutiang hrehawmna chu an tuar ve tih hriain, rinnaah nghet takin amah chu do ula. Khawngaihna zawng zawng Pathian, Kristaa a chatuan ropuina tura kotu che u chuan, rei vak lo i tuar hnuah amah ngeiin a ti famkim ang che, a tichak ang che, chakna a pe ang che. 1 Petera 5:9-10-ah kan hmu

7 Chuvângin, Pathian thu awih rawh. Diabola dodal la, ani chuan a tlanchhia ang che. Pathian hnaih la, Pathianin a hnaih ang che...Jakoba 4:7-8

(3)Isua zara hnehtute

(Diabola aiin a tha zawk, khawvel aiin a tha zawk, thihna aiin a tha zawk!)

Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan khawvel hi a hneh thin a, khawvel hnehtu chu kan rinna a ni. Khawvel hnehtu chu tu nge ni? Isua hi Pathian Fapa a ni tih ringtu a ni lo’m ni? 1 Johana 5:4-5-ah kan hmu

1 Tupawh beng nei chuan Thlarauvin kohhranhote hnena a sawi chu ngaithla rawh se! Hnehtu hnenah chuan Pathian Paradis-a nunna thing rah ei turin ka pe ang. ’” Thupuan 2:7
2 ...Hnehtu chu thihna pahnihnain a ti na lo vang. ’” tih a ni.
Thupuan 2:11
3 ...Hnehtu chu manna thup ka pe ang a, a hnenah chuan lung var, hming thar ziakna ka pe ang a, chu chu a dawngtu chauh lo chuan tumahin an hre lo vang. ’” Thupuan 2:17
4 Ka thupêkte chu a tâwp thlenga hnehtu leh zâwmtu chu, a hnênah hnamte chungah thuneihna ka pe ang ... a hnênah chuan zîng arsi ka pe ang. Thupuan 2:26,28
5 Tupawh hnehtu chu puan var a inthuam ang a, Nunna bu ata a hming ka thai bo lo vang a, ka Pa hmaah leh a vantirhkoh zawng zawng hmaah a hming a puang zawk ang. Thupuan 3:5
6 Hnehtu chu ka Pathian biak inah lungphun ka siam ang a, chuta tang chuan a chhuak leh tawh ngai lo vang. Tin, a chungah ka Pathian hming leh ka Pathian khawpui hming, Jerusalem Thar, van atanga lo chhuk, ka Pathian hnen atanga lo chhuk leh ka hming thar ka ziak ang. Thupuan 3:12

7 Hnehtu hnênah chuan ka lalṭhutthlênga ka hnênah ka ṭhuttîr ang, ka Pa hnênah a lalṭhutthlênga ka ṭhutpui ang bawk khan. Thupuan 3:21

articles.title: Thlarau lam ralthuam bun rawh 4
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian inpawlna kan zir chhunzawm zel a, Kristiante hian Pathianin thlarau lam ralthuam a pek chu nitin an ha tur a ni tih kan sawi chhunzawm zel a ni

Lecture 4: Remna Chanchin Tha hril

Kan Bible-te chu Ephesi 6:15-ah hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: “Remna Chanchin |ha nena leng tura inbuatsaihna chu in keah nghatin,” tiin.

1. Chanchin |ha

Zawhna: Chanchin |ha chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1)Isua chuan a ti a

Isuan an hnenah, "In hnena ka awm lai khan hei hi ka hrilh che u a ni: Mosia Dan leh Zawlneite leh Sam bua ka chanchin ziak zawng zawng chu a thleng famkim vek tur a ni," a ti a Pathian Lehkha Thute chu an hrethiam thei a, an hnênah: “Krista chu a tuar ang a, ni thum niah mitthi zîng ata a tho leh ang tih ziak a ni a, simna leh sual ngaihdamna chu a hmingin hril a ni ang a, Jerusalem aangin hnam zawng zawng (Luka Chanchin |ha bu. 24:44-47 -ah a awm a.

2. Petera chuan a ti a

Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! A khawngaihna nasa tak ang chuan Isua Krista thihna ata a thawhlehna hmangin beiseina nung nei turin piantharna min pe a, ro rochan chhe thei lo, bawlhhlawh lo leh bo thei lo, vanah in tan dah a ni. ...Pathian thu nung leh awm reng avang chuan chi chhe thei lo piangthar ni lovin, chhe thei lova piangthar in ni. ...Lalpa thu erawh chu kumkhuain a awm reng a ni. Hei hi in hnena Chanchin |ha hril kha a ni. (1 Petera 1:3-4,23,25) tih a ni.

3. Johana chuan a ti a

A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, Tao chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Tao chu Pathian a ni. He Thu hi a tir lamah Pathian hnenah a awm a. (Johana 1:1-2) tih a ni.

A tir aanga nunna thu bulpui chungchangah chuan hei hi kan hriat, kan hmuh, kan mit ngeia kan hmuh leh kan kut hmanga kan khawih chu a ni. (He nun hi a lo lang tawh a, kan hmu ta a, tunah chuan Pa hnena awm, keimahnia lo lang chatuan nunna chu nangmahni hnenah kan pe ta tih kan hriattir a ni.) (1 Johana 1:1-2)

4. Paula chuan a ti a

Tin, he Chanchin Ṭha hian chhandam in ni ang, engmah lova in ring lo va, ka thu hrilh che u hi in vawng tlat a nih chuan. Kei pawhin in hnena ka pek kha: Pakhatnaah chuan Krista chu Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin a thi a, phum a ni a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a ni thum niah kaihthawh a ni (1 Korinth 15 :2-4)

2. Remna Chanchin |ha

(1)Chawlh hahdamna pe rawh

Nangni thawkrim leh phurrit phur zawng zawngte u, ka hnenah lo kal ula, ka chawlhtir ang che u. Ka nghawngkawl chu in chungah keng ula, ka hnen atangin zir rawh u, ka thinlunga thuhnuairawlh leh inngaitlawm tak ka ni si a, in thlarau tan chawlhna in hmu ang. (Matthaia 11:28-29)

(2) tihdam a ni

Thingah chuan a khai a, kan sualte chu mimal takin a phur a, chutiang chuan sual thi tawhin felna kan nun theih nan. A vuaknain i tidam a ni. (1 Petera 2:24) tih a ni.

(3) Chatuan nunna chang rawh

“Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe a, amah ring apiang an boral lova, chatuana nunna an neih zawk nan (Johana 3:16)

(4) chawimawi rawh

Fa an nih chuan ro luahtu, Pathian ro luahtu leh Krista ro luahpuitu an ni tihna a ni. Amah nena kan tuarpui chuan Amah rualin kan chawimawi bawk ang.

(Rom 8:17) tih a ni.

3. Kea kal tura inbuatsaih nan pheikhawk angin remna chanchin tha nen in keah bun rawh

(1)Chanchin |ha chu Pathian thiltihtheihna a ni

Chanchintha hi ka zak lo, ringtu zawng zawng tan, Juda tan leh Grik mite tan pawh chhandamna atan Pathian thiltihtheihna a ni. Pathian felna chu he Chanchin |haah hian a lang si a; Thuziak angin: “Mi felte chu rinnain an nung ang” (Rom 1:16-17)

(2) Isuan van ram chanchin tha a hril a

Isua chuan khawpui tin leh khaw tinah a fang kual a, an inkhawmna inah zirtirna a pe a, ram chanchin tha a hril a, natna leh natna tinreng a tidam bawk. Mipui a hmuh chuan a khawngaih a, a chhan chu beram vengtu nei lo beram ang maia mi rethei leh tanpui theih loh an nih vang a ni. (Matthaia 9:35-36 Union Version) tih a ni.

(3) Isuan thlai seng turin hnathawk a tir a

Chuvangin a zirtirte hnenah, "Buh seng hi a tam hle a, hnathawktute erawh an tlem hle. Chuvangin, buh sengtu Lalpa hnenah chuan a buh seng tura thawktu tir turin ngen rawh u," a ti a (Matthaia 9:37-38) a ti a.

‘Buh seng hma thla li a la awm’ i ti lo em ni? Ka hrilh a che, i mit kha han chawi sang la, lo en rawh. Buh sengtu chuan a hlawh a dawng a, chatuan nunna atan buh a khawn khawm thin a, tichuan buh thehtu leh buh sengtu chu an hlim dun thei ang. ‘Pakhatin a tuh a, pakhatin a seng’ an tih angin, hei hi a dik tih a chiang hle. I thawhrim loh chu seng turin ka tir che a, mi dangte thawhrimna chu nuam i ti hle a ni. ”(Johana 4:35-38) tih a ni.

articles.title: Thlarau lam ralthuam bun 3
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian inpawlhona leh insemna hi kan chhui chhunzawm zel a, Kristiante hian nitin Pathianin a pek thlarau lam ralthuam hi kan inbel tur a ni:

Lecture 3: Felna chu i hnute khuh nan breastplate atan hmang ang che

Kan Bible hi Ephesi 6:14-ah hawng ila, chhiar ho ila: Chutichuan, thutak kawrfual chuan in kawrfual khirh la, felna kawrfual puan in khuh la, ding nghet rawh u;


1. Rorelna dik

Zawhna: Rorelna dik chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: "Gong" tih hian dikna, dikna leh dikna a kawk a;

Bible hrilhfiahna! “Felna” tih hian Pathian felna a kawk a ni!

2. Mihring felna

Zawhna: Mite hian "felna" an nei em?

Chhanna: Ni lo.

【Mi fel a awm lo】

Thuziak angin:
Mi fel an awm lo, pakhat mah an awm lo.
Hriatthiamna a awm lo;
Pathian zawngtu an awm lo;
Kawng dik aangin an kal bo vek a, .
hmantlak lohah an awm dun ta a ni.
Thil ha titu an awm lo, pakhat mah an awm lo.

(Rom 3:10-12) tih a ni.

【Mihring thil tih zawng zawng hi a sual vek】

An ril chu thlan inhawng a ni a;
An lei chu bum nan an hmang a, .
Adder thaw rimchhia chu a hmuiah a awm a, .
A hmui chu chibai bukna leh thinrimnain a khat a.
Thah leh thisen chhuah, .
An ke a thlawk a, .
Kawng lakah hian nunrawng leh nunrawngna a awm dawn a ni.
Remna kawng an la hre lo;
An mithmuhah Pathian hlauhna a awm lo.

(Rom 3:13-18) tih a ni.

【Rinna avanga thiamchantir】

(1) .

Zawhna: Nova kha mi fel tak a ni!

Chhanna: Nova (ringin) Lalpa, Pathian thupek zawng zawng a ti a, chuvangin Pathianin Nova chu mi fel a ti a.

Nimahsela Nova chuan Lalpa mithmuhah duhsakna a hmu a.
Nova thlahte chu a hnuaiah hian chhinchhiah a ni. Nova hi a thlahte zingah mi fel leh mi famkim a ni. Nova chu Pathian nen an leng dun a. ...Chu chu Nova tih chu a ni. Pathianin thu a pek apiang chu a ti zel a ni.

(Genesis 6:8-9,22) tih a ni.

(2) .

Zawhna: Abrahama kha mi fel tak a ni!
Chhanna: Abrahama chuan Jehova a (ring) a, Pathianin thiam a chantir ta a ni!
Chutichuan pawnah a hruai chhuak a, "Van lam hawi la, arsi te hi i chhiar thei ang em?" a felna chu.

(Genesis 15:5-6) tih a ni.

(3) .

Zawhna: Joba kha mi fel a ni em?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

"Hna"

1 Integrity kimchang: 1.1.

Uz ramah hian mi pakhat Joba a awm a, ani hi mi famkim leh dik tak, Pathian ṭih leh thil sual pumpelh mi a ni. (Joba 1:1) tih a ni.

2 Khawchhak mite zinga ropui ber berte:

A thil neihah chuan beram sangsarih, sanghawngsei sangthum, bawngpa pahnih za nga, sabengtung hmeichhia za nga, leh chhiahhlawh leh bawihnu tam tak a awm a. He mi hi khawchhak mite zingah chuan a ropui ber a ni. (Joba 1:3) tih a ni.

3 Joba chuan mi fel a ti a

Felnain ka inthuam a, .
Rorelna dik chu i puan leh lallukhum atan ha rawh.
Mitdel mit ka ni, .
Ke ke ruh tliak.
Mi retheite tan pa ka ni a;
Ka la tawn ngai loh mi pakhat chanchin ka hmuchhuak a.
...Ka ropuina chu keimahah a pung zel a;
Ka thal chu ka kutah a chak zual sauh sauh a. ...An kawng ka thlang a, a hmasa berah chuan ka thu thin....

(Joba 29:14-16,20,25) tih a ni.

Vawikhat chu Joba chuan: Kei hi mi fel ka ni a, Pathianin ka rorelna chu a la bo a (Joba 34:5) a ti a;

Note: (Joba simna) Joba 38 atanga 42 thleng khan Joba’n Jehova thusawi a ngaihthlak hnuah Jehova’n a chhang a.

Chutichuan, LALPA chuan Joba hnênah: Inhnialtu chuan Engkimtitheia chu a inhnial ang em? Pathian nena inhnial thinte hian hengte hi an chhang thei! ...(Job) Ka mi tenawm! Engtin nge ka chhan ang che? Ka kut chuan ka hmui ka khuh a ngai a. Vawikhat ka sawi a, ka chhang lo; (Joba 40:1-2,4-5) tih a ni.

Khawngaihin min ngaithla la, thu sawi ka duh a, ka ngen che a, min hmuhtir ang che. I chanchin ka lo hre tawh a, .
Tunah hian ka mit ngeiin kan inhmu leh ang. Chuvangin keimah leh keimah (or lehlin: ka thute) ka hua a, vaivut leh vut chhungah ka sim thin. (Joba 42:4-6) tih a ni.

A hnuah Lalpan Joba chu a duhsak a, a hnuah Lalpan a hma aiin mal a sawm lehzual a ni.

Chuvangin Joba felna chu mihring felna (mahni dikna) a ni a, khawchhak mite zingah chuan a ropui ber a ni. "Ani chuan, "Khawpui kawtah chuan ka chhuak a, kawtthlerah ṭhutna ka siam a, tleirawlte chuan min hmu a, min hlauthawng ta a, lal fapate chuan an lo ding chhuak ta a, an kâ chu an kutin an khuh ta a." hruaitute chu an ngawi reng a, an hmui chung lamah an lei an nghat a. Benga mi ngaithlatu chuan malsawmna min ti a;

...ka taksaah ka ropuina a pung a; Miin min hriat chuan an han hawi chho a, ka kaihhruaina chu ngawi rengin an nghak thin.

...An kawng ka thlang a, a hmasa berah ka thu a...(Joba 29:7-11,20-21,25)

---A nih leh Lal Isuan eng nge a sawi? --- .

“Mi zawng zawngin i chungchâng thu ṭha an sawi hian in chung a pik e!...” (Luka 6:26).

Joba chuan mi fel leh “mi fel” tiin a sawi a, mahse amah leh a chhungte chungah chhiatna a thleng ta a ni. I chanchin hi ka lo hre tawh a, tunah chuan ka mit ngeiin ka hmu che a ni. Chuvangin keimah leh keimah ka hua (or lehlinna: ka thusawi), vaivut leh vut chhungah ka sim thin! A tawpah chuan Pathianin Joba chu a hma aia malsawmna tam zawkin mal a sawm ta a ni.

3. Pathian felna

Zawhna: Pathian felna chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

【Pathian felna】

A huam: hmangaihna, ngilneihna, thianghlimna, hmangaihna nena khawngaihna, thinrim ngam, thil dik lo ngaihtuah lo, ngilneihna, hlimna, remna, dawhtheihna, ngilneihna, thatna, rinawmna, ngilneihna, inngaihtlawmna, insumtheihna, dikna, felna, êng, felna Kawng chu thutak, nunna, êng, tihdamna leh chhandamna a ni. Misualte tan a thi a, phum a ni a, ni thum niah a tho leh a, vanah a lawn ta a ni! Miten he chanchin ha hi ringin chhandam ni sela, tho lehin, piang tharin, nunna neiin, chatuan nunna nei rawh se. Amen!

Ka fate u, in sual loh nan heng thu hi ka ziak che u a ni. Tupawhin sual an tih chuan Pa hnenah thurawn petu kan nei a, Isua Krista mifel chu. (1 Johana 2:1)

4. Rorelna dik

Zawhna: Tunge mi fel?

Chhanna: Pathian chu a fel a ni! Amen.

Khawvel hi fel takin ro a rel ang a, Mite chungah dik takin ro a rel ang. (Sâm 9:8) .
Felna leh dikna chu i lalthutphah lungphum a ni a, hmangaihna leh thutak chu i hmaah a kal a ni. (Sâm 89:14) tih a ni.
Lalpa chu a fel a, felna a hmangaih si a; (Sâm 11:7) .
Lalpa chuan a chhandamna a siam chhuak a, hnamte mithmuhah a felna a lantir a (Sam 98:2)
lei rorel turin a lo kal si a. Khawvel hi fel takin a rêl ang a, hnamte chu dik takin a rêl ang. (Sâm 98:9)
Lalpa chuan rorelna dik a tihlawhtling a, thil dik lo titu zawng zawng phuba a la chhuak thin. (Sam 103:6) tih a ni.
Lalpa chu a khawngaihthlak a, a fel a; (Sâm 116:5) tih a ni.
Aw Lalpa, i fel a, i rorelna pawh a dik a ni! (Sam 119:137) tih a ni.
Lalpa chu a kawng zawng zawngah a fel a, a kawng zawng zawngah khawngaihthlak a ni. (Sam 145:17) tih a ni.
Nimahsela Lalpa Engkimtitheia chu a felna avangin chawimawiin a awm a; (Isaia 5:16) tih a ni.
Pathian chu a fel a nih avangin, nangmahni harsatna petute hnenah harsatna a rul ang (2 Thessalonika 1:6)

Ka han en a, vanram a inhawng tih ka hmu a. Sakawr var pakhat a awm a, a sakawr khalhtu chu Rinawm leh Dik an ti a, roreltu leh fel taka indo thin. (Thu Puan 19:11)

5. Felna chu i hnute khuh nan breastplate atan hmang ang che

Zawhna: Engtin nge felnain i thinlung i humhim theih ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Mihring hlui dah bo a, mahni thar inbel a, Krista inbel tihna a ni! Nitin Lal Isua Krista felna nen inthuam la, Isua hmangaihna thu hril rawh: Pathian chu hmangaihna, ngilneihna, thianghlimna, hmangaihna nena khawngaihna, thinur ngawih ngawih, thil dik lo ngaihtuah lo, hmangaihna, lawmna, thlamuanna, dawhtheihna, ngilneihna a ni . Misualte tan a thi a, phum a ni a, ni thum niah a tho leh a, kan thiamchantirna atan vanah a lawn ta a ni! Engkimtitheia ding lamah thu rawh. Miten he chanchin tha hi ringin chhandam ni se, tho lehin, piang tharin, nunna neiin, chatuan nunna nei rawh se. Amen!

6. Tao vawng reng la, thutak vawng reng la, thinlung venghim rawh

Zawhna: Engtin nge kawng dik chu i vawng tlat ang a, i thinlung i humhim ang?

Chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlimah innghat la, thutak leh kawng hate chu nghet takin vawng tlat ang che! Hei hi thinlung venhimna atan a ni a, darthlalang ang maiin.

1 I thinlung veng rawh

Thil dang zawng zawng aiin i thinlung i veng tur a ni.
A chhan chu nunnain nghawng a neihte hi thinlung atanga lo chhuak a ni.

(Thufingte 4:23 leh)

2 Kawng ha vawng reng turin Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhan rawh

Krista Isuaa rinna leh hmangaihnain ka hnen ata thu i hriatte chu vawng reng ang che. Keimahnia cheng Thlarau Thianghlimin kawng tha a pek che chu i veng tur a ni.

(2 Timothea 1:13-14) tih a ni.

3 Tupawh thuchah ngaithla mahse hrethiam lo

Tupawh vanram thu ngaithlatu chuan a hrethiam lova, tichuan mi sual chu a lo kal a, a thinlunga tuh chu kawng sirah a tuh a ni. (Matthaia 13:19)

Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?


7. Pathian nen lengdun

Aw mihring, thil ha chu Lalpan a entir che a ni.
I lakah eng nge a duh?
Rorelna dik i tih leh khawngaihna i hmangaih phawt chuan,
I Pathian nen inngaitlawm takin leng rawh.

(Mika 6:8) tih a ni.

8. Mi 144,000 velin Isua an zui a

Tin, ka han en a, Beram No chu Zion tlângah a ding a, a hnênah mi sîngkhat leh sângli leh pali, an hmaiah a hming leh a Pa hming ziak a awm tih ka hmu a. ... Hêng mite hi hmeichhiain an tibawlhhlawh lo va; Beram No chu a kalna apiangah an zui thin. Pathian leh Beram No tana rah hmasa ber atan mihring zinga lei an ni. (Thupuan 14:1,4)

lal Isua krista kohhran chu

Unaute u!
