articles.title: Thlarau lam ralthuam ha rawh 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian traffic sharing kan enfiah chhunzawm zel a

Lecture 2: Nitin thlarau lam ralthuam inbel thin ang che

Kan Bible hi Ephesi 6:13-14-ah hawngin, chhiar ho ila:

Chuvangin, Pathian ralthuam zawng zawng chu keng la, mangan nia hmelma i do theih nan leh engkim i tih zawh hnua ding turin. Chuvangin ding nghet la, thutak nen inbengbel rawh...

1: I kawr chu thutak hmangin khirh rawh

Zawhna: Thutak chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Thlarau Thianghlim chu thutak a ni

Thlarau Thianghlim chu thutak a ni:

Hei hi Isua Krista tui leh thisen chauhva lo kal a ni lo va, tui leh thisen hmanga lo kal, Thlarau Thianghlim hriatpuitu a ni, Thlarau Thianghlim chu thutak a ni si a; (1 Johana 5:6-7) tih a ni.

Thutak Thlarau:

"Mi hmangaih chuan ka thupekte in zawm ang. Tin, Pa hnenah ka dil ang a, Thlamuantu dang (a nih loh leh Thlamuantu; a hnuai lam ang bawk kha) a pe ang che u, chu chu chatuan in hnena a awm theih nan, chu chu thutak a ni. Khawvel hi." Amah chu a pawm thei lo va, Amah chu a hmu hek lo va, a hre hek lo, nangni erawh chuan Amah chu in hria a, nangmahniah a awm reng a, nangmahniah a awm dawn si a (Johana 14:15-17).

(2) Isua chu thutak a ni

Thutak chu eng nge ni?
Pilata chuan, "Lal i ni em?" ka awah Pilata chuan, “Thutak chu eng nge ni?”

(Johana 18:37-38) tih a ni.

Isua chu thutak a ni:

Isuan, “Kei hi kawng leh thutak leh nunna ka ni;

(3) Pathian chu thutak a ni

Thu chu Pathian a ni:

A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, Tao chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Tao chu Pathian a ni. He Thu hi a tir lamah Pathian hnenah a awm a. (Johana 1:1-2) tih a ni.

Pathian Thu chu thutak a ni:

Khawvel mi an ni lo, kei khawvel mi ka nih loh ang bawkin. Thutakah tithianghlim rawh i thu chu thutak a ni. Khawvela mi tirh ang khan kei pawhin khawvelah ka tir a ni. Anmahni avângin ka intithianghlim a, anni pawh thutak avânga tihthianghlim an nih theih nân.

(Johana 17:16-19) tih a ni.

Note: A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, Tao chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Tao chu Pathian a ni! Pathian chu Thu, nunna Thu a ni (1 Johana 1:1-2 en la). I Thu hi thutak a ni a, chuvangin Pathian chu thutak a ni. Amen!

2: Engtin nge i kawr chu thutak nen i khirh theih ang?

Zawhna: Engtin nge i kawr chu thutak nen i khirh theih ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Note: Thutak chu kawrfual anga hman, chu chu Pathian kawng, Pathian thutak, Pathian thu leh Thlarau Thianghlim fuihna te hi Pathian fate leh Kristiante tan chuan thuneihna leh thiltithei tak a ni! Amen.

(1) Piantharna
1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang - Johana 3:5-7
2 Chanchin |ha rinna aanga piang - 1 Korinth 4:15, Jakoba 1:18

3 Pathian atanga piang - Johana 1:12-13

(2) Mahni thar inbel la, Krista inbel rawh

Mi thar chu inbel rawh:

Tin, felna leh thianghlimna dik takah Pathian anpuia siam, mahni thar chu inbel bawk ang che. (Ephesi 4:24) tih a ni.

Mi thar inbel rawh. Mi thar chu a Siamtu anpuiah hriatnaah siam thar leh a ni. (Kolossa 3:10) tih a ni.

Krista inthuam rawh:

Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. Kristaa baptisma chang tawh zawng zawngte chuan Krista in inthuam a. (Galatia 3:26-27) tih a ni.

Lal Isua Krista inthuam fo la, tisain a duhzawng a hlen chhuah theih nan ruahmanna siam suh. (Rom 13:14) tih a ni.

(3) Kristaah awm reng rawh

Mi thar chu Kristaah a awm reng a;

Tunah chuan Krista Isuaa awmte tan thiam loh chantirna a awm tawh lo. (Rom 8:1 KJV) tih a ni.

Tupawh amaha awm reng chuan thil a tisual lo va; (1 Johana 3:6 KJV) tih a ni.

(4) Inrintawkna-Tuna mi dam hi ka ni tawh lo

Krista nen khenbeh ka ni tawh a, keimah ka ni tawh lo va, Krista chu keimahah a nung a, tuna tisaa ka nun hi Pathian Fapa, min hmangaih a, ka aia inpetu rinnain ka nung a ni. (Galatia 2:20 KJV) tih a ni.

(5) Mi thar chuan Krista a zawm a, puitlingah a lo thang lian ta a ni

Rawngbâwlna hna thawk tûra mi thianghlimte thuam tûr leh Krista taksa siam ṭha tûrin, rinna leh Pathian Fapa hriatna inpumkhatna kan thlen hma loh chuan, mipa puitling tûrin, a san zawng tehna thlengin Krista famkimna,... Hmangaihna chauhvin thutak a sawi a, engkimah a lo thang lian a, Lu, Kristaah chuan a lo thang lian a, chu chuan taksa pum pui chu a vawn khawm a, a inzawm khawm a, inzawmna tin hian a thiltum rawngbawlin, a duh angin an in thlawp tawn a ni taksa peng tinte hnathawh, taksa chu a lo thanglian a, hmangaihnaah a insiam tha a ni. (Ephesi 4:12-13,15-16 KJV) tih a ni.

(6) Mihring putar "tisa" chu a chhe zauh zauh a

A thu i hriat a, a zirtirna i dawng a, a thutak i zir a nih chuan i nihna hlui, i nihna hlui, a châkna bumna avanga tichhetu chu i paih bo tur a ni (Ephesi 4:21-22 Union Version). ) .

(7) Mi thar “thlarau mi” chu ni tin Kristaah a tharin a awm zel a

Chuvang chuan kan lungngai lo. Pawn lam taksa chu tihchhiat ni mah se, chhungril taksa chu ni tin a siam thar zel a ni. Kan hrehawm tawrhna êng leh hun rei lote chhunga kan tawrhnate hian chatuan ropuina rit tak, tehkhin rual lohin min thawk ang. Thil hmuh theih chu kan ngaihsak lo va, thil hmuh theih loh lam kan ngaihtuah zawk tih a lo lang ta a ni; (2 Korinth 4:16-18 KJV) tih a ni.

Chutichuan, in rinna chu mihring finnaah a innghat lo va, Pathian thiltihtheihnaah a innghat zawk ang. (1 Korinth 2:5 KJV) tih a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah:

Paula hi Pathian thu leh Chanchin Tha tan a ni! Tisa lamah chuan khawvêla hrehawmna leh chain a tawng a, Philippi khuaa a tân khân sipai tân in vengtu chu ralthuam famkim ha chungin Thlarau Thianghlim thâwk khum a ni! Chuvangin Ephesi khuaa mi thianghlim zawng zawng hnenah lehkha a ziak a, Kristiante hian thlarau lam malsawmna an nei a, Krista sipai tha tak tak an ni.

In fimkhur ula, mi â angin che suh u, mi fing angin awm zawk rawh u. Hun hmang tangkai rawh u, heng ni te hi a sual a ni. Mi â ni suh la, Lalpa duhzâwng chu eng nge ni tih hrethiam rawh. Ephesi 5:15-17 hi en rawh

Pathumna: Krista sipai anga Kristiante

Pathianin a pek che chu nitin ha rawh

-Thlarau lam ralthuam:

---Hmangaihna leh uire thliar hran dan---

Vawiin hian fellowship sharing: hmangaihna leh uirena kan chhui dawn a ni

Bible hi Genesis Bung 2, châng 23-25-ah hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u:
Chu pa chuan: Hei hi ka ruh ruh leh ka tisa sa a ni a, mipa hnen atanga lak a nih avangin hmeichhia i ti thei ang.

Chuvangin mipa chuan a nu leh pa kalsanin a nupui a vuan ang a, an pahnih hian tisa pakhat an lo ni ang. Hetih lai hian an nupa hi saruak an ni a, an zak lo.

1. Hmangaihna

Zawhna: Hmangaihna chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1)Adama leh Evi inhmangaihna

--An nupa chu an saruak a, an zak lo--

1 Adama chuan Evi hnenah, "Hei hi ka ruh ruh leh ka tisa sa a ni, hmeichhia ka ti ang che" a ti a!
"Hmeichhia" hi Pathianin mipa hnena thilpek a pek mawi ber berte an ni a, thutak, ngilneihna leh mawina an ni! Fakna, ṭhian, thlamuanna leh ṭanpuitu a ni!
2 Miin a nu leh pate a kalsan ang a;
3 I nupui chu zawm la, .
4 An pahnih chu pakhat an lo ni ta a.

5 Chu pa leh a nupui chu saruak an ni a, an zak lo.

[Hriat tur] Adama leh Evi chu Eden huanah an awm a, an thinlung chu thianghlim, thianghlim, hmangaihna dik, thutak, thatna leh mawina a ni! Chuvangin nupa chu saruak an ni a, mualphona an nei lo Hei hi mihringah la lut lo hmangaihna a ni.)

(2)Isaka leh Rebeki inhmangaihna

Chutichuan, Isaaka chuan Rebeki chu a nu Sari puan inah a hruai lut a, a nupui atan a nei a, a hmangaih ta a. Tunah chuan a nu a awm tawh loh avangin Isaka chuan thlamuanna a hmu ta a ni. Genesis 24:67-ah hian kan hmu a

[Hriat tur] Isaka hian Krista a entîr a, Rebeki hian kohhran a entîr bawk! Isaka chuan Rebeki chu nupuiah a nei a, a hmangaih em em a ni! Chu chu Krista chuan kohhran a pasal a, Kohhran a hmangaih tihna a ni.

(3)Hla Hla hmangaihna

【Mipa leh Nupa Duhawm tak】

"Hmangaih" tih hian Krista a entir a, .
"Nupa Tha ber":
1 hian nula thianghlim thianghlim a entîr a-2 Korinth 11:2, Thupuan 14:4;
2 hian kohhran a entîr a-Ephesi 5:32;

3 hian Krista mo a entir a - Thupuan 19:7.

Kei hi Saron rose leh ruam lily ka ni.
Ka hmangaih chu hmeichhia zîngah a awm a, hling zînga sakei ang maiin.
Apple kung chu thing zinga a awm angin ka hmangaih chu mihring zingah a awm a ni.
Hlim takin a thlazar hnuaiah ka thu a, a rah ka tem a, .

A thlum hlein a lang. Banquet hall chhungah min hruai lut a, ka chungah hmangaihna chu a banner atan a dah a. Hla Hla 2:1-4

Khawngaihin i thinlungah seal ang maiin min dah la, stamp ang maiin i kut ah min phur ang che.

Hmangaihna chu thihna angin a chak si a, thikna chu hremhmun angin a ngilnei a; Hmangaihna hi tui tam takin a timit thei lo va, tuilianin a chim thei hek lo. Tupawhin a chhungkuaa ro hlu zawng zawng hi hmangaihnain a thlak chuan hmuhsit a ni ang. Hla Hla 8:6-7

2. Uirena

Zawhna: Uire leh uire chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Rinna thlarau thianghlim piantharna angin:

1 Khawvel ṭhiante--Jakoba 4:4 en rawh
2 Lei lalte nena kohhran inpumkhatna--Thupuan 17:2 en rawh

3. Dan chunga innghatte--Rom 7:1-3, Gal

(2) Tisa rorelna thupek angin;

1 I uire tur a ni lo--Exodus 20:14
2 Tupawh a nupui ṭhen a, mi dang nei chuan a uire a; ” Luka 16:18-ah kan hmu a

3 Tupawh hmeichhia chu duhâm taka en chuan a thinlungah a uire tawh a ni - Matthaia 5:27-28

3. Hmangaihna leh uire thliar hran dan

Zawhna: Kristiante hian engtin nge hmangaihna an hriat chian?

Chhanna: Pathian thurualpui inneihna chu hmangaihna a ni!

1 Miin a nu leh pa kalsan a duh a, .
2 I nupui nên inpumkhat rawh, .
3 An pahnih chu pakhat an lo ni ta a, .
4 Pathian thawhhona a ni a, .
5 Tumah inthen suh se--Matthaia 19:4-6 en rawh
6 An pahnih hian saruak an ni a, .

7 Zak lo--Genesis 2:24 en rawh

Zawhna: Kristiante hian uirena hi engtin nge an hriat?

Chhanna: Pathian inrem taka inneihna "pawn lama" duhâmna eng pawh chu uirena a ni.

(Entirnan:) Genesis 6:2 Pathian fate chuan mihring fanute hmeltha tak tak an hmuhin anmahni duhthlannain nupuiah an nei ta a.

. Pathian”) → Pathianin a buatsaih inneihna a ni lo . Jakoba 2:16 hi en rawh
Genesis 3-4 (ni lo) Pathian chuan fa nei turin mihring hmeichhiate a thawhpui → "mi ropui, mi huaisen leh mi hmingthang" → "mi huaisen, milem, chapo, chapo" "lal" nih duh leh miten an biak emaw, chibai an buk emaw duh lote .
Tin, LALPA chuan mihring sualna chu leiah hian a nasa hle tih a hmu a, a ngaihtuahna zawng zawng chu sual mai mai a ni fo tih a hmu a, Genesis 6:5

4. Nungchang leh mizia (hmangaihna, uirena) .

Zawhna: Eng thiltih nge hmangaihna chu? Chu thiltihte chu uirena a ni em?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Nupui pasal

1 Pathian thawhhona inneihna

Mipa chuan a nu leh pa kalsanin a nupui a vuan ang a, an pahnih hian tisa pakhat an lo ni tawh ang! Pathianin a zawm inneihna chu mihringin a then thei lo. Entirnan, pasal chuan a nupui a ngai emaw, nupuiin a pasal a ngai emaw An pahnih hian saruak an ni a, mualpho lovin an "inpumkhat" → hei hi hmangaihna a ni. Khawngaihin 1 Korinth 7:3-4 hi en la.
Entirnan: Adama leh Evi - Genesis 2:18-24 en rawh
Entirnan: Abrahama leh Sari - Genesis 12:1-5 en rawh

Entirnan: Isaka leh Rebeki - Genesis 24:67 en rawh

2 Pathian malsawmna inneihna

Entirnan: Nova leh a chhungte - Genesis 6:18 en rawh
Entîrna: Jakoba chu Pathianin a hmangaih a, a nupui pahnih leh a bawihnu pahnihte chuan Israel hnam sawm leh pahnihte chu an hring a, hei hi Pathian malsawmna inneihna a ni!

Entirnan: Ruthi leh Boaza – Reference Luka: 4:13

3 Pathian thurualpui inneihna a ni lo

Entirnan, Abrahama hian hmei a la a, Hagari a mutpui chuan Abrahama chuan a nupui Sari a phu loh avangin a thinlungah "mualpho" a ti ang! Chuvang chuan Pathian duh loh zawng inneihna a ni. A tawpah chuan Ismaela "hnungtu" Hagari thlah tam zawk chuan Pathian kawng aangin an kalsan a, Pathian chu an kalsan ta a ni.

4 Pathian chuan mihring nungchang a en lo

Entirnan: Tamash leh Judai

Tamari nungchang leh a pasalṭhate nungchang chu tisa dan ang chuan "inngaihna" sualah a ngai a, Amaherawhchu, Pathianin Tamari nungchang chu a rinna chauh a ngaihtuah lo Pathian leh Juda chhungte tana fapa hrin a rinna chu Pathianin mi fel takah a puang a ni. Genesis 38:24-26, Matthaia 1:3 leh Deuteronomy 22 "Thianghlimna thupek" en rawh.

Entirnan: Lahaba leh Salmona--Matthaia 1:5

Entîr nân: Davida leh Bathsebi

Davida chuan "uirena leh thah tumin khandaih a loan" a ni. Tin, Davida chuan Pathian chu thinlung zawng zawnga a hmangaih a, engkimah Pathian duhzawng a zui avangin (Israel fate chu Pathian rinchhan tura a hruai) avangin Pathian thinlung angin mihring tia koh a ni. Tirhkohte 13:22 leh 2 Samuela 11-12 en rawh.

(2) Nupui nei lo mipa leh hmeichhia

"Hmeichhe mipa leh hmeichhia" tih hian nupui pasal nei lo mipa leh hmeichhia te chu an inngaizawng a, chhungkua din duhna a ni. I thinlungah mi dang nena duhâmna ngaihtuahna i neih chuan i uire tihna a ni.

Lal Isuan a tih angin: Nimahsela ka hrilh a che u, tupawh hmeichhia chu duhâm taka en chuan a thinlungah a uire tawh a ni. Matthaia 5:28 ah hian kan hmu

(3) Hmeithainute

Ka hrilh a che u, mipat hmeichhiatna hmang lova a nupui ṭhen chuan a uire a, nupui pasal nei tawh chu a uire a ni. ” Matthaia 19:9 ah hian kan hmu a

[Paula ngaihdan angin].

1 Nupui nei lote leh hmeithaite hnenah

I puih theih loh chuan nupui pasal i nei thei ang. Duhnain a kang ai chuan nupui pasal neih a tha zawk ang. 1 Korinth 7:9-ah hian kan hmu a

2 I pasal a thih chuan nupui pasal i nei leh thei

Pasal a dam lai hian nupui chu phuar a ni a, a pasal a thih chuan nupui chu a duh angin a zalen a, mahse Lalpaah chuan a awm ve chauh a ni. 1 Korinth 7:39-ah kan hmu

(4) Inneihna pawn lam thil
"Hongxing comes out of the wall" tih hian hmeichhe pakhat, estrus period chhunga par chhuak leh a mipat hmeichhiatna lama a duhna a lo thawk chhuak tih a sawi a, nupuiin mipa a inngaizawng a, mipa nen an inngaizawng tihna a ni. Mipain nupui pasal pawn lama inngaizawng emaw, hmeichhiain nupui pasal pawn lama inngaizawng emaw pawh ni se, an nungchang chu uirena a ni.
(5)Inngaihzawnna
Hmeichhia leh mipa inkara inngaihzawnna leh inngaihzawnna te hi uirena thiltih a ni.
Chuvang chuan Pathianin zahthlak châknaah a pe ta a ni. An hmeichhiate chuan an pianpui hmanna chu pianpui hmannaah an chantir a, chutiang bawkin an mipa, an pianpui hmanna kalsan a, duhâmna leh duhâmnain a ei zo vek a, mipain mipa hnêna thil zahthlâk tak tak an ti a, chu chu an phu a ni anmahni phuba lakna. Rom 1:26-27-ah hian en rawh
(6)Masturbation tih hi a ni

"Sual lawmna": Mipa emaw hmeichhia emaw thenkhat chuan sual aangin taksa lungawina leh nawmna an hmu a, chu chu ruihhlo ngawlvei a reh hnuah an thlarauah inchhir, hrehawmna leh engmah lo tihna a ni.

(7)Zan lama mumang (wet dreams) .

"Nitin ngaihtuahna, zan tin mumang": Mipa taksa hian androgen hormone a tichhuak a, "semen" a paih chhuak thin a hre lo; hmeichhiate tan pawh chutiang bawk chu a ni." Naupai laiin mipa nen sex hmanpui i mumang a nih chuan i uire tihna a ni.

Leviticus 15:16-24, 22:4 "Mipa zan lama chhuak" tih hi bawlhhlawh anga chhut a ni a, hmeichhiate tan pawh chutiang bawk chu a ni.

5. Tupawh Pathian atanga lo piang chuan engtikah mah sual a nei lovang

Zawhna: Engtin nge miin uire a pumpelh theih?

Chhanna: "Piangthar" a ngai a, Pathian atanga piang chuan a uire lovang.

Zawhna: Engvangin nge?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Mihring thar piangthar chu tisa mi a ni lo - Rom 8:9 en rawh
2 Krista Isuaah awm reng rawh--Rom 8:1 en rawh
3 Pathianah Krista nen thup--Kolossa 3:3 en rawh

4 Pathian hrin chuan thlarau taksa a nei a, tisa châkna leh châkna tel lo (Mi thar) chuan nupui a nei lo va, inneihnaah pawh pêk a ni lo. 1 Korinth 15:44 leh Matthaia 22:30 en rawh.

【Thil chhinchhiah】

Pathian atanga lo piang leh thawhleh chuan thlarau taksa a nei a - 1 Korinth 15:44 en la; tisa châkna leh châkna sualte, nupui pasal nei lo, nupui pasal neih chu vân aanga lo kal vântirhkoh ang a ni! Mi thar piangthar chuan thil a tisual lo vang a, a uire hek lo vang.

Entîr nân, tisa inrêlbâwlna thupêkte:

1 I that tur a ni lo

Isuan, "He khawvêla mite hian nupui pasal an nei a, inneihnaah pêk an ni a; nimahsela chu khawvêla tlâk tlâka ruatte erawh chuan mitthi zînga nungte chu nupui pasal an nei hek lo va; tin, thawhleh an nih aang khan Pathian Fapa angin Luka 20:34-36.

[Hriat tur:] Mi thar pianthar leh thawhlehte chu vantirhkohte ang bawkin an thi leh thei tawh lo. Chutih lai chuan "I that tur a ni lo" tih thupek hi zawm a ngai em ni? thihna emaw, chibai bukna emaw. Thupuan 21:4, 22:3 en rawh!

2 I uire tur a ni lo

Entîrna: Meizial zu duh leh zuk duh lote chuan an tisa chu sualah hralh an ni (Rom 7:14 en la, sual dan an duh (Rom 7:23 en la) leh an thinlungin a zui Tisa chuan meizuk a duh a;

Note: Mihring thar piangthar chu thlarau taksa a nih avangin tisa châkna leh châkna sualte a neih tawh loh avângin, vântirhkohte ang bawkin nupui pasal an nei lo va, an innei lo bawk a, chuvangin piantharna nei apiangin sual a ti lo vang a, uire pawh a ti lo vang!

Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo (Rom 4:15 en la)

Mihring thar piangthar chu Dân lak ata a zalên tawh a, thupêk (uire lo tûr) leh tisa dânte zawm a ngai tawh lo. Hei hi i hrethiam em?1 Johana 3:9, 5:18 hi en la

3 Ruk suh

Hriat tur: A ruat lawk tawhte pawh a ko va, thiam a chantirte pawh a chawimawi bawk. Rom 8:30-ah kan hmu. Hetiang a nih chuan Pathian ramah hian rukrukna a la awm em?

4 Thuhretu dik lo i sawi tur a ni lo

Note: Mihring thar piangthar chuan a chhungah Pa a nei a, a thinlungah Krista thu a nei a, Thlarau Thianghlim chuan Pa lawm zawng thil ti turin a insiam thar leh a, chutiang chuan "thuhretu dik lo" a pe thei ang em! dik e! Chuvangin heng dante hi i zawm a ngai em ni?

5 Duham suh

Note: Nangni Pathian atanga lo piangte hi Van Pa fate in ni vek a, Van Pa ro rochan in ni. A Fapa ngei chu khawngaih lo va, kan zavaia tana hlantu chuan engtin nge a thlawnin engkim min pek loh ang? Rom 8:32-ah kan hmu. Chutiang chuan i Pa vâna mi rochan i neih chuan mi dangte thil chu i la duh reng ang em?

articles.title: I Pathian Dik Chauh Hriat Rawh
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan enfiah a, "Pathian Dik Hriat" kan share bawk.

Johana 17:3-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar dun ila:

Hei hi chatuan nunna a ni: Nang Pathian dik awmchhun leh i tirh Isua Krista hriat hi.

1. I Pathian dik awmchhun hre rawh

Zawhna: Pathian dik pakhat hming chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Jehova chu a hming a ni!

Chuvangin Pathian dik awmchhun, A hming chu Jehova a ni! Amen.

Mosia’n a sawi ang khan: I hming chu eng nge ni?

Pathianin Mosia hnenah: "Kei hi ka ni" a ti... Pathianin Mosia hnenah: "Israel fate hnenah hetiang hian i sawi tur a ni: 'Lalpa, in pi leh pute Pathian, Abrahama Pathian, Isaka Pathian.' , Jakoba Pathian chuan in hnenah mi tir a ni

Zawhna: I Pathian dik awmchhun chu hre rawh, Pathian dik awmchhun i nih avangin!
Engvângin nge khawvêla mite hian milem tam tak, pathian dik lo leh thlarau tam tak an biak? Sakyamuni Buddha, Guanyin Bodhisattva, Muhammad, Mazu, Wong Tai Sin, in lama kawngkhar pathian, hausakna pathian, khaw chhunga khawtlang zung pathian, Bodhisattva, etc. te, leh hriat loh pathian tam tak an awm em?

Chhanna: Khawvel hi a hriat loh vang leh Pathian dik tak a hriat loh vang a ni.

Tirhkohte Thiltih bu-a Paula sawi angin: "Ka vak kual lai chuan in chibai bukte ka hmu a, maicham pakhat, a chungah 'Pathian hriat loh' tih ziak ka hmu a. Tunah chuan in biak loh chu ka hrilh che u a ni." hre rawh Lei leh van Lalpa Pathian chu mihring kuta siam temple-ah a cheng lo va, mihring kut chhuakin a rawng a bawl lo, engmah mamawh ang maiin amah ngeiin mi tin hnenah nunna leh thaw leh thisen engkim a pe a ni. leilung pum puia cheng turin mihring hnam zawng zawng siam turin, an hun leh an awmna tur ramri pawh a ruat lawk bawk a, chutiang chuan an zawng ang Pathian hi hriatthiam theih a ni a, mahse kan nun, kan chetna leh kan awmna zawng zawng hi amahah a innghat vek a, nangni hla phuahtute ang bawkin mi thenkhat chuan: "Keini pawh Pathian fa kan nih avangin .Pathian Pathianna chu mihring kutchhuak leh ngaihtuahnain a phun rangkachak, tangkarua, lungphun ang a ni tih an ngaihtuah tur a ni lo. Pathian chuan a en lo va, mahse tunah chuan hmun tinah mi zawng zawng chu sim turin thu a pe a, a ruat mipa hmanga khawvel hi fel taka rorelna tur ni a ruat tawh a, mi zawng zawng hnenah rinna a pe ang thi tawh tih finfiahna” Tirhkohte 17:23-31.

2. Jehova lo chu pathian dang an awm lo

Zawhna: Pathian dik pakhat chauh lo chu pathian dang a awm em?

Chhanna: Kei hi LALPA ka ni a, keimah hmaah pathian dang an awm lo; Min hre lo mah se, i kawrfual chu ka khirh ang (chu chu i kawrfual chu thutak hmangin ka khih ang a, thutak hriat nan, Pathian dik i hriat theih nan).

Ni chhuahna hmun aanga a tlakna thlengin, keimah lo chu pathian dang an awm lo tih mi zawng zawngin hre rawh se. Kei hi LALPA ka ni; Isaia 45:5-6 ah hian kan hmu a

【Tupawh LALPA ringtu chu chhandam an ni ang】

I ngaihtuahnate chu i sawi ang a, i sawi ang a, anmahni inkara inrawnkhawm rawh se. Hmanlai atang tawhin tuin nge kawhhmuh? Hmanlai atang tawhin tuin nge sawi? LALPA ka ni lo maw? Keimah lo chu Pathian dang a awm lo; Lei tawp zawng zawngte u, keimah hi en la, chhandam in ni ang; Isaia 45:21-22 ah hian kan hmu a

3. Pathian dik awmchhun hian mi pathum a nei a

(1)Pa, Fapa, Thlarau Thianghlim

Isuan an hnenah a lo kal a, an hnenah, "Lei leh vanah thuneihna zawng zawng ka hnenah pek a ni tawh. Chutichuan kal ula, hnam tin zirtirah siam ula, Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hmingin baptisma chantir rawh u," a ti a. " Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hmingin baptisma chang ula) thupek ka pek zawng zawng che u zawm turin zirtir rawh u, tin, hun tawp thlengin in hnenah ka awm reng ang." -20 a ni

(2)Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hming

Zawhna: Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hmingin! Pathian hming a ni em? A nih loh leh title a ni em?

Chhanna: "Pa, Fapa" tih hi title a ni a, hming a ni lo! Entirnan, i pa hi i tih ang chi hi a ni a, i pa hming chu Li XX, Zhang XX, etc. a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Zawhna: Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hmingte chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Pa hming: Pa Jehova--Exodus 3:15
2 Fapa hming: Fapa Jehova! Thu chu tisaah a lo chang a, Isua tia koh a ni ta! Matthaia 12:21, Luka 1:30-31 en rawh

3 Thlarau Thianghlim hming: Thlamuantu emaw, hriak thihna emaw an ti bawk--Johana 14:16, 1 Johana 2:27

(3) Pathian dik awmchhun hian mi pathum a nei a

Zawhna: Pa, Fapa, Thlarau Thianghlim! Hetiang pathian engzat nge awm?

Chhanna: Pathian pakhat chauh a awm a, Pathian dik awmchhun a ni!

Amaherawhchu Pathian pakhat, Pa chu kan nei a, a hnen atangin engkim lo piang kan ni a, Lalpa pakhat, Isua Krista, amah zarah engkim kan lo awm a, keini pawh ama zarah kan awm a ni. 1 Korinth 8:6-ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Mi pathumte chu engte nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Thlarau Thianghlim chu pakhat a ni
Thilpek chi hrang hrang a awm a, mahse Thlarau thuhmun a ni. 1 Korinth 12:4-ah hian kan hmu a
2 Nimahsela Lalpa pakhat, Lal Isua Krista a awm!
Rawngbawlna hrang hrang a awm a, Lalpa erawh chu a thuhmun a ni. 1 Korinth 12:5-ah hian kan hmu a
3 Pathian chu pakhat a ni

Hnathawh chi hrang hrang a awm a, mahse engkim a zawng zawnga thawktu chu Pathian pakhat a ni. 1 Korinth 12:6-ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Thlarau Thianghlim chu pakhat a ni a, Lalpa chu pakhat a ni a, Pathian chu pakhat a ni! Hei hi pathian pathum a ni lo’m ni? A nih loh leh pathian a ni em?

Chhanna: "Pathian" hi Pathian, Pathian dik awmchhun a ni!

Pathian dik pakhat hian mi pathum a nei a: Thlarau Thianghlim pakhat, Lalpa pakhat leh Pathian pakhat! Amen.

(Chutiang bawkin) taksa pakhat leh Thlarau pakhat a awm, beiseina pakhata koh in nih ang bawkin. Lalpa pakhat, rinna pakhat, baptisma pakhat, mi zawng zawng Pathian leh Pa pakhat, engkim chungah, engkim kaltlangin, mi zawng zawngah. Ephesi 4:4-6 ah hian kan hmu a

Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Okay, vawiin hian hetah hian fellowship hi i share ang u!

Pathian hnenah i tawngtai ho ang u: Abba Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista chungah lawmthu kan sawi a, Thlarau Thianghlim chungah lawmthu kan sawi bawk a, thlarau lam thutak hmuh leh hriat theihna tura kan thlarau mit min hawnsak avangin! Hei hi chatuan nunna a ni, nang Pathian dik awmchhun leh i tirh Isua Krista hriatna hi! Amen

Lal Isua hmingin! Amen

Ka nu duh tak hnena Chanchin |ha hlan.

articles.title: Thlarauvah kal rawh 2
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian kan enfiah chhunzawm zel a, kan traffic a, kan share chhunzawm zel bawk!

Lecture 2: Kristiante’n Sual an hmachhawn dan

Galatia 5:25-ah Bible hi hawng ila, chhiar ho ila: Thlarauva kan nun chuan Thlarauvah pawh kan kal a ngai a ni.

Rom 8:13 hi han hawi leh teh, tisa anga i nun chuan i thi ang;

Zawhna: Tisa bawhchhiatnate hi engtin nge kan tih ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 An (mihring hlui) bawhchhiatnate chu anmahni (mi thar) chungah dah lovin, inremna thuchah min hlan zawk a ni--2 Korinth 5:19 en rawh
2 Thlarauva kan nung chuan Thlarauvah pawh kan kal a ngai - Reference Gal 5:25
3 Taksa thiltih chu Thlarau Thianghlimin tihhlum rawh--Rom 8:13 en rawh
4 Leia awm i member-te chu tithinur rawh - Kolossa 3:5 en rawh
5 Keini (mi hlui) chu Krista nen khenbeh kan ni a, kei hi ka nung tawh lo--Gal 2:20 en rawh
6 Sual thiah (mihring putar) inngai rawh - Rom 6:11 en rawh
7 Khawvela a (mihring hlui sualna) nun huat apiang chuan chatuan nunna atan a (mihring thar) nun chu a humhim tur a ni. 12:25 chungchang sawina

8 Ring tharte nungchang dan--Ephesi 4:25-32 en rawh

[Thuthlung Hlui] Chuvangin, Thuthlung Hluiah chuan dan leh thupek a awm a, mahse Pathian hmaah chuan tumah thiamchantir an ni lo tih hi a chiang hle a, chuvangin Paula chuan tisa thunun nan heng thupekte hi i rinchhan chuan Lust hian a nei a ni, a ti engmah nghawng a nei lo--Kolossa 2:20-23 en rawh

Zawhna: Engvangin nge a hlawk loh?

Chhanna: Dan anga hnathawk apiang chu ânchhe hnuaiah an awm si a... Danin Pathian hmaah thiamchantir an ni lo tih hi a chiang - Galatia 3:10-11 en la;

[Thuthlung Thar] Thuthlung Tharah pawh Krista taksa zarah Dan lakah i thi tawh a...tunah chuan Dan lakah i zalen ta - Rom 7:4,6 en rawh! tunah hian i piangthar ta a ni Kristiante hian Thlarau Thianghlim awmna kan nei ta a ni. Chu chu, tisa châkna thiltih sual zawng zawng tihhlum tûra Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhan a, (mihring hlui) sual nun hua, (mihring thar) chu chatuan nunna atâna vawnghim tûrin kan innghah tûr a ni tihna a ni! (Mihring thar) Thlarau Thianghlim hmangin: hmangaihna te, lawmna te, thlamuanna te, dawhtheihna te, ngilneihna te, thatna te, rinawmna te, nunnemna te, insumtheihna te hi Thlarau Thianghlim rah a ni! Galatia 5:22-23 ah hian kan hmu a. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

9. Ro hlu chu lei bêlah dah rawh

He thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi keimahni aanga lo chhuak ni lovin Pathian hnen aanga lo chhuak a ni tih lantir nan leia bêlah he ro hlu hi kan nei a ni. 2 Korinth 4:7-ah kan hmu

Zawhna: Naute chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: "Ro hlu" chu thutak Thlarau Thianghlim a ni - Johana 15:26-27 en rawh

Zawhna: Lei bêl chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: "Lei bungrua" tih awmzia chu Pathianin bungbel hlu tak atan a hmang duh che tihna a ni - 2 Timothea 2:20-21 en rawh leia ro hlu dah chu kan mihring thar piangthar chunga Thlarau Thianghlim dah a ni.

Zawhna: Engvangin nge?

Chutiang chu: natna tihdam, ramhuai hnawhchhuah, thilmak tih, tawng dang sawi...etc.!

Chhanna: He thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi Pathian atanga lo chhuak a ni a, keimahni atanga lo chhuak a ni lo.

Entîr nân: Kristiante’n Isua an rin hmasak ber khân, anmahni ngeiin inlârna leh mumang tam tak an tawng ang a, an vêla thil mak tam tak a thleng ang. Mahse tunah chuan zawi zawiin a lo lang tlem hle a, a bo ta hial a ni? Thlarau Thianghlim thiltihtheihna lantir nan.

10. Thihna hian Isua nun pholang turin keimahniah a thawk chhuak thin

Isua nunna pawh keimahniah a lan chhuah theih nan Isua thihna chu kan keng tel fo thin. ...Chutiang chuan thihna hian keimahniah hna a thawk a, nangmahah erawh nunna hian hna a thawk a ni. 2 Korinth 4:10,12-ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Thihna bul tanna chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Isua thihna chu keimahniah a thawk chhuak a, Isua chu engtin nge a thih? A thihna ang chiaha Amah nen kan inzawm tawh a nih chuan a thawhlehna angah pawh Amah nen kan inzawmkhawm dawn a ni - Rom 6:5 en rawh tin, Isua thlarau chu kan keng tel fo thin.I kraws pu la, Lalpa kawng ni rawh. 35. Isua nun i neih chuan Isua nun i pholang thei ang Thlarau Thianghlim Nun chu Isua nun hriatpuitu a ni Amen!

"Chu ni hma chuan", mi zawng zawng hi vawi khat thi vek tur a ni a, khawvela mi zawng zawng hian tisa "pian, tar, natna leh thihna" an tawng vek ang a, thil dang avanga thi hial an ni ang a, mahse Kristiante hian Lal Isua hnenah tawngtai tam zawk sela, anmahni chu phalsak lo ila; taksa taksa "pian, tar chakna". Kan mihring hluiah hian a thihna hi a thawk chhuak thei turin Lal Isua hnenah kan tawngtai tur a ni a, kan kraws puin, Isua hnung zui a, thutak leh chanchin tha atan kan nun hlui hloh a, Krista nen thihna kan tawng ve tur a ni! I tar hunah chuan duhthusam ber chu i mut chhunga taksa lama thih emaw, i mut chhunga pianphung leh thlamuang taka thih emaw hi a ni mai thei.

11. Mihring hlui chu a chhe zauh zauh a, mi thar chu a lo thang zauh zauh bawk

Chuvang chuan kan lungngai lo. Pawn lam taksa chu tihchhiat ni mah se, chhungril taksa chu ni tin a siam thar zel a ni. 2 Korinth 4:16-ah hian kan hmu a

Thil chhinchhiah:

(Mihring putar) "Pawn lam taksa"chu pawn lam atanga hmuh theih taksa a ni a, tihchhiat ni mahse, he putar tisa hi duhthusam bumna avang hian a chhe zauh zauh thin - Ephesi 4:22 en rawh

(Mihring Thar) Krista nena kaihthawh chu thlarau taksa a ni - 1 Korinth 15:44 en rawh;" ") - Rom 7:22 hi en rawh.

→→Pathian atanga lo piang hmuh theih loh (mihring thar) chu Krista nena inzawm chu zawi zawiin mihringah a lo thang lian a, Krista san zawng famkim chu a tihlawhtling ta a ni - Ephesi 4:12-13 en rawh

Chuvang chuan kan lungngai lo. Pawn lam taksa (mihring hlui tisa) chu tihchhiat ni mah se, chhungril taksa (mihring thar piang thar) chu nitin tihthar lehin "mihringah a lo thang lian zel a ni." Kan hrehawmna rei lo te leh rit tak (mi hlui hrehawm tawrhnate dah bo) hian keimahni (mihring thar) tan chuan ropuina rit tak, tehkhin rual loh leh chatuan atan a hlen chhuak ang. Kan thil hmuh (mihring hlui) hi kan ngaihsak lo va, kan hmuh loh (mi thar) hi kan ngaihsak zawk tih a lo lang a, a chhan chu kan thil hmuh (mihring hlui) hi hun eng emaw chen chauh a ni a, mahse kan hmuh loh chu a ni see (mihring thar) chu chatuan a ni. 2 Korinth 4:16-18 hi en la, hei hi i hrethiam em?

12. Krista a lo lang a, mi thar a lo lang a, chatuan nunah a lut ta a ni

Kan nunna Krista a lo lan hunah chuan nangni pawh ropui takin a hnenah in inlar ang. Kolossa 3:4 ah hian kan hmu a

articles.title: Thlarauvah kal rawh 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian traffic sharing kan enfiah ho dawn a ni

Lecture 1: Kristiante’n Sual an hmachhawn dan

Kan Bible-a Rom 6:11 hi han hawi ila, chhiar ho ila: Chutichuan nangni pawh sual tan thiah in inngai tur a ni a, Krista Isuaah erawh chuan Pathian tan nung angin in inngai tur a ni.

1. Engvangin nge mi an thih?

Zawhna: Engvangin nge mi an thih?
Chhanna: Mite chu "sual" vangin an thi thin.

Sual man chu thihna a ni si a; Rom 6:23 ah hian kan hmu

Zawhna: Kan "sual" hi khawi atanga lo chhuak nge?
Chhanna: Pi leh pute hmasa ber Adama hnen atanga lo chhuak a ni.

Mi pakhat zarah sual chu khawvelah a lut a, sual avanga thihna a lo thleng ang bawkin, mi zawng zawngin thil an tihsual avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. Rom 5:12-ah hian kan hmu

2. "Thil sual" tih awmzia.

(1) sual

Zawhna: Sual chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Dan bawhchhiat hi sual a ni.

Tupawh sual chuan Dan a bawhchhia a ni; 1 Johana 3:4

(2) Thihna thlenga sual leh thihna thlenga sual (ni lo).

Miin a unaupa thihna thlen lo sual a tih lai a hmuh chuan a tan a tawngtai tur a ni a, Pathianin nunna a pe ang a, mahse thihna thlentu sual a awm chuan a tan tawngtai tur ka ti lo. Fel lohna zawng zawng hi sual a ni a, thihna thlen lo sual a awm bawk. 1 Johana 5:16-17-ah kan hmu

Zawhna: Thihna thlentu sual chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Pathianin mihring nen thuthlung a siam a, mihringin "thuthlung a bawhchhiat" chuan sual chu thihna thlentu sual a ni.

duh:

1 Adam-a’n Eden huana contract bawhchhiatna sualna--Genesis 2:17 en rawh
2 Pathianin Israel fate nen thuthlung a siam a (tu pawhin thuthlung a bawhchhiat chuan sual a ni ang) - Exodus 20:1-17 en rawh

3 Thuthlung Thar rin loh sualna --Luka 22:19-20 leh Johana 3:16-18 en rawh.

Zawhna: Sual "nilo" chu thihna thlentu chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Tisa bawhchhiatnate!

Zawhna: Engvangin nge tisa bawhchhiatna (ni lo) sualte hian thihna a thlen?

Chhanna: I thi tawh avangin - Kolossa 3:3;

Kan mihring tisa hlui chu a duhzawng leh duhzawngte nen Krista nen khenbeh a ni - Gal 5:24 en la;

Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a awm chuan tisa mi i ni lo - Rom 8:9 en la;

Tunah chuan keimah hi ka nung tawh lo va, Krista chu keimahah a nung zawk a ni - Reference Gal 2:20.

Pathian leh Keimahni【Thuthlung Thar】

Tichuan, ani chuan: An sualte leh an bawhchhiatnate chu ka hre reng tawh lo vang. Tunah chuan heng sualte hi ngaihdam a ni tawh a, sual avanga inthawina a awm tawh lo. Hebrai 10:17-18 hi i hrethiam em?

3. Thihna ata tlanchhuahna

Zawhna: Engtin nge thihna lak ata a tlanchhuah theih?

Chhanna: Sual hlawh chu thihna a nih avangin - Rom 6:23 en rawh

(Thihna laka zalen i duh chuan sual laka i fihlim tur a ni; sual laka zalen i duh chuan dan thiltihtheihna lakah i zalen a ngai a ni).

Boral! Khawiah nge hneh theihna i neih?
Boral! Khawiah nge i sting chu?

Thihna chil chu sual a ni a, sual thiltihtheihna chu Dan a ni. 1 Korinth 15:55-56-ah hian kan hmu a

4. Dan thiltihtheihna ata tlanchhuah

Zawhna: Dan thiltihtheihna lakah engtin nge kan tlanchhuah theih ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Dan laka zalen

Chutichuan, ka unaute u, Pathian tana rah kan chhuah theih nân, mi dangte ta in nih theih nân, Krista taksa avângin Dânah in thi bawk a ni. ...Mahse, min phuartu dan avanga kan thih aang khan tunah chuan dan lakah kan zalen ta a, chutichuan, kawng hlui ang ni lovin thlarau thar (thlarau: emaw Thlarau Thianghlim tia lehlin) angin Lalpa rawng kan bawl thei ang of ceremony tih a ni. Rom 7:4,6-ah kan hmu

2 Dan ânchhe laka zalenna

Krista chuan kan tâna ânchhe dawngtu a nih avângin Dân ânchhe lak ata min tlan a;

3 Sual leh thihna dan ata chhanchhuah a ni

Tunah chuan Krista Isuaa awmte tan thiam loh chantirna a awm tawh lo. Krista Isuaa nunna Thlarau dan chuan sual leh thihna dan ata min chhuah zalen ta si a. Rom 8:1-2 ah hian kan hmu

5. Piantharna

Zawhna: Piantharna hi eng nge i rin?

Chhanna: (Ring rawh) chanchin tha chu a piang thar leh ta!

Zawhna: Chanchin |ha chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: In hnena ka lo hlan chhawn pawh kha: Pakhatnaah chuan Krista chu Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin a thi a, phum a ni a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a ni thum niah kaihthawh a ni. 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a

Zawhna: Isua thawhlehna khan engtin nge min hrin?

Chhanna: Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! A khawngaihna nasa tak ang chuan Isua Krista thihna ata a thawhlehna hmangin beiseina nung nei turin piantharna min pe a, ro rochan chhe thei lo, bawlhhlawh lo leh bo thei lo, vanah in tan dah a ni. Nangni rinna avanga Pathian thiltihtheihnain a vawn tlat chuan chhandamna inbuatsaih chu hun hnuhnung bera puan chhuah tur chu i dawng ang. 1 Petera 1:3-5-ah kan hmu

Zawhna: Engtin nge kan pianthar?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang--Johana 3:5-8 en rawh
2 Chanchin |ha thutak aanga piang--1 Korinth 4:15;

3 Pathian atanga piang--Johana 1:12-13;

6. Putar leh a nungchang lakah inthiarfihlim rawh

Zawhna: Putar leh a nungchangte chu engtin nge kan paih chhuah theih ang?

Chhanna: A thihna angin amah nen kan inpumkhat tawh a nih chuan, kan mihring hlui kha a rualin khenbehin a awm tih hriain, sual taksa chu tihboral a nih theih nan, a thawhlehna angin amah nen kan inpumkhat ve bawk ang. sual kan thawh tawh loh nan Bawih Rom 6:5-6

Note: Kan thi a, kan phum a, Krista nen kan tho leh ta a ni! Kolossa 3:9 hi en rawh

7. Mi thar (a ta lo) chu mi hlui a ni

Zawhna: Putar chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Adama tisa zung atanga lo chhuak tisa zawng zawng hi putar ta a ni.

Zawhna: Mi thar chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Adam hnuhnung ber (Isua) atanga member lo piang zawng zawng hi mi thar an ni!

1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang--Johana 3:5-8 en rawh
2 Chanchin |ha thutak aanga piang--1 Korinth 4:15;

3 Pathian atanga piang--Johana 1:12-13;

Zawhna: Engvangin nge mi thar (a ta ni lo) chu mi hlui chu a nih?

Chhanna: Pathian Thlarau (i.e. Thlarau Thianghlim, Isua Thlarau, Van Pa Thlarau) chu nangmahah a cheng a nih chuan tisa (Adama mi hlui) ni tawh lovin (mihring thar) i ni tawh ang. chu Thlarau Thianghlim atanga lo chhuak a ni (chu chu Thlarau Thianghlim atanga lo chhuak a ni a, Krista erawh chu Pa Pathian ta a ni). Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. Rom 8:9 hi en la, hei hi i hrethiam em?

8. Thlarau Thianghlim leh Tisa

1 taksa

Zawhna: Taksa hi tu ta nge?

Chhanna: Tisa chu putar ta a ni a, sualah hralh a ni tawh.

Dan chu thlarau atanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria a, kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh. Rom 7:14-ah hian kan hmu a

2 Thlarau Thianghlim

Zawhna: Thlarau Thianghlim hi khawi atanga lo chhuak nge?
Chhanna: Pa Pathian hnen atangin Mihring thar chu Thlarau Thianghlim ta a ni

Nimahsela, Pa hnên aṭanga ka tirh tûr, Pa hnên aṭanga lo chhuak, Thlarau dik tak, Pa hnên aṭanga lo chhuak, Ṭanpuitu a lo kal hunah chuan ka chanchin a sawi ang. Johana 15:26-ah a awm

3 Thlarau Thianghlim leh tisa châkna inkâra inhnialna

Tisa chuan Thlarau a châk si a, Thlarau pawhin tisa chu a châk si a, chung pahnihte chu an inhmachhawn a, chutichuan in duhzâwng chu in ti thei lo. Galatia 5:17-ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Putar tisa duhzawngte chu engte nge ni?
Chhanna: Tisa thiltih hi a chiang hle: uirena, bawlhhlawhna, bawlhhlawhna, milem biakna, dawithiamna, huatna, inhnialna, inhuatna, thinrimna, pawl hrang hrang, inhnialna, thurin dik lo, leh inhuatna), zu ruih, carousing, etc. Ka sawi tawh che u a, tunah hian ka hrilh che u a, hetiang thil titute hian Pathian ram an luah lo vang. Galatia 5:19-21 ah hian kan hmu a

4 Mi thar chuan Pathian dân chu a lâwm a;

A chhan chu a chhungril lam awmzia (a bul tanna chu mihring a ni) (chu chu mihring thar piangthar tihna a ni), (mihring thar) ang chuan Pathian dan hi ka duh a, mahse ka taksaah hian indona dan dang a awm niin ka hria a; ka thinlungah dan dahin salah min man thin. Ka vanduai lutuk! He thihna taksa lakah hian tuin nge min chhanchhuak thei ang? Pathian hnenah lawmthu awm rawh se, kan Lalpa Isua Krista zarah kan tlanchhuak thei a ni. Hetiang hian ka thinlungin Pathian dan (mihring thar) ka zawm a, ka tisa (mihring hlui) erawh chuan sual dan a zawm thung. Rom 7:22-25 ah hian kan hmu

Zawhna: Pathian dan chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: "Pathian dan" tih hi Thlarau Thianghlim dan, zalenna dan leh Thlarau Thianghlim rah a ni - Rom 8:2 en rawh - Gal 6:2; hmangaihna chungchang - Rom 13:10, Matthaia 22:37-40 leh 1 Johana 4:16;

articles.title: Thlarau lam ralthuam ha rawh 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Remna awm rawh u, unaute u!

Vawiin hian i zawng chhuak ang u, i fellowship ang u, i share dun ang u! Bible Ephesi: 1.1.

Thuhmahruai Pathian thu!

thlarau lam malsawmna a dawng

1: Fapa nihna nei rawh

Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! Van hmuna thlarau malsawmna tinreng Kristaah malsawmna min pe a ni: Pathianin khawvel din a nih hmaa Amahah min thlan ang khan min hmangaihna avangin Amahah min ruat lawk a ni Isua Krista zâra fate anga pawm tûrin, a duhzâwng duhzâwng ang zêlin (Ephesi 1:3-5)

2: Pathian khawngaihna

He Fapa duh tak thisen zarah tlanna kan nei a, kan sual ngaihdamna, a khawngaihna hausakna ang zelin. He khawngaihna hi Pathianin finna leh hriatthiamna zawng zawngah tam takin min pe a, chu zawng zawng chu a duhzawng tha ang zelin a ni a, chu chu a duhzawng thuruk min hriattir tura a ruat lawk a ni a, chutiang chuan hun famkima a siam theih nan van lam thilte chu a ruahmanna angin , leia thil awm zawng zawng chu Kristaah a inpumkhat vek a ni. Amahah chuan rochan kan nei bawk a, a duhzawng anga thil engkim thawktu chuan a tum ang zela ruat lawk kan ni a, chutichuan, keimahni, Kristaa hmasa berte zarah a ropuina kan chang thei ang fak a ni ang. (Ephesi 1:7-12) tih a ni.

Pathumna: Thlarau Thianghlim tiam tawha chhinchhiahna awm

Amahah chuan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahna i nei a, chu chu thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin tha i hriat lai khan Krista pawh i rin lai khan. He Thlarau Thianghlim hi Pathian mite (original text: inheritance) a ropuina fak tura tlan an nih hma loh chuan kan rochan thutiam (original text: inheritance) a ni. (Ephesi 1:13-14) tih a ni.

Pali: Krista nen thi la, Krista nen tho leh la, a hnenah vanah awm rawh


I bawhchhiatna leh sualnaah i thi tawh a, ani chuan a tinung ta che a ni. Chutah chuan he khawvêl kalphung ang zêlin, boruak thiltihtheihna lalber, tûna thuâwih lohna fate zînga thawktu thlarau thu âwih chungin i kal a ni. Chung zingah chuan kan awm vek a, tisa châknate chu kan inhlim a, tisa leh thinlung duhzâwngte kan zui a, kan pianphungah chuan mi zawng zawng ang bawkin thinurna fa kan ni. Amaherawhchu, khawngaihnaa hausa leh hmangaihna nasa tak nena min hmangaihtu Pathian chuan kan bawhchhiatnatea kan thih lai pawhin Krista nen min nungtir thin. Khawngaihna vangin chhandam i ni. Tin, min kaitho a, Krista Isuaah chuan van hmunah min ṭhutpui bawk (Ephesi 2:1-6)

Panga: Pathianin ralthuam a pek chu ha rawh

Thu hnuhnung ber ka nei: Lalpaah leh A thiltihtheihnaah chak takin awm rawh. Pathian ralthuam zawng zawng ha la, Diabola remruatnate i do theih nan. Tisa leh thisen nen kan inbei lo va, lalna te, thuneihna te, khawvel thim chunga roreltu te, hmun sâra thlarau sualna te nen kan indo zawk si a. Chuvangin, Pathian ralthuam zawng zawng chu keng la, mangan nia hmelma i do theih nan leh engkim i tih zawh hnua ding turin. Chutichuan, ding nghet takin ding la, i kawr chu thutakin khuh la, i rilru chu felna kawrfual chuan khuh la, i keah remna chanchin tha pheikhawk bun rawh. Chu bâkah, rinna phaw chu keng la, chu chuan mi sual thal kang zawng zawng chu i timit thei a, chubakah chhandamna lukhum leh Thlarau khandaih, chu chu a ni Pathian thu chu engtik lai pawhin Thlarauva dilna leh dilna chi hrang hrang nen tawngtai la, mi thianghlim zawng zawng tan leh keimah tan pawh tawngtai chau lovin hemi kawngah hian fimkhur rawh u, chutiang chuan huaisen takin thu ka sawi thei ang Chanchin |ha thurukte puang chhuakin, (I He Chanchin Tha thuruk atan hian chain-a mi tirhkoh,) ka tih tur ang zelin huaisen takin min sawitir a. (Ephesi 6:10-20)

Paruk: Thlarau lam hla hmangin Pathian fak rawh

Sam te, fakna hla te, thlarau lam hlatein inbia ula, in thinlung leh in kâin Lalpa chu zai ula, in fak ṭhîn. Kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin engkim chungah Pa Pathian hnenah lawmthu sawi fo ang che. Krista zahna avang hian kan intukluh tawn tur a ni.
(Ephesi 5:19-21) tih a ni.

Pasarih: I thinlung mit ti eng rawh

Kan Lalpa Isua Krista tan tawngtai rawh u Pathian, ropuina Pa chuan Amah hriatnaah finna leh inpuanna Thlarau chu a pe che u a, in thinlung mit a ti eng a, tichuan a kohna beiseina leh a kohna beiseina chu in hriat theih nan mi thianghlimte Rochan ropuina hausakna chu eng nge ni a, Kristaa thihna ata kaihthawh leh vanah a thut theihna tura a thiltihtheihna ropui tak ang khan keini ringtute chungah chuan a thiltihtheihna ropui tak chu a va ropui tak em A kut dinglam a dah a, (Ephesi 1:17-20) a ni.

articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian traffic sharing kan enfiah dawn a ni: "Baptisma" Kristian Nun Thar Pattern

Rom Bung 6, châng 3-4-ah hian kan Bible i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u:

Keini Krista Isua baptisma changte kha a thihnaah baptisma kan chang tih in hre lo em ni? Chuvangin Krista chu Pa ropuina avanga mitthi zing ata kaihthawh a nih ang khan nunna thara kan len theihna turin thihnaa baptisma changin a hnenah phum kan ni.

Zawhna: Engtin nge Isua zawm theih ang?

chhanna: baptisma changin Isuaah a lut a ni !

1 Isuaah baptisma chang rawh--Rom 6:3
2 Kan nihna hlui chu Amah nen khenbeh kan ni--Rom 6:6
3 Amah nen thi rawh--Rom 6:6
4 Amah phum a ni--Rom 6:4

6 A thihna angin amah nen in inzawm tawh a, a thawhlehna angin a hnenah in inzawm bawk ang - Rom 6:5

Ka kut leh ke i en chuan keimah ka ni tak zet tih i hre mai ang. Min khawih la, en rawh! Thlarau chuan ruh leh tisa a nei lo I hmu a, ka nei. ” Luka 24:39-ah kan hmu a

Chhanna: Isua chu kan sualte avangin a thi a, chuta tang chuan min chhuah zalen ta a ni. Thihna ang taka amah nena inpumkhat a nih avangin kan putar chu amah nen khenbeh a ni a, sual taksa chu tihboral a nih theih nan, sual bawih kan nih tawh loh nan, thi tawh chu sual lak ata a chhuah zalen tawh si a. Rom 6:6-7 leh Kol 3:3 en la, in thi tawh si a...!

3. (Rinna) Pathian atanga lo piang apiangin an sual ngai lovang

Zawhna: Engvangin nge Pathian atanga lo piang apiangin thil an tihsual loh?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Isuan a thisen ngei hmangin mi sual a silfai (vawi khat). Hebrai 1:3 leh 9:12 hi en rawh
(2) Krista thisen bawlhhlawh lo chuan in thinlung a tithianghlim (original text is "conscience") Hebrai 9:14 en rawh

Zawhna: Engvangin nge ka inthiam loh fo thin?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Dân i neih avângin, dân hnuaiah i awm a, dân i bawhchhia a, dânin sualah thiam loh a chantîr che a, Diabola chuan sualah a puh che a ni. Thuhmahruai Rom 4:15, 3:20, Thupuan 12:10

3 Thiam loh inhriate chu piangthar an ni lo! Chu chu (mihring thar) anga piang thar an la ni lo, chanchin tha an hrethiam lo va, Krista chhandamna pawh an la hrethiam lo tihna a ni a, a chhan chu (mihring hlui) sual taksaah, duhâmna sualah leh Adama châknate chu Krista thianghlimnaah a awm lo.

5 Nangmahni (mihring hlui) chu sual thiah in inngai tur a ni a, Krista Isuaa Pathian tana nung ni turin in inngai tur a ni. Rom 6:11-ah hian kan hmu
Entirnan: Isuan an hnenah, "Mitdel ni ta la, sual in nei lo vang; tunah chuan, 'Kan hmu thei,' in tih avangin in sual chu a la awm reng a ni," a ti a
6 Dan bawhchhia, Isua zara Dan laka chhuah zalen lo apiang chu Dan hnuaiah an awm a, mi sual thiltihtheihnaah an awm a, chuta tang chuan tute nge Pathian fate an nih leh tute nge an nih tih a chiang hle Diabola fate an ni. Johana 1:10 hi en rawh

4. Nula thianghlim thianghlim

(1) Mi 144,000 vel an awm

Hêng mite hi hmeichhiain an tibawlhhlawh lo va; Beram No chu a kalna apiangah an zui thin. Pathian leh Beram No tana rah hmasa ber atan mihring zinga lei an ni. An kâah hian dawt engmah hmuh tur a awm lo; Thupuan 14:4-5

Zawhna: Heta mi 144,000 te hian tute nge an aiawh?

Chhanna: Chhandam tawh Jentailte leh mi thianghlim zawng zawngte a entir a ni!

(2) Chanchin |ha ringa piangthar Kristiante hi nula thianghlim thianghlim an ni

I chunga thinrimna ka neih hi Pathian thinurna a ni. Nula thianghlim anga Krista hnena hlan che u turin pasal pakhatah ka ruat che u a ni. 2 Korinth 11:2-ah hian kan hmu a

5. Mi upa Adama chu dah bo

(1) Experience→Putar chu zawi zawiin a hnutchhiah a

Zawhna: Engtik lai khan nge ka putar Adama kha ka tihkhawtlai?
Chhanna: Kraws-a khenbeh ka nih (ring) a, ka thi a, Krista nen phum ka ni a, chutiang chuan putar Adama chu ka dah bo ta a, chutah chuan Isua thihna chu keimah ah a intan tih ka ring (experience) a, zawi zawiin putar chu ka dah bo ta a ni. 2 Korinth 4:4:10-11 leh Ephesi 4:22 en rawh

(2) Experience→Mi thar chu a lo thang zauh zauh a

Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi i ni tawh ang. ...Rome 8:9 en rawh → Chuvangin, kan rilru a hah lo. Pawn lam taksa (mihring hlui) chu tihchhiat zel ni mah se, chhungril mihring (mihring thar) chu ni tin a tharin a awm zel a ni. Kan hrehawm tawrhna êng leh hun rei lote chhunga kan tawrhnate hian chatuan ropuina rit tak, tehkhin rual lohin min thawk ang. 2 Korinth 4:16-17-ah hian kan hmu a

6. Lalpa Zanriah ei rawh

Isuan, "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, Mihring Fapa sa in ei a, a thisen in in loh chuan nangmah ah nunna i nei lo. Tupawh ka tisa ei a, ka thisen in chuan chatuan nunna a nei a, a tawp berah chuan," a ti ni chuan ka kaitho ang

7. Mahni thar inbel la, Krista inbel rawh

Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. Kristaa baptisma chang tawh zawng zawngte chuan Krista in inthuam a. Galatia 3:26-27-ah kan hmu

8. Chanchin |ha hril leh mite Isua rin tir duh

Piangthar Krista mizia langsar ber chu a chhungte, a chhungte, a classmate, a thawhpui, leh a thiante hnenah Isua hrilh a duh a, chanchin tha ring a, chhandam ni tur leh chatuan nunna nei turin a hrilh thin.
(Entirnan) Isuan an hnenah a lo kal a, an hnenah, "Lei leh vanah thuneihna zawng zawng ka hnenah pek a ni tawh. Chutichuan kal ula, hnam tin zirtirah siam ula, Pa leh Fapa leh a hmingah baptisma chantir rawh u," a ti a Thlarau Thianghlim ( Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hmingin baptis rawh u). 28:18- 20-ah a awm

9. Milem biak tawh lo

Kristian piangtharte hian milem an biak tawh lo va, lei leh van siamtu Lalpa, Lal Isua Krista chauh an bia a ni Amen!
I bawhchhiatna leh sualnaah i thi tawh a, ani chuan a tinung ta che a ni. Chutah chuan he khawvêl kalphung ang zêlin, boruak thiltihtheihna lalber, tûna thuâwih lohna fate zînga thawktu thlarau thu âwih chungin i kal a ni. Chung zingah chuan kan awm vek a, tisa châknate chu kan inhlim a, tisa leh thinlung duhzâwngte kan zui a, kan pianphungah chuan mi zawng zawng ang bawkin thinurna fa kan ni. Amaherawhchu, khawngaihnaa hausa leh hmangaihna nasa tak nena min hmangaihtu Pathian chuan kan bawhchhiatnatea kan thih lai pawhin Krista nen min nungtir thin. Khawngaihna vangin chhandam i ni. Tin, min kaitho a, Krista Isua nen van hmunah min ṭhutpui bawk. Ephesi 2:1-6 ah hian kan hmu a

10. Hmangaihna inkhawm te, Bible zir te, thlarau lam hla hmanga Pathian fak te

Kristian piangtharte hian an inhmangaih tawn a, member anga inkhawm hi sermon ngaithla tur te, Bible chhiar leh zir tur te, Pathian hnena tawngtai tur te, thlarau lam hla hmanga kan Pathian fak tur te hi an ngaina hle!
ka thlarauvin i fakna hla a sa a, a ngawih ngai loh nan. Aw LALPA, ka Pathian, kumkhuain ka fak ang che! Sam 30:12-ah hian kan hmu a
Krista thu chu in thinlungah hautak takin awm sela, Sam te, hlate leh thlarau lam hlate hmangin inzirtir tawnin infuih tawnin, khawngaihnaa khat in thinlungin Pathian fakna hla sa ula. Kolossa 3:16-ah hian kan hmu a

11. Khawvel mi kan ni lo

(Lal Isuan a sawi angin) I thu ka pe ta. Khawvel mi an nih loh avangin khawvelin a hua a, kei pawh khawvel mi ka ni lo. Khawvel ata hruai chhuak turin ka ngen lo che a, mi sual (or lehlin: sual lakah) lakah venhim turin ka ngen che a ni. Khawvel mi an ni lo, kei khawvel mi ka nih loh ang bawkin. Johana 17:14-16-ah a awm

12. Rinna, beiseina leh hmangaihna nena Krista lo kal lehna nghah

Tunah chuan thil pathum awm reng a awm: rinna, beiseina leh hmangaihna, chung zinga ropui ber chu hmangaihna a ni. --1 Korinth 13:13-ah hian kan hmu a

Thilsiam zawng zawng hi tun thleng hian an tap a, an thawk ho thin tih kan hria. Chu mai a ni lo, keini Thlarau rah hmasa ber neitute pawhin chhungril lamah kan tap a, fapa anga kan pawm, kan taksa tlanna chu kan nghak reng a ni. Rom 8:22-23 ah hian kan hmu a
Chu thu hretu chuan, “Ni e, ka lo kal thuai dawn a ni!” Lal Isu, lo kal turin ka duh che!

Lal Isua khawngaihna chu mi thianghlim zawng zawng hnenah awm reng rawh se. Amen! Thupuan 22:20-21

articles.title: Chanchin |ha ring rawh 12
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Chanchin |ha ring rawh" 12

Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan zirchiang chhunzawm zel a, "Chanchin |ha rinna" kan insem chhunzawm zel a ni.

Marka 1:15-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar dun ila:

Said: "A hun a lo thleng ta a, Pathian ram chu a hnai ta. Sim ula, Chanchin |ha chu ring rawh u!"

Lecture 12: Chanchin |ha rinna hian kan taksa a tlan chhuak hin

Rom 8:23, Chu mai pawh ni lovin, keimahni ngei pawh, Thlarau rah hmasa ber neitute hian kan taksa tlanna, fapa anga pawm kan nghah lai hian chhungril lamah kan tap thin.

Zawhna: Engtikah nge kan taksa hi tlan a nih ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Kan nun hi Krista nen Pathianah thup bo a ni

I thi tawh a, i nun chu Krista hnenah Pathianah thup a ni si a. Kolossa 3:3 ah hian kan hmu

Zawhna: Kan nun leh taksa siam tharte hi hmuh theih a ni em?

Chhanna: Mihring thar piangthar chu Pathianah Krista nen inthup a ni a, hmuh theih loh a ni.
Thil hmuh theih chu kan ngaihsak lo va, thil hmuh theih loh lam kan ngaihtuah zawk tih a lo lang ta a ni; 2 Korinth 4:18-ah hian kan hmu a

(2) Kan nun a lo lang

Zawhna: Engtikah nge kan nun hi a lan chhuah?

Chhanna: Krista a lo lan hunah chuan kan nun pawh a lo lang ang.

Kan nunna Krista a lo lan hunah chuan nangni pawh ropui takin a hnenah in inlar ang. Kolossa 3:4 ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Nun hian taksa a nei niin a lang em?

Chhanna: Taksa a awm!

Zawhna: Adama taksa a ni em? Nge Krista taksa hi?
Chhanna: Krista Taksa a ni! Chanchin |ha hmanga min hrin avangin a member kan ni. Ephesi 5:30-ah kan hmu

Note: Kan thinlunga awm chu Thlarau Thianghlim, Isua Thlarau leh Van Pa Thlarau a ni! Thlarau chu Isua Krista thlarau a ni! Taksa hi Isua taksa thi thei lo a ni a, chuvangin kan mihring thar hi mihring hlui, Adama thlarau taksa a ni lo. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Remna Pathianin tithianghlim vek che rawh se! Tin, i thlarau, i thlarau leh i taksa (i.e., i thlarau leh i taksa piang thar) chu kan Lalpa Isua Krista lo kal hunah sawisel bovin awm rawh se! A kotu che chu a rinawm a, a ti ngei ang. 1 Thessalonika 5:23-24-ah hian kan hmu a

(3) Isua muhilte chu Isuan a hruai a

Zawhna: Isua Kristaa muhil tawhte chu khawiah nge an awm?

Chhanna: Pathianah Krista nen inthup!

Zawhna: Tunah hian khawiah nge Isua a awm?

Chhanna: Isua chu a tho leh a, vanah a lawn chho ta a, tunah chuan Pa Pathian dinglamah a thu a, kan nun leh Isua muhil tawhte nun pawh vanah a awm. Ephesi 2:6 hi en rawh

Zawhna: Engvangin nge kohhran henkhat (Seventh-day Adventist-te ang chi) hian mitthite chu Krista a lo kal leh hma loh chu thlanah an mut a, chumi hnuah thlan ata an lo chhuak a, an tho leh ang tih an sawi?

Chhanna: Isua chu a lo kal leh hunah van atangin a lo chhuk ang a, Isua muhil tawhte chungchangah chuan van ata lo hruai a ni ngei ang;

【Isua Krista tlanna hna thawh zawh tawh avangin】

Mitthite chu thlanah an la muhil a nih chuan an rinna chu harsatna lian tak a tawk dawn a, chu chu kum sâng tâwp, rorelna hnuhnung ber, thihna leh Hades-a’n an zînga mitthite an hlan chhawn a ngai dawn a ni nunna bu-a ziak a ni lo, a duhzawng mei dilah paih a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Thupuan 20:11-15 en rawh

Unaute u, muhilte chungchâng hre lo turin kan duh lo che u, chutilochu beiseina nei lote angin in lungngai ang. Isua a thi a, a tho leh tih kan rin chuan Isua muhilte pawh Pathianin a hruai ve ngei ang. 1 Thessalonika 4:13-14-ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Kristaa muhil tawhte chu taksa neiin an tho leh dawn em ni?

Chhanna: Taksa, thlarau taksa, Krista taksa a awm! 1 Korinth 15:44-ah hian en theih a ni

Amah Lalpa ngei chu au thawm nen, vantirhkoh chungnung ber aw nen, Pathian tawtawrawt nen a lo chhuk dawn si a; 1 Thessalonika 4:16-ah hian kan hmu a

(4) Nung leh la awmte chu an inthlak danglam ang a, mihring thar an ha ang a, mit khap chhungin an lo lang ang.

Tunah chuan thil mak tak ka hrilh che u a ni: kan muhil vek dawn lo va, mahse kan inthlak vek ang, rei lo te chhungin, mit khap chhungin, tawtawrawt hnuhnung ber a ri hunah. Tawtawrâwt a ri dâwn si a, mitthite chu chhe thei lovin kaihthawh an ni ang a, keini pawh kan danglam ang. He chhe thei hi a chhe thei lo chungah a inthuam ("bun") tur a ni; 1 Korinth 15:51-53-ah hian kan hmu a

(5)A hmel dik tak chu kan hmu ang

Zawhna: Kan pianphung dik tak chu tute nge a lan?

Chhanna: Kan taksa hi Krista pengte a ni a, Amah angah a lang!

Unau duh takte u, tunah hian Pathian fa kan ni tawh a, nakin lawka kan nih tur chu a la puang chhuak lo a, mahse Lalpa a lo lan hunah chuan Amah ang kan ni dawn tih kan hria a, a chhan chu Amah ang angin kan hmu dawn a ni. 1 Johana 3:2 leh Philippi 3:20-21-ah te kan hmu a

A tha e! "Chanchin |ha ring rawh u" tih hi hetah hian kan share a ni.

I awngai ho ang u: Abba Van Pa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e, Chhandamtu Isua Krista chungah lawmthu kan sawi a, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnena a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi bawk ang u! Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh hriat theih nan leh Bible kan hriatthiam theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel ang a, kan rilru a hawng zel ang u! Isua a lo kal hunah chuan a pianzia dik tak kan hmu ang tih kan hrethiam a, kan mihring thar taksa pawh a lo lang ang, chu chu taksa chu tlan a ni ang tihna a ni. Amen

Lal Isua Krista hmingin! Amen

Unaute u! Khawlkhawm hi hre reng ang che

"Chanchin |ha ring rawh" 11

Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan zirchiang chhunzawm zel a, "Chanchin |ha rinna" kan insem chhunzawm zel a ni.

Marka 1:15-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar dun ila:

Said: "A hun a lo thleng ta a, Pathian ram chu a hnai ta. Sim ula, Chanchin |ha chu ring rawh u!"

Lecture 11: Chanchin |ha rinna hian fapa nihna kan chang thei a

Zawhna: Pathian fapa nihna hi engtin nge kan neih theih ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Middle partition wall chu an tichhia a

(2) Krista chuan a taksa chu huatna tihboral nan a hmang a

(3) Hmelma chu kraws-ah a boral ta

Zawhna: Eng lungawi lohnate nge tihchhiat, tihbo leh tihchhiat?

Chhanna: Dan-a inziak dan tur (regulations) a ni.

Ani chu kan thlamuanna a ni si a, an pahnih chu pakhatah a siam a, inthenna kulh chu a tichhia a, a taksaah chuan inhmêlma, Dân thupêkte chu a tichhia a, chu chu an pahnih a siam theih nân a ni himself Chutiang chuan mihring thar chuan inremna a nei a ni. Kraws-a hmêlma nihna chu kan titawp tawh a, Ephesi 2:14-16 hmangin Pathian nen kan inrem ta a ni

(4) Dan leh document tihbo

(5)Hlawp rawh

(6) Kraws-ah khenbeh an ni

Zawhna: Kristan kan tan eng nge hriak a thih? Eng nge paih chhuah?

Chhanna: Dan siama kan dodaltu leh kan tana chhiatna thlen thei thuziak te chu thai bo la, paih bo rawh.

Zawhna: Isuan dan, thupek leh thuziak te “a thai bo” a, lak bo a, kraws-a a khenbeh “tum” chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Tupawh thil sual titu chuan Dan a bawhchhia a; 1 Johana 3:4

Thupuan 12:10 hi en la, a chhan chu Setana Diabola chu Pathian hmaah a chhûn zânin a awm a, → unaute → Dan kalh a ni em? Dan leh hrai hmanga puh che a, thi tura thiam loh chantir che? Setana chuan rorelna ṭhutphah hmaah dan i bawhchhia tih finfiah nan dan, thupek leh lehkhate chu "finfiahna" atan a zawn a ngai a ni → thi tura thiam loh chantir che a ngai a; Dan thupek leh lehkha, min puhtu leh thi tura hremtu finfiahnate chu a thai bo a, kraws-ah a khenbeh a, a hruai bo ta a ni. Chutiang chuan Setana chuan "evidence" hmangin a puh thei lo vang che a, thiam loh a chantir thei lo vang che a, thi tura thiam loh a chantir thei bawk hek lo che. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

In bawhchhiatnate leh tisa serhtan lohnaah in thi tawh a, mahse Pathianin Krista nen a tinung ta che u a, kan bawhchhiatna zawng zawng a ngaidam che u (a nih loh leh kan lehlin: keini) che u a, Dan thua thil awm zawng zawng a thai bo vek tawh avangin Thuziakte chu la bo rawh ( sualna finfiahna) kan chungah leh kan chungah ziak a ni a, kraws-ah khenbeh rawh. Kolossa 2:13-14-ah hian en rawh

(7) Dan laka zalenna leh dan chibai bukna

Zawhna: Dan leh chibai bukna lakah engtin nge kan tlanchhuah theih ang?

Chhanna: Krista taksa hmangin danah thi rawh

Chutichuan, ka unaute u, nangni pawh Krista taksa avângin dân tân in thi tawh a ni... Nimahsela, kan phuarna dâna kan thih avângin tûnah chuan dân lakah kan zalên ta... Rom 7:4 ,6

Krista chuan kan tâna ânchhe dawngtu a nih avângin Dân ânchhe lak ata min tlan a;

(8) Pathian fapa nihna chang rawh

Zawhna: Engtin nge fapa nihna kan neih theih ang?
Chhanna: Fapa nihna kan chan theih nan Dan hnuaia awmte tlan turin.

Hun famkim a lo thlen chuan Pathianin a Fapa, hmeichhe laka piang, Dan hnuaia piang, Dan hnuaia awmte tlan turin a tir a, chutichuan fapa anga pawm kan nih theih nan. Galatia 4:4-5 ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: Engvangin nge dan hnuaia awmte hi tlan an nih ang?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Tupawh sual titu chuan Dan a bawhchhia a, Dan bawhchhiatna chu sual a ni. 1 Johana 3:4
2 Dan anga hna thawk apiang chu ânchhe hnuaiah an awm a, “Dan bua ziak zawng zawng ti lo apiang chu ânchhe dawng an ni,” tih ziak a ni tih chu a chiang hle a, Pathian Lehkha Thu chuan, "Mi felte chu rinnain an nung ang," a ti a
3 Dân chuan thinurna a tithinur si a (a nih loh leh lehlin: hremna a thlen) .
Chuvangin →→
4 Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo - Rom 4:15
5 Dan tel lo chuan sual hi sual anga ngaih a ni lo - Rom 5:13
6 Dan tel lo chuan sual chu a thi tawh si a - Rom 7:8

7 Dan tel lova thil sual titu chu Dân tel lovin a boral ang a, Dan hnuaia thil sual titu chu Dân angin rorêlsak an ni ang. Rom 2:12-ah hian en rawh

(Ni Hnuhnung Rorelna Ropui: Unaute hi fimkhur leh ngaihsak tur a ni. Dan hnuaia awm (ni lo) te, chu chu Isua Kristaa awmte chu an tho leh ang a, Krista nen kum sangkhat an lal ang kum sâng hmaa Dân hnuaia awmte chuan Hêng mithite hi Dân hnuaia an thiltih leh an bawhchhiatna leh sualte ang zêla hlan leh rorêlsak an ni ang. Nunna buah chuan mei dilah paih a ni a, a boral ta a ni).
He [chanchin |ha] hi Pathian thiltihtheihna a ni tih i rin loh chuan, khawngaihin Rorelna Ni-ah hian "ṭap la, ha hrual suh" suh. Thupuan 20:11-15 en rawh

articles.title: Chanchin |ha ring rawh 10
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Chanchin |ha ring rawh》10

Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan zirchiang chhunzawm zel a, "Chanchin |ha rinna" kan insem chhunzawm zel a ni.

Marka 1:15-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar dun ila:

Said: "A hun a lo thleng ta a, Pathian ram chu a hnai ta. Sim ula, Chanchin |ha chu ring rawh u!"

Lecture 10: Chanchin tha rinna hian min siam thar leh thin

Tisa atanga lo piang chu tisa a ni a; “I piangthar a ngai” ka tih hian mak ti suh. Johana 3:6-7-ah a awm

Zawhna: Engvangin nge kan pianthar a ngaih?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Mihring a pianthar loh chuan Pathian ram a hmu thei lo - Johana 3:3
2 Pathian ramah a lut thei lo - Johana 3:5
3 Tisa leh thisen hian Pathian ram a luah thei lo - 1 Korinth 15:50

Chuvangin Lal Isuan: “I pianthar a ngai tih hi mak ti suh,” a ti a.

Miin piantharna a neih loh chuan Thlarau Thianghlim kaihhruaina tel lo chuan Bible hi i hrethiam lovang Isuan a ti a. Entirnan, a tir lama Isua zuitu zirtirte khan Isua thusawi chu an hrethiam lova, Isua kaihthawh leh Vanram a lawn lai khan, Thlarau Thianghlimin an khat a, thiltihtheihna an chang a, chumi hnuah chuan an hrethiam ta a ni Lal Isuan a sawi kha. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Zawhna: Engvangin nge tisa leh thisen hian Pathian ram a luah theih loh?

Chhanna: Boral thei chuan chhe thei lo chu a rochun thei lo.

Zawhna: Eng nge chhe thei?

Chhanna: Lal Isuan a sawi! Tisa atanga lo piang chu tisa a ni.Kan tisa hi kan nu leh pate atanga lo piang a ni → Sual avangin Adama tisa chu a chhe vek ang a, thihna a hmu ang a, chuvangin Pathian ram a luah thei lovang.

Zawhna: Isua pawhin tisa leh thisen taksa a nei em?
Chhanna: Isua chu Van Pa hnen atangin a piang a, Jerusalem atangin vanah a lo chhuk a, nula thianghlimin a rai a, Thlarau Thianghlimin a lo piang ta a ni thihna! Thuhmahruai Tirhkohte 2:31
Kan tisa, Adama vaivut atanga lo chhuak chu sualah hralh a ni tawh a, sual man chu thihna a ni a, chuvangin kan tisa chu a chhe thei a, a thi thei bawk a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Zawhna: Engtin nge Pathian ram hi kan rochun theih ang?

Baptisma changin a hnenah phum in ni a, chutah chuan mitthi zing ata kaihthawhtu Pathian hnathawh rinna avangin a hnenah kaihthawh in ni bawk. In bawhchhiatnate leh tisa serhtan lohnaah in thi tawh a, Pathianin Krista nen a tinung a, kan bawhchhiatna zawng zawng a ngaidam che u a;

(1) Thawhlehna hi thlarau taksa a ni

Taksa tuh hian Adama taksa, mihring hlui a kawk a, taksa thawhleh hian Krista taksa, mihring thar a kawk a ni. Taksa taksa a awm chuan thlarau taksa pawh a awm ngei ngei tur a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? 1 Korinth 15:44-ah hian en theih a ni

Ka kut leh ka ke i en chuan keimah ka ni tak zet tih i hre mai ang. Min khawih la, en rawh! Thlarau chuan ruh leh tisa a nei lo I hmu a, ka nei. ” Luka 24:39-ah kan hmu a

Lalpa Zanriah, Inpawlna Thianghlim kan ei hian a taksa kan ei a, Lalpa thisen kan in bawk! Kan chhungah Krista nunna kan nei a, he nun hi (Adama tisa leh thisen nena inzawmna nei lo, piantharna mihring thar chu Isua tisa leh thisen a ni a, hei hi a thawhlehna ang chiaha Krista nena inzawm tur a ni . (2) Pathian felna chu rinnaah a innghat a, chuvangin chu rinna chu

Chanchintha hi ka zak lo, ringtu zawng zawng tan, Juda tan leh Grik mite tan pawh chhandamna atan Pathian thiltihtheihna a ni. He Chanchin |haah hian Pathian felna a lang a, rinna aanga rinnaah hian he felna hi a ni. Thuziak angin: “Mi felte chu rinnain an nung ang.”

Rinnain → Chanchin |ha rinna avanga chhandam nih chu piantharna a ni!

Chutichuan Thlarau Thianghlim rinna → rinna chu tihthar leh chawimawi a nih theih nan!

Felna thiltih kan tih ang ni lovin, a khawngaihna ang zelin, Thlarau Thianghlim silfai leh siam tharna hmangin min chhandam a ni. Tita 3:5 ah hian kan hmu a

(3)Yongyi chungchang inhriattirna

“I mite leh in khawpui thianghlim tan, bawhchhiatna titawp tur te, sual tih tawp tur te, khawlohna inremna siam tur te, chatuan felna thlen tur te, inlarna leh hrilhlawkna chhinchhiahna tur leh Mi Thianghlim Daniela hriak thihna tur atan kar sawmsarih hun ruat a ni 9:24-ah a awm.

Zawhna: Sual tihtawp tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Titawp tih awmzia chu chawlhsan tihna a ni a, tihsual a awm tawh lo!

Krista taksa hmanga min phuartu dan laka thihna avang hian tunah chuan dan lak ata kan zalen ta... Dan awm lohna hmunah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo. Thuhmahruai Rom 4:15 . Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Zawhna: Sual tihbo tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Thianghlim tih awmzia chu inthiarfihlim tihna a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Chu aia nasa zawkin, chatuan Thlarau zara Pathian hnena bawlhhlawh awm lova inhlanna Krista thisen chuan Pathian nung rawng in bawl theihna turin in thinlungte chu thiltih thi ata a tifai ang? ...A nih loh chuan inpeknate hi hun rei tak kal ta atang khan a tawp tawh lo’m ni? A chhan chu chibai bûktute chhia leh ṭha hriatna a lo thianghlim tawh a, an sual tih an inhriat tawh loh vâng a ni. Hebrai 9:14, 10:2-ah hian kan hmu a

Chhanna: Tlanna tih awmzia chu thlakna, tlanna tihna a ni. Pathianin sual nei lo Isua chu kan tan sualah a siam a, Isua thihna hmang hian kan sualte chu kan inremtir a ni. 2 Korinth 5:21-ah hian en rawh

Chhanna: "Chatuan" tih hi chatuan tihna a ni a, "felna" tih hian thiamchantirna a kawk bawk!

Sualte ngaihdamna leh sual chi (a tir chuan Adama thlah) tihboralna chu, tunah chuan Pathian thu chu rawn hruai lut la, chatuan atana thiamchantir i nih chuan chatuan nunna i nei ang! Amen.Hetiang hian i hrethiam em?

(4) Pathian Thlarauva silfai, tihthianghlim leh thiamchantir tawh

Zawhna: Engtikah nge tihthianghlim, thiam chantir, thiam chantir kan nih?

Chhanna: Thianghlimna tih awmzia chu sual tel lova thianghlimna a ni a;

Thiam chantirna tih awmzia chu Pathian felna a ni tihna a ni a; Pathianin vaivut atanga mihring a siam lai ang bawk khan Pathianin Adama chu "mihring" a nih hnuah "mihring" a ti ta! Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Mi zawng zawngin thil an tisual a, Pathian ropuina an tlachham si a; Pathianin Isua chu Isua thisen zarah leh mihring rinna hmangin Pathian felna lantir nan a dintir a, a chhan chu amah ngei pawh a nih theih nan tun hmaa miten an tihsualte chu dawhthei takin a tuar a ni mi fel nia hriat a ni a, Isua ringtute pawh thiamchantir a nih theih nan. Rom 3:23-26 ah hian kan hmu

"Lalpa Thlarau (chu chu Pathian Thlarau, Thlarau Thianghlim a ni)
Keimah (i.e. Isua) ah chuan, .
Amah (chu chu Van Pa tihna a ni) hriak min thih avangin, .

1 Diabola sal mante chu;
2 Thim leh Hades thiltihtheihnain a khungte chu;

Johana 3:16, 1 Korinth 15:51-54, 1 Petera 1:4-5 te hi en rawh

...Pathian thu nung leh awm reng avang chuan chi chhe thei lo piangthar ni lovin, chhe thei lova piangthar in ni. ...Lalpa Thu chauh hi chatuanin a awm. "Hei hi in hnena Chanchin |ha hril chu a ni. 1 Petera 1:3-5,23,25."

A tir aanga nunna thu bulpui chungchangah chuan hei hi kan hriat, kan hmuh, kan mit ngeia kan hmuh leh kan kut hmanga kan khawih chu a ni. (He nunna hi a lo lang ta a, kan hmu ta a, tunah chuan Pa hnena chatuan nunna awm tawh leh kan hnena inpuan tawh chu kan puang chhuak che u tih kan hriattir a ni.) 1 Johana 1:1-2
“Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe a, amah ring apiang an boral lova, chatuan nunna an neih zawk nan Johana 3:16

articles.title: Chanchin |ha ring rawh 1
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Chanchin |ha ring rawh" 1

Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian fellowship kan enfiah a, "Chanchin |ha rinna" kan insem a.

Marka 1:15-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar dun ila:

Said: "A hun a lo thleng ta a, Pathian ram chu a hnai ta. Sim ula, Chanchin |ha chu ring rawh u!"

Thuhmahruai:
Pathian dik hriatna aangin Isua Krista chu kan hre ta!

→→Isua ring rawh!

Lecture 1: Isua hi Chanchin Tha bul tanna a ni

Isua Krista, Pathian Fapa chanchin tha lo intanna a ni. Marka 1:1

Zawhna: Chanchin |ha hi ring rawh.
Chhanna: Chanchin |ha rinna →→ hi (rinna) Isua a ni! Isua hming hi Chanchin |ha a ni

Zawhna: Engvangin nge Isua hi chanchin tha bul tanna a nih?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. Isua chu chatuan Pathian a ni

1Pathian awm leh awm

Pathian chuan Mosia hnenah, “Keimah hi ka ni” a ti a;
Zawhna: Engtikah nge Isua a awm?
Chhanna: Thufingte 8:22-26
“Lalpa thil siam tirh lamah khan, .
A tir lamah, thil zawng zawng siam a nih hma khan keimah ka awm (chu chu Isua a awm tihna a ni).
Chatuan ata, a tir ata, .
Khawvel a awm hma chuan ka din a ni.
Ka lo pian chhuahna khuarkhurum, tui lian tak tak tuikhuah a awm lo.
Tlâng a lo awm hma, tlâng a lo pian hma, kei hi ka lo piang ta a ni.

LALPAN lei leh a lo leh khawvel leilung a siam hma khan keimah ngeiin ka piantir a. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

2 Isua chu Alpha leh Omega a ni

"Kei hi Alpha leh Omega, Engkimtitheia, awm tawh leh awm tawh leh lo kal tur ka ni," tiin Lalpa Pathian chuan a sawi

3 Isua chu a hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung ber a ni

Kei hi Alpha leh Omega ka ni a; ” Thupuan 22:13

2. Isua Siam Hnathawh

Zawhna: Khawvelte hi tuin nge siam?

Chhanna: Isuan khawvel a siam a.

1 Isuan khawvelte a siam a

Hmân laia kan pi leh pute hnêna zâwlneite hmanga vawi tam tak leh kawng tam takah biak ṭhintu Pathian hian tûnah hian he hun hnuhnûngah hian a Fapa, engkim ro luahtu atân a ruat a, amah zâra khawvêl zawng zawng a siamsaktu hmangin min bia ta a ni. Hebrai 1:1-2 ah hian kan hmu

2 Engkim hi Isua siam a ni

A tir lamah chuan Pathianin lei leh van a siam a - Genesis 1:1

Amah (Isua) zarah thil zawng zawng siam a ni a, Amah tel lo chuan engmah siam a ni lo. Dar 1:3 vel khan

3 Pathianin mihring chu ama anpui leh a anpuiin a siam a

Pathian chuan: “Kan anpuiin (Pa, Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim sawinain) mihring i siam ang u, tuifinriata sanghate chungah te, boruaka savate chungah te, ran vulhte chungah te thuneihna nei rawh se leiah leh leilung zawng zawng chungah.

Chutichuan Pathianin mihring chu ama anpuiin a siam a, Pathian anpuiin mipa leh hmeichhia a siam a; Genesis 1:26-27 ah hian kan hmu a

【Thil chhinchhiah:】

A hmaa "Adama" kha Pathian (Isua) anpui leh anpuia siam a ni taksa! --Kolossa 2:17, Hebrai 10:1, Rom 10:4 en rawh.

“Thlarau” a lo lan hunah chuan → Adam Isua hnuhnung ber a ni! Adam hmasa kha "thlang" → Adam hnuhnung ber, Isua → chu Adam tak a ni a, chuvangin Adama chu Pathian fapa a ni! Luka 3:38 en rawh. Adamaah chuan "sual" avangin mi zawng zawng an thi vek a; 1 Korinth 15:22 en rawh. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Thlarau Thianghlim êng chhuakte chuan an hmuh leh hriat hunah an hrethiam ang a, mi thenkhat erawh chuan an hmui a vawt pawhin an hrethiam lo ang. Hriatthiam lote chuan zawi zawiin an ngaithla thei a, Pathian hnenah an tawngtai nasa zawk thei a, a zawngtu chuan a hmu ang a, a kiktu tan Lalpan kawngkhar a hawng ang! Mahse Pathian kawng dik chu i dodal tur a ni lo va, miten Pathian kawng dik an dodal a, thutak hmangaihna an pawm loh chuan Pathianin thinlung dik lo a pe ang a, thu dik lo ring turin heng mite hian Pathian an dodal zel ang .An ti ang I thih hma loh chuan chanchin tha emaw, piantharna emaw i hrethiam ngai lovang tih i ring em? 2:10-12 en rawh.
(Entirnan, 1 Johana 3:9, 5:18 Tupawh Pathian atanga lo piang "sual tur a ni hek lo"; mi tam tak chuan "Pathian laka piang apiang" an la sual zel ang an ti. A chhan chu eng nge ni? I ti thei ang hriatthiamna?
Kum thum chhung Isua zuia a phatsantu Juda leh thutak dodaltu Pharisaite ang bawk khan Isua chu Pathian Fapa, Krista leh Chhandamtu a ni tih an thih thlengin an hrethiam lo.

Entirnan, "nunna thing" chu thil bulpui lem dik tak a ni Isua! Isua hi thil bulpui lem dik tak a ni. Kan (mihring hlui) hi Adama tisa atanga lo piang a ni a, "Thlarau" a ni bawk; Amen! Chuti a nih chuan, i hrethiam em? 1 Korinth 15:45-ah hian en rawh

3. Isua tlanna hna a thawh

1 Mihringte chu Eden huanah an tlu a

Tin, Adama hnênah, “I nupui thu i awih a, thing rah i ei avângin, ei lo tûra thu ka pêk che kha, lei chu ânchhe dawng a ni;
Lei atanga ei tur hmuh theih nan i dam chhung zawng i thawkrim tur a ni.

Lei hian in tan hling leh hling a rawn chhuahtir ang a, lova thlai te chu in ei ang. I hmai thawmhnaw thawmhnaw hmangin i chhang chu i pianna leiah i kir leh hma loh chuan i ei ang. Leivut in ni a, vaivut lamah i kir leh ang. ” Genesis 3:17-19 ah hian kan hmu a

2 Adama hnên aṭanga sual khawvêla a lo luh meuh chuan mi zawng zawng hnênah thihna a lo thleng ta a

Mi pakhat zarah sual chu khawvelah a lut a, sual avanga thihna a lo thleng ang bawkin, mi zawng zawngin thil an tihsual avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. Rom 5:12-ah hian kan hmu

3. Pathianin a fapa mal neih chhun Isua a pe a, Isua ring la, chatuan nunna i nei ang.

“Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe a, amah ring apiang an boral lova, chatuana nunna an neih zawk nan .Johana 3:16-17 ah hian chhandam a ni

4. Isua hi hmangaihna hmasa ber a ni

1 hmangaihna hmasa ber

Mahse, thil pakhat ka dem tur che a awm a, chu chu i hmangaih hmasa ber i kalsan ta a ni. Thupuan 2:4

Zawhna: Hmangaihna hmasa ber chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: “Pathian” chu hmangaihna a ni (Johana 4:16)! Chuvangin, hmangaihna hmasa ber chu Isua a ni!

A tir lamah chuan Isua rinna hmangin chhandamna beiseina i nei a, a hnuah chuan "ring" turin nangmah ngeiin i nungchang i rinchhan a ngai a, "rinna" i chhuahsan chuan Isua i chhuahsan ang a, i original chu i chhuahsan ang hmangaihna. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

2 Thupek hmasa ber

Zawhna: A tir lama order chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: Kan inhmangaih tawn tur a ni. Hei hi a tir atanga thupek i hriat kha a ni. 1 Johana 3:11-ah kan hmu

3 Pathian hmangaih rawh.

“Zirtirtu, Dân thupêk ropui ber chu eng nge ni?” .

Chuvangin "Isua Krista, Pathian Fapa chanchin tha bul tanna chu Isua a ni! Amen, i hrethiam em?"

A dawtah chuan chanchin ha thu: "Chanchin |ha ring rawh u" Isua hi chanchin ha bul anna, hmangaihna bul anna leh engkim bul anna a ni tih hi kan sawi chhunzawm zel ang! Isua! He hming hi "gospel" → i mite sual laka chhandam nan a ni! Amen

I awngai ho ang u: Abba Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista chungah lawmthu kan sawi e, Thlarau Thianghlim chungah lawmthu kan sawi a, Isua Krista chu: Chanchin |ha bul tanna, hmangaihna bul tanna leh engkim bul tanna a ni tih min hriattir avangin Thlarau Thianghlim chungah lawmthu kan sawi e ! Amen.

Lal Isua hmingin! Amen

Ka nu duh tak hnena Chanchin |ha hlan.

Unaute u! A khawn khawm tih hre reng ang che.
