articles.author: admin
articles.content:
"Isua Krista hriatna" 8

Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se!

Vawiin hian kan zir chhunzawm zel a, kan fellowship a, "Isua Krista hriatna" kan insem chhunzawm zel bawk.

Johana 17:3-ah Bible hi hawng ila, han phelh la, chhiar dun ila:

Hei hi chatuan nunna a ni, nang Pathian dik awmchhun leh i tirh Isua Krista hriatna hi! Amen

Lecture 8: Isua chu Alpha leh Omega a ni

(1) Lalpa chu Alpha leh Omega a ni

Lalpa Pathian chuan heti hian a sawi: “Kei hi Alpha leh Omega (Alpha, Omega: Grik alphabet-a hawrawp hmasa ber leh hnuhnung ber pahnih), Engkimtitheia, awm tawh, awm leh lo thleng tur ka ni,” a ti

Zawhna: “Alpha leh Omega” tih hi eng nge a awmzia?

Chhanna: Alpha leh Omega → tih hi Greek hawrawp "first and last" tih a ni a, chu chu a hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung ber tihna a ni.

Zawhna: Hun kal tawh, tunlai leh chatuan tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: "Tun hmaah a awm" tih awmzia chu Chatuan, a bul, a bul, a bul, khawvel a awm hma → Lalpa Pathian Isua chu a lo awm tawh a, vawiinah hian a awm tawh a, chatuan atan a awm tawh ang! Amen.

Thufingte bu chuan:

“Lalpa thil siam tirh lamah khan, .
A tir lamah, thil zawng zawng siam a nih hma khan keimah ka awm (chu chu Isua a awm tihna a ni).
Chatuan ata, a tir ata, .
Khawvel a awm hma chuan ka din a ni.
Khukkhua a awm lo va, tuikhuah lian tak a awm lo, kei (Isua sawina) ka lo piang ta.
Tlâng a lo awm hma, tlâng a lo pian hma, kei hi ka lo piang ta a ni.
LALPAN lei leh a lo leh khawvel leilung a siam hma khan keimah ngeiin ka piantir a.
(Van Pa) Vante a din a, kei (Isua sawina) chu ka awm a;
Chu khur thuk tak hmai chu a sir vel chu a siam a. A chung lamah chuan van chu a ti nghet a, a hnuaiah chuan tuikhuahte a ti nghet a, tuifinriat tan ramri a siam a, tuiin a thupek a pelh loh nan a veng a, leilung lungphum a din bawk.
Chutih lai chuan kei (Isua) chu Amah (Pa) hnenah kut hnathawktu (engineer) thiam tak, .
Nitin Amahah a lawm a, A hmaah a lawm fo thin a, mihring (mihringte sawina) chenna tur hmun a buatsaihah a lawm thin a, (Isua) chuan mihring zinga awm chu a lawm thin.

Tunah hian ka fapate u, min ngaithla teh u, ka kawngte vawngtu chu a eng a thawl e. Thufingte 8:22-32-ah a awm

(2) Isua hi a hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung ber a ni

Ka hmuh chuan thi ang maiin a ke bulah ka tlu ta a. A kut dinglam chu ka chungah a nghat a, "Hlau suh! Kei hi a hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung ber ka ni;

Tupawh nung chu ka thi tawh a, ngai teh, kumkhuain ka nung a; Thupuan 1:17-18

Zawhna: A hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung ber hian eng nge a awmzia?

Chhanna: "A hmasa berin" tih awmzia chu chatuan aangin, a tir aangin, a bul aangin, a bul aangin, khawvel a awm hmain → Isua chu a awm tawh a, a lo ding tawh a, a lo piang ta a ni! “A tâwpna” tih hian khawvêl tâwpna, Isua chu chatuan Pathian a nih lai a kâwk a ni.

Zawhna: Isua chu tu tan nge a thi?

Chhanna: Isua chu kan sualte avangin “vawi khat” a thi a, phum a ni a, ni thum niah a tho leh a. 1 Korinth 15:3-4-ah kan hmu

Zawhna: Isua chu kan sualna avangin a thi a, phum a ni a, eng nge min chhuah zalen?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Sual lak ata min chhuah zalen rawh

Sual bawih kan nih tawh loh tur thu - Rom 6:6-7

2 Dan leh a ânchhia laka zalenna - Rom 7:6, Gal 3:13
3 Mihring hlui leh a thiltihte chu paih bo rawh - Kolossa 3:9
4 Tisa châkna leh châknate chu paih bovin - Gal 5:24
5 Keimah atanga chhuakin keimah hi ka nung tawh lo - Gal 2:20
6 Khawvel atanga chhuak - Johana 17:14-16

7 Setana laka chhanchhuah a ni - Tirhkohte 26:18

Zawhna: Isua chu ni thumnaah a tho leh a, eng nge min pek?
Chhanna: Min thiamsak rawh! Rom 4:25-ah hian kan hmu. Thawhleh, piang thar, chhandam, Pathian fa anga pawm, Krista nen chatuan nunna nei dun ila! Amen

(Isua) Thim thiltihtheihna ata min chhanchhuak a (thihna leh Hades sawina) a Fapa duh tak ramah min sawn ta a ni

Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "Ka thi tawh a, tunah chuan kumkhuain ka nung tawh a, thihna leh Hades chabi ka nei ta. Hei hi i hrethiam em?"

(3) Isua hi a bul leh a tawp a ni

Tichuan, vântirhkoh chuan ka hnênah, "Heng thu hi a dik a, a rin tlâk a ni. Lalpa, zâwlneite thlarau thâwk khumte Pathian chuan a chhiahhlawhte hnêna thil lo thleng thuai tûrte kawhhmuh tûrin a vântirhkoh a tîr a ni," a ti a rang takin i hnenah lo kal rawh u." Lo kal rawh! He lehkhabu hrilhlawkna zawmtute chu an eng a thawl e! "...Kei hi Alpha leh Omega ka ni; " "

Thupuan 22:6-7,13

Van Pa, Lal Isua Krista leh Thlarau Thianghlim chungah lawmthu kan sawi e, keini naupangte hnenah engtik lai pawha min awmpui reng a, kan thinlung mit min ti eng reng a, naupangte min hruai zel bawk (A vaiin lecture 8) Examination, fellowship and sharing: Know Jesus Christ whom you an tir tawh a ni!

I awngai ho ang u: Abba Van Pa duhtak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Thutak zawng zawngah min hruai la, Lal Isua hi hre rawh: Ani chu Krista, Pathian Fapa, Chhandamtu, Messia leh Chatuan nunna min petu Pathian a ni! Amen.

Lalpa Pathian chuan: "Kei hi Alpha leh Omega ka ni; Kei hi a hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung ber ka ni; kei hi a bul leh a tawp ka ni. Kei hi Engkimtitheia, awm tawh, lo awm tawh leh lo la awm tur chu ka ni. Amen!

Lal Isu, lo kal thuai rawh! Amen

Lal Isua hmingin ka dil e! Amen

"Isua Krista hriatna" 7

Vawiin hian kan zir chhunzawm zel dawn a, kan fellowship zel dawn a, "Isua Krista hriatna" kan share chhunzawm dawn a ni.

Hei hi chatuan nunna a ni a, nangmah, Pathian dik awmchhun i hriat theihna tur leh i tirh Isua Krista hriatna tur a ni. Amen

Lecture 7: Isua chu Nunna Chhang a ni

Pathian chhang chu van atanga lo chhuk a, khawvel nunna petu a ni si a. Anni chuan, "Lalpa, he chaw hi min pe reng rawh!" ” Isuan, “Kei hi nunna chhang ka ni,” a ti a. Tu pawh ka hnena lo kal chu a ril a tam lovang; Johana 6:33-35-ah a awm

Zawhna: Isua chu Nunna Chhang a ni! Chuti a nih chuan "mana" pawh hi nunna chhang a ni em?
Chhanna: Thuthlung Hluia thlalera Pathianin "manna" a thlak hi nunna chhang entîrna leh Krista entîrna a ni a, mahse "manna" chu "thlang" a ni → "thlang" chu Isua Krista a ni tih a lang a, leh Isua chu manna dik tak a ni , nunna chaw dik tak a ni! Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Entîr nân, Thuthlung Hluiah chuan thuthlung bâwma dah "manna rangkachak bêl, Arona tiang leh Dân lungphêk pahnih" dah khân Krista chu a entîr vek a ni. Hebrai 9:4 hi en rawh
“Manna” hi thlalak leh entîrna a ni a, nunna chhang tak tak a ni lo.

Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, tupawh ring apiangin chatuan nunna an nei a ni. Kei hi nunna chhang ka ni. In pi leh pute khan thlalerah manna an ei a, an thi a. Hei hi van atanga chhang lo chhuk chu a ni. If." i ei a, i thi lo vang.

(1)Nun chhang chu Isua taksa a ni

Zawhna: Nunna chhang chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Isua taksa hi nunna chhang a ni a, Isua thisen chu kan nunna a ni! Amen

Kei hi van atanga chhang nung lo chhuk chu ka ni; Chhang ka pek tur chu ka tisa a ni a, chu chu khawvel nunna atan ka pe ang. Chutichuan, Judate chuan, "Engtin nge he mi hian a sa ei tur min pek theih ang?" ” Johana 6:51-52-ah kan hmu

(2) Lalpa tisa ei leh Lalpa thisen in hian chatuan nunna a thlen ang

Isuan, "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, Mihring Fapa sa in ei a, a thisen in in loh chuan nangmah ah nunna i nei lo. Tupawh ka tisa ei a, ka thisen in chuan chatuan nunna a nei a, a tawp berah chuan," a ti ni chuan ka kaitho ang

(3) Nunna chhang eitute chu chatuanin an nung ang

"Isua Krista hriatna" 6

1. Kraws kawng

(1) Isua chu kawngkhar a ni! kan tan kawngkhar hawng rawh

(Lalpa chuan) Kei hi kawngkhar ka ni a, tu pawh keimah aanga lo lut chu chhandam an ni ang a, an lut ang a, ran vulhna hmun an hmu ang. Johana 10:9

(2) Chatuan nunna kawng i en ang u

Chatuan nunna chang duh apiangin Isua kraws kawng a zawh ngei ngei tur a ni!
(Isua) chuan mipuite chu a zirtirte nen a ko khawm a, an hnenah, “Tupawh ka hnung zui duh chuan amah leh amah a phat a, a kraws puin mi zui tur a ni.

Tupawh a nunna chhandam duh chuan a hloh ang a, kei leh Chanchin |ha avanga a nunna hloh erawh chuan a chhandam ang. Marka 8:34-35-ah a awm

Chhanna: I kraws pu la, Isua zui la, Lal Isua chanchin ha chu "ring" la, Kristaah baptisma chang la, Krista nen khenbeh la, i sual taksa tichhe la, i "mihring hlui" nun chu Adama hnen atangin hloh rawh; tin, Krista chu a thi a, phum a ni a, a tho leh a, a piang thar a, chhandam a nih chuan Adam hnuhnung ber [Isua] atanga kaihthawh nun "thar" chu i nei ang Hei hi chhandamna a ni ang! Rom 6:6-8 hi en rawh

Chuvangin Isuan: "Ka kawng" → he kawng hi kraws kawng a ni. Khawvela miten Isua an rin loh chuan hei hi chatuan nunna kawng, thlarau lam kawng leh mahni nunna chhanhimna kawng a ni tih an hrethiam lo ang. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

2. Isua chu thutak a ni

Zawhna: Thutak chu eng nge ni?

Chhanna: "Thutak" chu chatuan a ni.

(1) Pathian chu thutak a ni

Johana 1:1 A tir lamah chuan Thu a awm a, Thu chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Thu chu Pathian a ni.
Johana 17:17 Thutakah chuan tithianghlim rawh;

"Tao" chu → Pathian a ni a, i "Tao" chu thudik a ni a, chuvangin, Pathian chu thudik a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

A tir lamah chuan Thu a awm a, Thu chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, chu chu Pathian thu a ni → Pathian chu thutak a ni a, Isua chu mihring leh Pathian a ni a, chuvangin Lal Isua chu thutak a ni. tin, A thusawi chu thlarau, nunna leh thutak a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Hei hi Isua Krista tui leh thisen chauhva lo kal a ni lo va, tui leh thisen hmanga lo kal, Thlarau Thianghlim hriatpuitu a ni, Thlarau Thianghlim chu thutak a ni si a; 1 Johana 5:6-7-ah kan hmu

3. Isua chu nunna a ni

Zawhna: Nun chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Isua chu nunna a ni!
In (Isua) ah nunna a awm a, he nun hi mihringte êng a ni. Johana 1:4
He thuhriattîrna hi Pathianin chatuan nunna min pe tih a ni a; Miin Pathian Fapa (Isua) a neih chuan nunna a nei a; Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? 1 Johana 5:11-12-ah kan hmu

Chhanna: Adama nunna hian chatuan nunna a nei lo a ni, a chhan chu Adama chuan sualah a hralh a, tisa kan awm lai khan “sual” hlawh chu thihna a ni Adama hnen atangin.Sual taksa atanga lo chhuakte chuan tisa chu vaivut a ni a, vaivutah a kir leh dawn a, chuvangin chatuan nunna a rochun thei lo va, a chhe thei chuan a chhe thei lo chu a rochun thei lo. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Rom 7:14 leh Genesis 3:19 en rawh

Zawhna: Engtin nge chatuan nunna kan neih?

Chhanna: Isua ring la, chanchin tha ring la, kawng dik hrethiam la, Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chu chhinchhiahna atan dawng rawh! Piangthar la, Pathian fapa nihna chang la, mihring thar inthuam la, Krista inthuam la, chhandam la, chatuan nunna nei rawh! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Vawiin hian hetah hian kan share a ni! Mi fel tawngtaina hi thiltithei leh hlawk tak a ni a, chutichuan naupang zawng zawngin Pathian khawngaihna an hriatpui theih nan.

I awngai ho ang u: Abba Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim chungah lawmthu kan sawi a, thlarau lam thutak kan hriat theih nan leh kan hmuh theih nan leh Bible kan hriatthiam theih nan kan thinlung mit a ti eng reng avangin, naupang zawng zawngin Isua chu a ni tih an hriat theih nan kawngkhar Lal Isuan min hawnsak a, he kraws kawng hi chatuan nunna kawng a ni tih i lo en ang u. Amen

Lal Isua Krista hmingin! Amen

articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Felna avanga tihduhdah tuarte chu an eng a thawl e, van ram chu anmahni ta a ni si a.
---Matthaia 5:10

Encyclopedia awmzia sawifiahna

Mi nawr luih: bi po
Definition: khauh taka fuih;
Synonyms: tihduhdahna, tihduhdahna, tihduhdahna, tihduhdahna.
Antonyms: rilru hahdam, ngenna.

Bible hrilhfiahna

Isua tan, chanchin tha tan, Pathian thu tan, thutak tan leh mi chhandam thei nunna atan!
Hmuhchhiat, sawichhiat, tihduhdah, dodal, tihduhdah, tihduhdah, tihhlum.

Felna avanga tihduhdahna tuarte chu an eng a thawl e! Vanram chu an ta a nih avangin. Keimah avanga miten an sawichhiat che u a, an tihduhdah che u a, dik lo takin in chungah thil tha lo tinreng an sawi che u a nih chuan in vannei hle ang! Lawm la, lawm rawh, vanah in lawmman a tam si a. Chutiang bawk chuan miten in hmaa zâwlneite chu an tiduhdah a. " "
(Matthaia 5:10-11)

(1)Isua chu tihduhdah a ni

Isuan Jerusalem-a a han chhoh lai chuan zirtir sawm leh pahnihte chu kawng lakah a hruai a, an hnenah, “Ngai teh u, Jerusalem-a kan han chhoh hunah chuan Mihring Fapa hi puithiam lalte leh lehkhaziaktute kutah hlan a ni ang a, thiam loh an chantir ang ani chu thi turin a pe ang a, Jentailte hnenah pek a ni ang a, an nuihzat ang a, an vuak ang a, an khenbeh ang a, a ni thum niah chuan a tho leh ang," (Matthaia 20:17-19)

(2) Tirhkohte chu tihduhdah an ni

peter
He puan inah hian ka la awm lai hian ka hriat nawn tir che u a, ka tiharh che u tur a ni tih ka ngaihtuah a, kan Lalpa Isua Kristan min hmuhtir angin he puan in chhuahsan hun a lo thleng dawn tih hriain; Tin, ka thih hnuah pawh heng thilte hi in hriatrengna atan theihtawp ka chhuah ang. (2 Petera 1:13-15) tih a ni.

John
Kei Johana hi i unaupa leh i thawhpuipui ka ni a, hrehawmna leh lalram leh Isua tuar chhuahnaah hian i unaupa leh i thawhpui ka ni a, Pathian thu leh Isua hriatpuina atan Patmos an tih thliarkara ka awm a. (Thu Puan 1:9)

paul
tin, tihduhdahna leh hrehawmna Antiokei, Ikonia leh Lystra-a ka tawn te pawh a ni. Tihduhdahnate chu eng ang nge ka tuar a; (2 Timothea 3:11) tih a ni.

(3) Zâwlneite chu tihduhdah an ni

Jerusalem chu! Jerusalem chu! Zawlneite i that a, i hnena tirhte chu lungin i that bawk. Vawkin a thla hnuaia a note a khawm ang hian i fate chu vawi engzat nge ka khawm ang; (Luka 13:34) tiin a sawi.

(4) Krista thawhlehna chuan mi fel min siam a

Isua chu kan bawhchhiatnate avanga chhanchhuah a ni a, thiamchantirna atan kaihthawh a ni (a nih loh leh lehlin: Isua chu kan bawhchhiatnate avanga chhanchhuah a ni a, thiamchantirna atan a tho leh a ni). (Rom 4:25)

(5) Pathian khawngaihna zarah zalen takin thiam chantir kan ni

Tunah chuan Pathian khawngaihna avangin Krista Isua tlanna zarah zalen takin thiam chantir kan ni ta. Pathianin Isua chu Isua thisen zarah leh mihring rinna hmangin Pathian felna lantir nan a dintir a, a chhan chu amah ngei pawh a nih theih nan tun hmaa miten an tihsualte chu dawhthei takin a tuar a ni mi fel nia hriat a ni a, Isua ringtute pawh thiamchantir a nih theih nan. (Rom 3:24-26) tih a ni.

(6) Amah nen kan tuar chuan Amah nen chawimawiin kan awm ang

Thlarau Thianghlim chuan Pathian fate kan nih thu a hriattir a; Amah nena kan tuarpui chuan Amah rualin kan chawimawi bawk ang. (Rom 8:16-17) tih a ni.

(7) I kraws pu la, Isua zui rawh

Tichuan (Isua) chuan mipui leh a zirtirte chu a ko va, an hnenah: "Tupawh ka hnung zui duh chuan amah leh amah a phat tur a ni a, a kraws puin mi zui tur a ni. Tupawh a nunna chhanhim duh tan (or lehlin: soul;

(8)Van ram chanchin tha hril rawh

Isuan an hnenah a lo kal a, an hnenah, "Lei leh vanah thuneihna zawng zawng ka hnenah pek a ni tawh. Chutichuan kal ula, hnam tin zirtirah siam ula, Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hmingin baptisma chantir rawh u," a ti a. " Pa leh Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim hmingin baptisma chang ula) thu ka pek zawng zawng che u zawm turin zirtir rawh u, tichuan khawvel tawp thlengin in hnenah ka awm reng a ni (Matthaia 28: 18-20) Kûtpui)

(9) Pathian ralthuam zawng zawng inbel rawh u

Thu hnuhnung ber ka nei: Lalpaah leh A thiltihtheihnaah chak takin awm rawh. Pathian ralthuam zawng zawng ha la, Diabola remruatnate i do theih nan. Tisa leh thisen nen kan inbei lo va, lalna te, thuneihna te, khawvel thim chunga roreltu te, hmun sâra thlarau sualna te nen kan indo zawk si a. Chuvangin, Pathian ralthuam zawng zawng chu keng la, mangan nia hmelma i do theih nan leh engkim i tih zawh hnua ding turin. Chuvângin, nghet takin ding rawh u, .

4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Chu bâkah, rinna phaw, mi sual thal kang zawng zawng i tihmit theihna chu la la;
5. A rilru a hah lutuk tin, chhandamna lukhum chu a inthuam a, .

7. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhan la, englai pawha dilna chi hrang hrang nen tawngtai thin ang che;
8. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Tin, hemi kawngah hian fimkhur tak leh chau lo takin awm la, mi thianghlim zawng zawng tan tawngtai rawh.
(Ephesi 6:10-18) tih a ni.

(10) Lei bêlah chuan ro hlu chu a inpuang a

He thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi keimahni atanga lo chhuak ni lovin Pathian hnen atanga lo chhuak a ni tih lantir nan he ro hlu (thutak Thlarau) hi lei bêlah kan nei a ni. Khawi lam zawng zawngah hmelmain min hual vel a, mahse kan tang lo va, kan mangang lo va, tihduhdah kan ni lo va, min thlahthlam si lo va; (2 Korinth 4:7-9) tih a ni.

(11) Isua nunna pawh keimahniah a lan chhuah theih nan Isua thihna chu keimahniah a thawk chhuak a ni

Keini nungte hi kan taksa thi theiah hian Isua nunna a lo lan theih nan Isua avangin thihnaah hlan kan ni fo si a. Hetiang aang hian thihna hi keimahniah hian a thawk a, nangmahah erawh nunna hi a thawk a ni. (2 Korinth 4:11-12)

articles.content:
Remna siamtute chu an eng a thawl e, Pathian fa tia koh an ni dawn si a.

---Matthaia 5:9

Encyclopedia awmzia sawifiahna

Thuhmahruai: (Form) Inhnialna awm lovin inrem taka inrem rawh.
Synonyms: hian ha, duhsakna, remna, hian ha, hian ha, inrem, inrem, etc.
Antonyms: insual, inhnialna, inhnialna, inrem lohna.
Source: Xuanding, Qing Dynasty, "Records of Autumn Lamps on Rainy Nights. Nanguo Scholars" "I nu leh pa te hnenah filial la, i farnu te nen pawh inrem takin awm rawh.

zawt: Khawvêla mite hian mi dangte nên inremna an siam thei ang em?
chhanna: Engvangin nge Jentailte hi an inhnial?

Engvangin nge Jentailte hi an inhnial? Engvangin nge hnam zawng zawng hian thil âtthlâk tak an ruahman? (Sâm 2:1) .

Thil chhinchhiah: Mi zawng zawngin thil an tisual tawh → sual, dan, leh tisa duhzawng leh duhzawng → tisa thiltih te chu a lang chiang hle: uirena, bawlhhlawhna, bawlhhlawhna, milem biakna, dawithiamna, huatna, inhnialna, inhuatna, thinrimna, Inkhawmpui, inhnialna, heresies, jealousy (hmanlai lehkhabu zial thenkhatah chuan "tualthah" tih thumal an dah belh), zu ruih, lawmna, etc. ...(Galatia 5:19-21)
Chuvangin khawvela mite hian mi inkara remna an siam thei lo. Hei hi i hrethiam em?

1. Remna siamtu

zawt: Engtin nge remna kan siam theih ang?
chhanna: Krista zarah mihring thar siam a ni a, .
Tichuan inremna a awm ta!

Bible hrilhfiahna

Ani chu kan remna a ni si a, an pahnih chu pakhatah a siam a, a taksaah chuan hmêlma nihna chu a tichhia a, Dânah chuan mi thar siam tûrin pahnih, chutiang chuan inremna a awm ta a ni. (Ephesi 2:14-15) tih a ni.

zawt: Engtin nge Krista hian ama zarah mihring thar a siam?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Sual lak ata min chhuah zalen

Note: Krista chu kan sualte avangin kraws-ah a thi a, sual lak ata min chhuah zalen a ni. Rom 6:6-7 en rawh

(2) Dan leh Dan anchhe lak ata min chhuah zalen

Hriat tur: Kraws-ah chuan Krista chuan (van, lei, Pathian leh mihring) chu a inpumkhat tir a, a laiah chuan kulh inthenna chu a tichhia a (chu chu Judate hian dan an nei a, Jentail-te erawh chuan dan an nei lo va; mahni taksa huatna tihchhiat nan . Rom 7:6 leh Galatia 3:13 en rawh.

(3) Putar leh a nungchangte i dah bo ang u

Note: Tin, phum a ni a, chuvang chuan putar nungchang chu kan dah bo a ni.

(4) Krista thawhlehna chuan Amah hmangin mihring thar a siam a

Note: Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! A khawngaihna nasa tak ang chuan Isua Krista mitthi zing ata thawhlehna hmangin beiseina nungah min siam thar leh ta Reference (1 Petera 1:3)

3 Pathian hrin—Johana 1:12-13

Amahah chuan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahna i nei a, chu chu thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin tha i hriat lai khan Krista pawh i rin lai khan. (Ephesi 1:13) tih a ni.
Note: Chanchin |ha leh Krista ring rawh Pathian →→ Pathian fapa tia koh a ni ang ! Amen.

(2) Pathian Thlarau hruaia awm apiang chu Pathian fa a ni

Pathian Thlarau hruaia awm apiang chu Pathian fate an ni si a. Hlauhna nei reng turin bawih nihna thlarau i dawng lo va, chutah chuan “Abba, Pa” tiin kan au a, Thlarau Thianghlim chuan Pathian fate kan ni tih a hriattir a; (Lehkhabu 8:14-16)

(3) Chanchin tha hril la, mite Isua Krista ring tir la, Kristaa mite inkarah remna siam rawh

【 tih a ni. Isuan ram chanchin tha a hril a 】

Isua chuan khawpui tin leh khaw tinah a fang kual a, an inkhawmna inah te a zirtir a, ram chanchin tha a hril a, natna leh natna tinreng a tidam a. (Matthaia 9:35)

【 tih a ni. Isua hminga chanchin tha hril tura tirh chhuah a ni 】

Mipui a hmuh chuan a khawngaih a, a chhan chu beram vengtu nei lo beram ang maia mi rethei leh tanpui theih loh an nih vang a ni. Chuvangin a zirtirte hnenah, "Buh seng hi a tam hle a, hnathawktute erawh an tlem hle. Chuvangin, buh sengtu Lalpa hnenah chuan a buh seng tura thawktu tir turin ngen rawh u (Matthaia 9:36-38)

Thil chhinchhiah: Isuan remna a siam a, Isua hming chu Remna Lal a ni! Isua hriltu, Chanchin |ha ring a, chhandamna thlentu Chanchin |ha hriltute hi remna siamtu an ni → Remna siamtute chu an eng a thawl e, Pathian fa tia koh an ni dawn si a. Amen!

Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. (Galatia 3:26) tih a ni.

articles.title: Thinlung thianghlimte chu an eng a thawl e
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Thinlung thianghlimte chu an eng a thawl e, Pathian an hmu dawn si a.
---Matthaia 5:8

Chinese dictionary hrilhfiahna a ni

thinlung thianghlim qīngxīn
( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) Thinlung thlamuang, lungkhamna nei lo, rilru thianghlim leh duhthusam tlemte
( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) Ngaihtuahna tibuaitu te paih bo la, i rilru a thlamuang a, thlamuang takin siam la, thinlung thianghlim nei la, thla chu a var a, a thianghlim bawk.
( 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) tih hian thinlung thianghlim neih leh mi thianghlim reng reng tihna a ni bawk.

1. Nunnain nghawng a neihte hi thinlung atanga lo chhuak a ni

Thil dang zawng aiin i thinlung i veng tur a ni (a nih loh leh lehlin: i thinlung hi i veng tha tur a ni), i nun rah chhuah chu i thinlung atanga lo chhuak a nih avangin. (Thufingte 4:23)

1 monk a ni : 1.1. Thinlung thianghlim leh duhna tlem nei la, ei rang la, Buddha hming sawi la, Sakyamuni entawn la, taksa chu tipung rawh - Buddha ni nghal la, Buddha Nung chu hmuh tumin "kal" la, Pathian ngaihsak a ni.
Taoist puithiam 2: Tlang chungah chuan Taoism zawm la, thi thei lo ni rawh.
3 nun: Thi thei khawvel a hmuh chuan a sam a tan a, nun a ni a, nupui a nei a, Buddhism-ah a kir leh ta a ni.
4 (Rûl)-in an bum a, kawng dik chu a ni tih an ngaihtuah a .
→→Mihring tan chuan kawng dik anga lang a awm a, mahse a tawpah chuan thihna kawng a lo ni ta a ni. (Thufingte 14:12)
→→Fimkhur rawh u, chutilochuan in thinlungin a bum ang a, pathian dangte rawngbawl leh chibai buk turin kawng dik aangin in kal bo daih ang. (Deuteronomy 11:16) tih a ni.

2. Mihring thinlung hi bum hmang leh sual tak a ni.

1 Mite thinlung hi a sual hle

Mihring thinlung hi thil zawng zawng aia bum hmang leh sual lutuk a ni a, Tuin nge hre thei ang? (Jeremia 17:9) tih a ni.

2 Thinlung hi bumna a ni

Chhûngril aṭangin, chu chu mihring thinlung aṭangin ngaihtuahna sual te, mipat hmeichhiatna hmansualna te, rukrukna te, tualthah te, uirena te, duhâmna te, sualna te, bumna te, inngaihtlâwmna te, inhuatna te, sawichhiatna te, chapona te, chapona te a lo chhuak si a. Heng sual zawng zawng hi chhungril atanga lo chhuak a ni a, mihring a tibawlhhlawh thei a ni. ” (Marka 7:21-23) tih a ni.

3 Chhia leh ṭha hriatna hloh

Chuvang chuan ka ti a, Lalpaah chuan hei hi ka sawi a ni, Jentailte thil âtthlâkah chuan kal tawh suh u. An rilru chu Pathianin nunna a pek aangin a thim a, a inhlat hle a, an hriat lohna leh an thinlung khauh tak avangin an chhia leh tha hriatna hloh tawhin duhâmnaah an inhmang a, bawlhhlawhna chi hrang hrang an ti a ni. (Ephesi 4:17-19) tih a ni.

zawt: Thinlung thianghlim mi chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Bible hrilhfiahna

Sam 73:1 Israel rama thinlung thianghlimte chungah Pathian a ngilnei tak zet a ni!
2 Timothea 2:22 Tlangval châknate chu tlânsan la, thinlung thianghlima Lalpa hnêna ṭawngṭaitute nên felna, rinna, hmangaihna leh remna zawng rawh.

3. Chhia leh tha hriatna thianghlim

zawt: Engtin nge i chhia leh tha hriatna i tihthianghlim theih ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Tifai hmasa phawt ang che

Nimahsela chunglam atanga lo chhuak finna chu a hmasain a thianghlim a, chumi hnuah remna a ni a, a zaidam a, a zaidam a, khawngaihnain a khat a, rah tha tak a chhuah a, thliar hranna leh vervêkna tel lo a ni. (Jakoba 3:17) tih a ni.

(2)Krista thisen sawisel loh chuan in thinlung a tithianghlim thin

Chatuan Thlarau zara Pathian hnena bawlhhlawh awm lova inhlanna Krista thisen chuan Pathian nung rawng in bawl theih nan thiltih thi ata in thinlung a tifai ang? (Hebrai 9:14)

(3) I chhia leh ṭha hriatna a lo thianghlim tawh chuan i sualna i nei tawh lo.

Chutiang a nih loh chuan inpeknate chu hun rei tak kal ta atang khan a tawp tawh lo’m ni? A chhan chu chibai bûktute chhia leh ṭha hriatna a lo thianghlim tawh a, an sual tih an inhriat tawh loh vâng a ni. (Hebrai 10:2)

(4) Sual titawp la, sual tihbo la, sual ngaihdam la, chatuan felna luhtir rawh →→“Chatuan thiam chantir” i ni a, chatuan nunna i nei ta! I hrethiam em?

“I mite leh in khawpui thianghlim tan, bawhchhiatna titawp tur te, sual titawp tur te, khawlohna inremna siam tur te, chatuan felna thlentu tur te, inlarna leh hrilhlawkna chhinchhiahna siam tur te, Mi Thianghlim hriak thihna tur te, kar sawmsarih chhung ruat a ni ( Daniela 9:24 ah kan hmu a).

4. Krista rilru chu i thinlungah la rawh

zawt: Krista rilru chu engtin nge kan neih ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chhinchhiahna a dawng

Amahah chuan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahna i nei a, chu chu thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin tha i hriat lai khan Krista pawh i rin lai khan. (Ephesi 1:13) tih a ni.

(2) In thinlungah Pathian Thlarau a nung a, tisa mi in ni lo

Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi i ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. Nangmahah Krista a awm chuan taksa chu sual vangin a thi a, thlarau erawh chu felna avangin a nung a ni. (Rom 8:9-10) tih a ni.

(3) Thlarau Thianghlim leh kan thinlungin Pathian fa kan ni tih a hriattir a

Pathian Thlarau hruaia awm apiang chu Pathian fate an ni si a. Hlauhna nei reng turin saltanna thlarau i dawng lo va, chutah chuan, “Abba, Pa!” châng 14-16)

(4)Krista rilru chu i thinlungah nei rawh
Krista Isuaah pawh khan he rilru hi nangmahah awm rawh se: Ani chu Pathian angin a awm a, Pathian nena intluktlanna chu hriat theih turah a ngai lo va, chhiahhlawh angin a insiam lo va, mihringah a piang a ni ang chiah a ni a, mihring anga hmuh a nih avangin, A inngaitlawm a, thihna thlengin thu awih a lo ni ta a, kraws-a thih thlengin. (Philippi 2:5-8) tih a ni.

(5) I kraws pu la, Isua zui rawh

Tichuan mipui leh a zirtirte chu a ko va, an hnenah, "Tupawh ka hnung zui duh chuan amah leh amah a phat a, a kraws puin mi zui tur a ni. Tupawh a thlarau (or translated: soul) chhandam duh tan; the same below) Nang pawhin i nunna i hloh ang;

(6) Van ram chanchin tha hril rawh

Isua chuan khawpui tin leh khaw tinah a fang kual a, an inkhawmna inah te a zirtir a, ram chanchin tha a hril a, natna leh natna tinreng a tidam a. Mipui a hmuh chuan a khawngaih a, a chhan chu beram vengtu nei lo beram ang maia mi rethei leh tanpui theih loh an nih vang a ni. Chuvangin a zirtirte hnenah, "Buh seng hi a tam hle a, hnathawktute erawh an tlem hle. Chuvangin, buh sengtu Lalpa hnenah a buh seng tura thawktu tir turin ngen rawh u (Matthaia 9:35-38)

(7) Amah nen kan tuarpui a, amah nen chawimawiin kan awm bawk ang

Fa an nih chuan ro luahtu, Pathian ro luahtu leh Krista ro luahpuitu an ni tihna a ni. Amah nena kan tuarpui chuan Amah rualin kan chawimawi bawk ang. (Rom 8:17) tih a ni.

5. Pathian an hmu ang

(1) Simon Petera chuan: "Pathian nung Fapa i ni" a ti!

Isuan a hnenah, "Tunge ka nih i tih?" is not Tisain a puang che u a, ka Pa vana miin a puang zawk a ni (Matthaia 16:15-17).

Thil chhinchhiah: Judate pawhin “Juda” telin Isua chu Mihring Fapa angin an hmu a, mahse Isua chu Pathian Fapa angin an hmu lo.

(2) Johana hian a mit ngeiin a hmu a, novice-te pawhin an khawih a ni

A tir aanga nunna thu bulpui chungchangah chuan hei hi kan hriat, kan hmuh, kan mit ngeia kan hmuh leh kan kut hmanga kan khawih chu a ni. (He nunna hi a lo inpuang tawh a, kan hmu ta a, tunah chuan Pa hnena chatuan nunna awm tawh leh kan hnena inpuan tawh chu nangmahni hnenah kan pe ta tih kan hriattir a ni.) (1 Johana 1:1-2)

(3) Unau za nga hnenah vawi khatah a inlan

In hnena ka pek pawh kha: pakhatnaah chuan, Krista chu Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin a thi a, a phum a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a ni thum niah kaihthawh a ni a, Kepha hnenah chuan, Chumi hnuah chuan a lo awm ta a ni tirhkoh sawm leh pahnihte hnena entir a ni a; Tichuan Jakoba hnenah a lo lang ta a, chutah chuan tirhkoh zawng zawng hnenah, a tawpah chuan keimah, la piang lo angin a lo lang ta a ni. (1 Korinth 15:3-8) tih a ni.

(4) Thilsiam hnathawh hmanga Pathian thilsiam hmuh

Pathian chungchânga hriat theihte chu an thinlungah a lang chhuak a, Pathianin a puan chhuah avângin. Khawvel siam aangin Pathian chatuan thiltihtheihna leh Pathian nihna chu chiang takin hriat theih a ni a, hmuh theih loh ni mah se, thil siamte hmangin hriatthiam theih a ni a, mihring chu chhanna nei lovin a awm ta a ni. (Rom 1:19-20)

(5) Inlarna leh mumang hmanga Pathian hmuh

‘Ni hnuhnungah chuan, Pathianin a ti, mi zawng zawng chungah ka Thlarau ka leih ang. In fapate leh in fanute chuan inlarna an hmu ang a; (Tirhkohte 2:17)

(6) Krista a lo lan hian ropui takin a hnenah kan inlar ve thin

Kan nunna Krista a lo lan hunah chuan nangni pawh ropui takin a hnenah in inlar ang. (Kolossa 3:4) tih a ni.

(7)A pianphung dik tak chu kan hmu ang

Unau duh takte u, tunah hian Pathian fa kan ni tawh a, nakin lawka kan nih tur chu a la puang chhuak lo a, mahse Lalpa a lo lan hunah chuan Amah ang kan ni dawn tih kan hria a, a chhan chu Amah ang angin kan hmu dawn a ni. (1 Johana 3:2)

Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "Thinlung thianghlimte chu an eng a thawl e, Pathian an hmu dawn si a," a ti

articles.title: Khawngaihtute chu an eng a thawl e
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Khawngaihtute chu an eng a thawl e, khawngaihna an dawng dawn si a.
---Matthaia 5:7

Encyclopedia awmzia sawifiahna

Khawngaihna: [lian xu], hmangaihna leh lainatna a kawk.
Synonyms: khawngaihna, lainatna, khawngaihna, thilpek, lainatna.
Antonym: mi rilru na tak.

Bible hrilhfiahna

lainatna : Khawngaihna, lainatna, ngaihsakna leh ngaihsakna sawina a ni.

Thil ha tih hi ka ngaina (or lehlinna: lainatna ), halral thilhlan aiin Pathian hriatna an duh zawk. Hosea 6:6-ah hian a lang

zawt: Tu nge tha?
chhanna: Isuan a hnenah, “Engvangin nge mi tha min tih? Pathian chauh lo chu mi tha an awm lo . Marka 10:18-ah a awm

Jehova chu a ni Tha A dik a nih avangin mi sualte chu kawng dik a zirtir ang. Sam 25:8-ah hian kan hmu

zawt: Khawvel ngilneihna leh lainatna hi a pawimawh em?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Tisa mi chu sualah hralh a ni tawh
Pathian Lehkha Thuin a sawi angin → Dan chu thlarau atanga chhuak a ni tih kan hria a, kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh. Rom 7:14-ah hian kan hmu a

(2) Tisa mite chuan “ . suahsualna "dan
Mahse, member-ah hian dan dang a awm niin ka hria a, chu chu ka thinlunga dan nen a indo a, salah min man a, member-ah sual dan min zawm tir a ni. Rom 7:23 ah hian kan hmu

(3) Tisa miten tisa lam thil an ngaihsak a
Tisa anga nungte chuan tisa lam thilah an rilru an dah si a;

(4)Tisa lam ngaihtuahtute chu an thi tawh
Tisa rilru chu thihna a ni;...Tisa rilru chu Pathian hmêlma a ni si a; Tin, tisa lama awmte chuan Pathian an ti lawm thei lo. Rom 8:5-8 ah hian kan hmu

Thil chhinchhiah: Pathian tih loh chu khawvel mite khawngaihna chu tisa ngaihsak a, tisa thilte khawngaih, thi thei leh chhe thei tisa ngaihtuah hi a ni. Chuvangin Pathian mithmuhah chuan an nungchang hi tha leh khawngaihna anga ngaih a ni lo. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

zawt: Khawvela mite hian lainatna, khawngaihna leh ngilneihna an nei em?
chhanna: Aih.

zawt: Engati nge?
chhanna: A chhan chu mi zawng zawngin thil an tisual a, Pathian ropuina an tlachham a ni. Misual chu thuthlung bawhchhia a, sual titu, mi sual tia koh a ni.
Mi sualte "khawngaihna leh khawngaihna" pawh hi a ngilnei hle.

zawt: Engati nge?
chhanna: Sual hlawh chu thihna a nih avangin misual (mi sual) te hian Pathian emaw, Isua emaw, Chanchin |ha emaw an ring lo! Piantharna leh Thlarau Thianghlim phuarna a awm lo.” Tha "rah. Pathian mithmuhah chuan mi sualte, A "khawngaihna leh lainatna" zawng zawng hi inlanna, mi â, mi sualte hian felna an nei lo, .

"Mi sual ta". khawngaih "I thil ha a ti thei che a, a pui thei che a, a bum thei che u a, Pathian leh Krista chhandamna lam hawisan turin a hruai thei che u a ni, chutiang bawkin mi sual tan pawh a ni." khawngaih "A rapthlak bawk. Hei hi i hrethiam em?"

Mi fel chuan a ran vulh nunna a chhanhim a, mi sual nunna erawh a chhanhim thin khawngaih Pawh nunrawng . Thufingte 12:10 en rawh

1. Jehova chuan khawngaihna, hmangaihna, khawngaihna leh khawngaihna a nei a

LALPA chuan a hmaah heti hian a puang a: “LALPA, LALPA chu a ni khawngaih Pathian khawngaihthlak, thinrim ngam, hmangaihna leh thutak tam tak nei. Exodus 34:6 ah hian kan hmu a

(1) Pathian ṭihtute chu khawngaih rawh
Pain a fate a khawngaih ang hian Lalpa pawhin lainatna Amah hlautute chu! Sam 103:13-ah hian kan hmu a

(2) Mi retheite lainatna
Lal zawng zawngin chibai an buk ang a, hnam zawng zawngin a rawng an bawl ang. Mi retheite an au hunah a chhanchhuak ang a, anpuitu nei lote chu a chhanchhuak ang. a duh a ni lainatna Mi rethei leh rethei, mi retheite nunna chhanhim rawh u. Sam 72:11-13-ah a awm

(3) Pathian lam hawite chu khawngaih rawh
Lalpa ṭihtute chuan an inbia a, Lalpa chuan a ngaithla a, Lalpa ṭihtute leh a hming hre rengtute tan hriatrengna lehkhabu a awm a.
“Ka ruat niah chuan ka ta an ni ang,” tiin LALPA Engkimtitheia chuan a sawi a, “ka ta bik an ni ang a, mihring chungah ka khawngaih ang,” tiin. lainatna Mahni fapa ngei rawng bawl rawh. Malakia 3:16-17-ah a awm

2. Isuan khawngaihna a hmangaih a, mi zawng zawng a khawngaih

(1)Isua chuan khawngaihna a ngaina a
'Ka duh lainatna , chuan inthawina a duh lo. ’ He thu awmzia i hriat chian chuan mi sual lo chu misualah i ngai lo vang. Matthaia 12:7-ah hian kan hmu a

(2)Isua chuan mi zawng zawng chungah zahngaihna a lantir a
Isua chuan khawpui leh khaw tinah a fang kual a, an inkhawmna inah te a zirtir a, ram chanchin tha a hril a, natna leh natna tinreng a tidam a. Mi tam tak a hmuh chuan a khawngaih anmahni chu beram vengtu nei lo beram ang maia buai leh chenna nei lo an ni si a; Matthaia 9:35-36-ah a awm

Chutih lai chuan mi tam tak an pungkhawm leh a, ei tur a awm tawh lo. Isuan a zirtirte a ko va, "I." khawngaih Hêng mite zawng zawng hi hetah hian ni thum lai ka hnênah an awm tawh a, ei tûr an nei lo. Marka 8:1-2

zawt: Isuan mi zawng zawng a khawngaih a Chhan Eng nge ni?
chhanna: Isua chu Pathian Fapa a ni tih hriain Pathian lam hawitir rawh se .

Entîr nân, Isua chuan khawpui leh khaw tinah vân ram chanchin ṭha hrilin a fang kual a, damlote a tidam a, ramhuaite a hnawt chhuak a, chhinchhiahna leh thilmak a ti a, mi sângnga aia tam chu chhang panga leh sangha pahnih a chawm a, chutiang chuan an taksa chu tihdam leh lungawi theih a ni.

( Chhan ) tih hi Isua chu Pathian Fapa, Krista leh Chhandamtu a nihzia leh Isua rinna chuan chatuan nunna an neih theih phah dawn tih hriattirna a ni. Chutiang a nih loh chuan Isua chu Krista a ni tih an rin loh chuan an tisa taksa tihdam leh lungawina tur hlawkna a awm lovang.

Chuvang chuan Lal Isuan heti hian a sawi: “Ei tur boral tur atan hna thawk suh u, Chatuan nunna atana chatuan chaw atan hna thawk zawk rawh u, chu chu Mihring Fapain a pe ang che u, Pa Pathianin a chhinchhiahna a siamsak tawh si a.”

( Thil chhinchhiah: Khawvela mite hian a chang chuan khawngaihna leh lainatna an nei thei a, mahse Pathian felna leh Thlarau Thianghlim chu an chhungah an nei lo va, Pathian nung chanchin tha an hril thei lo bawk. An khawngaihna leh khawngaihna hian mihring tisa chhe thei chauh a ngaihtuah a, mihring "chatuan" nun chu an ngaihsak lo. Chuvangin an khawngaihna leh lainatna hian hlawkna engmah a nei lo va, malsawmna a ni dawn lo bawk. ) Chuti a nih chuan, i hrethiam em?

3. Kristiante chu lainatna thinlung puin Pathian nen kan leng dun thin

(1) Pathianin mi zawng zawng a khawngaih êm êm êm

Tun hma khan Pathian thu i awih lo a, tunah erawh an thu awih loh (Israel) avangin bum i ni ta lainatna . Chuvangin, (Israel) .
Anni pawhin thu âwih lo an ni a, chutichuan an thilpêk che u avângin lainatna , tunah (Israel) pawh a khuh a ni lainatna . A chhan chu Pathianin mi zawng zawng chu thu awih lohnaah a khuh vek avangin lainatna Mi zawng zawng. Rom 11:30-32 ah hian kan hmu

(2) Khawngaihna kan dawng a, Pathian mite kan lo ni ta a ni

Nimahsela, thim ata a êng mak takah a kotu che u ropuizia in puang chhuah theihna turin hnam thlan, lal puithiamte, hnam thianghlim, Pathian mite in ni. Tun hma chuan hnam in ni lo va, tunah chuan Pathian mi in ni tawh a; lainatna , mahse tunah chuan a mit a tidel ta lainatna . 1 Petera 2:9-10-ah kan hmu

(3) Khawngaihna nei la, khawngaihna thinlung puin Pathian nen lengdun rawh

Aw mihring, thil tha chu Lalpan a entir che a ni. I lakah eng nge a duh? Rorelna dik i tih chhung chuan, . Chutiang khawpa lainatna , in Pathian nen inngaitlawm takin leng rawh u. Mika 6:8-ah kan hmu

Chuvangin, hlawkna kan neih theih nan khawngaihna lalṭhutphahah huaisen takin i lo kal ang u lainatna , khawngaihna dawng la, engtik lai pawhin tanpuitu ni rawh . Hebrai 4:16 ah hian kan hmu

articles.title: Felna riltam leh tuihalte chu an eng a thawl e
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Felna riltam leh tuihalte chu an eng a thawl e, an lungawi dawn si a.
---Matthaia 5:6

Encyclopedia awmzia sawifiahna

tuihal[jt ke].
1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Riltam leh tuihal
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Beiseina duhthusam leh riltamna tehkhin thu a ni.
Muyi [mu yl] chuan ngilneihna leh felna a ngaisang hle.

Bible hrilhfiahna

1. Mihring felna

zawt: Khawvelah hian felna a awm em?
chhanna: Aih.

Thuziak angin: “Mi fel an awm lo, pakhat mah hrethiam an awm lo, Pathian zawngtu an awm lo pakhat pawh ni se Rom 3:10 -12 knots

zawt: Engvangin nge mi fel an awm loh?
chhanna: Mi zawng zawngin thil an tisual a, Pathian ropuina an tlachham avângin;

2. Pathian felna

zawt: Felna chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pathian chu felna a ni, Isua Krista, mi fel chu!

Ka fate u, in sual loh nan heng thu hi ka ziak che u a ni. Tupawhin sual an tih chuan Pa hnenah thurawn petu kan nei a, Isua Krista mifel chu.
1 Johana 2:1

3. Mi fel ( thlakthleng ) mi fel lote, Kristaa Pathian felna kan lo nih theih nan

Krista pawh hian sual vangin vawi khat a tuar a (hmanlai lehkhabu zial a awm: thihna), chu chu Fel lohna ai chuan felna Pathian hnena min hruai turin. Taksa lamah chuan tihhlum a ni a, Thlarau lamah chuan a tho leh a ni. 1 Petera 3:18-ah kan hmu

Sual hre lo chu Pathianin a siam a, . tan Amaha Pathian felna kan nih theih nan sualah kan lo chang ta a ni. 2 Korinth 5:21-ah hian kan hmu a

4. Felna riltam leh tuihalte

zawt: Felna riltam leh tuihalte chu engtin nge an tihreh theih ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Tui nung Lalpa pek chu ei rawh

Hmeichhia chuan, "Ka pu, tui lakna hmanrua kan nei lo va, tuikhuah pawh a thuk a ni. Khawiah nge tui nung i hmuh theih ang? Kan pi leh pute Jakoba hian he tuikhuah hi min hnutchhiah a, amah leh a fapate leh a ran vulhte chuan chu tuikhuah chu an in ta a ni," a ti a tui." , a aia tha zawk i ni em? A lian lutuk em?" Isuan a chhang a, "Tupawh he tui in hi a tuihal leh ang a;

zawt: Tui nung chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Krista pum aangin tui nung luite a luang chhuak a, ringtu dangte pawhin Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chu an chang ngei ang! Amen.

Kût ni hnuhnung ber, ni ropui ber ni-ah chuan Isua chu a ding a, a aw chu a tisang a, "Tupawh tuihal chuan ka hnenah lo kal sela, in rawh se. Tupawh mi ring apiang chu Pathian Lehkha Thuin 'Pawn chhuak rawh u," a tih angin of his belly will flow living water'" Lui a lo thleng ang. '" Isuan he thu hi Amah ringtute’n an dawn tur Thlarau Thianghlim sawiin a sawi a ni. Isua chawimawi a la nih loh avangin Thlarau Thianghlim chu pek a la ni lo. Johana 7:37-39-ah a awm

(2)Lalpa nunna chhang ei rawh

zawt: Nunna chhang chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Isua chu nunna chhang a ni

Kan pi leh pute khan thlalerah manna an ei a, heti hian ziak a ni: “Van atangin chhang a pe a,” tiin. ’” tih a ni.

Isuan, "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, Mosia hian van atanga chhang a pe lo che u a, ka Pa hian van atanga chhang dik tak a pe zawk che u a ni. Pathian chhang chu van atanga lo chhuk chu a ni si a, Pakhat chu a ni," a ti a khawvel nunna petu,” a ti a.

Anni chuan, “Lalpa, he chhang hi min pe fo rawh!”
Isuan, “Kei hi nunna chhang ka ni, tupawh ka hnena lo kal apiang chu a ril a tam lo vang;
Mahse, ka hrilh che u a, min hmu a, mahse min la ring lo. Johana 6:31-36-ah a awm

2 Lalpa ei leh in rawh Sa leh Thisen

(Isua chuan) Kei hi nunna chhang ka ni. I pi leh pute khan thlalerah manna an ei a, an thi ta a ni. Hei hi van atanga chhang lo chhuk chu a ni a, miten an ei chuan an thih loh nan. Kei hi van atanga lo chhuk chhang nung chu ka ni;

Chhang ka pek tur chu ka tisa a ni a, chu chu khawvel nunna atan ka pe ang. Chutichuan, Judate chuan, "Engtin nge he mi hian a sa ei tur min pek theih ang?" " "

Isuan, "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, Mihring Fapa sa in ei a, a thisen in in loh chuan nangmah ah nunna i nei lo. Tupawh ka tisa ei a, ka thisen in chuan chatuan nunna a nei a, a tawp berah chuan," a ti ni chuan ka kaitho ang.
Johana 6:48-54-ah a awm

(3) Rinna avanga thiamchantirna

zawt: Felna riltam leh tuihal! Engtin nge mi pakhatin Pathian felna a hmuh theih?
chhanna: Mihring chu Isua Krista rinnain thiam chantir a ni!

1Dil la, pek a ni ang
2Thil zawng la, i hmu ang
3Kkk la, kawngkhar chu i tan a inhawng ang! Amen.

(Isua chuan) Ka ti leh a che u, dil rawh u, zawng rawh u, tichuan in kik ang a, in tan kawngkhar chu hawn a ni ang. Dil apiangin a hmu a, zawng apiangin a hmu a, kik apiang chu a tan kawngkhar hawn a ni ang.
Nangni zînga tuin nge a fapain chhang a dîl chuan lung pe ang? Sangha dil chungin, sangha aiah rul i pek chuan engtin nge ni ang? Egg i dil chuan scorpion i pek chuan engtin nge ni ang? Nangni pawh mi sual ni mah la, in fate hnena thilpek tha pek dan in hriat chuan, in Pa vana mi chuan a diltute hnenah Thlarau Thianghlim chu engtiang chiahin nge a pek ang? ” Luka 11:9-13-ah kan hmu a

zawt: Rinna avanga thiamchantir a ni! engtin( lehkhathawn ) dikna (justification) a ni em?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1( lehkhathawn ) Chanchin |ha thiamchantirna

Chanchintha hi ka zak lo, ringtu zawng zawng tan, Juda tan leh Grik mite tan pawh chhandamna atan Pathian thiltihtheihna a ni. He Chanchin |haah hian Pathian felna a lang a, rinna aanga rinnaah hian he felna hi a ni. Thuziak angin: “Mi felte chu rinnain an nung ang.”

zawt: Chanchin |ha chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Chhandamna Chanchin |ha → (Paula) Kei pawhin ka hril che u kha: Pakhatnaah chuan Pathian Lehkha Thu ang chuan Krista hi; kan sualte avanga thi a ni , .

→Sual lakah min chhuah zalen la, .
→Dan leh a ânchhia lakah min chhuah zalen rawh , .
Tin, phum a ni a, .
→Mihring hlui leh a thiltihte i dah bo ang u;
Tin, Bible-in a sawi dan chuan a ni thum niah a tho leh ta a ni.
→ Krista thawhlehna hian mi fel min siam a , . (Chu chu thawhleh, pianthar, chhandam, leh Krista nena Pathian fa anga pawm a ni. Chatuan nunna.) Amen!

2 Pathian khawngaihnaa zalen taka thiam chantir

Tunah chuan Pathian khawngaihna avangin Krista Isua tlanna zarah zalen takin thiam chantir kan ni ta. Pathianin Isua chu Isua thisen zarah leh mihring rinna hmangin Pathian felna lantir nan a dintir a, a chhan chu amah ngei pawh a nih theih nan tun hmaa miten an tihsualte chu dawhthei takin a tuar a ni mi fel nia hriat a ni a, Isua ringtute pawh thiamchantir a nih theih nan. Rom 3:24-26 ah hian kan hmu a

Isua chu Lal a ni tih i kâin i puang a, Pathianin mitthi zîng ata a kaitho tih i thinlunga i rin chuan chhandam i ni ang. A chhan chu mi chu a thinlunga rinna hmanga thiamchantir theih a ni a, a kâa inpuan hmanga chhandam theih a nih vang a ni. Rom 10:9-10 ah hian kan hmu

3 Pathian Thlarau (Thlarau Thianghlim) hmanga thiamchantirna .

Chutiang bawkin in zînga ṭhenkhat chu in silfai a, tihthianghlim in ni a, Lalpa Isua Krista hming leh kan Pathian Thlarauvin thiam changin in awm ta a ni. 1 Korinth 6:11-ah hian kan hmu a

Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "Felna riltam leh tuihalte chu an eng a thawl e, an chawh ang. Amen! Hei hi i hrethiam em?"

articles.title: Thuhnuairawlhte chu an eng a thawl e
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Thuhnuairawlhte chu an eng a thawl e, lei hi an luah dawn si a.
---Matthaia 5:5

Encyclopedia awmzia sawifiahna

Gentle: (form) ngilnei leh hlim thei, (near) thu awih leh thu awih.
Mi ngilnei, ngilnei, ngilnei, ngilnei, thu awih, lum, zaidam leh ngaihsak tak ang chi te.
Ai Qing hla "Bouquet. Vienna":"Ni chu i window atang chuan a rawn eng thei a, kut zungtang nem takin i mit a khawih thei a ni..."

Antonyms: mi rilru na, mi râpthlâk, mi râpthlâk, mi râpthlâk, tharum thawh, mi râpthlâk, mi chapo.

Bible hrilhfiahna

Mi sawichhiat suh la, inhnial suh la, thlamuang takin awm rawh, Mi zawng zawng chungah ngilneihna lantir rawh . Tita 3:2 ah hian kan hmu

Engkimah inngaitlawm rawh, . dimdawi , dawhthei takin awm ula, hmangaihnaa in tuar tawn ula, Thlarau inpumkhatna vawng reng turin remna thlunzawm hmang rawh u. Ephesi 4:2-3 ah hian kan hmu a

zawt: Mi ngilnei tak chu tu nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1)Krista zaidamna

“Zion hmeichhiate hnênah, ‘Ngai teh u, in Lal chu in hnênah a lo kal a; a nêm hle , leh sabengtung chunga chuang, chu chu sabengtung no chunga chuang tihna a ni. ’” Matthaia 21:5-ah hian kan hmu a

(2) Lal Isuan: “Thinlung zaidam leh thuhnuairawlh ka ni” a ti!

Nangni thawkrim leh phurrit phur zawng zawngte u, ka hnenah lo kal ula, ka chawlhtir ang che u. Thinlung ngilnei leh inngaitlawm tak ka ni , ka nghawngkawl chu in chungah keng la, ka hnen atangin zir rawh u, tichuan in thlarau tan chawlhna in hmu ang. Matthaia 11:28-29 ah hian kan hmu a

zawt: Khawi atanga lo chhuak nge zaidamna?
chhanna: Chunglam atang chuan.

zawt: Tunge chunglam atanga lo kal?
Chhanna: Isua, Van Pa Fapa.

(Isua chuan) Leia thil ka hrilh che u a, nang pawhin i ring lo a nih chuan, vanah thil ka hrilh che chuan engtin nge i rin theih ang? Mihring Fapa van atanga lo chhuk, vana la awm chauh lo chu tumah vanah an lawn lo. Johana 3:12-13-ah a awm

zawt: Chunglam atanga ngilneihna chu engtin nge kan pawm ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Tifai hmasa phawt ang che

zawt: Engtin nge tihfai ang?
chhanna: I chhia leh ṭha hriatna a thianghlim hunah chuan inthiam lohna i nei tawh lo. !

Chutiang a nih loh chuan inpeknate chu hun rei tak kal ta atang khan a tawp tawh lo’m ni? A chhan chu tawngtai thinte chuan, . Vawikhat chu chhia leh tha hriatna a lo thianghlim tawh chuan sualna a nei tawh lo. . Hebrai 10:2

zawt: Engtin nge inthiam lohna nei lovin ka tihfai theih ang?
chhanna: ( lehkhathawn ) Krista thisen sawisel loh chuan i (chhia leh tha hriatna) chu i thiltih thi ata a tifai a, i thinlung (chhia leh tha hriatna) chuan Krista thisen hlu tak hmangin " su "I sual tih ka hre tawh lo. Amen!

Chatuan Thlarau zara Pathian hnena bawlhhlawh awm lova inhlanna Krista thisen chuan Pathian nung rawng in bawl theih nan thiltih thi ata in thinlung a tifai ang? Hebrai 9:14 en rawh

(2)A hnuhnung ber chu remna, zaidamna leh zaidamna a ni

Nimahsela chunglam atanga finna lo chhuak chu a thianghlim hmasa a, chutah chuan remna a awm a; Mi ngilnei leh ngilnei , khawngaihnaa khat, rah chhuah, duhthlanna nei lo, inngaihluhna nei lo. Jakoba 3:17-ah a awm

(3) Khawngaihna rah tuh nan remna hmang rawh

Tin, remna siamtu chu felna rah thlamuang taka tuh hi a ni. Jakoba 3:18-ah a awm

(4) Thuhnuairawlh hi Thlarau Thianghlim rah a ni

Thlarau rah chu hmangaihna te, lawmna te, thlamuanna te, dawhtheihna te, ngilneihna te, thatna te, rinawmna te, . dimdawi ,thunun. Chutiang thil khapna dan a awm lo.
Galatia 5:22-23 ah hian kan hmu a

(5) Mi thuhnuairawlhte chuan Van Pa rochun chu an rochun ang

He Thlarau Thianghlim hi Pathian mite (mipui: A original text chu industry a ni ) chu A ropuina fak turin tlan a ni.
Ephesi 1:14-ah hian kan hmu a

Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. ... Krista ta in nih chuan Abrahama thlahte in ni a, thutiam angin ro luahtu in ni.
Galatia 3:26,29-ah kan hmu

Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "Mi thuhnuairawlhte chu an eng a thawl e, lei hi an rochun dawn si a, Amen! Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

articles.title: Lungngaite chu an eng a thawl e
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Lungngaite chu an eng a thawl e! an thlamuan dâwn si a.
--Matthaia 5:4

Encyclopedia awmzia sawifiahna

Lungngaihna: Chinese hming
A lam chhuah dan: āi tòng
Hrilhfiahna: Lungchhiatthlak tak, lungngaihna nasa tak.
Source: "Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Ji Zun Zhuan".

Bible hrilhfiahna

lungngai rawh : lungngaihna, lungngaihna, tap, lungngai, lungngai → "thihna hlauhna", "boral hlauhna", chhungte bo tana tap, tap, lungngaihna leh lungngaihna tih ang bawkin.

Sarah chu kum za leh sawmhnih leh pasarih a nih thlengin a dam a, chu chu Sari dam chhung kum a ni. Sari chu Kanaan rama Kiriath Arba, Hebron khuaah a thi a. Abrahama chuan a lungngai a, a tap bawk a. Genesis Bung 23 Châng 1-2 en rawh

zawt: Miin “ui” a boral avanga a lungngaih chuan hei hi malsawmna a ni em?
chhanna: Aih!

zawt: Chutiang chuan Lal Isuan: "A ti a. lungngai rawh "Mipuite an eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(Pathian duhzawng anga tlachham, lungngai leh lungngai, chanchintha tana thahnemngai tak takte chu an eng a thawl e)

(1) . Isuan Jerusalem a tap a

“Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, nang zâwlneite thattu leh i hnêna tirhte lunga deng ṭhîntu, Vawkin a thla hnuaia a note a khâwm ang hian vawi eng zât nge ka duh tawh a, Nang erawh chuan Ni e in chu in kutah dah a ni

(2) . Isua chuan miten Pathian thawhlehna thiltihtheihna an ring lo tih a hmuh chuan a tap a.

Mari chu Isua hnena a lo kal a, a hmuh chuan a ke bulah a bawkkhup a, "Lalpa, hetah hian awm ta la, ka unaupa hi a thi lovang, Isuan a tap lai leh a bula Juda mite an tap lai a hmuh chuan ani An thinlungah an rûm a, an buai hle a, "Khawiah nge i mutpui?" Isua chu a tap a . Johana 11:32-35-ah a awm

(3) . Krista chu ring takin a tap a, kan sualte chu mittui tla chungin a tawngtai a, kan capital sualte ngaidam turin Van Pa hnenah a ngen a

Krista tisaa a awm lai khan aw ring tak a nei a tap , thihna laka chhanchhuak thei Lalpa hnenah mittui tla chungin a tawngtai a, a Pathian ngaihsakna avangin chhan a ni. Hebrai 5:7 en rawh

(4) . Petera chuan Lalpa chu vawi thum a phat a, nasa takin a tap a

Petera chuan Isua thusawi: “Ar au hmain vawi thum mi phat ang,” tih chu a hre reng a nasa takin a tap a . Matthaia 26:75-ah a awm

(5) . Zirtirte chuan kraws-a Isua thihna chu an lungngai a

Chawlhkar ni khatnaah zing takah Isua chu a tho leh a, Mari Magdalini (chuta tang chuan Isuan ramhuai pasarih a hnawhchhuahna) hnenah a inlar hmasa ber a.
Isua zuitu mipuite chu an awm tih a hrilh a; lungngai leh tap rawh . Isua chu a nung a, Mariin a hmu tih an hria a, mahse an ring lo. Marka 16:9-11-ah kan hmu

(6) . Korinth khuaa kohhran chu Paula vangin tihduhdahna an tawk a ni! Bo, lungngaihna leh thahnemngaihna

Makedonia kan thlen pawhin kan taksaah thlamuanna kan nei lova, buainain min hual vel a, pawnah indona a awm a, kan chhungril lamah pawh hlauhna a awm bawk. Amaherawhchu, lungngaite thlamuantu Pathian chuan Tita lo kal lehnain min thlamuan a, a lo kalna ringawt pawh ni lovin, nangmahni laka thlamuanna a dawn avang pawhin min thlamuan che u a ni; lungngai rawh , leh ka tana thahnemngaihna te chuan min hrilh vek a, min ti hlim lehzual a ni. 2 Korinth 7:5-7-ah kan hmu

(7) . Lungngai la, lungngai la, Pathian duh danin sim rawh

avang Pathian duh dan anga lungngaihna , chu chuan inchhir lohna a siam a, chhandamna kawngah a hruai a; I hmu em, Pathian duhzawng anga i lungngaih hian taimakna te, mahni inngaihsakna te, mahni inhuatna te, hlauhna te, duhthusam te, thahnemngaihna te, leh hremna (or lehlin: mahni inpumkhatna) te i hring ang. Chûng zawng zawngah chuan in thianghlim tih in inhriattîr ṭhîn.
2 Korinth 7:10-11-ah hian kan hmu a

lungngaihna awmzia chu:

1 Nimahsela khawvel lungngaihna te, lungngaihna te, tap te, thinlung kehchhia te hian mi an that thin. .

(Entirnan, ui leh ui ngainatute, mi thenkhat chuan ui emaw ui emaw an hloh hnuah an "lungngai" a, thenkhat phei chuan "vawk" thih vangin an lungngai a, an tap bawk a, khawvel hi natna emaw, lungngaihna leh lungngaihna chi hrang hrang in vangin nasa takin a tap thin khawvel.Hetiang "lungngaihna", tap, lungngaihna leh beiseina hloh hian Isua Krista chu chhandamtu a nih an rin loh avangin mi a that mek a ni.

2 Pathian duhzâwnga lungngai, sim leh lungngaite chu an eng a thawl e

Entirnan, Thuthlung Hlui hunlai khan Abrahama khan Sari thihna chu a sûn a, Davida chu Pathian hmaah a sualte a sim a, Nehemia chu a ṭhu a, Jerusalem kulh an tihchhiat lai khan a tap a, chhiahkhawntu chuan simna dilna a tawngtai a, Petera chuan Lalpa chu vawi thum a phatsan a tin, nasa takin a tap a, Krista pawh kan sualte avângin Pa ngaihdamna dîlin ring taka ṭawngṭai leh au chhuakin, zirtîrte chuan kraws-a Isua thihna chu an sûn a , Korinth kohhran chuan Paula tihduhdahna te, khawvela Kristiante taksa tawrhna te, Van Pa hnena tawngtai leh lungngaihna te, tap te, lungngaihna te, Kristiante’n an chhungte, thian te, classmate te, leh an chhehvela thawhpui, etc. nghaktute pawhin Isua chu thihna ata a tho leh a, chatuan nunna a nei tih an rin loh avangin an lungngai ang a, an lungngai bawk ang. Heng mite hian Pathian leh Isua Krista an ring vek! An "lungngaihna" chu malsawmna a ni. Chuvangin Lal Isuan heti hian a sawi: “Lungngaite chu an eng a thawl e →→ Pathian duhzawng anga lungngai te, sim te, lungngaia tap te chu an eng a thawl e;

zawt: " " lungngai rawh " " Mite hian eng thlamuanna nge an hmuh?
Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) . Thihna hlauhna avanga a dam chhung zawng sal tang chhiahhlawh chu chhuah zalen a ni

Naupangte hian tisa leh thisen an insem avângin, Amah ngei pawhin tisa leh thisen a nei ta a, chu chu thihna hmanga thihna thiltihtheihna neitu, chu chu Diabola a tihboral theih nân leh, an dam chhûng zawnga sal tangte chu a chhuah zalen theih nân a ni thih hlauhna hmanga (sual) tih. Hebrai 2:14-15 ah hian kan hmu

(2) . Krista chuan min chhandam a ni

Mihring Fapa chu bo zawngin chhandam turin a lo kal a. Luka Bung 19 Châng 10 en rawh

(3) . Sual leh thihna dan ata chhanchhuahna

Krista Isuaa nunna Thlarau dan chuan sual leh thihna dan ata min chhuah zalen ta si a. Rom 8:2

(4) . Isua ring la, chhandam la, chatuan nunna nei rawh

Chatuan nunna in nei tih in hriat theih nan Pathian Fapa hming ringtute hnenah heng thu hi ka ziak a ni.

( Chatuan nunna i neih hunah chauh thlamuanna i nei thei ang Chatuan nunna thlamuanna i neih loh chuan khawiah nge i hmuh theih ang? I sawi dik em? )-Johana 1 Bung 5 Châng 13 en rawh

Hla: Krista nen khenbehin ka awm a

Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: Chu chu Pathian fate zawng zawngin kum sangkhat hnuah hrethiam rawh se (Diabola hnehna hnuhnung ber chu an vawrh lut ta a ni Mei leh brimstone luipui chhunglam) . Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

---Kum sangkhat hnuah---

(1) Kum sangkhat hnuah Setana chu chhuah zalen a ni

zawt: Setana hi khawiah nge chhuah a nih?
chhanna: Jail, jail emaw, khur thum emaw atanga chhuah.

zawt: Engvangin nge tihchhuah?
Chhanna: Pathian mi thlante chunga Pathian dikna, hmangaihna, dawhtheihna, khawngaihna, thiltihtheihna leh tlanna lantir rawh →Israel chhungkua zawng zawng chhandam an ni ang . Amen
Thuhmahruai (Rom 11:26) .

Kum sâng tâwpah chuan Setana chu a tân in ata chhuah a ni ang Reference (Thupuan 20:7)

Tin, vân ata vântirhkoh lo chhuk ka hmu a, a kutah chuan khuarkhurum chahbi leh kaidil lian tak a keng a. Sakeibaknei, hmân lai Rul, Diabola leh Setana tia koh bawk chu a man a, kum sângkhat chhûng a phuar a, khuarkhurum chu a khar a, Hnamte a bum tawh loh nân chhinchhiahnain a khâr ta a ni . Kum sangkhat a ral hunah chuan hun eng emaw chen chu chhuah a ngai a ni . Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 20:1-3) .

(2) Khawvel hmun hrang hrang atanga hnam zawng zawng indo tura inkhawm turin bum turin lo chhuak rawh

(Setana) chu lei kil li, Goga leh Magog-a awm hnamte bum turin a lo chhuak a, . Indo turin inkhawm rawh se . An zat hi tuifinriat hnim ang maia tam an ni. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 20:8) .

(3) Mi thianghlimte riahhmun leh khawpui duhawm tak chu hual vel rawh

An lo chho a, leilung zawng zawng an luah khat a, mi thianghlimte riahhmun leh khawpui duhawm tak chu an hual ta a. Van atangin mei a lo chhuk a, a kang ral ta a ni . Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 20:9) .

(4)Setana hnehna hnuhnung ber

zawt: Diabola Setana hnehna hnuhnung ber chu khawiah nge a awm?

chhanna: Diabola chu mei leh meikhu dilah an paih lut ta a

chu chuan a ti buai hle Diabola chu mei leh meikhu dilah an paih lut ta a , sakawlh leh zâwlnei der awmna hmun. Chatuan kumkhuain a chhûn zanin hrehawm an tuar ang. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 20:10) .

articles.title: Kum sangkhat tih a ni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen

Thupuan bung 20 châng 4-na Bible hi hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Tin, lalṭhutthlengte leh a chunga mi ṭhute ka hmu a, rorel theihna thuneihna pêk a ni. Tin, Isua chungchâng thu hriattîrna leh Pathian thu avânga lu tansak tawhte leh sakawlh emaw, a lem emaw chibai bûk lo emaw, an hmaiah emaw, an kutah emaw a chhinchhiahna nei lote thlarau thawhlehna ka hmu a ., Krista nen kum sangkhat chhung lal rawh.

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Kum sangkhat" tih a ni. Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak【 biakin 】Hnathawktute tir chhuak rawh: an kuta thutak thu ziak leh an sawi hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna, ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: Kum sangkhat chhunga a vawi khatna atana tho leh mi thianghlimte hi Pathian fa zawng zawngin hrethiam rawh se! Malsawmna dawngin, tihthianghlimin, kum sangkhat chhung Krista nen an lal ang. Amen !

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

1. Kum sâng hmaa thawhlehna

Thupuan [Bung 20:4] Tin, lalṭhutthlengte leh a chunga mi ṭhute ka hmu a, rorel theihna thuneihna pek a ni. Tin, Isua chungchâng an hriattîrna leh Pathian thu avânga lu tansak tawhte leh, sakawlh emaw, a lem emaw chibai bûk lo, an hmaiah emaw, an kutah emaw a chhinchhiahna la nei lote nunna ka hmu a; Thawhleh an ni vek a, kum sangkhat chhung chu Krista nen an lal dun a ni .

zawt: Kum sâng hmaa tute nge kaihthawh?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Isua thu hriatpuitu leh Pathian thu avanga lu tansakte thlarau

zawt: Pathian thila lu tansakte thlarau chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pathian thu avang leh Isua Krista Chanchin Tha an hriatpuina avanga thah an nihte thlarau an ni.
→→( duh ) Seal pangana ka han hawn chuan maicham hnuaiah chuan Pathian thu leh hriattirna avanga thah tawhte thlarau ka hmu a... Chutah chuan puan var an pe vek a...! Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 6:9) .

(2) Sakawlh emaw, a lem emaw a biak ngai lo

zawt: Sakawlh leh sakawlh lem chibai buk ngai lo mite kha?
chhanna: Biak ngai lo ". rul "Hmanlai rul, sakeibaknei sen lian tak tak, ramhuai, Setana. Sakawlh leh sakawlh lem - pathian dik lo, Guanyin, Buddha, khawvela pasaltha, mi ropui leh milem biak loh chuan leia thil awm zawng zawng, tuifinriata, leh." vanah sava awmte, etc.

(3) Hmaiah emaw, kutah emaw chhinchhiahna hmu tawh thlarau an awm lo.

zawt: Hrehawm tuar lo". chumi "Eng mark nge?"
chhanna: An hmaiah emaw, an kutah emaw sakawlh chhinchhiahna an dawng lo .
Tin, mi zawng zawng, a lian emaw, te emaw, hausa emaw, rethei emaw, zalen emaw, sal emaw, an kut dinglamah emaw, an hmaiah emaw chhinchhiahna an dawng vek bawk. ...Hetah hian finna a awm: Tupawh hrethiam chuan sakawlh zat chu chhut rawh se, chu chu mihring zat a ni a, a zat chu zaruk leh sawmruk leh paruk a ni. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 13:16,18) .

【Thil chhinchhiah:】 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua thu hriatpuitu leh Pathian Thu avanga lu tansakte thlarau; 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Sakawlh emaw, a lem emaw an be lo; 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A hmaiah emaw, a kutah emaw sakawlh chhinchhiahna dawngtu thlarau an awm lo, . Thawhleh an ni vek tawh! Amen
→→ Ropuina, lawmman leh thawhlehna tha zawk dawng rawh! →→Ni e 100 a ni vawi tam tak, a awm 60 a ni vawi tam tak, a awm 30 a ni Hun kal tawh! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Tin, a ṭhen chu lei ṭhaah an tla a, a rah a rah a, a ṭhen chu a let za, a ṭhen sawmruk, a ṭhen chu a let sawmthum. Ngaithla tur beng nei chuan ngaithla se! " "
→→ Unau tam tak chuan he kawng dik tak hi an hmu a, Ngawi rengin nghak, Ngawi rengin ngaithla, Ngawi rengin ring, awi rengin ram thu chu vawng reng rawh ! I ngaithla loh chuan hlohna i tuar ang . Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 13:8-9) .

(4)An tho leh vek

zawt: Thawhleh tawhte chu tute nge ni?
chhanna:

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua thu hriatpuitu leh Pathian Thu avanga lu tansakte thlarau , . (Tirhkoh sawmhnih leh Kristian mi thianghlim, Isua zuitu leh hun kal tawha chanchin tha hriatpuitu te ang kha)

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a sakawlh emaw, a lem emaw chibai bûk lo, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Ni lo, a hmaiah emaw, a kutah emaw sakawlh chhinchhiahna dawngtu an awm lo. .

Thawhleh an ni vek tawh! Amen.

(5)Hei hi thawhlehna hmasa ber a ni

(6)Mithi dang zawng zawng chu an la tho leh lo

zawt: Mitthi dang la kaihthawh lohte chu tute nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak
" " mitthi dang zawng zawng chu "Ka la tho leh lo" tih awmzia chu:
1 “Rul”, Sakeibaknei, Diabola leh Setana chibai buktute ;
2 Sakawlh leh a lem chibai buktute ;
3 Sakawlh chhinchhiahna hmu tawhte chu an hmaiah leh an kutah te .

(7) Thawhlehna hmasa bera tel a, kum sangkhat chhung Krista nena roreltute chu an eng a thawl e

zawt: Thawhlehna hmasa bera tel → Eng malsawmna nge awm?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Thawhlehna hmasa bera telte chu in eng a thawl a, in thianghlim e!
2 Thihna pahnihna chuan an chungah thuneihna a nei lo.
3 Rorelna pek an ni.
4 Pathian leh Krista puithiam an ni ang a, Krista rualin kum sângkhat an lal ang. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 20:6) .

2. Kum sangkhat chhung Krista nen lal rawh

(1) Kum sangkhat chhung Krista nen rorel rawh

zawt: Krista nena rorel tura thawhlehna hmasa berah (eng chen nge) i tel ve?
Chhanna: Pathian leh Krista puithiam an ni ang a, Krista nen kum sangkhat an lal ang! Amen.

(2)Pathian leh Krista puithiam nih

zawt: Pathian leh Krista puithiamte hian tu chungah nge ro an rel?
chhanna: Kum sangkhat chhunga Israel thlah 144,000 te chu enkawl rawh .

zawt: Nunna 144,000 (kum sangkhat chhungin) atang hian thlah engzat nge awm?
chhanna: An zat chu tuifinriat hnim ang maiin an tam a, leilung zawng zawng an luah khat ta a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah : An thlahte hi nausen ni rei lote chhunga thi tur nen an piang lo va, nunnain khat lo tar pawh an awm lo → Genesis-a "Adama leh Evi" fapa Setha leh Enosa, Kenan, Methusela, Lameka, leh Noh Dam rei zawng chu a inang vek. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Leilung hi rah chhuah leh pung zelin an luah khat ta a ni. Entirnan, Jakoba chhungkua chu Aigupta ramah an lo kal a, an vaiin mi 70 an ni (Genesis 46:27 en la, Aigupta rama "Gosen Ram"-ah kum 430 chhung fa tam tak an nei a, chutah chuan Israel fate chu Aigupta ram atangin a hruai chhuak a kum 20 an tlin hnua indo thei mi 600,000 chauh an ni a, sangthum za nga sawmnga, hmeichhia lo kir leh an ni , tar leh kum sawmhnih hnuai lam an tam lehzual a; An zat chu tuifinriat hnim ang maiin an tam a, leilung zawng zawng a luah khat vek a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Reference (Thupuan 20:8-9) leh Isaia 65:17-25.

(3)Kum sang tak hnuah

zawt: Thawhlehna hmasa berah khan!
Kum sangkhat chhung chu Krista nen an lal dun a ni!
Kum sangkhat hnuah engtin nge ni ang?
Lal an la ni reng em?
chhanna: Krista nen an lal ang, .
Chatuan kumkhuain! Amen.
Khawpuiah chuan Pathian leh Beram No lalthutphah a awm tawh lo vang a, a chhiahhlawhte chuan A rawng an bawl ang a, A hmel an hmu ang. An hmaiah a hming a inziak ang. Zan a awm tawh lo vang, khawnvar emaw, ni eng emaw an mamawh tawh lo vang, Lalpa Pathianin êng a pe dawn si a. Kumkhuain an lal ang . Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 22:3-5) .

3. Setana chu kum sangkhat chhung chu khuaah a tang a

zawt: Setana hi khawi atanga lo chhuak nge?
chhanna: van atanga vantirhkoh tla .

Vanah inlârna dang a lo lang leh a: Sakawlh sen lian tak, lu pasarih leh ki sawm nei, a lu sarihah lallukhum pasarih a awm. A hmui chuan van lama arsi hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu a hruai a, leiah a paih thla ta a ni. ...Reference (Thupuan 12:3-4) .

zawt: A tlûk hnuah vântirhkoh hming chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: " " rul "Hmanlai rûl, dragon sen lian tak kha Diabola an ti bawk a, Setana an ti bawk."

zawt: Setana hi kum engzat nge Abyss-a tantir a nih?
chhanna: kum sangkhat a ni .

Tin, vân ata vântirhkoh lo chhuk ka hmu a, a kutah chuan khuarkhurum chahbi leh kaidil lian tak a keng a. Sakawlh, chu hmân lai rul, Diabola an tih bawk, Setana tia koh bawk chu a man ta a ni. Kum sangkhat chhung khin la, a hnuai lam nei lo khur chhungah paih la, a hnuai lam nei lo khur chu khar la, seal rawh , hnamte a bum tawh loh nân. Kum sangkhat a ral hunah chuan hun eng emaw chen chu chhuah a ngai a ni. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 20:1-3) .

(Hriat tur: Tunlai kohhrana thumal lar tak takte chu →premillennial, amillennial, leh postmillennial tih te hi a ni. Heng zawng zawng hi thurin dik lo zawng zawng a nih avangin Bible-ah i kir leh a ngai a, thutak i zawm a ngai a, Pathian thu i ngaithla tur a ni!)

articles.title: Mi 144,000 chuan hla thar an sa
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen

Thupuan bung 14 châng 1-na Bible hi hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Tin, ka han en a, Beram No chu Zion tlângah a ding a, a hnênah mi sîngkhat leh sângli leh pali, an hmaiah a hming leh a Pa hming ziak a awm tih ka hmu a .

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Mi sangkhat leh sawmli leh paliin hla thar an sa". Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak【 biakin 】Hnathawktute tir chhuak rawh: an kuta thutak thu ziak leh an sawi hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna, ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: Pathian fate zawng zawngin hrethiam rawh se -- . Israel thlan thlante leh Jentail-te---Kohhran chuan vâna nula thianghlim 144,000, Beram No Lal Isua Krista zui tûra inlârte chu a inpumkhattîr a ni! Amen

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

- .

♥ tih a ni Mi 144,000 velin hla thar an sa a ♥ tih a ni

Thupuan [Bung 14:1] Tin, ka han en a, Beram No Zion tlânga ding chu ka hmu a, a hnênah mi sîngkhat leh sawmli leh pali, an hmaiah a hming leh a Pa hming ziak a ni .

pakhat, ♡ Zion tlangah ♡

zawt: Zion Tlng chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Zion Tlâng → Lal Ropui khawpui a ni!
Lal khawpui Zion tlang chu hmar lamah a ding sangin a mawi a, leilung zawng zawng lawmna a ni. Thuhmahruai (Sam 48:2) .

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Zion tlang → hi Pathian nung khawpui a ni!
( 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Zion Tlâng → chu vân Jerusalem a ni!
Nimahsela Pathian nung khawpui Zion tlâng chu i lo thleng ta a; van lam jerusalem . Vantirhkoh sang sawm chuang an awm a, fapa upa berte inkhawmpui tlangpui a awm a, an hming chu vanah a awm a, mi zawng zawng roreltu Pathian a awm a, mi fel famkimte thlarau pawh a awm bawk a, reference (Hebrai 12:22- 23) .

( Thil chhinchhiah: "leiah" tih a ni. Zion tlangah ” tih hian tûn laia Jerusalem, Israel rama Temple Tlâng sawina a ni. chumi Vanram a ni "". Zion tlangah "Ying'er." vanram tan ♡Zion tlang♡ Pathian nung khawpui, Lal ropui khawpui leh thlarau lam ram a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? ) .

2. Mi 144,000 seal an ni a, mi 144,000 velin Beram No an zui

Zawhna: Heng mi 144,000 te hi tute nge ni?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

【Thuthlung Hlui】--"Shadow" a ni.

Jakoba fapa 12 leh Israel hnam 12-te chu chhinchhiahna an vuah a, an zat chu 144,000 - Israel la awmte aiawh a ni.
(1) Thuthlung Hlui hi "thlang" a ni---Thuthlung Thar hi a lan chhuahna dik tak a ni!

(2) Thuthlung Hluia Adama chu "thlahrung" a ni---Thuthlung Thara Adama hnuhnung ber Isua hi mi tak tak a ni!

(3) Leia Israel rama mi 144,000 chhinchhiahna awmte hi "thlahrung" an ni --- vanah Beram No zuitu mi 144,000 te hi mi tak tak puan chhuah an ni.

Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

【Thuthlung Thar】Taksa dik tak chu a lo lang ta!

(1) Isua tirhkoh 12-Upa 12.

(2) Israel hnam 12--Upa 12.

(3)12+12=Upa 24 (Kohhran inpumkhatna) .

Chu chu Pathian mi thlante leh Jentail-te’n rochan chu an chang dun dawn tihna a ni!

Tin, van atangin thawm ka hria a, tui tam tak thawm leh ri nasa tak ri ang mai a ni a, ka hriat chu lyre tumtu ri ang mai a ni. Lalthutphah hmaah leh thil nung pali leh upate hmaah hla thar ang maiin an sa a, lei aanga lei mi sangkhat leh sawmli leh pali chauh lo chu tumahin an zir thei lo. Thupuan 14:2-3

Chuvangin, a bulah hian Beram No zuitu mi 144,000 vel an awm a, Lal Isuan mihring zinga a thisen ngeia a lei - rinna avanga thiamchantir tawh Jentailte, mi thianghlimte leh Pathian mi thlan Israelte aiawhtu an ni! Amen!

3. Mi 144,000 velin Isua an zui a

Q: Mi 144,000 - khawi atanga lo kal nge an nih?
Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Isua thisen ngeia a lei chu

(3) Kan taksa hi a danglam a ngai a

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【Seal hmasa ber】

Thupuan [Bung 6:1] Beram Noin chhinchhiahna pasarih zinga pakhatna a hawn ka hmuh chuan, thil nung pali zinga pakhatin rial ang maiin, “Lo kal rawh,” a tih ka hre ta a.

zawt: Beram Noin chhinchhiahna a hawn hmasak ber chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Beram No chhinchhiahna chu a lo lang ta a ni:

1. Inlarna leh hrilhlawkna seal turin ni 2300 chhung

Ni 2,300 chhunga vision hi a dik a, mahse he vision hi i seal tur a ni a, a chhan chu ni tam tak lo awm tur a ngaihtuah vang a ni. "Reference (Daniela 8:26) ."

zawt: Ni 2300 chhunga vision hian eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Hrehawmna Ropui →Tihchhiatna tenawm.

zawt: Tunge tihchhiatna tenawm chu?
chhanna: Hmanlai "rul", dragon, Diabola, Setana, Krista dodaltu, sual mi, sakawlh leh a lem, Krista der, zawlnei der.

(1) Tihchhiatna tenawm

Lal Isuan: "Zâwlnei Daniela'n hmun thianghlima dingin a sawi 'tihchhiatna tenawm' hi in hmu a (he lehkhabu chhiartute hian an hriatthiam a ngai). Reference (Matthaia 24:15)

(2) Misual ropui chu a inpuang

Tuman a tih dan chu eng ang pawhin thlem suh ang che u; Thuhmahruai (2 Thessalonika 2:3) .

(3) Ni sanghnih leh zathum inlarna

Mi Thianghlim zinga pakhat thusawi ka hria a, Mi Thianghlim dang pakhat chuan, "Tunge halral thilhlan reng reng leh boralna sual, hmun thianghlim leh Israel sipaite raptu, eng chen nge la bo ang?" inlarna a thlen famkim theih nan a ngai?"

(4)Ni a tawi ang

zawt: Eng ni nge tihhniam?
chhanna: 2300 Hrehawm nasa tak inlarna ni chu a tawi ta.

Chutih hunah chuan khawvêl siam tirh ata tûn thlenga la awm ngai loh hrehawmna nasa tak a awm dâwn a, a awm leh tawh ngai lo vang. Chûng nite chu tihtawi a nih loh chuan tisa tumah chhandam an ni lo vang; Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 24:21-22) .

(5) Kum khat, kum hnih, kum chanve

zawt: “Hrehawmna Ropui” lai khan ni engzat nge tihhniam?
chhanna: Kum khat, kum hnih, kum chanve.

Chungnungbera hnenah chhuanawm thu a sawi ang a, Chungnungbera mi thianghlimte a tihrehawm ang a, hun leh dante thlak danglam a tum ang. Mi thianghlimte chu hun engemaw chen, hun khat leh hun chanve chhung atan a kutah hlan an ni ang. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 7:25) .

(6) Ni Singkhat leh Ni Sawmhnih

Halral thilhlan reng reng lak bo a nih a, tihchhiatna tenawm tak din a nih aangin ni sangkhat leh zahnih leh sawmkua a awm ang. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 12:11) .

(7)Thla sawmli leh pahnih

Nimahsela, Biak In pâwn tual chu Jentail-te hnêna pêk a nih avângin, Thla sawmli leh pahnih chhûng chu Khua Thianghlim chu kein an rap dâwn a ni. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 11:2) .

2. Sakawr var chunga chuang, thal vulhtu chuan hnehna a chang

Thupuan [Bung 6:2] Chutichuan, ngai teh, sakawr var pakhat ka hmu a, sakawr chunga chuang chuan thal a keng a, lallukhum an pe a. Tichuan, hnehna changin hnehna changin a rawn chhuak ta a.

zawt: Sakawr var hian eng nge a entîr?
chhanna: Sakawr var hian thianghlimna leh thianghlimna a entir a ni.

zawt: "Sakawr var" chungah hian tu nge a chuang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Seal hmasa ber Mizia Hrilhfiahna:

1 Sakawr var ka hmu → (Tu ang nge a nih?)
2 Sakawr chunga chuang → (Tunge sakawr var khalh?)
3 Bow vawn → (Bow nen eng nge i tih?) .
4 Tin, lallukhum an pe → (Tunge lallukhum pe?)
5 A lo chhuak → (Eng atan nge a chhuah?)
6 Hnehna leh hnehna → (Tunge hnehna chang leh hnehna chang leh?)

3. Krista dik/dik lo thliar hran

(1)Thil dik leh dik lo thliar hran dan

"Sakawr chunga chuang chuan thal a keng" → hian indona emaw indona emaw a entir a ni

kohhran tam tak a ni "Sakawr var chunga chuang" tih hian "Krista" a entir niin an ring vek a ni.
Kohhran hmasa tirhkohte chanchin ha hril leh hnehna chang nawn leh hinte entîrna a ni.

(2) Lalte Lal Krista mizia:

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Vanram inhawng chu ka en reng a
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Sakawr var a awm a
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Sakawr chunga chuang chu mi rinawm leh thutak sawi a ni
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Rorel a, felna nen a indo thin
5. A rilru a hah lutuk a mitte chu mei ang a ni
6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A lu chungah chuan lallukhum tam tak a awm a
7. A rilru a hah lutuk A chungah hian amah chauh lo chuan tumahin an hriat loh hming ziak a awm bawk.
8. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mihring thisen chhuak thawmhnaw a ha a
9. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A hming chu Pathian Thu a ni.
10. A rilru a hah lutuk Vana sipaite chuan amah chu an zui a, sakawr var chungah chuangin puan zai mawi tak, var leh thianghlim inthuam an ni.
11. A rilru a hah lutuk A kâ aang hian hnamte tihlum tûrin khandaih hriam tak a lo chhuak a
12. A rilru a hah lutuk A kawrfual leh a kawrfual chungah chuan hming a inziak a: "Lalte Lal, Lalte Lalpa," tih hi.

Thil chhinchhiah: krista dik tak →Van atangin sakawr var leh chhum chungah a lo chhuk a, Rinawm leh Dik tia koh a ni a, felnain ro a rel a, indona a siam thin. "Bow lak a ngai lo" →A kâ atang chuan khandaih hriam tak a rawn chhuak ( Thlarau Thianghlim chu khandaih a ni ), able to smite the nations..
