articles.title: Seal pasarih tih a ni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen

Thupuan 5:5-ah hian Bible hi hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Upa pakhat chuan, “Ngai teh, Juda hnam Sakeibaknei, Davida zung chu, tap suh! (Beramno) A hneh ta , . Scroll hawng thei leh seal pasarih hawn thei .

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Seal pasarih" tih a ni. Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak【 biakin 】Hnathawktute tir chhuak rawh: an kuta thutak thu ziak leh an sawi hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna, ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: Thupuan Bu-a Lal Isuan lehkhabu chhinchhiahna pasarih a hawnna hmuna inlarna leh hrilhlawknate chu hrethiam rawh. Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

"Seal pasarih" tih a ni.

Beram No chu chhinchhiahna pasarih hawn tlak a ni

1. [Seal] tih a ni.

zawt: Seal chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: " " print rawh " tih hian hmân lai official-te, lalte, leh lalte’n rangkachak leh jade seal hmanga an siam ṭhin seal, seal, brand, leh imprint-te a kâwk a ni.

Hla Hla [8:6] Khawngaihin i thinlungah min vawng reng ang as imprint a ni , stamp ang maiin i kut ah bun rawh...!

2. [Seal] tih a ni.

zawt: Seal chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: " " char "Bible hrilhfiahna hian Pathian ( print rawh ) seal, seal, seal, thup leh seal.

(1) Inlarna leh hrilhlawkna sawmsarih pasarih chhinchhiahna

"I mite leh in khawpui thianghlim tan kar sawmsarih hun ruat a ni a, sual titawp turin, sual titawp turin, khawlohna inremna siam nan leh chatuan felna luhtir (a nih loh leh lehlin: puan chhuahna) Inlarna leh hrilhlawknate chu seal rawh , Mi Thianghlim chu hriak thih rawh. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 9:24) .

(2) Ni 2300 chhunga inlarna chu seal a ni

Ni 2,300 chhunga vision hi a dik a, mahse He vision hi i seal a ngai a ni , ni tam tak a ngaihtuah avangin. "Reference (Daniela 8:26) ."

(3) Vawi khat, vawi hnih, hun chanve chu a tawp thlengin thup leh seal a ni tawh

Tui chunga ding, puan zai mawi tak inthuam chuan a kut vei leh dinglam chu van lam hawiin a han phar a, chatuana nung Lalpa hmingin chhia a chham a, " Kum khat, kum hnih, kum chanve , mi thianghlimte thiltihtheihna a chhiat hunah chuan heng zawng zawng hi a thleng famkim vek ang. Chu thu ka hriat chuan ka hrethiam lo va, "Ka pu, heng thil tawpna hi eng nge ni?" Ani chuan, "Daniela, kal rawh; for." Heng thute hi thup leh seal-a dah a ni tawh , a tawp thlengin. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 12:7-9) .

(4)Ni sangkhat leh zahnih leh sawmkua a awm ang

Halral thilhlan reng reng lak bo a nih a, tihchhiatna tenawm tak din a nih aangin ni sangkhat leh zahnih leh sawmkua a awm ang. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 12:11) .

(5) Lal Mikaela a ding ang

“Tichuan Mikaela, i mite humhimtu chu a ding chhuak ang a, chu chu hnam din tirh ata tun thlenga la awm ngai loh buaina nasa tak a awm ang lehkhabu chu chhandam a ni ang.Reference (Daniela 12:1).

(6)Ni sangkhat leh zathum leh sawmthum leh panga

Ni sangkhat leh za thum leh sawmthum leh panga thleng nghaktu chu a eng a thawl e. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 12:12) .

(7)Heng thute hi thup la, he lehkhabu hi seal rawh

Lei vaivuta muhil tam tak chu an harh ang. Chung zingah chuan chatuan nunna nei henkhat an awm a, chatuana mualpho leh huat tawh henkhat an awm bawk... Daniela, i tih ngei ngei tur a ni Heng thute hi thup la, he lehkhabu hi seal rawh , a tawp thlengin. Mi tam tak chu an tlan kual ang (a nih loh leh lehlin: taima taka zir) an ni ang a, hriatna pawh a pung ang. "Reference (Daniela 12:2-4) ."

3. Scroll chu [seal pasarih] hmanga seal a ni.

(1) Lehkhazial hawn a, a chhinchhiahna pasarih phelh tlâk chu tu nge ni?

Tin, lalṭhutthlenga ṭhu kut ding lamah chuan lehkhabu zial, a chhung leh a pawna ziak, chhinchhiahna pasarih ziak ka hmu a. Tichuan, vântirhkoh thiltithei tak pakhatin aw ring takin, "Tunge lehkhabu hawn a, a chhinchhiahnate phelh tlâk?"

(2) Johana chuan lehkhabu hawn tlak tumah an awm lo tih a hmuh chuan a tap ta ringawt mai a

Lehkhabu hawng thei emaw, en thei emaw, vanah emaw, leiah emaw, lei hnuaiah emaw tumah an awm lo. Scroll hawn tlak emaw, en tlak emaw an awm loh avangin ka tap ta hlawm a. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 5:3-4) .

(3) Upate chuan Johana hnenah chhinchhiahna pasarih hawng thei tur chu an hrilh a

Upa pakhat chuan ka hnenah, "Tap suh! Ngai teh, Juda hnama Sakeibaknei, Davida zung chu. (Beramno) A hneh ta , . Scroll hawng thei leh seal pasarih hawn thei . "Reference (Thupuan 5:5) ."

(4)Thil nung pali

Lalṭhutphah hmaah chuan glass tuifinriat ang mai, crystal ang mai a awm a. Lalṭhutthlengah leh lalṭhutthleng velah chuan thil nung pali, hma leh hnung lama mit khata khat an awm a. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 4:6) .

zawt: Thil nung palite chu engte nge ni?
chhanna: Vantirhkoh- Cherub-hote .

Cherub-te hian hmai pali an nei theuh a, pakhatna chu cherub hmel a ni a, a pahnihna chu mihring hmel a ni a, a pathumna chu sakeibaknei hmel a ni a, palina chu mupui hmel a ni. . Thuhmahruai (Ezekiela 10:14) .

(5) Thil nung palite hian chanchin ha bu palite chu an entîr a ni

zawt: Thil nung palite hian eng nge an entîr?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Thil nung hmasa ber chu sakeibaknei ang a ni
Matthaia Chanchin |ha entîrna →→ Isua chu lal a ni
Thil nung pahnihna chu bawng no ang a ni
Marka Chanchin Tha entîrna →→ Isua chu chhiahhlawh a ni
Thil nung pathumna chuan mihring ang hmel a nei a
Chanchin |ha Luka entîrna →→ Isua chu mihring fapa a ni
Thil nung palina chu mupui thlawk ang mai a ni
Johana Chanchin |ha entîrna →→ Isua chu pathian a ni

(6)Angle pasarih leh mit pasarih

zawt: A kil sarih leh mit sarih tih hian eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: " " Angle pasarih leh mit pasarih "chu chu pathian thlarau pasarih .

Thil chhinchhiah: " " thlarau pasarih a ni ” Nimahsela, LALPA mit chu leilung zawng zawngah a tlan kual vel a.
Thuhmahruai (Zakaria 4:10) .

zawt: Khawnvar dahna pasarih chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: " " Lampstand pasarih a awm "Chu chu kohhran pasarih a ni."

zawt: Eng pasarih hian eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: " " light pasarih a ni " " pawh pathian thlarau pasarih

zawt: Seven Stars tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: " " arsi pasarih a ni "Kohhran pasarihte chu." tirhkoh a ni .

Tin, lalṭhutphah leh thil nung palite leh Beram No pakhat, upate zînga ding, thah ang maiin ka hmu a; Angle pasarih leh mit pasarih ,chu chu pathian thlarau pasarih , . Khawvel zawng zawngah tirh a ni . Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 5:6 leh 1:20) .

Thupuan [5:7-8] Hei hi beramno A lo kal a, lalṭhutthlenga ṭhu dinglamah lehkhabu zial chu a la a. Scroll chu a la ta a .

zawt: "Qin" tih hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Lyre ri hmangin Pathian an fak a.

zawt: "Ram rimtui" tih hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: hei rimtui tak Mi thianghlim zawng zawng tawngtaina a ni! Pathian pawm tlak thlarau inhlan.
Mi thianghlim zawng zawng tan thlarau lam hlate fakna hla sa, in Thlarau Thianghlimin tawngtai rawh .tawngtai!
Nangni (anni) Lalpa hnena in lo kal hian lung nung ang mai in ni a, puithiam thianghlim hna thawk turin thlarau inah in sak in ni. Isua Krista zâra Pathian pawm tlâk thlarau lam inthawina hlan rawh . Thuhmahruai Petera (1 Lehkhabu 2:5) .

(7) Thil nung pali leh Upa sawmhnih leh pali ten hla thar an sa a

1 Thil nung palite hian hla thar an sa a

zawt: Thil nung palite hla thar sa hian eng nge a entîr?
chhanna: Thil nung palite hian: " Chanchin |ha Matthaia, Chanchin |ha Marka, Chanchin |ha Luka, Chanchin |ha Johana ”→Pathian Beram No chuan Chanchin |ha bu pali thutak hmangin zirtirte a tir chhuak thin a, Kristiante hi mi zawng zawng chhandamtu leh khawvel leh khawvel tawp thlenga darhtu chanchin ha thutak an ni.

[Thil nung palite chuan hla thar an sa a] chu chu Pathian entîrna a ni beramno nangmah ngeiin hmang rawh Thisen Hla thar, hnam tin, tawng tin, hnam tin leh hnam tin atanga lei thar sa rawh! → Chumi hnu chuan ka han en a, ngai teh, mipui tam tak, tumah chhiar theih loh, hnam tin, chi tin, chi tin, tawng tin aangin, lalthutphah hmaah leh Beram No hmaah, puan var ha chungin, an kutah thinghnah kengin an ding a , aw ring takin a au a, "Lalthutthlenga thutu kan Pathian leh Beram No tan chhandamna awm rawh se!" lalṭhutthleng hmaah, biak in bye Pathian, chuan: "Amen! Malsawmna te, ropuina te, finna te, lawmthu sawina te, chawimawina te, thiltihtheihna te, chakna te chu chatuan atan awm rawh se. Amen!"

2 Upa sawmhnih leh pali

zawt: Upa sawmhnih leh pali te hi tute nge ni?
chhanna: Israel ram a ni 12. A rilru a hah lutuk Hnam hrang hrang + beramno 12. A rilru a hah lutuk tirhkoh a ni

Thuthlung Hlui: Israel hnam sawm leh pahnih

Kulh sâng tak, kawngkhâr sâwm leh pahnih nei a awm a, kulh kawngkaahte chuan vântirhkoh sâwm leh pahnih an awm a, kulh kawngkaah chuan ziak a awm bawk Israel hnam sawm leh pahnih hming . Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 21:12) .

Thuthlung Thar: Tirhkoh Sawm leh Pahnih

Bang chuan lungphum sawm leh pahnih a nei a, a lungphum chungah chuan a awm bawk Beram no tirhkoh sawm leh pahnihte hming . Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 21:14) .

3 Hla thar an sa thin

Hla thar an sa a, “Lehkhabu chu la in, a chhinchhiahnate hawn tlak i ni a, i thah a, i thisenin hnam tin, tawng tin, hnam tin leh hnam tin atangin Pathian tan mi i lei a, hnam tinah i siam a ni leh puithiamte an ni Lei chunga rorêltu Pathian, lalṭhutthlêng vêla vântirhkoh tam tak, thil nung leh upate, an zînga sâng tam tak, aw ring takin, “Berâm No chu a phu a ni,” an tih chu ka hmu a, ka hre bawk tihhlum a ni , hausakna te, finna te, thiltihtheihna te, chawimawina te, ropuina te, fakna te.” Tin, vanah te, leiah te, lei hnuaiah te, tuifinriatah te, thilsiam zawng zawngah te, “Lalthutphah chunga ṭhu leh Beram No chatuan chatuanin, malsawmna, chawimawina, ropuina leh thiltihtheihna awm rawh se,” an tih ka hre bawk. Thil nung palite chuan, “Amen” an ti a. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 5:9-14) .

Daniela bung 8 châng 26-ah Bible hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Ni 2,300 chhunga vision hi a dik a ni , . Mahse he inlarna hi i seal a ngai a, a chhan chu ni tam tak a ngaihtuah a ni. .

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Isua lo kal lehna chhinchhiahna". Aih. 7. A rilru a hah lutuk I tawngtai ang u: Abba duh tak, Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak【 biakin 】Hnathawktute tir chhuak rawh: an kuta thutak thu ziak leh an sawi hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna, ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: Daniela-a ni 2300 inlarna hi hrethiam la, i fate zawng zawng hnenah puang chhuak rawh. Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Ni 2300-na Vision

Kum khat, kum hnih, kum chanve

1. Misual ropui chuan ram a hneh

(1) Midang inpeih loh laiin ram luah

zawt: Misual ropui chuan engtin nge ram a neih?
chhanna: Mite an inpeih loh laiin bumna hmangin lalram chu a la ta a ni
"Mi hmuhsit tak chu a aiah lal atan a lo ding ang a, chu chu tumahin ram chawimawina an pe lo va, an inpeih loh laia thu fakna hmanga lalram hnehtu a ni. Reference (Daniela 11:21)

(2) Ram dang nena ṭangrual ni rawh

Sipai chhiar sen loh chu tuilian ang an ni ang a, a hmaah chuan an boral lo vang; Chu lal fapa nêna inzawmna a siam hnu chuan bumnain hna a thawk ang a, sipai tlêm tê aangin chak tûrin a lo chhuak dâwn a ni. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 11:22-23) .

(3) Mite hnena ro hlu pek

Mite him leh inpeih loh lai hian ram zau ber thlengin a lo kal ang a, a pi leh pute tih ngai loh, an pi leh pute tih loh chu a ti ang a, mite zingah rallak leh rawk leh ro hlu a theh darh ang a, a ti ang devise designs.Attack security, mahse hei hi hun eng emaw chen atan a ni. ... Ram dang pathiante puihnaah a innghat ang a, invenna chak ber berte pawh a tichhia ang. Amah pawmtute hnenah chuan ropuina a pe ang a, mi tam tak chungah thuneihna a pe ang a, thamna atan ram a pe ang. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 11:24,39) .

(4) Halral thilhlan pangngai chu paih bo la, hmun thianghlim tibawlhhlawh la, chawimawi rawh

Sipaiho a din ang a, hmun thianghlim, kulhpui chu an tibawlhhlawh ang a, halral thilhlan reng reng chu an la bo ang a, tihchhiatna tenawm tak chu an din ang. ... “Lal chuan a duh duh a ti ang a, pathian zawng zawng chungah a chawimawi ang a, pathiante Pathian lakah thu mak tak tak a sawi ang a, Lalpa thinurna a famkim hma loh chuan a hlawhtling ang, a ruat chu a thleng dawn si a .

(5) Mi thianghlimte chu a khandaihah an tlu ang

Thil sual titu leh thuthlung bawhchhiate thlem nan thu fing tak tak a hmang ang a, Pathian hretute erawh chu an chak ang a, an ti ang. Mi fingte chuan mi tam tak an zirtir ang a, ni tam tak chu khandaihin an tlu ang a, meia hal an ni ang a, salah leh rawknaah hruaiin an awm ang. An tluk chuan tanpuina tlemte an dawng a, mahse mi tam tak chuan fakna thu hmangin an rawn pan a. Mi fing ṭhenkhat chu a tawp thlenga thianghlim leh var an nih theih nân, mi dangte tihthianghlim theih nân an tlu a; Thuhmahruai (Daniela 11:32-35) .

2. Chhiatna nasa tak a awm ngei ang

zawt: Eng chhiatna nge thleng?
chhanna: Khawvel pian tirh atanga tun thleng hian hetiang chhiatna hi a la awm lo va, chuta tang chuan chutiang chhiatna chu a awm tawh lo. .

“Zâwlnei Daniela’n, ‘ . tihchhiatna tenawm tak chu ’ tih a ni. lei thianghlimah ding rawh (He Pathian thu chhiartute hian an hriatthiam a ngai). Chumi hunah chuan Judai rama awmte chu tlâng lamah an tlanchhia ang a; Chung hun laia naupai leh nau hnute pe thinte chu an chung a pik e. I tlanbo hunah thlasik leh Chawlhni a awm loh nan tawngtai rawh. Chumi hunah chuan khawvêl siam tirh ata tûn thleng hian chutiang hrehawmna chu a la awm ngai lo va, a awm leh tawh ngai lo vang. . Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 24:15-2) .

3. Ni sanghnih za thum

zawt: Ni engzat nge ni sanghnih leh zathum?
chhanna: Kum 6 aia tam, kum 7 dawn lai .

Mi Thianghlim zinga pakhat thusawi ka hria a, Mi Thianghlim dang pakhat chuan, "Tunge halral thilhlan reng reng leh boralna sual, hmun thianghlim leh Israel sipaite raptu chu eng chen nge a laksak ang?" inlarna chu a thleng famkim theih nan la rawh?" Ka hnenah, "Ni sanghnih leh zathum hnuah hmun thianghlim chu tihthianghlim a ni ang... Ni 2,300 chhunga vision hi a dik a ni , mahse he inlârna hi ni tam tak a ngaihtuah avângin i seal tûr a ni. ” Reference (Daniela 8:13-14 leh 8:26) .

4. Chu ni chu tih tawi a ni ang

zawt: Eng ni nge tih tawi a nih ang?
chhanna: Hrehawm nasa tak ni 2300 chu tih tawi a ni ang .

Chutih hunah chuan khawvêl siam tirh ata tûn thlenga la awm ngai loh hrehawmna nasa tak a awm dâwn a, a awm leh tawh ngai lo vang. Chûng nite chu tih tawi a nih loh chuan tisa tumah chhandam an awm lo vang; Mahse thlante tan chuan chu ni chu tih tawi a ni ang . Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 24:21-22) .

Thil chhinchhiah: Lal Isua chuan: " " Chu ni chu tih tawi a ni ang "," chu ni chuan " " Eng ni nge a sawi?

→→ zâwlnei Daniela hmuh sawina a ni Chhiatna nasa tak a thleng hmathlir, Vantirhkoh Gabriela chuan a hrilhfiah a ni 2300 chhung a ni Inlarna chu a dik a, mahse he inlarna hi ni tam tak a ngaihtuah avangin i seal tur a ni.

( ni 2300 chhung a ni Chu thuruk chu mihring rilru, mihring hriatna, mihring philosophy hmanga hriatthiam theih a ni lo Miin a neih loh chuan Thlarau Thianghlim ), eng ang pawhin hriatna nei emaw, hriatna nei emaw pawh ni ila, van lam thil leh thlarau lam thilte chu i hrethiam thei ngai lovang)
I hmangaihna avangin Van Pa chungah lawmthu ka sawi a, i khawngaihna avangin Lal Isua Krista chungah lawmthu ka sawi a, Thlarau Thianghlim infuih tharna avangin lawmthu ka sawi bawk e.
Thutak zawng zawngah min hruai →→ ni 2300 chhung a ni Hrehawm nasa tak nite chu a tlem ta a ni , Pathian fate kan hnenah inpuang vek! Amen.

A chhan chu tun hmaa kohhran tam takin " sawifiahtu (expositor) a ni "Zavai Chiang takin a sawifiah lo Zawlnei Daniela sawi kha " "Ni sanghnih leh za thum" tih thuruk. A awmzia chu kohhran a ti buai em em a, thurin lamah pawh a dik lo hle a ni. " " tih ang hi a ni tur a ni lo. Ni sarih-na Adventist a ni " " Ellen White-i chuan a rawn ti a Nangmah ngeiin Neo-Confucianism hmangin BC 456 atanga BC 1844 thleng khan vanah chhui chianna leh rorelna chu a intan tih chhut la Hei hi chutiang zirtirna dik lo a ni.

Kum nga, kum khat, kum hnih, kum chanve

(1) Mi sual chuan mi thianghlimte thiltihtheihna a tichhia a

zawt: Sual mi chuan mi thianghlimte thiltihtheihna a tihchhiat theih nan eng chen nge a mamawh ang?
chhanna: Kum khat, kum hnih, kum chanve
Tui chunga ding, puan zai mawi tak inthuam chuan a kut vei leh dinglam chu van lam hawiin a han phar a, chatuana nung Lalpa hmingin chhia a chham a, " Kum khat, kum hnih, kum chanve , mi thianghlimte thiltihtheihna a chhiat hunah chuan heng zawng zawng hi a thleng famkim vek ang. "Reference (Daniela 12:7) ."

(2) Mi thianghlimte chu a kutah hlan an ni ang

Chungnungbera hnenah chhuanawm thu a sawi ang a, Chungnungbera mi thianghlimte a tihrehawm ang a, hun leh dante thlak danglam a tum ang. Mi thianghlimte chu hun engemaw chen, hun khat leh hun chanve chhung atan a kutah hlan an ni ang . Thuhmahruai (Daniela 7:25) .

(3) Hmeichhia tihduhdahna (kohhran) .

Sakeibaknei chuan leia paih a nih thu a hmuhin, nau mipa hrintu hmeichhia chu a tiduhdah ta a. Chutichuan, hmeichhia chu rulpui ata thlalera, a awmna hmuna a thlawh theihna turin, mupui lian tak thla pahnih pek a ni a; Kum khat, kum hnih leh a chanve . Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 12:13-14) .

(4)Ni sangkhat leh zahnih leh sawmkua

zawt: Kum khat, kum hnih leh kum chanve chu eng chen nge a rei?
chhanna: ni sangkhat leh za hnih leh ni sawmkua →Chu chu ( Kum 3 leh a chanve chhung a ni ).
Halral thilhlan awm reng chu lak bo a nih a, tihchhiatna tenawm tak din a nih aangin a awm ang ni sangkhat leh za hnih leh ni sawmkua . Thuhmahruai (Daniela 12:11) .

Thil chhinchhiah: ni 2300 chhung a ni Hrehawmna Ropui chu a tak tak a ni tih Lal Isuan heti hian a sawi: “Chutiang ni chu tih tawi a nih loh chuan tisa tumah chhandamin an awm lo vang; Mahse thlante tan chuan chu ni chu tih tawi a ni ang .

Thuhmahruai (Daniela 12:11) .

4 ni sangkhat leh zahnih leh ni sawmruk a ni
Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 11:3 leh 12:6) .

5 Ni sangkhat leh zathum leh sawmthum leh panga
Thuhmahruai (Daniela 12:12) .

articles.content:

Daniela Bung 7, châng 2-3-na Bible hi hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: Daniela chuan: Zanah inlârna ka hmu a, vân thli pali chu tuifinriat chungah a lo chhuak a, a lo tleh ka hmu a. Tuipui ata sakawlh lian pali an lo chhuak a, an pianzia a inang lo vek : 1.1.

A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a I tawngtai ang u: Abba duh tak, Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! sakawlh chungchang inlarna

zawt: " " sakawlh "Eng nge a awmzia?"
chhanna: " " sakawlh ” tih hian “rul”, dragon, Setana, Diabola, leh Krista dodaltu tih hming a kawk a ni (Thupuan 20:2) .

zawt: " " sakawlh "Eng nge a rawn entîr?"
chhanna: " " sakawlh "He khawvel lalram, Setana lalram pawh a entir bawk."
1 Khawvel pum hi mi sual kutah a awm a →1 Johana 5:19 en rawh
2 Khawvel hnam zawng zawng →Matthaia 4:8 en rawh
Khawvel Lalram 3 →Vantirhkoh pasarihna chuan a tawtawrawt a ham a, vanah chuan, “He khawvel ramte hi kan Lalpa leh a Krista ram a lo ni ta a, ani chuan chatuanin ro a rel ang” (Thupuan 11: 15) .

1. Tuipui ata sakawlh lian pali an lo chhuak a

Daniela [Bung 7:2-3] Daniela chuan: Zanah inlârna ka hmu a, vân thli pali lo chhuak leh tuifinriat chunga tleh ka hmu a. Tuipui ata sakawlh lian pali an lo chhuak a, an pianzia a inang lo vek a;

A hmasa ber chu sakeibaknei → Babulon Empire ang a ni

Muipui thla a nei a; Thuhmahruai (Daniela 7:4) .

Sakawlh pahnihna hi sakawlh → Medo-Persia ang a ni

Sakawlh dang, sakawlh ang mai, sakawlh pahnihna chu a chungah chuan a thu a, a hmuiah chuan ruh pathum a awm bawk. Mi pakhatin sakawlh chu, "Tho la, tisa tam tak ei rawh" tiin thu a pe a.

Sakawlh pathumna chu sakeibaknei → Grik diabola ang a ni

Chumi hnu chuan ka han en a, ngai teh, sakeibaknei ang, sava thla pali nei, he sakawlh hian lu pali a nei a, thuneihna pek a ni. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 7:6) .

Sakawlh palina chu a rapthlak hle → Roman Empire

Zana inlârnain ka hmu a, ngai teh, sakawlh palina chu a râpthlâk êm êm a, a chak êm êm a, a chak êm êm a, thir ha lian tak tak a nei a, a la awmte chu a ei zo a, a ei zo a, a la awm chu a ke hnuaiah a rap a. He sakawlh hi sakawlh hmasa pathumte nen a danglam hle a, a lu-ah ki sawm a nei a. Ki ka en lai chuan ngai teh, an zingah chuan ki te zawk a lo thang lian a, he ki hmaah hian ki hmasa ber atanga zungte’n an lo hrual chhuah chu a awm a; He ki hian mihring mit ang maia mit a nei a, thu sawi uar lutuk sawi thei hmui a nei bawk. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 7:7-8) .

Rawngbawltu chuan sakawlh palina inlarna chu a hrilhfiah a:

zawt: palina" a ni. sakawlh "Tu nge a sawi?"
chhanna: roman lalram a ni

(Hriat tur: Historic record-a a lan dan chuan Babulon → Medo-Persia → Greek Ramhuai Lal → Rom Empire atanga lak a ni.)

zawt: Sakawlh lu palina hian " sawm jiao "Eng nge a awmzia?"
chhanna: Lu chuan " sawm jiao "Sakawlh palina a ni ( roman lalram a ni ) chu lal sawm zingah a tho ang.

zawt: Rom Empire-a lal sawmte chu tute nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak
27 BC - 395 AD → Rom lalram
395 AD - 476 AD → Chhim lam Rom lalram
395 AD - 1453 AD → Khawchhak lam Rom lalram
Hmanlai Rom Empire-ah hian: Italy, France, Germany, Spain, Portugal, Austria, Switzerland, Greece, Turkey, Iraq, Palestine, Aigupta, Israel, leh Vatican te a tel a. Chu bâkah, Rom Empire aṭanga inṭhen ram tam tak, tûn laia Russia, United States leh ram dang tam tak pawh a tel.

zawt: chuvangin" sawm jiao " " lal sawm a ni Tu nge ni?
chhanna: Ram an la hneh lo
zawt: Engati nge?
chhanna: A chhan chu an la lo kal lo a, mahse an lo kal hunah chuan an lo lang ang a, lalram → chu an chang ang “A mak khawp mai” Babulon Empire → Medo-Persia → Greece → Rom Empire → Feet chanve leilung leh a chanve thir sawm " " kezungtang " " Ki sawm leh lal sawm an ni .
Ki sawm i hmuhte hi lal sawmte an ni a, lalram an la chang lo a, mahse hun eng emaw chen chu sakawlhte ang bawka thuneihna leh lalte ang bawka thuneihna an nei ang. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 17:12) .

zawt: Adang " Xiaojiao chuan a rawn ti a "Eng nge a awmzia?"
chhanna: " " Xiaojiao chuan a rawn ti a ” → “ ki "Sakawlh leh rul hlui sawina a ni. He ki hian mit a nei a, mihring mit ang maiin →" rul "Mihring angin a inlan a; thil ropui tak tak sawi thei kâ a nei → Pathian biak inah pawh a ṭhu a, Pathian a inti → He mi hi 2 Thessalonika 2:3-4 ( paul ) sawi " Mi sual ropui tak chu a inpuang a ", Krista dik lo a ni. Vantirhkohin, "Chuti a nih chuan lal a tho ang," a tih kha a ni.

Chuta ding chuan heti hian a sawi: "Sakawlh palina hi khawvela lo kal tur ram palina a ni. Ram zawng zawng lakah a danglam ang. Lei zawng zawng a ei zo vek ang a, a ke hnuaiah a rap ang. Tin, he ram atang hian a chhuak ang," a ti Lal sawm a lo chhuak ang a, chumi hnuah chuan lal hmasa berte aiin lal danglam tak a lo chhuak ang a, Chungnungbera hnenah chuan thu ropui tak tak a sawi ang a, Chungnungbera mi thianghlimte chu a hrem ang. tin, hun leh dante pawh thlak danglam a tum ang. Mi thianghlimte chu hun engemaw chen, hun khat leh hun chanve chhung atan a kutah hlan an ni ang . Thuhmahruai (Daniela 7:23-25) .

2. Beram leh kel inlarna

Angel Gabriela chuan inlarna chu a hrilhfiah a

(1)Beram no ki pahnih nei

zawt: Beram ki pahnih nei chu tu nge ni?
chhanna: media leh persia lal
Berâmpa ki pahnih nei i hmuh kha Media leh Persia lal a ni. Thuhmahruai (Daniela 8:20) .

(2) billy kel

zawt: Billy kel chu tu nge ni?
chhanna: greek lal

zawt: Greece ram lal chu tu nge ni?
chhanna: Alexander ropui (historical records) 1.1.
Kel mipa chu Greece lal a ni (Greek tawngin: a thuziak bulpui chu Yawan a ni; a hnuaia mi ang bawk hi a ni); Thuhmahruai (Daniela 8:21) .

(3)2300 Ni Hmuh theihna

1 Ki zungpui lian tak chhe tawh →Greek lal "Alexander the Great" chu BC 333 khan a thi a.

2 Ki lian tak zung chu kil liah a lo chhuak a →"Lal Pali" tih hian Lal Pali a kawk a ni.
Cassander →Macedonia ram a awp a
Lysimachus → Thrace leh Asia Minor-ah ro a rel a

Ptolemy → Aigupta ram a awp

Lal Seleucid → 198-166 BC
Lal Hasmani → 166-63 BC
Roman Empire → BC 63 atanga BC 27-1453 BC

3 Kawng pali zinga pakhat aangin lalram tê tak tê a lo piang chhuak → Kawng pali tâwpah chuan lal a lo chhuak a
zawt: He ki te tak te, chak zual zel hi tu nge ni?
chhanna: roman lalram a ni
zawt: Lal a lo chhuak ang a, chu chuan i halral thilhlante chu a la bo ang a, i hmun thianghlim chu a tichhia ang.
chhanna: Krista dodaltu.
AD 70 khan Rom Empire tenawm leh tichhe thei tak " General Tita" tih a ni. Jerusalem chu a la a, halral thilhlante chu a tichhia a, hmun thianghlim chu a tichhia a ni. Krista dodaltu aiawhtu a ni .

→→Hêng lalram pali tâwp lamah hian, dân bawhchhetute sualna a lo kim hunah, lal a lo chhuak ang a, a lan dân râpthlâk tak leh double entendres hmang thiam... A bumna hlen chhuah nân thiltihtheihna a hmang ang, mite an inpeih loh hunah chuan mi tam tak a tiboral ang a, lalte lal chu an ding chhuak ang a, mahse mi kutah an boral lo vang. Ni 2,300 chhunga vision hi a dik a ni , mahse he inlârna hi ni tam tak a ngaihtuah avângin i seal tûr a ni. "Reference (Daniela 8:23-26) ."

3. Khawchhak Lal leh Hmar Lal

(1)Khawthlang lam Lal

zawt: Khawchhak lal chu tu nge ni?
chhanna: Ptolemaeus I Soter... thlah ruk hnuah ram tam takah lal. Tunah chuan Aigupta, Iraq, Iran, Turkey, Syria, Palestine leh ram dang tam tak pathian dang betu rinna nei te a sawina a ni → an vai hian "sakawlh", khawthlang lam lal aiawhtu an ni.
"Khawthlang lal chu a chak ang a, a sipai hotu pakhat chu a aia thiltithei zawk a ni ang a, thuneihna a nei ang a, a thuneihna pawh a ropui ang. Reference (Daniela 11:5)

(2)Hmarchhak lal

zawt: Khawchhak lal chu tu nge ni?

articles.title: Isua lo kal lehna chhinchhiahna (Lecture 5)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen.

Kan Bible hi Matthaia Bung 24 leh chang 32-ah hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: “Hei hi theipui kung aṭangin i zir thei a ni: a hnah a lo hmin a, a hnah a lo sei chuan thlasik a hnai tawh tih i hria a ni. .

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Isua lo kal lehna chhinchhiahna". Aih. 5. A rilru a hah lutuk I tawngtai ang u: Abba duh tak, Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak【 biakin 】Hnathawktute tir chhuak rawh: an kuta thutak thu ziak leh an sawi hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna, ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: Pathian fate zawng zawngin theipui kung a lo hring chhuak leh a hnah note a lo thang lian tih tehkhin thu hi hrethiam rawh se.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Isua chuan tehkhin thu dang a hrilh leh a: “Theipui kung leh thing dang zawng zawng hi en teh u; a hring chhuak (germination). I hmuh chuan thlasik a hnai tawh tih i hre mai ang. ...Chuvangin, heng thilte hi a lo thleng zauh zauh tih i hmuh chuan Pathian ram chu a hnai tawh tih i hre ang. (Luka 21:29,31) tih a ni.

Fig Thing (Sprouting) chungchang tehkhin thu .

1. Thlasik lai

zawt: theipui thing ( a hring chhuak (germination). ) Eng season-ah nge hnah hi a lo thang?
Chhanna: thlasik

zawt: Theipui kung hian eng nge a entîr?
chhanna: " " theipui thing ” tih hian Pathian mi thlan [Israel] chu a entîr a ni.

(1) Juda rah nei lo

Pathianin theipui kung "Israel" chuan hnah chauh a nei a, rah a nei lo tih a hmu a → Baptistu Johana'n, "Simna nena inmilin rah in rah tur a ni... Tunah chuan thal chu thing bulah an dah tawh a; Thingkung rah tha lo zawng zawng chu an tikehsawm a, meiah an paih vek thin . Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 3:8,10) .

(2) Jesaia Dune ( a hring chhuak (germination). ) branch pakhat a ni

Isaia [Bung 11:1] Jesaia thuziak bulpui aangin (a thu bul chu Dun a ni) . Betfair rawh A zung atanga hnah lo chhuakte chuan rah an chhuah ang.
【 tih a ni. thuthlung hlui a ni 】Pathianin Israel mite nen a din “ . dan thuthlung ", dan hnuaia Israel thing". theipui thing "A hnah chauh hian rah a chhuah thei lo, ." Chu chu cut down mai rawh .
【 tih a ni. Thuthlung Thar 】Pathian leh ( thar ) Israel mite " . khawngaihna thuthlung ” → Jesse’s Pier atanga lo kal Betfa ( Lal Isua a ni ); Isua Krista zung atanga lo piang peng chuan rah a chhuah ang . Amen! Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

(3) Theipui kung (sprouting) hian hnah naupang a tipung a

zawt: Theipui kung (budding) hian hnah naupang a lo sei chuan eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: tih hi en rawh. Thuthlung Thar "Aron tiang ang maiin". a hring chhuak (germination). ” → Numbers Bung 17 Châng 8 A tûkah chuan Mosia chu thuhriattîrna puan inah chuan a kal ta a. Staff te chu a lo chhuak a, buds an siam a, an par a, apricot puitling tak tak an siam bawk .
Chuvangin Lal Isuan heti hian a sawi: “Theipui hnah a lo hmin a, a hnah a lo chhuah lai in hmuh hunah chuan thlasik a hnai tawh tih in hria ang →” a ti a. Theipui kung chuan rah a chhuah dawn ta "Heng thilte hi zawi zawiin a lo thleng tih i hmuh hian Pathian ram chu a hnai tawh tih i hre tur a ni." Amen

2. Thlasik lai

zawt: Engtik laiin nge theipui kung hian rah a chhuah?
chhanna: nipui

(1) Thlarau Thianghlim rah

zawt: Jesaia tlâng aṭangin thinghnah a lo chhuak ang a, eng rah nge a chhuah ang?
Chhanna: Thlarau rah
zawt: Thlarau rahte chu engte nge ni?
chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlim rah chu Hmangaihna te, lawmna te, thlamuanna te, dawhtheihna te, ngilneihna te, thatna te, rinawmna te, zaidamna te, insumtheihna te . Chutiang thil khapna dan a awm lo. Thuhmahruai (Galatia 5:22-23) .

(2) Isuan Judate hnenah kum thum chhung chanchin tha a hril a

Chuvangin tehkhin thu a hmang a: "Mi pakhatin theipui kung a nei (referring to." Israel ram a ni ) grep huana phun ( Pathian in a ni )chhunglam. Thingkung bulah chuan rah zawngin a lo kal a, mahse a hmu thei lo. Chutichuan huan enkawltu hnenah chuan, ‘En teh, kei (referring to van pa ) Kum thum kalta chhung khan he theipui kung hi rah zawngin ka lo kal a, mahse ka hmu thei lo. Cut down rawh, engvangin nge ram hi a thlawna luah! 'Huan enkawltu ( . Isua ) chuan: "Lalpa, kumin hian a chhehvel lei ka laih chhuah a, chutah chuan bawlhhlawh ka dah hma loh chuan vawng reng rawh. Nakin lawkah rah a chhuah chuan kal tir rawh. Chutiang a nih loh chuan, tikehsawm leh rawh," a ti a. ’” tih thupui (Luka 13:6-9) .

3. Thlasik lai

(1) Buh seng

zawt: Engtikah nge theipui hi a puitlin?
chhanna: favang

zawt: eng season nge autumn tih hi
chhanna: buh seng hun lai

‘Buh seng hunah chuan a la awm reng ang’ i ti lo vang em ni thla li chhung a ni ’ tih hi? Ka hrilh a che u, lo lam hawiin i mit kha han chawi sang la, en rawh; Thlai te chu a puitling (a original text-ah chuan a var) a, seng tur a inpeih tawh a ni. Buh sengtu chuan a hlawh a dawng a, chatuan nunna atan buh a khawn khawm thin , buh thehtu leh buh sengtu chu an hlim dun theih nan. Thufing angin: ‘Mi tuhtu ( . Isuan chi a tuh a ), he mi hian a seng’( Kristiante hian Chanchin |ha an hril hin ), he thu hi a dik tih a chiang hle. I thawhrim loh chu seng turin ka tir che a, mi dangte thawhrimna chu nuam i ti hle a ni. ” Thuhriltu (Johana 4:35-38) .

(2)Buh seng hun hi khawvel tawpna a ni

Ani chuan, "Thlai tha thehtu chu Mihring Fapa a ni; lo chu khawvel a ni; chi tha chu ram fapa a ni; buh chi chu mi sual fate an ni a, buh chi thehtu chu hmelma chu a ni," tiin a chhang a Diabola chu; Buh seng hun hi khawvêl tâwpna a ni a; . Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 13:37-39) .

(3) Leiah thlai seng

Chutah ka han en a, ngai teh, chhum var a lo awm a, chu chhum chungah chuan Mihring Fapa ang pakhat, a lu-ah rangkachak lallukhum khum, a kutah chuan hruihrual hriam tak vuahin a thu a. Vantirhkoh dang pakhat chu biak in ata a lo chhuak a, chhum chunga ṭhu chu aw ring takin, " Buh seng hun a lo thleng tawh a, lei pawh a puitling tawh si a . "Chhum chunga ṭhu chuan a hruihrual chu leiah a paih a, leia buh seng chu a seng ta a ni. Reference (Thupuan 14:14-16)

4. Thlasik lai

(1)Rorelna ni

zawt: Thlasik hi eng season nge ni?
chhanna: Hibernation (rest) chu khaw lum laiin chawlh hahdam a ni.

zawt: Kristiante hi khawiah nge an chawl?
Chhanna: Kristaah chawl rawh! Amen

chhanna: " " thlasik " " Khawvel tawp leh rorelna ni lo thleng tur a entir a ni.

Matthaia [Bung 24:20] In tlanbo hunah thlasik leh Chawlhni a awm loh nan tawngtai rawh.

Chuvangin i tlanchhiat hunah thlasik emaw, Sabbath emaw i tawk lovang. Hei hi i hrethiam em?"

(2) Theipui kung hian rah a chhuah lo va, ânchhe dawng a ni

( Isua ) chuan kawngpui sirah theipui kung pakhat a hmu a. Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 21:19) .

Lalpa a dodal a, Pathian an tih zawng zawng leh chibai bukna zawng zawng chungah a chawimawi a, Pathian biak inah pawh thuin, Pathian ka ni tih sawiin . Thuhmahruai (2 Thessalonika 2:4) .

Chuvangin kohhran chuan a hmangaihna hmasa chu a kalsan ta a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

(2) Smurna Kohhran

→Dik takin awm la, hrehawm tuar rawh

(3) Pergamum Kohhran

→Balaama zirtirna ka zawm a, pawl hrang hrang leh inhnialna ka siam a
(Balaama zirtirna zawm chu sum ngainat a ni a; Nicolai mite zirtirna zawm chu pawl hrang hrang leh inhnialna siam a ni)

(4) Thuatira Kohhran

(“Zâwlnei Hmeichhia Jezebeli” tih hian inngaihna rinna, nawhchizuar kohhran → a kawk a ni 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Lei lalte nen inpawl rawh (Thupuan 17:1-6 en la), . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan zawm dan aanga innghat (Rom 7:1-6 en la), . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Khawvel nena inthian siam (Jakoba 4:4 en la) .

(5) Sardis Kohhran

→Kohhran hminga tlahniam zel
(The nominal church: nung ni mahse thi tak tak nia inchhal)

(6) Philadelphia Kohhran
→Thutak vawng tlattu leh Chanchin |ha dik hriltu Kohhran

(7) Laodikei Kohhran

→Lukewarm, sum leh pai hausa, hausa tawh, sum leh pai dinhmun avanga khawsa tha, mi hausa tam tak awmna kohhran →Mahse an “” tih an hre lo. thlarau nun "An rethei, khawngaihthlak, rethei, mitdel, saruak an ni. Mi thar an ha lo va, Krista an inthuam lo. Entirnan, tunlaia Vatican Catholic Kohhran, Europe leh America rama kohhran hausa tam tak hi Laodikei kohhran an ni."

3. Kohhran din

(1)Kal lung

zawt: A bul lung chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Hmanlai chuan in sak leh saknaah chuan in nghetna tur lungphum layer hmasa ber atan "corner stones and stones" an hmang thin.
Pathian nen thawk ho kan ni si a; Pathian khawngaihna ka pêk ang zêlin, foreman fing ang maiin lungphum ka phum a, mi dangte pawhin a chungah an din a; Thuhmahruai (1 Korinth 3:9-10) .

[Isua Krista] Amah ngei hi a lungphum a ni

1 Korinth 3:11 Lungphum phum tawh, Isua Krista tih loh chu tumahin lungphum dang an siam thei lo.
tin, tirhkohte leh zâwlneite lungphum chungah din a ni a, Krista Isua ngei chu a lungphum ber a ni a, reference (Ephesi 2:20)

(2) Lungpui, thlarau lam lungpui

Matthaia 16:18 Tin, ka hrilh a che u, Petera i ni a, he lungpui chungah hian ka kohhran ka din ang a, Hades kulh kawngkharte chuan an hneh lo vang.

zawt: He lungpui chungah hian Biak In hi →Lungpui tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: " " lung " kalkawng Krista

Thil chhinchhiah: " " lung ” tih hian leia lungte a kawk lo;
Van atanga thlarau lungpui →“ thlarau lam lungpui ” → tih hi Lungpui chu Krista a ni ! Amen.
Chhumah leh tuifinriatah Mosiaah baptisma an chang vek a; An in chu an hnung zuitu thlarau lam lungpui aanga lo chhuak a ni a; Chu lungpui chu Krista a ni . Thuhmahruai (1 Korinth 10:2-4) .

(3) Tirhkohte, zawlneite leh mi thianghlimte chu lungpui chungah an din a

zawt: Engtin nge Kristiante hi lungphum chungah an din?
chhanna: A chhan chu vawi hnih ( Krista kraws-a chhandamna ) chu Thlarau Thianghlim ( Thlarau tui inang chiah in rawh → Tui leh Thlarau Thianghlim atanga piang ), Pa hnena thlen theihna an nei. Chutichuan mikhual leh hnam dang in ni tawh lo va, mi thianghlimte leh Pathian chhungkaw member-te nen khua leh tui in ni tawh a, tirhkoh leh zawlneite lungphumah in sak in ni a, Krista Isua ngei chu a lungphum ber a ni a, mi tin Amah kaltlangin in chu a awm a ni dik taka inzawm a, zawi zawiin Lalpa biak in a lo ni ta a ni. Amahah chuan Thlarau Thianghlimin Pathian chenna tur atan in sak dun in ni bawk. Thuhmahruai (Ephesi 2:18-22) .

4. Kohhran hi a taksa a ni

(1)Kohhran hi a taksa a ni
Ephesi 1:23 Kohhran chu a taksa a ni a, engkim tikhattu A famkimna a ni.

(2) Kohhran hotu ber a ni
Kolossa 1:15-18 Fapa Duhawm chu hmuh theih loh Pathian anpui, thilsiam zawng zawng hmaa piang hmasa ber a ni. Amahah chuan thil zawng zawng, vanah emaw, leiah emaw, hmuh theih emaw, hmuh theih loh emaw, lalṭhutthlenga emaw, lalna emaw, thuneihna emaw, thil zawng zawng chu Amah siam a ni a, a tan siam a ni. Engkim hmaah a awm a, amahah chuan engkim a din a ni. Kohhran taksa lu ber a ni bawk. Amah hi a bul tanna a ni a, mitthi zing ata tho leh hmasa ber a ni a, engkimah hmahruaitu a nih theih nan.

5. A taksa peng kan ni

(1)A taksa peng in ni

1 Korinth 12:27 Nangni chu Krista taksa in ni a, in peng pakhat theuh in ni.

(2)A taksa ruh leh tisa kan ni

Ephesi 5:30 A taksa pengte kan ni si a (Pathian Lehkha Thu thenkhatah chuan: A ruh leh a tisa te pawh kan sawi tel bawk).

zawt: Engtin nge A ruh leh a tisa kan ni tih kan hriat theih ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua chu mitthi zîng ata tho leh a ni → thlarau taksa (1 Korinth 15:44) .
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thlarau taksa a lo lang → tisa leh ruh nen (Luka 24:38-39) .
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a keini( en ) hmuh theih taksa → chu Adama ruh leh tisa a ni
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a keini( en )Taksa bo → Isua ruh leh tisa a ni
5. A rilru a hah lutuk Krista nena thawhleh taksa → chu thlarau taksa a ni
6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian atanga piang, thlarau taksa → Pathiana Krista nena inthup (Kolossa 3:3)
7. A rilru a hah lutuk Krista a lo lang leh ang → Kan thlarau taksa te chu a lo lang ang a, ropui takin Krista nen a lo lang ang! Amen

6. Kohhran inpumkhatna leh Krista taksa dinchhuahna

zawt: Krista taksa hi engtin nge kan din ang?
chhanna: Rinnaa inpumkhatna chu kohhran inpumkhatna chu Krista taksa inpumkhatna a ni →→ Inremna inzawmna chu hmang ula, Thlarau Thianghlimin a pek thinlung inpumkhatna chu vawng reng turin bei rawh u. Beiseina pakhata koh i nih ang khan taksa pakhat leh Thlarau pakhat a awm. Lalpa pakhat, rinna pakhat, baptisma pakhat, mi zawng zawng Pathian leh Pa pakhat, engkim chungah, engkim kaltlangin, mi zawng zawngah. ...Tirhkoh thenkhat, zawlnei thenkhat, Chanchin |ha hriltu thenkhat, pastor leh zirtirtu thenkhat, mi thianghlimte rawngbawlna hna thawk tura thuam turin a pe a, Krista taksa siam turin a pe a, rinna inpumkhatna kan thlen vek hma loh chuan, hre rawh Pathian Fapa chu mi famkimah hruai a ni a, Krista famkimna dinhmun a lo thleng ta a,...mahse hmangaihnain thutak sawiin, engkimah a lo thang lian a, chu chu Lu, Krista, a hnen atanga a pum puia lo awm tawhah chuan lo thang lian rawh taksa chu a inzawm khawm a, a rawngbawlna dik takah ruh tin nen, Taksa tin hnathawh dan ang zela in tanpuina hmang hian taksa chu hmangaihnaah a thang lian ang a, a insiam ha ang. Thuhmahruai (Ephesi 4, châng 3-6, 11-13, 15-16) .

7. Kohhran hi Krista pasal tur a ni

Ephesi 5:30-32 A taksa pengte kan ni si a (Pathian Lehkha Thu thenkhatah chuan: a ruh leh a tisa hi a awm a ni). Chumi avang chuan mipa chuan a nu leh pa kalsanin a nupui nen an inpumkhat ang a, an pahnih hian tisa pakhat an lo ni ang. Hei hi thuruk ropui tak a ni a, mahse Krista leh Kohhran chungchang ka sawi a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah: Kohhran hi Isua Krista inhualna a ni," fiancée a ni "Isua nupui pasal nei lo, nula thianghlim, nula thianghlim a sawina a ni. Nula thianghlim a lo seilian →". nula hmeltha tak ni rawh ” Chu chu taksa mawi zawka thawhlehna a ni → Krista nupui nei tura a lo kal leh hunah chuan kohhran a ni ! Amen

【 tih a ni. Thlarau Thianghlim chhinchhiahna 】

→→Isua Krista’n a monu a hmangaihna chhinchhiahna a ni ( engagement ring a ni ): Khawngaihin i thinlungah chhinchhiahna ( Thlarau Thianghlim chhinchhiahna ), i kut ah stamp ang maiin bun rawh. Hmangaihna chu thihna angin a chak si a, thikna chu hremhmun ang maiin a ngilnei a; Hmangaihna hi tui tam takin a timit thei lo va, tuilianin a chim thei hek lo. Tupawhin a chhungkuaa ro hlu zawng zawng hi hmangaihnain a thlak chuan hmuhsit a ni ang. Thuhmahruai (Hla Hla 8:6-7) .

8. Beram No Inneihna Zanriah

【 tih a ni. Isua krista chuan kohhran a nei 】

Tin, mipui aw, tui tam tak aw, ri nasa tak, "Halleluia! Lalpa kan Pathian, Engkimtitheia chuan ro a rel dawn si a," tih ka hre ta a. avang, Beram No inneihna hun a lo thleng ta; , tin, puan zai mawi tak, eng leh var inthuam turin khawngaihna pek in ni. articles.title: Thlarau Chhandamna (Lecture 7)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Kan Bible hi 1 Korinth 12, châng 10-ah i hawng ang u, i chhiar ho ang u: Mi pakhat chu thilmak tih theihna te, zâwlnei nih theihna te, thlarau hriat thiam theihna te, ṭawng danga thu sawi theihna te, ṭawng dang hrilhfiah theihna te a pe a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Thlarau Chhandamna". Aih. 7. A rilru a hah lutuk Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang [kohhran] chuan hnathawktu a tir chhuak thin: an kut hmangin thutak thu, kan chhandamna chanchin tha, kan ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna thute chu an ziak a, an sawi thin. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: I fate zawng zawng hnenah thlarau thilpek zawng zawng → thlarau hriat thiamna pe turin Lalpa hnenah dil rawh ! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

1. Van Pa Thlarau

(1)Thlarau zawng zawng pa

Kan tisa Pa chuan a duh danin rei lo te chhungin min thunun fo thin a, thlarau zawng zawng Pa erawh chuan kan thatna tur min thunun thin a, chutichuan a thianghlimna changtu kan nih theih nan. (Hebrai 12:10)

zawt: mi sang sawm ( thlarau ) tu hnen atangin nge?
chhanna: Pa hnen atangin →Piang emaw thil siam emaw zawng zawng hi Pathian Thlarau atanga lo chhuak a ni! Amen

zawt: Thlarau piang chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pa Fapa Thlarau chu Thlarau piang a ni
Vantirhkoh zawng zawng zingah hian tu hnenah nge Pathianin: "Ka Fapa i ni, vawiinah hian ka hrin che" a ti ngai lo? Eng ber nge a kawhhmuh a, a sawi: "Kei hi a Pa ka ni ang a, ani chu ka fapa a ni ang"? Thuhmahruai (Hebrai 1:5) .

zawt: Pathianin tu hnenah nge, Ka fapa i ni?
chhanna: Adam --Luka 3:38 en rawh
A hmaa Adama kha Pathian anpui leh anpuia siam a ni → chuvangin Adama chu “ . Hlimthla "→Adama hnuhnung ber chu Adam hmasa ber a ni". Hlimthla "Taksa tak tak, Ying'er." taksa tak tak manifest →chu chu Adam Isua hnuhnung ber , Isua chu Pathian Fapa a ni! Amen
Mi zawng zawngin baptisma an chang a, Isua pawh baptisma a chang ta a ni. Ka tawngtai lai chuan vanram a inhawng a, . Thlarau Thianghlim A chungah chuan ṭhuro ang maiin a lo thleng a, vân aṭangin aw a lo chhuak a, “ “ Ka fapa duh tak i ni, I lakah ka lawm e . "Reference (Luka 3:21-22) ."

(2)Van Paa Thlarau

zawt: Van Paa Thlarau →Thlarau chu eng nge ni?
chhanna : 1.1. Pathian Thlarau, Jehova Thlarau Thlarau Thianghlim, Thutak Thlarau! Amen.
Nimahsela, Pa hnen ata ka tirh tur, Pa hnen ata, Thlarau dik tak, Pa hnen atanga lo chhuak, tanpuitu a lo kal hunah chuan ka chanchin a hriattir ang. Thuhmahruai (Johana 15:26) .

2. Isua Thlarau

zawt: Isua thlarau chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pa Thlarau, Pathian Thlarau, Jehova Thlarau Thlarau Thianghlim! Amen.
Mi zawng zawngin baptisma an chang a, Isua pawh baptisma a chang ta a ni. Ka tawngtai lai chuan vanram a inhawng a, . Thlarau Thianghlim chu a chungah a lo thleng a , ṭhuro ang maia insiam a ni a, vân aṭangin aw a lo chhuak a, “ Ka fapa duh tak i ni, I lakah ka lawm e . ” (Luka 3:21-22) tih a ni.

3. Thlarau Thianghlim

zawt: Van Paa Thlarau →Thlarau chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlim!

zawt: Isua Thlarau →Thlarau chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pawh Thlarau Thianghlim!

zawt: Thlarau Thianghlim chu tu thlarau nge ni?
chhanna: Van Pa Thlarau leh Fapa duh tak Isua Thlarau a ni!

【 tih a ni. Thlarau Thianghlim 】 Awle Pa Thlarau, Pathian Thlarau, Jehova Thlarau, Fapa duh tak Isua Thlarau leh Krista Thlarau zawng zawng hi → “thlarau pakhat” Thlarau Thianghlim aanga lo chhuak vek a ni!
1 Korinth 6:17 Lalpa nena inpumkhat erawh chu a awm Lalpa nên thlarau pumkhat ni rawh u . Isua chu Pa nên a inpumkhat em? nei! Dik! Isuan → Paah ka awm a, Pa chu keimahah a awm → Kei leh Pa chu pumkhat kan ni a ti. "Reference (Johana 10:30) ."
Thuziak angin →Beiseina pakhata koh in nih ang khan taksa pakhat leh Thlarau pakhat a awm. Lalpa pakhat, rinna pakhat, baptisma pakhat, mi zawng zawng Pathian leh Pa pakhat, engkim chungah, engkim kaltlangin, mi zawng zawngah. Thuhriltu (Ephesi 4:4-6). Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

4. Adama Thlarau

Israelte chungchanga Lalpa Thu. Vante tizautu, leilung lungphum dintu leh mihring chhunga thlarau siamtu LALPA chuan a ti: (Zakaria 12:1)
zawt: Mihring chhungril tuin nge siam →( thlarau ) tih hi?
chhanna: Jehova!
zawt: Pathian Jehova hi a tlangpui ( thinrim ) Adama hnar chhungah? Hetiang hian a chhunga thlarau chu Pathian a ni lo,” a ti a. hel "? Genesis 2:7 ah hian kan hmu a
chhanna: ham" thinrim "Thlarau ("thlarau" emaw "thlarau" emaw) nei mi nung a lo ni ta a ni." thisen ”) → Adama thlarau chu ( thisen ) mi nung.
(1) Adama taksa → vaivut atanga siam (Genesis 2:7 en rawh)
(2) Adama thlarau → pawh siam a ni (Zakaria 12:1 en rawh)
(3) Adama thlarau → pianphung (1 Korinth 15:44 en rawh)
Chuvangin Adam-a" thlarau taksa “Pathian siam vek an ni!
Thil chhinchhiah:
1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Adama chuan" thlarau "A ni tawh piang thlarau, tichuan a chhungah ". thlarau ” Lalpa Thlarau, Isua Thlarau, Thlarau Thianghlim pawh → ani chu “ . rul "Diabola Setana chu hnehin, ( Thisen ) thlarau a bawlhhlawh lo vang.
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Adama chuan thlarau piang thlarau, a thlahte pawh Jehova thlarau, Isua thlarau, Thlarau Thianghlim, Pathianin tirh thla a ngai lo; thlarau ) Adama thlahte chungchang → Numbers 11:17 Chutah chuan ka lo kal ang a, ka bia ang che u, ka bia ang in chunga Thlarau tla chu an hnenah pe rawh u , mite enkawl tura mawhphurhna pawimawh tak hi i hnenah an ṭawmpui ang a, chutiang chuan nangmah chauhin i tuar a ngai tawh lo vang. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

5. Pathian Fate Thlarau

(1) Pathian fate taksa

zawt: Tisaa piangte hi Pathian fate an ni em?
chhanna: tisa atanga piang Aih Pathian fate (Rom 9:8) .

Chauh
1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang , .
2 Chanchin Ṭha thutak aṭanga piang, .
3 Pathian atanga piang → Thlarau taksa chu Pathian fa a ni , 1 Korinth 15:44 en rawh

(2) Pathian fate thisen

zawt: Tisa atanga piang naupang → "chhungril". Thisen "Tu thisen nge ni?"
chhanna: Pi leh pute Adama " Thisen ",rizai" rul "Tainted a ni." Thisen ;

zawt: Pathian fate ( Thisen )tu thisen nge?
Chhanna: Krista ta Thisen ! Thianghlim, bawlhhlawh nei lo, thianghlim Thisen ! Amen →→Krista thisen hlu, beramno bawlhhlawh leh bawlhhlawh nei lo ang maiin. Thuhmahruai (1 Petera 1:19) .

(3)Pathian fate thlarau

zawt: Tisa atanga lo piang thlarau →Tu thlarau nge ni?
chhanna: Adama thlarau chu tisa leh thisen nei mi nung a ni!

zawt: Pathian Fate Thlarau →Tu Thlarau?
Chhanna: Van Pa Thlarau, Pathian Thlarau, Isua Thlarau leh Thlarau Thianghlim! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi i ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. Thuhmahruai (Rom 8:9) .

6. Mi felte thlarau tih famkim

zawt: Mi fel thlarau tih famkim chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Isua Krista( thlarau ) tlanna hna thawh zawh hnuah heti hian a sawi: " Ti zo ! "A lu a ti hniam a, ." I thlarau chu Pathian hnenah pe rawh . Thuhmahruai (Johana 19:30) .

zawt: Mi felte thlarau ti famkimtute chu tute nge ni?
chhanna: Taksa lama an dam lai khan, a chhan chu ( lehkhathawn ) Pathianin thiam chantirte → Thuthlung Hlui hun laia chhinchhiah angin, chung zingah chuan: Abela, Enoka, Nova, Abrahama, Lota, Isaka, Jakoba, Josefa, Mosia, Gideona, Baraka, Cham Son, Jephtha, Davida, Samuel, leh zawlneite...etc. " " thuthlung hlui a ni "An dam lai khan, a chhan chu ( lehkhathawn ) chu Pathianin thiam a chantir a ni," Thuthlung Thar "Kan sualte avanga Isua Krista thihna, a phumna leh ni thum nia a thawhlehna hmangin ( thlarau ) Tlanna hna chu zawhfel a ni →→ thlante chu hawn a ni a, mi thianghlim muhilte ruang tam tak chu kai tho a ni. Isua a thawhleh hnu chuan thlan ata an lo chhuak a, khawpui thianghlimah an lut a, mi tam tak hmaah an inlar a. Thuhmahruai (Matthaia 27:52-53) .

7. Chhandam thlarau

zawt: Chhandam thlaraute chu engte nge ni?
chhanna: 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Entîr nân, hmân lai Nova hun laia Thuthlung Hluiah chuan, Nova chhûngte zînga mi pariat lawngah an lût tih loh chu, mi dang reng rengin lawngah an lût lo va, an taksa chu tuilianin a rêl a, a tichhe vek a, an (thlarau) erawh chu chhandam an ni chanchin tha rinna hmangin →→( Isua ) chu chuan a kal a, tân ina thlarau, Nova’n lawng a buatsaih lai leh Pathianin dawhthei taka a nghah laia Pathian thu awih lote hnênah thu a hril a ni. Hetih lai hian lawng chhungah mi tam tak an lut lo va, tuiah chuan chhandam an ni a, mi pariat chauh an awm...Hemi avang hian mitthite pawhin an tisa anga rorelsak an nih theih nan Chanchin |ha hril a ni. An thlarau nun chu Pathianah a innghat a ni . Thuhmahruai (1 Petera bung 3 châng 19-20 leh 4 châng 6)

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Korinth kohhranah pawh uire chungchang pawh a awm a, chu chu mi tu emaw chuan a pasalnu "Paula" chuan →Chutiang mi chu a tisa tichhe turin Setana kutah hlan tur a ni. Lal Isua niah a nunna chhandam a nih theih nan . Thuhmahruai (1 Korinth 5:5).

Thil chhinchhiah : Heta thlarau chhandam → chhandam mai a ni a, ropuina, lawmman leh lallukhum pawh nei lo. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

8. Vantirhkoh Thlarau

zawt: Vantirhkohte hi Pathian siam an ni em?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Vanah Eden huan →Pathianin vantirhkoh a siam
2 Leia Eden huan → Pathianin Adama a siam

Eden huanah i awm a, lung hlu chi hrang hrang: Rubi te, rubi te, diamond te, beryl te, onyx te, jasper te, sapphire te, emerald te, ruby te, rangkachak te, leh tha tak tak te in inthuam thin a, khuang leh fife in neihna apiangah , an awm vek a ni i siam ni khan Inbuatsaih tha tak a ni. Thuhmahruai (Ezekiela 28:13) .

zawt: Vantirhkohte hi mihring mitin hmuh theih an ni em?
chhanna: Mihring mit hian thiltihtheihna khawvelah chauh thil a hmu thei a, vantirhkoh taksa →Ni e thlarau lam taksa , kan mitin hmuh theih loh. Vantirhkoh thlarau taksa chu a lo lang a, mihring mit chauhin a hmu thei. Nula thianghlim Mari chuan thu puangtu vantirhkoh Gabriela a hmuh ang khan, Berampute pawhin Krista a lo pian laia vantirhkoh zawng zawng an hmuh ang khan → Krista thawhlehna thlarau taksa a lo lan ang khan zirtir zawng zawngin an hmu thei a, Krista chu vanah a lawn ta! Chanchin tha rawn thlentu vantirhkoh chu an hmu vek a. Tirhkohte 1:10-11 en rawh

zawt: Eden huana vantirhkohte chu tute nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Mikaela →Indo lai vantirhkoh lalber a entir (Daniela 12:1) .
2 Gabriela →Chanchin |ha thlentu vantirhkoh a entir (Luka 1:26)
3 Lucifer-a →Vantirhkohte fakna a entir (Isaia 14:11-12) .

(1)Vantirhkoh tlu

zawt: Vantirhkoh tlu tawh chu tu nge ni?
chhanna: Lucifer →Lucifer
"Aw arsi eng, zing Fapa, engvangin nge van ata i tluk? Engvangin nge hnamte hnehtu hi leia tihchhiat i nih? Reference (Isaia 14:12)

zawt: Vantirhkoh engzat nge "Lucifer" zuia tlu?
chhanna: Vantirhkoh hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu an tlu a
Vanah inlârna dang a lo lang leh a: Sakawlh sen lian tak, lu pasarih leh ki sawm nei, a lu pasarihah lallukhum pasarih a awm. A hmui chuan van lama arsi hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu a hruai a, leiah a paih thla ta a ni. ...Reference (Thupuan 12:3-4) .

zawt: "Bright Star, Son of the Morning" Lucifer-a Tluk hnu →Eng nge a hming?
chhanna: Dragon, dragon sen ropui, hmân lai rul, Diabola tia koh bawk, Setana tia koh bawk, ramhuai lal Beelzebub, Belial, sual mi, Krista dodaltu .

Tin, vân ata vântirhkoh lo chhuk ka hmu a, a kutah chuan khuarkhurum chahbi leh kaidil lian tak a keng a. Dragon, hmân lai rul, Diabola tia koh bawk, Setana tia koh chu a man a, kum sângkhat chhûng a phuar a (Thupuan 20:1-2).

(2)Vantirhkoh tlu tawh thlarau

zawt: Vantirhkoh tlu tawh thlarau →Eng thlarau nge ni?
chhanna: Diabola thlarau, thlarau sual, tihsual thlarau, Krista dodaltu thlarau .
Ramhuai thlarau, thilmak ti thin, khawvel lal zawng zawng hnena indo tura kal chhuak, Pathian Engkimtitheia ni ropui takah chuan indonaa kalkhawm thin an ni. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 16:14) .

(3) Vantirhkoh hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat thlarau tlu tawhte

zawt: Vantirhkoh hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khata tlu tawh thlarau →Eng thlarau nge ni?
chhanna: Tin, ramhuai thlarau te, thlarau sual te, thlarau bawlhhlawh te pawh .
Sakawlh kâ ata te, sakawlh kâ ata te, zâwlnei der kâ ata te, rulhut ang maia thlarau bawlhhlawh pathum lo chhuak ka hmu a. Thuhmahruai (Thupuan 16:13) .

(4) Krista dodaltu, zâwlnei der thlarau

zawt: Zawlnei derte thlarau chu engtin nge kan hriat theih ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

An kâ aṭanga thu lo chhuak chu →

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Frog" thlarau sual bawlhhlawh ang maiin
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista dodal la, Pathian dodal la, thutak do la, kawng dik tibuai la, a ni leh ni lo tih kawng chu hril rawh.
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian Fapa khenbeh thar tur leh tlang taka mualpho turin; thisen hlu tak a ni ) chu thil pangngai angin an sawi a, khawngaihna Thlarau Thianghlim chu an nuihzat bawk.
Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

zawt: Unau derte chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlim awm lohna → Pathian fa anga inlan .

zawt: Engtin nge kan sawi ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Aih Isua hre rawh (Johana 1:3:6 en rawh) .
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan hnuaiah (Gal. 4:4-7 en la) .
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Aih Kristaa thlarau chhandamna chu hrethiam rawh
5. A rilru a hah lutuk Aih Chanchin |ha thutak chu hrethiam rawh
6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Kristaah ni lovin Adama tisaah
7. A rilru a hah lutuk Aih piantharna
8. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Aih Pa Thlarau, Jehova Thlarau, Pathian Thlarau, Fapa duh tak Isua Thlarau, Thlarau Thianghlim a awm lo.
Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Thlaraute hriat chian dan i hria em?

Gospel transcript sharing, Pathian Thlarau atanga infuih tharna, Isua Krista Hnathawktute, Unaupa Wang*Yun, Unaunu Liu, Unaunu Zheng, Unaupa Cen leh thawhpui dangte chuan Isua Krista Kohhran chanchin tha hnathawh hi an thlawp a, an thawk ho bawk. Isua Krista chanchin tha, mite chhandamna, chawimawina leh an taksa tlanna chantirtu chanchin tha an hril thin! Amen

articles.title: Thlarau Chhandamna (Lecture 6)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Kan Bible hi 1 Korinth 15 leh chang 44-ah hawngin, i chhiar ho ang u: Tuh chu tisa taksa a ni a, tho leh chu thlarau taksa a ni. Taksa taksa a awm chuan thlarau taksa pawh a awm ngei tur a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Thlarau Chhandamna". Aih. 6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang [kohhran] chuan hnathawktu a tir chhuak thin: thutak thu ziak leh an kuta sem chhuah hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna chanchin tha, kan ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna a ni. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh u: Chanchin tha ringin Isua thlarau leh taksa i chang ang u! Amen .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Fapa leh fanu Pathian atanga lo piang

---Krista Taksa chu hmu rawh---

1. Krista ring la, nunpui rawh

zawt: engtin( lehkhathawn ) Krista nen an thawhleh?
chhanna: A thihna angin amah nen kan inpumkhat tawh a nih chuan a thawhlehna angah pawh amah nen kan inpumkhat ang Reference (Rom 6:5)

zawt: Engtin nge taksa lamah amah nen kan inpumkhat theih ang?
chhanna: Krista taksa chu thing chungah a innghat a, .

( lehkhathawn ) Ka taksa chu thingah a innghat a, .
( lehkhathawn )Krista taksa chu ka taksa a ni, .
( lehkhathawn ) Krista a thih khan ka sual taksa chu a thi a, .
→→hei hi Thihna angin amah hi zawm ve rawh ! Amen
( lehkhathawn ) Krista taksa phumna hi ka taksa phumna a ni.
( lehkhathawn ) Krista taksa thawhlehna hi ka taksa thawhlehna a ni.
→→hei hi thawhlehna angin amah nena inpumkhat turin ! Amen
Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Krista nena kan thihpui chuan a hnenah kan cheng ve ngei ang tih kan ring. Thuhmahruai (Rom 6:8) .

2. Krista mitthi ata kaihthawhin min siam thar leh a

zawt: Engtin nge kan pianthar?
chhanna: Chanchin |ha ring rawh →Thudik hrethiam rawh!

1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang --Johana 3:5 en rawh
2 Chanchin |ha thutak aanga lo piang --1 Korinth 4:15 en rawh
3 Pathian atanga piang --Johana 1:12-13 en rawh
Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! A khawngaihna nasa tak ang chuan Isua Krista mitthi zing ata thawhlehna hmangin beiseina nungah min siam thar leh ta Reference (1 Petera 1:3)

3. Thawhlehna hi thlarau taksa a ni

zawt: Krista nen thawhleh kan ni taksa taksa Thawhlehna?
chhanna: Thawhlehna chu a ni thlarau lam taksa ; Aih taksa thawhlehna .

Tuh chu tisa taksa a ni a, tho leh chu thlarau taksa a ni. Taksa taksa a awm chuan thlarau taksa pawh a awm ngei tur a ni. Thuhmahruai (1 Korinth 15:44) .

zawt: Thlarau taksa chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Krista taksa → chu thlarau taksa a ni!

zawt: Krista taksa hi keimahni nen a danglam em?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista chu ( kawng ) tisaah kan lo chang ta a;
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista chu ( pathian ) tisaah kan lo chang ta a;
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista chu ( thlarau ) tisa kan lo ni ta a;
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a krista taksa Thi thei lo kan taksa hian ro a hmu a ;
5. A rilru a hah lutuk krista taksa Thihna hmu lo Kan taksa hian thihna a hmu a.

zawt: Tunah hian khawiah nge Krista pianpui kan taksa thawhleh tawhte nen hian kan awm?
Chhanna: Kan thinlungah! Kan thlarau leh taksa hi Krista nen Pathianah thup bo a ni →Thlarau Thianghlimin Pathian fate kan ni tih kan thinlungin a hriattir a. Amen! Rom 8:16 leh Kolossa 3:3 en rawh

zawt: Engvangin nge Pathian piang taksa hi kan hmuh theih loh?
chhanna: Krista nena thawhleh kan taksa → Ni e thlarau lam taksa ,keini( putar ) . mit saruak A hmu thei lo ( Mi thar a ni ) mahni thlarau taksa.

Tirhkoh Paulan a sawi angin → Chuvangin, kan rilru kan tichhe lo. ( hmuh theih a ni ) Pawn lam taksa chu chhe tawh mah se, chhungril taksa ( hmuh theih loh mi thar ) chu nitin tihthar zel a ni. Hun rei lote chhunga kan hrehawm tawrhna leh tlêm tête hian tehkhin theih loh khawpa ropuina rit chatuan min thawk ang. Gu Nian-a hmuh ang kha kan ni lo tih a chiang ta ( Taksa ), mahse hmuh theih loh ngaihsak ( thlarau lam taksa ); Taksa chu a tawpah chuan vaivut-ah a let leh ang ), hmuh theih loh ( thlarau lam taksa ) chu chatuan atan a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai (2 Korinth 4:16-18) .

zawt: engvangin nge tirhkohte mit saruak Isua thawhleh taksa hmuh theih chu?
chhanna: Isua thawhleh taksa chu thlarau lam taksa →Isua thlarau lam taksa hi hmun, hun leh thil neihin a huam chin a ni lo. Vawikhatmah Isua chu a bo ta a. Thuhmahruai (Luka 24:3) leh 1 Korinth 15:5-6

zawt: Engtikah nge kan thlarau taksa hi a lo lan?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Krista lo kal leh hun ni chu!

I thi tawh a, i nun chu Krista hnenah Pathianah thup a ni si a. Kan nunna Krista a lo lan hunah chuan nangni pawh ropui takin a hnenah in inlar ve ang. Thuhmahruai (Kolossa 3:3-4) .

2 A pianzia dik tak chu i hmu ngei tur a ni

Pathian fa tia koh kan nih theih nan leh a fate kan nih tak tak theih nan Pain min hmangaihna hi in hmu a ni. Chuvang chuan khawvel hian min hre lo ( mi thar piang thar leh ), a chhan chu ka la hre ngai lo ( Isua ). Unau duh takte u, tunah hian Pathian fa kan ni tawh a, nakin lawka kan nih tur chu a la puang chhuak lo a, mahse Lalpa a lo lan hunah chuan Amah ang kan ni dawn tih kan hria a, a chhan chu Amah ang angin kan hmu dawn a ni.

→→ Thil chhinchhiah: “Lalpa a lo lan chuan a pianzia dik tak chu kan hmu ang a, amah nena kan inlan hunah chuan keimahni thlarau taksa ngei pawh kan hmu ang”! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai (1 Johana 3:1-2) .

Pali: A taksa peng hrang hrang kan ni

I taksa hi Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni tih i hre lo em ni? He Thlarau Thianghlim Pathian atanga lo chhuak hi nangmahniah a cheng a, nangmahni ta in ni lo (1 Korinth 6:19)

zawt: Kan taksa hi Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni em?
chhanna: Pathian atanga piang ( hmuh theih loh ) → " . thlarau lam taksa "Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni."

zawt: Engati nge?
chhanna: Hmuh theih taksa →Adama atanga lo chhuak a nih avangin pawn lam taksa chu a chhe zauh zauh ang a, a na ang a, a thi ang →he uain vun hlui hian uain thar a chelh thei lo ( Thlarau Thianghlim ), a leak thei a, chuvangin kan tisa hi Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni lo;

【 tih a ni. thlarau thianghlim biak in a ni 】Awle Hmuh theih loh a kawk a ni → thlarau lam taksa , chu Krista taksa a ni a, a taksa pengte kan ni a, hei hi Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

→A taksa pengte kan ni si a (hmanlai lehkhabu zial thenkhatah chuan: A ruh leh a tisa te hi an dah tel bawk). Thuhmahruai (Ephesi 5:30) .

【 tih a ni. inthawina nung 】Rom 12:1 Chuvangin, ka unaute u, Pathian khawngaihna avang hian in taksa hi inthawina nung atan hlan turin ka ngen a che u...

zawt: Inthawina nung hian ka tisa taksa a kawk em?
chhanna : 1.1. Inthawina nung tih awmzia chu piantharna " " thlarau lam taksa ” → Krista taksa chu inthawina nung a ni a, a taksa peng hrang hrang inthawina nung kan ni → Thianghlim leh Pathian lawmawm, hei hi i thlarau rawngbawlna a ni Amen

Thil chhinchhiah: Piantharna leh hriatthiamna i hriatthiam loh chuan i taksa i hlan ang → He taksa hi Adama hnen atanga lo chhuak a ni a, bawlhhlawh leh bawlhhlawh a ni a, chhe leh thihna hnuaia awm a ni a, thihna inthawina a ni.
Pathian duhzawng inthawina nung i hlan a nih chuan inthawina thi i hlan tihna a ni a, a rah chhuah chu engtiang chiahin nge a pawi dawn tih hi ngaihtuah teh. Dik! Chuvangin thianghlimna i hriat a ngai a ni.

5. Lalpa Zanriah ei la, Lalpa taksa dawn thu hriatpui rawh

Kan malsawmna no hi Krista thisen changtu a ni lo maw? Chhang kan phel hian Krista taksa a tel lo em ni? (1 Korinth 10:16) tih a ni.

zawt: ( lehkhathawn ) chu Krista nen a tho leh a, Krista taksa chu a nei tawh lo’m ni? Engvangin nge a ruang hi i la dawng duh?
chhanna: KA( lehkhathawn ) Krista thlarau taksa nei tur chuan keini pawhin thuhretu Krista taksa chu nei la, nakin lawkah i nei tam zawk ang tawnhriat Thlarau lam tisa inlanna →Isua mit ngeia hmuh theih” chhang "A taksa (nunna chhang) aiah, no chhungah". grape tui a ni "Amah ai chuan." Thisen , . nunna , . thlarau →Lalpa Zanriah ei rawh Chhan min rawn ko a ni thutiam zawm rawh , thil dang atan dah rawh Thisen kan hnenah din a ni Thuthlung Thar , kawng vawng reng, hmang ( inrintawkna ) Pathian atanga lo piang chu chhungril ( thlarau taksa )! Krista a lo kîr leh a, taksa tak tak a lo lan hma loh chuan → Rinna in neih leh neih loh in inenfiah a ngai a, in fiah tur a ni. I hnawl loh chuan i chhungah Isua Krista i nei tih i hre lo em ni? Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai (2 Korinth 13:5) .

6. In thinlungah Pathian Thlarau a awm chuan tisa mi in ni lo vang.

Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi i ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. (Rom 8:9) tih a ni.

zawt: Pathian Thlarau chu thinlungah a cheng a, chuti a nih chuan engvangin nge tisa mi kan nih loh?
chhanna: Pathian Thlarau in thinlunga a awm hunah chuan mihring thar piangthar in ni ang Nangni ( Mi thar a ni )Awle hmuh theih loh → chu " thlarau lam taksa "Pathian atanga piang i ni". Mi thar a ni "Thlarau taksa hi ( putar )tisa. Putar taksa chu sual vangin a thi a, a thlarau ( thlarau lam taksa ) rinna avanga thiam chantir nun. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Nangmahah Krista a awm chuan taksa chu sual vangin a thi a, thlarau erawh chu felna avangin a nung a ni. Thuhmahruai (Rom 8:10) .

7. Pathian atanga lo piang apiangin an sual ngai lovang

1 Johana 3:9 Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan thil a tisual lo va, Pathian thu chu amahah a awm reng a, a sual thei hek lo;

zawt: Engvangin nge Pathian atanga lo piangte hian thil an tihsual loh?
chhanna: Pathian thu (original text awmzia chu "chi" tihna) a thinlungah a awm avangin a sual thei lo →
1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian Thu, Pathian Thlarau leh Pathian Thlarau Thianghlim i thinlunga a awm chuan i piangthar ( Mi thar a ni ), .
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mihring thar chu thlarau taksa ( a ni lo ) tisa lama thil sual titu putar, .
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mihring thar thlarau leh taksa chu Krista nen Pathianah a inthup a, tunah hian khawiah nge Krista a awm? Vanah chuan! Vanah mi thar angin in piang thar a, Krista chu Pa Pathian ding lamah a awm a, nang pawh Pa Pathian ding lamah in awm bawk! Amen – Ephesi 2:6 en rawh
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Sual hmanga putar taksa thihna, Krista thihnaa lo thleng chu tihmit a ni tawh a, thlanah an phum ta a ni. Keimah hi ka nung tawh lo, Krista hi ka tan a nung tawh a ni ". Mi thar" Kristaah hian eng sual nge tih theih? I sawi dik em? Chuvangin Paula chuan → Nang pawhin sual ( en ) amah ngei pawh a thi tawh a, engtik lai pawhin ( en ) a taksa sual tak chu vaivuta a lo kîr leh hma loh chuan a thi ang a, Isua thihna chu a tawng ang. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Rom 6:11 en rawh

8. Tupawh thil sual titu chuan Isua an hre lo

1 Johana 3:6 Tupawh amaha awm reng chuan thil a tisual lo va;

zawt: Engvângin nge mi sualte hian Isua an hriat ngai loh?
chhanna: misual, misual →

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A hmu ngai lo, Isua pawh a hre ngai lo , .
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Kristaa thlarau chhandamna hrethiam lova, .
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian fapa nihna chang lo , .

zawt: Kan nu leh pate atanga taksa lamah tu thlahte atanga lo piang kan nih?

Mipa leh hmeichhia inzawmna atanga lo piang zawng zawng hi mipa thlah an ni vek a, chu chu "pi leh pu hmasa ber" Adama leh a nupui Evi atanga lo piang fate ang chi → Ni khat chu mipa "Adama" chuan a nupui Evi nen sex an hmang a , tichuan Evi chuan nau a pai a, Kaina a hring a (chu chu hmuh theihna a ni), "LALPA chuan mipa min pe ta a ni," a ti a. Abela chu berâm vêngtu a ni a; (Genesis 4:1-2) tih a ni.
Adama chuan a nupui nen an inpawl leh a, fapa a hring a, chu chu Setha tiin a vuah a, chu chu, "Pathianin Abela aiah fapa dang min pe leh ta a, Setha pawhin fapa a hrinsak a ni," tihna a ni. tichuan a hmingah Enosa a sa ta a. (1) Pathian Jehova chuan mihring chu vaivut aṭangin a siam a

1 Mite’n Dân an bawhchhia a, thil an tihsual a, chhia leh ṭha hriatna thing rah an ei avângin.

Lalpa Pathian chuan chu mi chu Eden huanah chuan hna thawk tur leh vawng turin a dah a. Lalpa Pathian chuan, "Huana thing rah chu a thlawnin i ei thei a, a chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah erawh chu i ei tur a ni lo, a rah i ei ni chuan i thi ngei ang" (Genesis). 2:15) -17 knots) a ni.

Tin, Adama hnenah chuan, "I nupui thu i awih a, ei loh tura thu ka pek che thing rah i ei avângin, lei chu i anchhe ânchhe dawng a ni a; i dam chhûng zawngin a rah ei tur i hmuh theih nân i thawk chhuak tûr a ni," a ti a ." ngei I tan hling leh hling i lo thang ang a; (Genesis 3:17-19) tih a ni.

Destiny ang chuan mi zawng zawng hi vawi khat thi tura ruat an ni a, thih hnuah rorelna a awm ang. (Hebrai 9:27)

(5) Thih hnuah rorelna a awm ang

Thil chhinchhiah: Mipa thlah fapate leh fanu zawng zawngte chu an sual a, Pathian ropuina an tlachham a, Dan ânchhe hnuaiah an awm ta → Mi zawng zawng hi vawi khat thi tura ruat an ni a, an thi ang a, an thih hnuah rorelna a awm ang, tin, dan hnuaia an thil tih angin hrem an ni ang Rorelna→→boralna pahnihna a ni--Thupuan 20:13-15 en rawh

Tin, mitthi lian leh te, lalthutphah hmaa ding ka hmu a. Lehkhabute chu hawn a ni a, lehkhabu dang hawn a ni a, chu chu nunna bu a ni. Mitthite chu hêng lehkhabu-a chhinchhiah ang leh an thiltih ang zêla rorelsak an ni. Chutichuan, tuifinriat chuan an chhunga mitthite chu a pe ta a, thihna leh Hades-a chuan mitthite chu a pe ta a, an thiltih ang zelin rorelsak an ni ta a ni. Thihna leh Hades pawh mei dilah an paih a; Nunna bu-ah tu pawh hming a inziak loh chuan mei dilah paih a ni ang. Thupuan Bung 20 en rawh

zawt: Engvangin nge kan pianthar a ngaih?
chhanna: Mihring a pianthar loh chuan Pathian ram a hmu thei lova, Pathian ramah pawh a lut thei hek lo. Mi a pianthar loh chuan ni hnuhnung rorelna → mei dila paih a nih chu a tuar ang a, chu chu thihna pahnihna (chu chu thlarau thihna a ni). Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
