Kan Bible hi 2 Korinth Bung 1, châng 18-ah i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u: Pathian, rinawm tak hmingin, ka ti a, kan thu hrilh che u hi a ni leh ni lo tih hi a ni lo. .

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, hriatthiam dan kan sawi dun bawk "Thil dik leh dik lo awm dan". Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. “Woman of Merit” kohhran chungah lawmthu kan sawi a, an kuta thu ziak hmanga thutak thu hrilh tura hnathawktu min tir a, chu chu chhandamna, chawimawina leh kan taksa tlanna chantirtu chanchin tha a ni. Thlarau lam thudik kan hriat theih nan leh kan hmuh theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel ang a, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru a hawng zel ang u. Pathian fate chu thil dik leh dik lo thliar hran dan → zirtir rawh . Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin! Amen

1. Ni e, ni lo

【Pathian Lehkha Thu】
2 Korinth 1:18 Pathian chu a rinawm angin ka ti a ni: In hnena kan thu hrilhna kha a ni leh ni lo tih a ni lo. .

zawt: →→ ni leh ni lo tih chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Ni e, ni lo
Bible hrilhfiahna: Thil dik leh dik lo rang taka sawina a ni Chumi hma chuan " tih a ni. Awle ", a ti leh a ". Aih "; tih hmain ". dik ", a ti leh a ". dik lo "; tih hmain ". nemnghehna, hriatpuina "; a hnuah " Mahse, hnial rawh ”, thusawi emaw thu hril emaw → dik leh dik lo, inmil lo .

2. Thil dik leh dik lo kawng

zawt: →→a ni leh ni lo tih kawng chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) . dik lo Kristian Thisen mite sual a tithianghlim thin

zawt: Lalpa thisen ( vawi engzat nge ni ) mite sual tihthianghlim nan?
chhanna: " " vawikhat ”→→Krista ta a ni Thisen Sual tihthianghlimna pakhat chauh a awm a, sual tihthianghlimna vawi tam tak a awm lo.

1 Krista chuan Amah a hmang a Thisen , vawi khat chauh
Chutichuan, chatuan inremna hmuin, kel leh bawng no thisen ni lovin, ama thisenin vawi khat atân hmun thianghlimah chuan a lut ta a ni. (Hebrai 9:12)

2 a taksa chu vawi khat chauh hlan rawh
Chumi duhzâwng chuan Isua Krista taksa vawi khat atâna hlanna avângin tihthianghlimin kan awm a ni. (Hebrai 10:10)

3 Sual thawina a hlan
Mahse Krista chuan sualte avanga chatuan inthawina pakhat a hlan a, Pathian ding lamah a thu ta a. (Hebrai 10:12)

4 Isua’n a sawi Thisen sual zawng zawng ata min tifai ang che
Pathian ênga a awm angin ênga kan kal chuan inpawlna kan nei a, a Fapa Isua thisenin sual zawng zawng ata min tlenfai hin. (1 Johana 1:7) tih a ni.

5 Chutichuan, tihthianghlim tawhte chu kumkhuain an famkim theih nân
A inthawina pakhat avang hian tihthianghlim tawhte chu chatuan atan a ti famkim si a. (Hebrai 10:14)

Thil chhinchhiah: Kristian Thisen Chauh" vawikhat "Mihring chu a sual ata a silfai tawh chuan → tihthianghlim tawh chu chatuan atan a famkim a → chatuan atan a thianghlim a, sual nei lo leh thiamchantir a ni! Amen. Sual chu vawi tam tak a tifai lo, duh Sual vawi tam tak silfai tur chuan Krista hian vawi tam tak thisen a chhuah a ngai ang Pathian Fapa, Beram No an ni." Thisen "A pangngai angin enkawl rawh. I hrethiam em?"

zawt: Hriat theih dan →" Ni e, ni lo "Sual tlenfaina chu?"
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

A hmain "thianghlim" a ti a;
(Hebrai 1:3) Ani chu Pathian ropuina êng, Pathian nihna dik tak a ni a, a thupêk chak tak hmangin engkim a vawng tlat a ni. Mite chu an sual ata a tithianghlim a , ropui takin a dinglamah a thu a.

Thil chhinchhiah: A hmain a sawi tawh su "; a hnuah " dik lo ” → “ . a hnuah "Thu hnial tur". Hma "A thusawi → Tunlai thuhriltu tam tak chuan hmui hrual chungin an sawi mai → ( A hmain a sawi tawh )Isua chuan sual zawng zawng ata min tithianghlim a;( mahse )Lalpa ka ring". hnuah "Naktuk sual te, naktuka sual te, ngaihtuahna sual te, hmui hmanga thusawi sual te hi a la ti lo. Tih a nih chuan zawt mai rawh ( lalpa thisen ) sual silfai tur te, sual thai bo tur te, khuh bo tur te→→Hei hi an thuhril a ni→" Yes leh no tih kawng ". A hmaa a sawi tawh ( Awle )a hnuah( Aih ), a hmaa sawi tawhte hnial nan a hnuaia thumalte hi hmang ang che.

(2) . dik lo dan laka zalen

zawt: Dan leh a chibai bukna lakah engtin nge kan tlanchhuah theih ang?
chhanna: Krista nena a taksa hmanga thihna avang hian min phuartu dan lakah kan thi tawh a, tunah chuan dan lakah kan zalen ta →→ Mahse min phuartu dan lakah kan thih tawh avangin tunah chuan dan lakah kan zalen ta a, Kan rawngbawl tur a ni Lalpa chu thlarau tharna (thlarau: emaw Thlarau Thianghlim tia lehlin) angin, ritual hlui ang ni lovin. (Rom 7:6) leh Gal.

zawt: Hriat theih dan→→" Ni e, ni lo "Dan atanga inhnukdawk?"
chhanna: ( A hmain a sawi tawh ) Tunah chuan dan leh a chibai bukna ata kan zalen ta; A hnuah ) Kan kir leh a, dan kan zawm chuan vawk sil tawh ang mai kan ni a, chu chu leiah a kal leh mai thin a ni. inthen rawh "Law," a hnuah a ti leh a Fimkhur rawh "Dan → tih awmzia chu Dan laka zalen lo mah la, dan hnuaiah i la bawhchhia tihna a ni. Dan bawhchhiat chu sual a ni. Dan i bawhchhiat chhunzawm chuan i zalên lo → → Hei hi a ni." an thuhriltu dik lo tak takte thu hrilh chu." Yes leh no tih kawng ".". tiin a sawi.

(3) . dik lo Tupawh Pathian atanga lo piang chuan engtikah mah sual a nei lovang

zawt: Naupang piangtharte hian thil an tisual thei em?
chhanna: Tupawh Pathian atanga lo piang chuan engtikah mah sual a nei lovang

zawt: Engati nge?
chhanna: Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan sual a ti lo, Pathian thu chu amahah a awm reng a, a sual thei lo, Pathian laka piang a nih avangin. (1 Johana 3:9)
Pathian atanga lo piang chuan engtikah mah sual a nei lovang tih kan hria a, Pathian atanga lo piang chuan amah leh amah a vawng reng ang (hmanlai lehkhabu zial a awm: Pathian atanga lo piang chuan a venghim ang), mi sual chuan a tichhe thei lovang. (1 Johana 5:18) tih a ni.

zawt: Hriat theih dan→→" Ni e, ni lo "Piantharna?"
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak
1 Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan sual a nei ngai lo →(OK) tih a ni.
2 Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan thil a tisual lo →(OK) tih a ni.
3 Tupawh Amaha awm reng chuan thil a tisual lo→ (Ngei ngei)

zawt: Engvangin nge Pathian atanga piangte hian thil an sual ngai lo?
chhanna: Pathian thu (chi) chu a thinlungah a awm avangin a sual thei lo.

zawt: Miin thil sual a tih chuan engtin nge ni ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak
1 Tupawh thil sual titu chuan a hmu lo --1 Johana 3:6
2 Tupawh thil sual titu chuan amah an hre lo ( Krista chhandamna hrethiam lo )--1 Johana 3:6
3 Tupawh thil sual titu chu Diabola mi a ni --1 Johana 3:8

zawt: Naupang sual lote chu tu ta nge an nih? Naupang sualte hi tute ta nge an nih?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak
【1】Pathian atanga lo piang fate→→engtikah mah an sual lovang!
【2】Rul atanga lo piang fate→→sual.
Chuta tang chuan tute nge Pathian fate leh tute nge Diabola fate tih a lo lang chhuak thin. Tupawh felna ti lo chu Pathian mi a ni lo va, a unau hmangaih lo chu Pathian mi a ni hek lo. Thuhmahruai (1 Johana 3:10) .

Thil chhinchhiah: Pathian piang Kristiante chuan sual an ti lo ang → Bible thutak a ni Tupawh sual titu chu Diabola ta a ni → Bible thutak a ni bawk.

Tûn laia kohhran tam tak chuan hetiang hian an ring sual a ni: Miin Lalpa a ring a, chhandam a nih hnuah, mi fel ni mah se, mi sual a ni bawk. Kristiante hian mipat hmeichhiatna lama sual an ti chhunzawm zel lo va, mipat hmeichhiatna lama sual an thiam lo tih an sawi → Kristiante hi a rualin mi fel leh mi sual an ni a; diabola chu a rualin → Tichuan thu pakhat an siam ta a: thlarau chanve pathian chanve "Mi an rawn chhuak a, an sawi dun a." Vawikhatmah dik leh a chang chuan dik lo Tao-ho, hetiang rinna hi thi tawh emaw thi lo emaw an ti→→Hei hi an hriatthiam loh vang a ni.” piantharna "Thuhriltu ril tak chuan a sawi→→." Yes leh no tih kawng . Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Pali, . dik lo Thlarau Thianghlim chu i hnenah a awm reng a ni

zawt: Thlarau Thianghlim hi kan hnenah a awm reng em?
chhanna: Pa hnenah ka dil ang a, Thlamuantu dang (or Translation: Thlamuantu; a hnuaia mi ang bawk) a pe leh ang che u, kumkhuain in hnêna a awm theih nân , chu chu thutak Thlarau, khawvelin a pawm theih loh, Amah a hmuh loh vang leh a hriat loh vang a ni. Amaherawhchu, nangmahni hnenah a awm reng a, nangmahniah a awm reng dawn si a. Thuhmahruai (Johana 14:16-17) .

zawt: Kohhran an inkhawm apiangin Thlarau Thianghlim lo kal zel turin an tawngtai hin a, chutiang kohhran chuan Thlarau Thianghlim awmna a nei em?
chhanna: Hetiang hian kohhran hian " meichher "Aih" Tel ",chu chu Thlarau Thianghlim awmna a awm lo → Chuvangin kan inkhawm apiangin Thlarau Thianghlim lo kal turin dil rawh u .

zawt: Thlarau Thianghlima khat tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlim chhungril lama tihthar hna thawktu, Thlarau Thianghlim ruahmanna, finna, finna leh thiltihtheihna pholangtu a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Matthaia 5:37 (Lalpa Isuan a ti) Ni e i tih chuan ni lo ti rawh, i sawi leh chuan mi sual (a nih loh leh lehlin: chu chu sual aanga lo chhuak) a ni. " "
chuvangin( paul ) chuan, Pathian a rinawm ang bawkin, in hnena thu kan hrilh che uah hian ni leh ni lo a awm lo. Isua Krista, Pathian Fapa, kei leh Sila leh Timothea in zînga thu kan hril kha, a ni leh ni lo a nei lo va, amahah chuan a ni pakhat chauh a nei si a. Pathian thutiamte chu eng ang pawhin tam mah se, Kristaah chuan a ni. Chuvangin amah avanga thil zawng zawng hi a tak tak (taktak: amen in the original text), Pathian chu keimahni hmanga chawimawi a nih theih nan. Thuhmahruai (2 Korinth 1:18-20) .

zawt: Dik leh dik lo thu hriltu kohhran an awm em?

chhanna: Seventh-day Adventist, Catholic, Samaj Chhungkua, Jesuit Dik tak, Charismatic, Evangelical, Grace Gospel, Beram Bo, Mark House of Korea... leh kohhran dang tam tak a awm a.

Text sharing sermon, Pathian Thlarau Hnathawktute, Unaupa Wang, Unaunu Liu, Unaunu Zheng, Unaupa Cen, leh thawhpui dangte chuan Isua Krista Kohhran chanchin ha hna hi an thlawp a, an thawk ho hin. Isua Krista chanchin tha, mite chhandamna, chawimawina leh an taksa tlanna chantirtu chanchin tha an hril thin! Amen

articles.title: FAQ: Sakawlh chhinchhiahna
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna, Amen!

Thupuan bung 13 chang 16-ah Bible hi hawng ila, chhiar ho ila: Mi tin, mi lian leh te, mi hausa leh rethei, zalên leh bawih zawng zawngte pawhin an kut dinglamah emaw, an hmaiah emaw chhinchhiahna a neihtîr bawk.

Vawiin hian kan enfiah ang a, kan inpawl ang a, kan insem ang "Sakawlh chhinchhiahna". Tawngtai rawh: "Abba Pa Thianghlim duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e"! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak". biakin "Hnathawktute tir chhuak rawh u, an kuta thutak thu ziak leh an sawi hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna, ropuina leh kan taksa tlanna chanchin tha a ni. Amen! Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel sela, kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel ang u." hriatthiamna kawngah kan rilru hawng la, thlarau lam thutak hre thei leh hmu thei→ Sakawlh chhinchhiahna chu eng nge ni tih hrethiam rawh . Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, ngenna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin a ni! Amen

sakawlh chhinchhiahna

1. Thlarau lam thil nei lo rannung

(1) Rannung mite

Sam 92:6 Sakawlhte hian an hrethiam lo va, Mi â pawhin an hrethiam hek lo.
Sam 49:20 Mi harh lova zahawm taka awm reng chu sakawlh thi ang a ni.

zawt: Sakawlh chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: "Mihring thlarau lam nun" chu ran vulh ang a ni a, Pathian dik tak chu an ring lo Siamtu chuan mihringte hi rannung leh ran vulh atanga lo piang chhuak a ni tih hi a la ring duh a, "Darwin-a" theory of evolution hi a ring tlat bawk! Ramsa atanga lo piang chhuak an nih thu pawmtute chu rul, dragon, vawk, ui, etc. Hetiang chi hi rannung mihring an ti a.
Pathian thinurna chu van atangin Pathian ngaihsak lo leh mi fel lo zawng zawng, dik lo taka che leh thutak tikhawlotute chungah a lo lang ta a ni tih a lo lang ta a ni. Pathian chungchânga hriat theihte chu an thinlungah a lang chhuak a, Pathianin a puan chhuah avângin. Khawvel siam aangin Pathian chatuan thiltihtheihna leh Pathian nihna chu chiang takin hriat theih a ni a, hmuh theih loh ni mah se, thil siamte hmangin hriatthiam theih a ni a, mihring chu chhanna nei lovin a awm ta a ni. A chhan chu, Pathian hre mah sela, Pathian anga an chawimawi lo va, lawmthu an sawi lo. An ngaihtuahna chu engmah lo a lo ni ta a, an thinlung â chu a thim ta a ni. Mi fing nia inchhalin mi â an lo ni ta a, thi thei lo Pathian ropuina chu mihring chhe thei leh sava, sakawlh leh rannung chi hrang hrang ang chi lemte nen an thlak ta a ni. Thuhmahruai (Rom 1:18-23) .

(2) Thlarau lam thil nei lo rannung

2 Petera Bung 2 Châng 12 Mahse heng mite hian thlarau an nei lo va, man leh tihhlum tur rannung anga piang an ni niin a lang. An hriat loh thil an sawichhiat a, midang an tihchhiat lai hian anmahni ngeiin eirukna an tuar dawn a ni.
Juda 1:10 Nimahsela heng mite hian an hriat loh chu an sawichhia a. Thlarau nei lo sakawlhte ang chiah chu an pianphungah an hre vek a, hemiah hian an intihchhiat phah a ni.

2. Sakawlh lem chibai buk la, sakawlh hnung zui rawh

zawt: Sakawlh lem chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1)Hmanlai khan Israel fate hian rangkachak bawnghnute an paih thin

LALPAN Mosia hnênah, “Chhuk la, i mite Aigupta ram ata i hruai chhuahte chu an chhe tawh a, bawnghnute hmin an siam a, an chibai bûk a. Inthawina hlan la, 'Aw Israel, Aigupta ram ata hruai chhuaktu che u hi i pathian chu a ni,' ti rawh," Exodus 32:7-8.

(2) Babulon rangkachak lim

"Aw lal, milem ropui tak i mumang a ni. Milem chu a sang hle a, a eng em em bawk. I hmaah a ding a, a hmel chu a rapthlak hle mai. Milem lu chu rangkachak thianghlim a ni a, a beng leh a kut chu tangkarua a ni a, a pum leh a kawr chu rangkachak thianghlim a ni.

(3) Mihring siam milem der

Pathian thutak chu dawt nen an thlak a, Siamtu aiah thilsiam chibai buk leh rawng an bawl ta a ni. Lalpa chu kumkhuain malsawm a ni. Amen! Rom 1:25 ah hian kan hmu

(4) Sakawlh lem chu nung leh tawng thei turin siam rawh

Tin, sakawlh lem chu thu sawi thei tura nunna pe turin thuneihna pek a ni a, sakawlh lem chibai buk lo apiang tihhlum tir turin thuneihna pek a ni bawk. Thupuan 13:15

zawt: He "sakawlh" hi khawi atanga lo chhuak nge?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Tuipui ata sakawlh a lo chhuak a

Tin, tuifinriat ata sakawlh lo chhuak ka hmu a, ki sawm leh lu pasarih nei, a kiah chuan lallukhum sawm, a lu-ah chuan Pathian sawichhiatna hming a awm a. Thupuan 13:1

Note: Tuipui atanga sakawlh lo chhuak hian → sual mi a lo lang → a chhinchhiahna a dawng tan tihna a ni

2 Lei ata sakawlh dang a lo chhuak a

Tin, sakawlh dang, beram no ang ki pahnih nei, dragon anga thu sawi, lei ata lo chhuak ka hmu a. Thupuan 13:11

Note: Lei aanga sakawlh lo chhuak hian zâwlnei der, mi bum tûra khawvêla lo kal chu a kâwk a ni.

zawt: He "sakawlh" hian eng nge a entîr?
chhanna: “Sakawlh” tih hian khawvêl entîrtu ram a kâwk a.

→→Heng sakawlh lian palite hi khawvela lal pali tho leh tur an ni. Daniela Bung 7 Châng 17 en rawh
→→Hei hi rawngbawltu chuan a sawi: “Sakawlh palina chu khawvela lo kal tur ram palina a ni a, ram dang zawng zawng aiin a danglam ang :23

zawt: He “sakawlh” ki sawmte hian eng nge a sawi?
chhanna: He "lalram" atang hian lal sawm an lo chhuak a.
→→K sawm i hmuhte hi lal sawmte an ni a, mahse rei lo te chhung chu sakawlhte ang bawka thuneihna leh lalte ang bawka thuneihna an nei ang. Thupuan 17:12
→→K sawmte erawh chu he ram atang hian lal sawm an lo chhuak ang a; Nakinah chuan lal dang a lo chhuak leh a , a hmaa mite ang lo takin lal pathumte chu a thunun ang. Daniela 7:24-ah a awm

zawt: Lu sarih nei "sakawlh" tih hian eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: tlang pasarih a ni
→→Thinlung fing chuan hetah hian a ngaihtuah thei. Lu pasarihte hi hmeichhia ṭhutna tlang pasarih a ni a, Thupuan 17:9 (chipchiar zawka sawifiahna atan "Sakawlh Inlarna" tih hi en la)

zawt: Engtin nge he "sakawlh lem" hian thu a sawi theih ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Mi tam takin taima takin an zir ang a, hriatna a pung ang.
Daniel, he thu hi thup la, he lehkhabu hi hun tawp thlengin seal rawh. Mi tam tak chu an tlan kual ang (a nih loh leh lehlin: taima taka zir) an ni ang a, hriatna pawh a pung ang. "Daniela 12:4 ah hian."
2 Artificial intelligence hian ramhuai leh sakawlh lem a siam a
3 Mihring mit a nei --Dan 7:8-ah a awm
4 Thuneihna, chakna, leh thusawi thiamna neih.
5 Lei zawng zawnga mite chuan “sakawlh” chu an zui a, “sakawlh lem” chu an bia . --Thupuan 13:15
6 Sakawlh chhinchhiahna “Mihring leh machine chu pumkhat an lo ni ta.”

3. Sakawlh chhinchhiahna 666

(1) . Kut dinglam emaw hmaiah emaw chhinchhiahna dawng

Tin, mi zawng zawng, a lian leh te, hausa leh rethei, zalên leh bawih zawng zawngte chu an kut dinglamah emaw, an hmaiah emaw chhinchhiahna an dawng a ni. (Thu Puan 13:16)

(2) . Leia mi zawng zawngte chuan sakawlh chu an zui a, dragon chu an bia a

...lei zawng zawng chuan mak an ti hle a, sakawlh chu an zui a, dragon chu chibai an buk a, sakawlh hnenah thuneihna a pek avangin, sakawlh chu an chibai a, "He sakawlh ang hi tu nge ni a, tuin nge a do thei ang?" Thupuan Record Bung 13 Châng 3-4

zawt: Engvangin nge leia mi zawng zawngte khan sakawlh chu an zui a, chutih lai chuan dragon chu an biak?
chhanna: Daniela lehkhabuin a sawi angin “ . Fimkhur taka zirchianna ”→artificial intelligence hmanga thil siam chhuah( Mihring leh machine inzawmna ) a lo lang ang a, khawvel hmun hrang hranga mite chuan hriatna atan "monster" an rinchhan a ngai dawn a, tunlai 2022 AD-a mihringte hi "smartphone"-ah kan innghat nasa hle ang bawkin. Entirnan, miten "English" zir an duh a nih chuan "monster"-a "memory" a khawlkhawm chu an kut emaw, an hmai emawa miin a dawn "imprint"-ah chauh an copy a ngai a ni study "English" hard. Hetiang tawng thiamna → "Hriatna hi a thang lian ang." Hripui leh thisen chhuahnain ka hrem ang. Amah leh a sipaite leh a hnena awm zawng zawngte chungah ruah te, rial te, mei te, meikhu te ka tir bawk ang. (Ezekiela 38:22) tih a ni.

(1) "Miaomiao" indo rawh.

chhanna: Tunah chuan i hre tawh". Hripui hi rawn hruai thla rawh "Pathian ta a ni a, Pathianin a kaitho a, a laka invenna tur a awm lo → Thuziak angin - Ezekiela 33:27... Dik! Mi thenkhat chuan "Miao Miao" an ei hnuah an taksa pum puiah reaction an nei a, mi thenkhat phei chu "Miao Miao" ei hnuah an thi bawk a, i taksa immunity a tlahniam ang a, hri kai i hlauhawm zawk ang; tin, i thi mai thei bawk.

Chuvângin, chhiatna emaw, hripui emaw kan tawh hunah unaute tân mahni thu tlûkna siam loh hi a ṭha ber a, a chhan chu i taksa chu Lal Isua khan " Thisen "A man chawia lei in ni a, Krista thihnaah dah in ni ( Virus hripui vangin i thi lovang ), i kraws i keng a, Isua i zui a, Amah nen i thihpui avangin krista chanchin tha Thuhretu chu. I hrethiam em?

Hripuite hi Pathian hnen atanga lo chhuak, mi suaksualte tihboralna tur a ni tih in hriat avangin, mi suaksualte phuba lakna tura LALPAN hripui a tirh ni a ni. I ( lehkhathawn ) Chanchin |ha dik tak, pawh ( lehkhathawn ) te hian Isua Krista hi an pawm a, Pathian atanga piang naupang i ni tih i hria a, engtin nge heng hripui hripui te hi i chungah a lo thlen theih ang? I sawi dik em?

Chanchin |ha Luka【Bung 11 Châng 11-13】 Lal Isuan a sawi ang khan → Nangni zingah tu nge in fapa (or fapa emaw fanu emaw) in chhang dil se, lung in pe ang? " Dik?

I ( lehkhathawn ) kum tam tak chhung chu kawng dik lo , Pathian fa, mi â angin i inlan a, hri kai i kai ang a, hripuiin i thi ang i ti a, Pathian fa i ni tur a ni lo. Kristian tam tak chuan "an zawng chhuak" a, a hnuah an inchhir thin. Thlarau lam zinkawng kan tlan lai hian inpumkhatna leh rawngbawlna thinlung kan nei tur a ni Unau te hian kan in thlawp tawn a ngai a, kan inhnukdawk a, kan infuih tawn a ngai a, a chhan chu thlah hnuhnung berah hian Jehova thuhretu kan ni→ Nang, hmeichhe zinga hmeltha ber, i hriat loh chuan beram ke pen chu zui mai rawh ...Reference (Hla Hla 1:8) .

Hla: Ka ring! Mahse, rinna ka nei tlem hle a, khawngaihin min pui rawh!

(2)Sakawlh chhinchhiahna 666

chhanna: Tin, mi zawng zawng, a lian emaw, te emaw, hausa emaw, rethei emaw, zalen emaw, sal emaw, an kut dinglamah emaw, an hmaiah emaw chhinchhiahna an dawng vek bawk. (Thupuan 13:16) → "Tlemte" - thenkhatin kut veilam an nei a, thenkhatin kut dinglam an nei bawk a;

(3) Hetah hian mi thianghlimte dawhtheihna leh rinna chu a awm a ni

articles.title: Zawhna leh Chhanna: Sual kan ti lo kan tih chuan
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
1 Joh.


1. Mi zawng zawngin thil an tisual vek

zawt: Keimahni ngeiin kan sual ve ngai em?
chhanna: " " nei ”→ Mi zawng zawngin thil an tisual a, Pathian ropuina an tlachham si a (Rom 3:23)

2. Mi pakhat kaltlangin khawvelah sual a lut

zawt: Kan sualna hi khawi atanga lo chhuak nge?
chhanna: Mi pakhat (Adama) atanga lo kal → Hei hi mi pakhat hmanga khawvelah sual a lut a, sual atanga thihna lo chhuak ang mai a ni a, chuvangin mi zawng zawngin an sual avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. (Rom 5:12)

3. Sual ka ti lo kan tih chuan

zawt: "Keini" hian kan sual lo ti ila → "keini" tih hian pianthar hma tihna em ni? A nih loh leh pianthar hnuah?
chhanna: hetah" keini "Awle Pianthar hmaa a thusawi sawina a ni tih awmzia chu ( ; lehkhathawn ) Isua hnenah a lo kal a, chanchin tha thutak a hrethiam a, ( piantharna ) chuan mi thianghlim chuan a ti a.

Lal Isuan a sawi ang khan → Mi fel (mi thiam chang, mahni inngaihtuah thiam, sual nei lo mi) ko tura lo kal ka ni lo va, misual lam zawk → 1 Timothea Bung 1:15 “Krista Isua chu chhandam turin khawvelah a lo kal a misualte." He thu hi rintlak leh fak tlak tak a ni. Misualte hotu ber ka ni. hmuh theih a ni". Saula "Pianthar an nih hma chuan Isua leh Kristiante an tiduhdah a; Krista êng an neih hnuah". paul "Hriat → Mi sual zingah kei". Saula "Amah hi a mawhphurtu ber a ni."

zawt: Pa Pathian hrin Isua khan thil a tisual em?
chhanna: Aih! →Kan puithiam lalber chu kan chak lohnate hi a khawngaih thei lo a ni lo. Keimahni ang bawka thlemna engkimah a awm a, chuti chung pawh chuan sual a nei lo. (Hebrai 4:15)

zawt: Keini Pathian atanga lo piangte hian thil sual kan ti ngai em?
chhanna: Aih !
zawt: Engati nge?
chhanna: Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan sual a ti lo, Pathian thu chu amahah a awm reng a, a sual thei lo, Pathian laka piang a nih avangin. (1 Johana 3:9 leh 5:18)

Thil chhinchhiah: Chuvangin hetah hian". keini "Pianthar hmaa sawi tawhte a kawk a, as in". keini "Tun hma chuan chanchin tha ka la hre lo a, Isua ka la hre lo a, ka la hre lo ( lehkhathawn )Isua, zui tura piangthar lo ( Eng ) mite leh " nangmah ” chu a inang vek → mi zawng zawng chu dan hnuaiah an awm a, dan bawhchhia an ni a, sual bawih an ni.
Johana chu ( Ziak ) Pathian ringtute tan, mahse ( I ring suh ) Isua Juda unaute chuan palai, Isua Krista an tlachham tih an sawi! anni( lehkhathawn ) dan zawm la, dan zawm la, thil sual i ti lo tih ngaihtuah rawh.
Johana’n ngilnei taka fuihna thu chuan “ . anni "Ti rawh →". keini "Kan sual lo kan tih chuan Pathian chu dawtheiah kan siam a, a thu chu keimahniah a awm lo."
Tichuan 1 Johana bung 2 châng 1-na chu “ Johana” tih aṭangin “ . keini "Tone chu thlak rawh". nangmah ”→Ka fapa te u, heng thute hi ka hrilh ang che u Ziak Nang tan (chu chu kalpel Chanchin |ha chu an hnenah pek a ni) in sual loh nan. Tupawhin sual an tih chuan Pa hnenah thurawn petu kan nei a, Isua Krista mifel chu.

zawt: Engtin nge Johanan sual lo turin a hrilh?
chhanna: Johana chuan Isua Krista hre turin a hrilh → Isua ring rawh →Piantharna, thawhlehna, chhandamna, chatuan nunna!

Tupawhin sual an tih chuan Pa hnenah thurawn petu kan nei a, Isua Krista mi fel → Ani chu kan sualte inremna a ni a, keimahni chauh ni lovin khawvel pum sualte tan pawh a ni. (1 Johana 2:2)

Thil chhinchhiah: Johana chuan Dan hnuaia awmte chu Dan zawm turin a hrilh a, Dan bawhchhiat leh dan zawm lo chu sual a ni → thil sual titu mi →Pa hnenah thurawn petu kan nei a, Isua Krista mi fel. Isua Krista hi Pa hnen atanga tirh a ni tih hria ang che, ani chu kan sualte inremna a ni a, kraws-ah khenbeh a ni a, keini Out of touch a ni ( suahsualna ), . Out of touch a ni ( dan )→ tih a ni

articles.title: Zawhna leh Chhanna: Kan sualte kan puan chuan
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
1 Joh.

1. Thiam loh chantir

zawt: Kan sualte kan puan chuan → “keini” tih hian pianthar hma a kawk em? A nih loh leh pianthar hnuah?
chhanna: hetah" keini " kalkawng pianthar hma , Isua a hre lo va, a ( lehkhathawn ) Isuan dan hnuaia a awm lai khan chanchin tha thudik chu a hrethiam lo.

zawt: engvangin nge hetah hian". keini "Pianthar hma tihna em ni?"
chhanna: A chhan chu kan pianthar hma khan Isua kan hre lo emaw, Chanchin |ha thurin dik tak kan hrethiam lo va, Dan hnuaia awmte kha Dan bawhchhiat leh dan bawhchhiat hi sual a ni dan hnuaiah kan awm.

2. Dan hnuaia inpuanna

(1) Akana chuan thiam loh a chantir → Josua chuan Akana hnenah, "Ka fapa, ka ngen che u, LALPA, Israelte Pathian chu chawimawi la, a hmaah i sual puang rawh. I thil tih hi min hrilh la, ka lakah thup suh," a ti a Josua.Ya chuan, “LALPA, Israelte Pathian lakah ka sual tak zet a ni (Josua 7:19-26).

Thil chhinchhiah: Akana chuan a thil tihsual chu a inpuang → a sualna finfiahna chu finfiah a ni a, dan angin lungin an deng hlum ta a ni → Mosia dan bawhchhia mi pahnih emaw pathum emaw pawh ni se, zahngaihna an lantir lo va, a thi ta a ni. (Hebrai 10:28)

(2) Lal Saula chuan a thil tihsual chu a inpuang a → 1 Samuela 15:24 Saula chuan Samuela hnenah, “Mipuite ka hlauh a, an aw ka zawm avangin Lalpa thupek leh i thu ka zawm lo.

Note: Thu awih lohna → tih awmzia chu inremna bawhchhiatna a ni ("thuthlung" chu dan a ni) → Thu awih lohna sual chu dawithiamna sual nen a inang a; LALPA thupêk i hnawl avângin Lalpa chuan lal atân a hnar che a ni. ” (1 Samuela 15:23) tih a ni.

(3) Davida chuan a inpuang a →Ka ngawih reng a, ka sualte ka puan loh chuan nilengin ka bengchheng avangin ka ruhte chu a vuai a. ...Ka sualte chu in hnenah ka puang a, ka thiltih sualte chu thup suh. Kei chuan, "LALPA hnenah ka sualte ka puang ang a, nang pawhin ka sualte min ngaidam ang che," ka ti a. (Sam 32:3,5) tih a ni. (4) Daniela chuan a sualte a puang →Ka tawngtai a, ka sualna chu LALPA ka Pathian hnenah ka puang a: “Aw Lalpa, Pathian ropui leh hlauhawm, Lalpa hmangaihtu leh a thupek zawmtute hnena thuthlung leh khawngaihna vawngtu chu kan sual a, kan bawhchhia a ni thil tha lo leh helna kan ti a, I thupekte leh rorelnate ata kan bo ta a,... Israel zawng zawngin i dan an bawhchhia a, an kal bo a, i aw chu an awih lo va, chuvangin ânchhe thu leh thutiamte chu I chhiahhlawh Mosia chu kan chungah a leih a, kan sual avângin Pathian (Daniela 9:4-5,11) .

articles.title: Trivia: Sualah nawmna
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hebrai 11:24-25 Rinnain Mosia a lo puitlin chuan Pharaoa fanu fapa tia koh a duh lo. Hun rei lo tê sual nawmna hlimpui ai chuan Pathian mite nêna hrehawm tuar a duh zâwk ang.


zawt: Sual nawmnate chu engte nge ni?
chhanna: Sual khawvêlah chuan sual nawmna hlimawm hi sual nawmna an ti a.

zawt: Sual nawmna leh Pathian hlimna hlimna hi engtin nge kan thliar hrang ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. Tisa chu sualah hralh a ni tawh

Dan chu thlarau atanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria a, kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh. Reference (Rom 7:14) → Entirnan, Aigupta rama Mosia hi Pharaoa fate fapa a ni a, Aigupta hian khawvel, sual khawvel a entir a ni. Israel mi Mosia a lo puitlin chuan Pathian mi thlan, mi thlan thianghlim a ni tih a hre chiang hle. Pharaoa fate fapa tia koh a duh lo va, Aigupta ram hausakna → Aigupta ram hriatna, zirna, ei leh in leh nawmna zawng zawng te pawh huamin nuam a ti duh lo. Hun eng emaw chen chu sual nawmna hlim taka hlim ai chuan Pathian mite nena tuarpui a thlang zawk ang 40. Midian rama kum 40 zet beram a enkawl hnuah Aigupta Pharaoa fapa leh fanu a nihna a theihnghilh a, Aigupta rama hriatna, zirna leh talent zawng zawng a theihnghilh ta chauh a, Pathianin hruaitu atan a ko a ni Israel fate chu Aigupta ram ata an chhuak ta a ni. Lal Isuan: "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, tupawh naupang ang lo chu Pathian ramah a lut thei lovang," a tih ang khan Pathian chauhvin Mosia hmangin naupang anpuiah a kir leh a naupang chu chak lohna a ni a, khawvel hriatna leh zirnaah a innghat lo va, Pathian finna chauh a rinchhan a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Mosia hi Pharaoa fate fapa a ni a, chu chu sual hnena hralh tisa chu a entîr a, tisa chuan sual Aigupta lal thil neihte leh ei leh in, infiamna leh nawmna zawng zawng hlim taka a hlim lai a entîr a ni. Chûng nawmsakna taksa lama hlimna → chu sual nawmna hlimawm tih a ni!
Chuvang chuan Mosia chuan Pharaoa fate fapa nih a duh lo va, mipuite nen tisaa hrehawm tuar chu a inhuam a → tisaa hrehawm tuartu chuan sual a bansan tawh avangin. Reference (1 Petera Bung 4:1), hei hi i hrethiam em?

2. Pathian atanga lo piangte hi tisa atanga lo piang an ni lo

Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi i ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. Thuhmahruai (Rom 8:9) .
zawt: Engvangin nge Pathian atanga lo piangte hi tisa ta an nih loh?
chhanna: Pathian Thlarau, Pa Thlarau, Krista Thlarau leh Pathian Fapa Thlarau chu “thlarau pakhat” an ni a, chu chu Thlarau Thianghlim a ni a, in thinlungah Pathian Thlarau, Thlarau Thianghlim a cheng a nih chuan! → chu chu Thlarau Thianghlim chu Kristaah a cheng a ni (a taksa pengte kan ni), Krista taksa in nih avângin, in Krista taksa chu Thlarau Thianghlim a nih chuan Krista chu nangmah ah a awm a, (Adama taksa chu kan ta a ni lo) taksa chu sual avangin a thi tawh a , thlarau (Thlarau Thianghlim) erawh chu felnain a nung a ni. (Rom 8:10), hei hi i hrethiam em?

3. Sual nawmna leh Pathian hlimna hlimna

zawt: Sual nawmna leh Pathian hlimna hlimna hi engtin nge kan thliar hrang ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Suala lawmna

1 Tisa chu sualah hralh a ni tawh --Rom 7:14 en rawh
2 Tisa lam ngaihtuah chu thihna a ni --Rom 8:6 en rawh
3 Chaw chu pum a ni a, pum chu chaw a ni a, Pathianin an pahnih hian a tiboral ang. --1 Korinth 6:13 en rawh

Thil chhinchhiah: Tisa kan awm lai khan sualah hralh kan ni tawh → Tisa i zui a, tisa lam i ngaihtuah chuan chu chu thihna a ni, a chhan chu sual man chu thihna a ni. Chaw chu pum a ni a, tisa pum chu ei tur atan a ni → → Tisa lam i ngaihtuah a, engtik lai pawhin i ei tha a, i in tha a, i khel tha a, tisa nawmna i hlim → → sual nawmna i hmang thin! Entirnan, sum lakluhna tura i thawhrim hian i taksa tan i ei tha fo thin a, i taksa tan i inchei tha fo thin a, tha taka chenna tur villa i lei thin a, i taksa hian hetiang nawmna hi nuam a ti a nih chuan sual nawmna i hmang tihna a ni . Infiamna, idol drama, infiamna, zai, hriselna, mawina, zin... leh thil dang tam tak a awm bawk! Adamaah, Adama taksaah, Adama taksa [sual]-ah → [taksa sual] hlimna leh hlimhlawp chu i hlim tihna a ni. Hei hi tisa zui leh tisa thil ngaihsak → sual lawmna a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Pathian atanga kan piang thar hi tisa atanga lo piang a ni lo. Taksa chungchang thil → Chaw leh silhfen i neih phawt chuan i lungawi tur a ni . Thuhmahruai (1 Timothea 6:8) .

(2)Pathian lawmna chu nuam ti takin hmang rawh

3 Lawmthu kan sawi fo thin --Ephesi 5:20

5 Thilpek leh ro hlute chu vânah dah rawh --Matthaia 6:20
Fax channel dawngtu hnathawk 6 → “Tupawh nangmah lo hmuaktu chuan min lo hmuak a;
7 I kraws pu la, Vanram Chanchin |ha hril rawh --Marka 8:34-35-ah a awm. Pathian thu avangin tisaah hrehawm tuarin hrehawm tuar mah ila, kan thlarauah hlimna nasa tak kan la nei a, hei hi Kristaa Pathian hlimna hlimna chu a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan leh a ânchhia lak ata min chhanchhuak ang che;

4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista chauh vawikhat Thisen chhuah hian mihring sual a tifai thin--Hebrai 9:12-14

Krista hian sualte vawi tam tak silfai sela, vawi tam tak a thisen a leih a ngai dawn a ni ;

articles.title: FAQ: An inchhir leh thei lo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
【Pathian Lehkha Thu】Hebrai 6:6 Thurin ata an tlakchhiat chuan simnaah hruai kir leh theih a ni lovang. A chhan chu Pathian Fapa chu an khenbeh thar a, tlang taka mualpho tir an nih vang a ni.


1. Thutak i kalsan chuan

zawt: Eng thu bulte nge kan kalsan ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Sual thurin ata zalen

Krista chu kan sualte avangin (kraws-ah) a thi a--1 Korinth 15:3-4 en rawh
Mi pakhatin mi zawng zawng tan a thih chuan mi zawng zawng an thi vek tihna a ni - 2 Korinth 5:14 en rawh
Thi tawhte chu sual lakah an chhuak ta--Rom 6:7 en rawh

Thil chhinchhiah: Sual thurin ata zalenna→Krista chauh” tan "Mi zawng zawng an thih chuan mi zawng zawng an thi vek a, mitthite chu sual lak ata an chhuak. → Mi zawng zawng an thih chuan mi zawng zawng chu sual lakah an chhuak vek. Amah ringtu chu thiam loh chantir a ni lo." “Sual laka zalenna” ring lote chuan . , thil sual tih chu thutlukna siam a ni tawh. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Johana 3:18 en rawh

(2) Krista inthawina pakhat chuan tihthianghlim tawhte chu chatuan atan a ti famkim a ni

Chumi duhzâwng chuan Isua Krista taksa vawi khat atâna hlanna avângin tihthianghlimin kan awm a, tihthianghlim tawhte chu chatuan famkim, chatuan thiam chantîr, chatuan sual nei lo leh chatuan thianghlima siam an ni. Thuhmahruai (Hebrai 10:10-14) .

(3)Isua thisen chuan kan sual zawng zawng a silfai vek a

Pathian ênga a awm angin ênga kan kal chuan inpawlna kan nei a, a Fapa Isua thisenin sual zawng zawng ata min tlenfai hin. Thuhmahruai (1 Johana 1:7) .

(4) Dan thurin atanga inthiarfihlim

Nimahsela, min phuartu dana kan thih aang khan tunah chuan Dan lak ata kan zalen ta a, chutiang chuan Lalpa rawng kan bawl theih nan, thlarau thar (thlarau: emaw Thlarau Thianghlim tia lehlin) ang zelin kan rawng kan bawl thei ang ritual tih a ni. Thuhmahruai (Rom 7:6) .

(5) Mi upa leh a nungchang thu bulte chu dah bo rawh

Mihring hlui leh a thiltihte chu in sawn hlat a ni (Kolossa 3:9)

(6) Setana khawvel hnuai thim thiltihtheihna ata tlanchhuak

Thim thiltihtheihna ata min chhanchhuak a, a Fapa duh tak ramah min letling ta Reference (Kolossa 1:13)

(7) Thiam chantirtu, thawhleh theihna, piantharna, chhandamna, chatuan nunna nei tura min puitu thurin

Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! A khawngaihna nasa tak ang chuan Isua Krista mitthi zing ata thawhlehna hmangin beiseina nungah min siam thar leh ta Reference (1 Petera 1:3)

2. An inchhir tir leh thei lo.

chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(Hebrai 6:4) Eng chang tawhte, van thilpek tem tawhte leh Thlarau Thianghlim chan ve tawhte chungchângah chuan;

chhanna: Pathian êng leh Chanchin |ha êng→ Thutak thu in hriat aang khan→ Krista chu kan sualte avângin a thi a, phum a ni a, ni thum niah a tho leh a→ 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thim thu bulte leh Hades thiltihtheihna ata chhuah zalen, . 7. A rilru a hah lutuk Chutichuan thiam chantir i nih theih nan, thawhleh i nih theih nan, piantharna i nih theih nan, chhandam i nih theih nan, Thlarau Thianghlim tiam i dawn theih nan, chatuan nunna i neih theih nan! →Chu chu chhandam in nih theihna tur leh van thilpek in tem theihna tur leh Thlarau Thianghlim changtu in nih theihna tur Chanchin Tha chu a ni.

(Hebrai 6:5) Pathian thu ṭha tem tawh leh hun lo la awm tûr thiltihtheihna hretute chuan, .

articles.title: Zawhna leh Chhanna: Naupang ang maia in lo nih loh chuan van ramah i lut ngai lovang
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna, Amen!

Matthaia Bung 18 Châng 3-na Bible hi hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u. “Isua” chuan, “Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, in hawi let a, naupang tê ang maia in awm loh chuan van ramah in lut ngai lo vang.

Vawiin hian kan zawng a, kan inbiak a, kan insem ho bawk "Naupang angin i hawi leh loh chuan van ramah i lut ngai lovang." Tawngtai rawh: "Abba Pa Thianghlim duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e"! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang “kohhran” chuan an kuta thutak thu ziak leh sawi hmangin hnathawktute a tir a, chu chu kan chhandamna leh vanram kan luhna chanchin tha a ni! Thlarau lam thudik kan hriat theih nan leh kan hmuh theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel ang a, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru a hawng zel ang u. Thlarau Thianghlimin naupangte ang taka kir leh tura min hruai vek dan leh vanram chanchin tha kan luh thuruk min hriattir dan hi hrethiam rawh. . Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, ngenna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin a ni! Amen

【Pathian Lehkha Thu】Matthaia 18:1-3 Chumi lai chuan zirtirte chu Isua hnenah an lo kal a, “Van ramah hian tu nge ropui ber?” ti rawh u, in hawi let a, naupang te ang maia in awm loh chuan van ramah in lut ngai lovang.

1. Naupang style

zawt: Naupang style chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Naupang hmel chu a hmel aangin en rawh : Benevolence → Mi zawng zawngin an hmuh hian an ngaina vek a, naupangte hian remna, ngilneihna, zaidamna, sualna nei lo, cuteness, innocence...etc.!
2 Naupang style chu thinlung aṭangin en rawh : Bumna, fel lohna, sualna, sualna, uirena, licentiousness, milem biakna, dawithiamna, tualthah, zu ruih, orgies, etc. a awm lo.
3 Naupang style chu a rinchhan aangin en rawh : I nu leh pate ring reng la, i nu leh pate rinchhan la, nangmah i innghah ngai lo.

2. Naupangte hian dan an nei lo

zawt: Naupangte tan dan a awm em?
chhanna: Naupang tan dan a awm lo.

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuziak angin → Dân chuan thinurna a tithinur si a, Dân awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo. Thuhmahruai (Rom 4:15) .
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan awm lohna hmunah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo → Dan a awm loh avangin bawhchhiatna chu bawhchhiatna anga ngaih a ni lo va, chutiang bawkin nu leh pate pawhin an fate bawhchhiatna an hmuh chuan bawhchhiatna a ni lo.
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Thar Van Pa chuan in bawhchhiatnate chu a hre reng lovang → dan a awm loh avangin! I Pa vâna mi chuan i bawhchhiatnate chu a hre reng lo vang a, Dan tel lo chuan thiamloh a chantir thei lo vang che → “Hei hi chu ni hnua an hnena thuthlung ka siam tur chu a ni, Lalpa chuan a ti: Ka dante chu an thinlungah ka ziak ang a, ka dah lut ang anmahni." Tichuan, "An sualte leh an bawhchhiatnate chu ka hre reng tawh lo vang," a ti a. Tunah chuan heng sualte hi ngaihdam a ni tawh a, sual inthawina dang a ngai tawh lo. Thuhmahruai (Hebrai 10:16-18) .

zawt: Dan chu an thinlungah dah la, dan an nei lo em ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Dan tawpna chu Krista a ni →Rom 10:4 en rawh.
2 Dân chu thil ha entîrna a ni →Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a nih avangin thil awmdan dik tak a ni lo--Hebrai 10:1 en rawh.
3 Dan lem leh a pianzia dik tak chu Krista a ni →Kol. 2:17 en rawh. Chutiang chuan Pathianin an hnênah thuthlung thar a siam a, heti hian a sawi: “Ka dânte chu an thinlungah ka ziak ang a, an chhûngah ka dah ang → chu chu Pathianin [ Krista 】Kan thinlunga ziak, Hla Hla Bung 8:6 Khawngaihin i thinlungah chhinchhiahna ang maiin min dah la, I kutah stamp ang maiin min phur ang che...! Tin, an chhungah a dah ang → Pathianin a duh ang krista nun 】Kan chhungah dah rawh. Hetiang hian Pathianin kan hnena thuthlung thar a siam hi i hrethiam em?

3. Naupangin sual an hre lo

zawt: Engvangin nge naupangte hian sual an hriat loh?
chhanna : Naupangin dan an neih loh vang a ni.

zawt: Dan hnathawh chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Dan hnathawh chu Mite chu sualah thiam loh chantir rawh →Chuvangin Dan thiltih avangin tisa tumah Pathian hmaah thiam changin an awm lo vang, a chhan chu Dan hi miten an sualte an hriat theih nan a siam a ni . Thuhmahruai (Rom 3:20) .

Mite chu an sualte hriattirna dan a ni.Dan chu i sualte pholanna tur a ni. Naupangin Dân an neih loh avângin sual an hre lo.

1 Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo --Rom 4:15 en rawh
2 Dan tel lo chuan sual chu sual a ni lo --Rom 5:13 en rawh
3 Dan tel lo chuan sual chu a thi a ni --Rom 7:8, 9-ah hian kan hmu a

Section hrang hrang " paul "Tiin → Dan tel lovin ka nung a; mahse Dan thupek a lo thlen chuan sual a lo nung leh ta → "Sual man chu thihna a ni," tiin ka thi ta a ni. Dan i duh chuan i duh em?" → sualah nung la, kal la, " suahsualna "I dam chuan → i thi ang. I hrethiam em?"
Chuvangin, naupangin dan a neih loh chuan bawhchhiatna a nei lova, naupangin dan a neih loh chuan, sual chu sualah ngaih a ni lo va, naupangin dan a neih loh chuan sual a hre lo va, Dan pawh a hre lo; naupang thiam loh chantir theih a ni lo. Professional lawyer hnenah kal la, danin naupang a thiam loh chantir theih leh theih loh zawt rawh. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

4. Piantharna

zawt: Engtin nge naupang form-ah hian ka kir leh theih ang?
Chhanna: Piantharna!

zawt: Engvangin nge pianthar tur?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Pi leh pute Adama khan mihring a siam a
A chhan chu Pathian Jehova'n "Adama" chu vaivut aṭangin a siam a, Adama chu mi puitling " piang ". Tin, Adama thlahte kan ni a, kan taksa taksa hi Adama atanga lo chhuak a ni. According to " siam a ni "Kan taksa hi leivut → paltlang lo tih sawi". piang "Puitling tan material a ni". vaivut ". (Hei hi Adama leh Evi te inneihna leh pian chungchang ngaihdan atanga siam a ni lo va, thil siam thil "leivut" atanga siam a ni zawk). Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Genesis 2:7 en rawh.

(2) Adama taksa chu sualah hralh a ni tawh

1 sual chu Adama zarah chauh khawvelah a lut a
Mi pakhat zarah sual chu khawvelah a lut a, sual avanga thihna a lo thleng ang bawkin, mi zawng zawngin thil an tihsual avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. Thuhmahruai (Rom 5:12) .
2 Kan tisa chu sualah hralh a ni ta
Dan chu thlarau atanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria a, kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh. Thuhmahruai (Rom 7:14) .
3 Sual man chu thihna a ni
Sual man chu thihna a ni si a; Reference (Rom 6:23) → Chuvangin Adamaah chuan mi zawng zawng an thi vek a ni.

zawt: Engtin nge naupang ang maiin kan pianthar theih ang?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang --Johana 3:5
(2) Chanchin |ha thu dik aanga lo piang --1 Korinth 4:15 leh Jakoba 1:18
(3) Pathian hnen atangin --Johana 1:12-13

Thil chhinchhiah: A hmaa siam "Adama" kha lei lam a ni → mi lian tak anga siam a ni a; tawpna a ni tan" Adam "Isua chu thlarau lamah a piang a, naupang a ni! Thu, Pathian leh Thlarau lo ni ta naupang a ni →→【 Naupang 】Dan awm lo, sual hriatna nei lo, sual lo →→Adama hnuhnung ber Isua chu sual a nei lo” Thil sual tih chu hre suh ” → Pathianin sual nei lovin a siam ( Thiam loh chantir lo: a thuziak bulpui chu sualna hriat lohna a ni ), amahah chuan Pathian felna kan nih theih nan kan tan sual a lo ni ta a ni. Reference (2 Korinth 5:21)→→Chuvangin keini 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a tui leh Thlarauva piang, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a chanchin ha thutak aanga lo piang, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian atanga piang →→ chu Adama naupang hnuhnung ber → → dan nei lo, sual hre lo, sual nei lo → → naupang ang a ni!

Hei hi Lal Isuan a sawi chu a ni: “Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, in hawi let a, naupang te ang in nih loh chuan van ramah in lut ngai lo vang→→ Naupang lem anga inlet leh tumna hmasa ber chu 【 tih a ni. piantharna 】→→Tui leh Thlarau Thianghlim atanga lo piang, chanchin tha thu dik atanga lo piang emaw, Pathian atanga lo piang emaw chu van ramah an lut thei a ni. Reference (Matthaia 18:3), hei hi i hrethiam em?

chuvangin" Lalpa chuan a ti a "He naupang te ang maia inngaitlawm tu pawh". Chanchin tha ring rawh "Van ramah chuan a ropui ber a ni. Ka hming avanga hetiang naupang lo hmuaktu tu pawh". Pathian hrin fate, Pathian chhiahhlawh, Pathian hnathawk”, Min dawngsawng tur chauh a ni . "Reference (Matthaia 18:4-5) ."

articles.title: Zawhna leh Chhanna: Heng mite hi rinnain an thi vek a, thutiam an dawng lo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Hebrai 11:13, 39-40 Heng zawng zawng hi rinnain an thi a, thutiamte chu hmu lovin, hla tak atangin an hmu a, lawm takin an lo hmuak a, khawvela mikhual an nih thu an inpuang a, It’s a sojourn.

... Chûng zawng zawngte chu rinna avânga finfiahna ṭha hmu tawh, mahse thutiam la dawng lote an ni a, Pathianin thil ṭha zâwk min buatsaihsak avângin, kan hnêna an dawn loh chuan an famkim thei lo vang.

1. Hmanlai mite chuan he lehkha atang hian finfiahna mak tak tak an dawng a

1 Abela rinna

Rinnain Abela chuan Kaina thilhlan aia tha zawk Pathian hnenah inthawina a hlan a, chutiang chuan thiamchantir a nihna hriatpuina, Pathianin a thilpek a hriattirna chu a dawng ta a ni. Thi mah se, he rinna avang hian thu a la sawi reng a ni. (Hebrai 11:4)
zawt: Abela chu taksa lamah a thi a, mahse a la tawng reng em? Eng thil nge sawi?
chhanna: Thlarau chuan thu a sawi a, Abela thlarau a ni!
zawt: Engtin nge Abela thlarau hian thu a sawi?
chhanna: LALPA chuan, "Eng nge i tih (Kaina)? I unaupa (Abela) thisen chuan lei aangin ka hnenah a au a. Reference (Genesis 4:10)
zawt: Thisen Lei atang hian aw pakhat hian Pathian hnenah heti hian a au a, " Thisen "Aw thusawi pawh a awm dawn em ni?"
chhanna: " " Thisen "Chu chu nunna a ni, thisenah nunna a awm si a → Leviticus 17:11 Thil nungte nunna chu thisenah a awm si a. Maicham-a in nunna inremna siam turin he thisen hi ka pe che u a ni; thisenah hian a awm si a." Nun, chuvangin sualte a inrem thei a ni.
zawt: " " Thisen "A chhungah hian nunna a awm → He "nunna" hi thlarau a ni em?
chhanna: mi" Thisen "A chhungah hian nunna a awm a ni," thisen nunna "Mihring thlarau a ni →". Thisen "Aw thu sawi a awm a, chu chu". thlarau "Thu sawi! Incorporeal". thlarau "I sawi thei bawk!"
zawt: " " thlarau "Speak → Mihring beng hian a hre thei em?"
chhanna: chauh" thlarau "Thu sawiin, tumahin an hre thei lo! Entirnan, i thinlungah ngawi rengin i sawi chuan: "Hello" → hei hi " nunna thlarau "Tawi rawh! Mahse hei". thlarau "Thu sawi lai hian a ri chu tisa hmuiah a kal tlang lo a nih chuan mihring beng hian a hre thei lo va, " nunna thlarau "Lei leh hmui hmanga thawm a chhuah chuan mihring bengin a hre thei a;
Entirna dang chu mi tam takin " taksa atanga chhuak "argument, engtikah nge". thlarau "Taksa chhuahsan," . thlarau "I taksa ngei pawh i hmu thei. Mahse mihring taksa chu." mit saruak A hmu thei lo". thlarau ", kut hmanga khawih theih loh". thlarau ", " nen hman theih a ni lo. thlarau "Inbiakpawhna leh hre thei lo". thlarau "Speaking voice. A chhan chu." Pathian chu thlarau a ni →→Chuvangin Abel-a “ thlarau "Thu aw chu kan taksa beng hriat theih loh leh kan mit saruak hmuh theih loh a ni."

Pathian awm ring lote erawh chuan mihringte hian thlarau an nei tih an ring lo va, heng zawng zawng hi mihring taksaa hriatna leh duhna zawng zawng a ni tih an ring tlat a, he hriatna hi a bo chuan taksa chu a thi a, vaivut-ah a lo let leh a, mihringte chu a zo vek tawh a ni thlarau lam thil.Chutiang bawk. anihna takah chuan" thlarau "Taksa chhuahsan a, mahni chauha awm thei te pawhin an tawng thei bawk! Hei hi i hrethiam em? Okay! About". thlarau "Chu chu share nan a ni. Nakinah ka share leh ang【 thlarau chhandamna ] A chungchang chipchiar takin sawi ila.
(1) Nunna emaw, thlarau emaw →→Matthaia 16:25 en rawh Tupawh mahni nunna chhanhim duh chuan ( Nunna: emaw thlarau emaw ;
(2) Thlarau chuan dikna a sawi chhuak thin →→Thupuan 6:9-10 en rawh, chhinchhiahna pangana a han hawn chuan, maicham hnuaiah Pathian thu leh hriatpuina avanga thahte ka hmu a. Soul, a au chhuak ringawt "Aw Lalpa, thianghlim leh dik tak, leia chengte chunga rorelsak a, kan thisen phuba i lak hma chu eng chen nge a la ngai ang?"

2 Enoka Rinna

Rinnain Enoka chu thihna a hmuh loh nan hruai bo a ni a, tumahin an hmu thei lo, a chhan chu Pathianin a kaitho tawh a, nimahsela hruai a nih hma chuan Pathianin a lawm tih finfiahna chiang tak a dawng tawh a ni. Thuhmahruai (Hebrai 11:5) .

3 Nova rinna chu

Rinnain Nova chu Pathianin a la hmuh loh thilte a vaukhân a, mak ti takin a che a, a chhûngte chhandam an nih theih nân lawng a buatsaih a. Chutichuan, chu thlahte chu thiam loh a chantir a, amah ngei chu rinna atanga lo chhuak felna ro luahtu a lo ni ta a ni. (Hebrai 11:7)

4 Abrahama te, Isaka te, Jakoba te Rinna

Rinnain Abrahama chuan thupek a zawm a, koh a nih huna a rochun tur hmunah a chhuak ta a. Rinnain thutiam ramah chuan mikhual angin a awm a, ram dangah ang bawkin puan inah a awm a, chu thutiam pakhata tel ve bawk Isaaka leh Jakoba ang bawkin. (Hebrai 11:8-9)

2. Heng mite hi rinnain an thi vek a, an tiam chu an dawng lo.

Thil chhinchhiah: Abrahama ang bawkin Pathian chuan a thlahte chu vâna arsi ang maia tam leh tuipui kama hnim hring ang maia chhiar sen loh an nih tur thu a tiam a → mahse a dam lai chuan a thlahte chu a hmu lo va, arsi ang maiin an thi ta a ni van. →→Sari, Mosia, Josefa, Gideona, Baraka, Samsona, Jephtha, Davida, Samuela leh zâwlneite rinna... Mi dangte chuan nuihzatna te, vuakna te, chain inkhai te, lung ina khung te leh fiahna dangte an tuar a, lungin an deng hlum a, an thi ta a, thlem an ni a, khandaihin an that a, beram leh kel vun vuah an vak kual a, retheihna te, hrehawmna te, leh hrehawmna te an tuar Harms, thlalerah te, tlangah te, lungpuiah te, leihnuai puk a vakvai te hi khawvel tana tling lo mi an ni. →→
Heng mite hian khawvela Pathian thutiam hi ring mah se, hla tak atangin an hmu a, lawm takin an lo hmuak a, khawvela mikhual leh mikhual an nihzia an pawm bawk. Chutiang thu sawitute chuan Vanrama chenna in hmuh an duhzia an tilang a ni khandaih.Beram leh kel vun ha chunga vakvai, retheihna tuar , hrehawmna, tuarna, thlaler, tlang, puk, leh lei hnuaia puk → Khawvela mi an nih loh avang leh khawvela awm tlak an nih loh avangin khawvelah engmah hmu lovin an thi → Heng mite hi chhandam an ni vek Rinnaa thi tawh chuan a tiam chu a hmu lo. Thuhmahruai (Hebrai 11:13-38) .

3. Chutichuan kan hnena an dawn loh chuan an famkim thei lo

Chûng mite chuan rinna avângin finfiahna ṭha an dawng vek a, mahse, Pathianin thil ṭha zâwk min buatsaihsak avângin, keimahni nêna an dawn loh chuan an famkim thei lo vang. (Hebrai 11:39-40)

zawt: Pathianin kan tan thil tha zawk eng nge a buatsaih?
chhanna: Isua krista chhandamna →→ Pathianin a Fapa mal neih chhun Isua Krista tisa lo chang → Kraws-a khenbeh a ni a, kan sualte avângin a thi a, phum a ni a, a ni thum niah a tho leh ta a ni. →→ Thiam chang ila, piang thar ila, tho leh ila, chhandam i ni ang u, Krista taksa i chang ang u, Krista nunna i chang ang u, Pathian fapa nihna i chang ang u, Thlarau Thianghlim tiam i chang ang u, chatuan nunna i chang ang u! Pathianin fapa nihna min pe mai ni lovin, ropuina, lawmman, lallukhum, leh taksa mawi zawk min petu thawhlehna min pe bawk! Amen.
Thuthlung Hlui hun laia hmanlai mite kha rinna neiin an thi vek a, mahse an thih laia Pathianin a tiam Thlarau Thianghlim chu an chang lo! Thlarau Thianghlim tel lo chuan Pathian fapa nihna a awm lo. A chhan chu chutih lai chuan Isua Krista tlanna hnathawh 】La zo lo → Thuthlung Hluiah chuan mi pakhatah Thlarau Thianghlim a che thei a nih pawhin Lal Saula hi entawn tlak a ni. Mihring hlui uain vun taksaah chuan Thlarau Thianghlim a cheng lo va, Krista uain vun taksa tharah chuan Thlarau Thianghlim a cheng a, Krista taksa chu Thlarau Thianghlim biak in a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Kan thlarau nun hausak zawk nan hla tak atangin van atanga ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thudik tak ka hrilh a che u, buh chi khat leia a tla a, a thih loh chuan buh chi khat chauh a awm a, mahse a thih chuan buh chi tam tak a chhuah thin. Tupawh a nun hmangaihtu chuan a hloh ang; Johana 12:24-25-ah a awm

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mahni thar chu ha la, zawi zawiin siam thar leh rawh → Mahni thar chu bun rawh. Mi thar chu a Siamtu anpuiah hriatnaah siam thar leh a ni. Thuhmahruai (Kolossa 3:10) .
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mihring hlui pawn lam taksa chu tihchhiat a ni a, mihring thar chhungril mihring erawh chu "Thlarau Thianghlim" hmangin ni tin tihthar leh zel a ni → Chuvang chuan kan lungngai lo. Pawn lam taksa chu tihchhiat ni mah se, chhungril taksa chu ni tin a siam thar zel a ni. Thuhmahruai (2 Korinth 4:16) .
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathianin thil tha ti turin min buatsaih → A kutchhuak kan ni si a, thil tha ti turin Krista Isuaah chuan siam kan ni a, chu chu thil tha ti tura Pathianin a buatsaih lawk a ni. (Ephesi 2:10), Pathianin Isua Krista kohhranah “hnathawh tha zawng zawng” min buatsaih sak→ 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Thu hriat" chu hriatna lamah a tharin zawi zawiin, thlarau hnute tui thianghlim in leh thlarau lam chaw ei a, mi puitlingah a lo thang lian a, Krista dinhmunah a lo thang lian a; 2" a ni. "Inbuatsaih" Thlarau Thianghlim kan chungah ti rawh tihthar leh rawh hna" xingdao tia koh a ni ”. hei xingdao tia koh a ni ! Thlarau Thianghlimin chanchin tha min hrilh a, chhandamna chanchin→ xingdao tia koh a ni ! Mite chhandamtu Chanchin |ha hril tih awmzia chu thil ha chi hrang hrang tih a ni i thil tih hate chu an hre reng lo vang, chûng thilte chu an tân a ni, tisain a hlawh ang, chûng thilte chu i tih chuan chatuan nunna i nei lo vang. Chanchin |ha anpui te, chanchin ha hril te, chanchin ha atana hman te chauh hi thil ha tihna a ni . Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

(2) Mahni thar inbel la, Krista inbel rawh

I rilruah siam thar leh la, Pathian anpui anga felna leh thianghlimna dik taka siam, mahni thar chu inbel rawh. (Ephesi 4:23-24) tih a ni.
Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. Kristaa baptisma chang tawh zawng zawngte chuan Krista in inthuam a. (Galatia 3:26-27) tih a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah: Krista Isua rinna avanga Pathian fate in ni vek a, Kristaah baptisma in chang a, chu chu piantharna thar a ni Krista thawhleh taksa chu inthuam rawh u. "Thlarau Thianghlim" siam tharna hmangin, mihring thar chuan "a thlak danglam ang che". Mi thar a ni "A "rilru" chu." Thlak Pakhat thar→

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Adama ah a awm a ni". Thlak "Kristaah chuan, ."

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Misual a ni ta a ni". Thlak "Mi fel takin awm rawh, ."

3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan chibai buknaah chuan " Thlak "Khawngaihna malsawmnaah chuan,

4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A bul tanna chu Thuthlung Hlui " Thlak "Thuthlung Tharah chuan,

5. A rilru a hah lutuk Ka nu leh pa hian " Thlak "Pathian atanga piang, ."

6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Setana thiltihtheihna thim hnuaiah chuan " Thlak "Pathian êng ramah chuan, ".

7. A rilru a hah lutuk A bawlhhlawh leh bawlhhlawh a lo ni ta a ni” Thlak "Felna leh thianghlimnaah hian thutak a awm. Amen!

"Rilru" Thlak A thar, Pathian duhzawng chu i ta a ni” Thinlung ",nangmah lehkhathawn" chhia leh ṭha hriatna "Isua thisen zarah". vawikhat "Clean, i inthiam lo tawh lo ang! A lo ni ta". misual "Khawiah nge piang thar kei chu! Tunah chuan ka awm ta". mi fel ", thutak felna leh thianghlimna! Chu chu a dik em? Mi thar hian sual a nei em? Sual a nei lo; sual a ti thei lo em ni? A sual thei lo → Sual titute chuan Amah an hre lo, "Krista", chhandamna pawh an hrethiam lo Krista. Pathian atanga lo piangte chuan Sual nei lote → Piantharna an awm em? rul "Piang, Diabola laka piangte hi Diabola fate an ni. Chiang takin i hrethiam em? A danglamna i hre thei em? Reference (1 Johana 3:6-10)

(3) I nungchang hluiah khan putar kha dah bo rawh

Krista chanchin i zir hian hetiang hi a ni lo. A thu i hriat a, a zirtirna i dawng a, a thutak i zir a nih chuan i nihna hlui, i nihna hlui, a duhzawng bumna avanga tichhe mek chu i paih bo tur a ni (Ephesi Bung 4, chang 22).

zawt: Isua kan rin hian putar leh a nungchangte chu kan dah bo tawh lo em ni? Engvangin nge hetah hian a sawi (i thil tih dan hlui kha dah bo rawh?) Kolossa 3:9
chhanna: Krista chanchin i zir a, a thu i hria a, a zirtirna i dawng a, a thutak pawh i zir bawk → Thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin i hriat a, Krista i rin lai khan thutiam i dawng ta a ni ". Thlarau Thianghlim " chu "piantharna" chhinchhiahna a ni a, mihring thar piang thar, . thlarau mihring Chu chu thlarau mi, van mite tihna a ni". a ni lo "Lei mihring hlui leh putar". misual "Tirhkohte→Chuvangin Isua Krista in rin tawh avangin," diam "Putar leh a nungchang hlui kha dah bo rawh; dah bo mai rawh →". tawnhriat "I nungchang hlui (entir nan, hmeichhe naupai, a pum chhungah nun thar a nei em - naute? Naute hian nu pum a chhuahsan tur em ni, nu pum atanga inthenna a tawng tur em ni, a piang tur em ni) a ti grow up?), you must Hei hi i nungchang hluiah chuan putar chu dah bo tih awmzia chu a ni.

zawt: Hmanlai khan putar hian eng nungchang nge a neih?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1Putar tisa châknate

Tisa thiltih chu a chiang hle: uirena, bawlhhlawhna, bawlhhlawhna, milem biakna, dawithiamna, huatna, inhnialna, inhuatna, thinrimna, pawl hrang hrang, inhnialna, thurin dik lo, leh inhuatna , zu ruih, lawmna, etc.. Ka lo hrilh tawh che u a, tunah pawh hetiang thil titute hian Pathian ram an luah dawn lo tih ka hrilh che u a ni. (Galatia 5:19-21) tih a ni.

2 Tisa châknate inngaihtlâwmna

Chutah chuan he khawvêl kalphung ang zêlin, boruak thiltihtheihna lalber, tûna thuâwih lohna fate zînga thawktu thlarau thu âwih chungin i kal a ni. Chung zingah chuan kan awm vek a, tisa châknate chu kan inhlim a, tisa leh thinlung duhzâwngte kan zui a, kan pianphungah chuan mi zawng zawng ang bawkin thinurna fa kan ni. (Ephesi 2:2-3) tih a ni.

zawt: Engtin nge i nungchang hluiah khan putar chu i tihkhawtlai?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Kan mihring hlui kha Krista nen khenbehin, thihna taksa ata inthen a ni

(Paula sawi angin) Ka va hrehawm tak em! He thihna taksa lakah hian tuin nge min chhanchhuak thei ang? Pathian hnenah lawmthu awm rawh se, kan Lalpa Isua Krista zarah kan tlanchhuak thei a ni. Hetiang aang hian ka thinlungin Pathian dan ka zawm a, ka tisa erawh chuan sual dan a zawm thung. Thuhmahruai (Rom 7:24-25) .

2 Baptisma hmanga a thihnaah Krista nena inzawmkhawma mihring hlui chu paih bo

Chutichuan, Krista chu Pa ropuina avanga mitthi zing ata kaihthawh a nih ang khan, nunna thara kan len theihna turin, thihnaa baptisma changin a hnenah phum kan ni. Thuhmahruai (Rom 6:4) .

3 Krista chuan tisa sual nihna chu paih bovin a serh a tansak che u a ni

Amahah chuan kut tel lova serhtan in ni a, Krista serhtan avanga tisa sual nihna chu paih bo in ni. Baptisma changin a hnenah phum in ni a, chutah chuan mitthi zing ata kaihthawhtu Pathian hnathawh rinna avangin a kaihthawhpui bawk a ni. (Kolossa 2:11-12) tih a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah: Rinna leh baptisma hian Krista nen a inpumkhat tir che→ 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thihna pianzia chu Krista nen a inzawm khawm a, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista thihnaah chuan, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Putar chu phum la, putar leh a nungchangte chu dah bo rawh.
Nangni pahnih hian " . lehkhathawn "Krista". baptisma a chang "Thihnaah kal ula, thihna angin a hnenah inpumkhat rawh u, tisa sual nihna serhtanna avanga serhtan in nih avangin a thawhlehna angah pawh amah nen inzawm ula→." Hei hian a hnuaia effect hi a siam ang : 1.1.

(1) . Isua'. boral Activate in our old man → "Mi upa taksa pawn lam chu a chhe vek a, pawn lam chu a chhe vek a, tar chu mahni hmasial duhna bumna avangin zawi zawiin a chhe ta a ni.
(2) . Isua'. piang Kan nihna thara inpuanna → "Chuvangin thinlung kan bo lo. Pawn lamah chuan boral ni mah ila, chhungril lamah chuan ni tin tihthar zel kan ni. Chhungril lamah eng nge inpuan? Isua, Pa chu keimahniah a awm a ni." Pathian chu kan thinlungah a awm → Thlarau Thianghlim siam tharna hmangin kan thinlungah a awm a ni bawnghnute a pe a, thlarau lam chaw a ei a, mi puitlingah a lo thang lian a, zawi zawiin a lo thang lian a, Krista san zawngin a khat a, hmangaihnain a insiam tha a, nunna tam zawk a nei bawk a ni.

Chuvang chuan Krista thurin bul tanna lam kan bansan → kan nihna hlui chu kalsanin, kan nihna thar kan inbel a, nungchangah kan nun hlui hi kalsanin, Kristaah leh Isua Krista Kohhran hmangaihnaah kan insiam a, kan lo thanglian zel tur a ni . Amen!

A THA E! Vawiin hian hetah hian kan zirchiang a, kan inpawlkhawm a, kan insem a, a lo awm turah hian i tel ve ang u: Krista Thurin chhuahsan tanna, Lecture 6

Gospel transcript sharing, Pathian Thlarau atanga infuih tharna, Isua Krista Hnathawktute, Unaupa Wang*Yun, Unaunu Liu, Unaunu Zheng, Unaupa Cen leh thawhpui dangte chuan Isua Krista Kohhran chanchin tha hnathawh hi an thlawp a, an thawk ho bawk. Isua Krista chanchin tha, mite chhandamna, chawimawina leh an taksa tlanna chantirtu chanchin tha an hril thin! Amen, an hmingte chu nunna buah a inziak a ni! Lalpa hriatrengna. Amen!

articles.title: Krista Thurin kalsan tanna (Lecture 4)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa unau zawng zawngte tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Bible-a Kolossa bung 3 châng 9-na hi han en ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Dawt in inhnek suh u;

Vawiin hian kan zir chhunzawm zel ang a, kan fellowship ang a, " Krista Thurin bul tanna kalsan "Aih. 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! "Hmeichhe nungchang" kohhran chuan hnathawktute a tir chhuak thin - an kuta an ziak leh sawi thin thutak hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna leh ropuina chanchin tha a ni. Chaw ei tur hi hla tak atangin van atanga phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min pe chhuak thin a, chutiang chuan kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk ang a, ni tin a thar zel ang! Amen. Thlarau lam thutakte kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan leh Krista kalsan tur thurin bul kan hriatthiam theih nan Lal Isua’n kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel a, Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru a hawng zel theih nan tawngtai ila: Mihring hlui kalsan dan hre la, mi thar inthuam la, tum lam pan chuan tlan rawh .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

(1) Putar chu i dah bo ta a ni

Kolossa 3:9 Dawt in indawt suh u, mihring hlui leh a thiltihte chu in thlahthlam si a.

zawt: Engtik lai khan nge kan awm". diam “Putar leh a nungchang hlui kha dah bo rawh?
chhanna: Piantharna! Isua Krista thihna ata a thawhleh khan kan piang thar leh ta a, mihring hlui leh a nungchangte chu a dah bo ta a ni - thutak thu i hriat a, Krista chu a tho leh tih i hriatthiam hunah thi tawh, chu chu in chhandamna chanchin tha, Krista rinna leh thutiam i dawnna chu a ni [ . Thlarau Thianghlim 】Seal atan→Thlarau Thianghlim chu "piantharna" finfiahna leh Van Pa rochan dawnna finfiahna a ni. Thlarau Thianghlim atanga lo piang, chanchin tha thutak atanga lo piang, Pathian atanga lo piang i ni! Amen. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? →Thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin i hriat a, Krista i rin khan amahah chuan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahin i awm a. (Ephesi 1:13) tih a ni.

1 Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang
Isuan, “Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, mi chu tui leh Thlarau atanga piang a nih loh chuan Pathian ramah a lut thei lovang (Johana 3:5).
zawt: Tui leh Thlarau atanga piang tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: “Tui” chu tui nung, nunna tuihna tui, vana tui nung, chatuan nunna thlenga luang chhuak tui nung luite → Isua Krista pum atanga - refer to (Johana 7:38-39 leh Thupuan 21:6;
" " Thlarau Thianghlim "Pa Thlarau, Isua Thlarau, Thutak Thlarau → Nimahsela, Pa hnen atanga ka tirh tur, Pa hnen atanga ka tirh tur, Pa hnen atanga lo chhuak thutak Thlarau, tanpuitu a lo kal hunah chuan ka chanchin a hriattir ang. Reference (Gospel." of Johana 15:26), i hrethiam em?

2 Chanchin |ha thutak aanga piang

Nangni Krista chanchin zirtute hian zirtirtu sang sawm in nei thei a, pa erawh chu in nei tlem hle mai, Krista Isuaa Chanchin Tha zarah ka hrinsak che u a ni. (1 Korinth 4:15) tih a ni.

zawt: Chanchin |hain min hring a ni! Hei hian eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Paula sawi ang khan! Chanchin tha Krista Isuaah ka hrin che u a; Chanchin |ha "Ka hrin che → Chanchin tha chu eng nge ni?" Chanchin |ha ” Paula’n a tih ang khan: Kei pawhin in hnena ka hlan chhawn hi: A hmasa berah chuan Krista chu Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin a thi a, phum a ni a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a ni thum niah kaihthawh a ni (Kol. 1 Korinth 15:3-4) kan hmu a.
zawt: Thu dik takin min hrin tih hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: A duh dan ang zelin a thil siam zawng zawng rah hmasa ber ang kan nih theih nan thutak thuin min hring a ni. (Jakoba 1:18), .
"Thu dik" → A tir lamah chuan Thu a awm a, chu chu Pathian a ni thu chu tisaah a chang a, chu chu Pathianin tisa a siam a ni → A hming chu Isua a ni! Isuan: "Kei hi kawng leh thutak leh nunna ka ni" a ti - Reference (Johana 14:6), Isua chu thutak leh kawng dik a ni → Pa Pathian chu a duh danin "Isua Krista" hmangin thihna ata a tho leh a duhdan
piang Keini tan chuan chanchin tha thutak piang Kan hmu ta! Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

3 Pathian atanga piang

Amah chang apiangte hnenah Pathian fa nih theihna thuneihna a pe a, a hming ringtute hnenah. Chungte chu thisen atanga piang lo, châkna aanga piang ni lo, mihring duhzâwnga piang ni lo, Pathian laka piangte an ni. (Johana 1:12-13) tih a ni.
zawt: Engtin nge Isua kan lo dawnsawn ang?
chhanna: Ka tisa eia ka thisen intu chu keimahah a awm reng a, kei pawh amahah a awm reng a ni. (Johana 6:56) →Isua hi Pathian a ni em? Awle! "Pathian" hi thlarau a ni! Isua hi Thlarauva piang a ni em? Awle! Isua kha thlarau lam mi a ni em? Awle! Lalpa Zanriah kan ei hian Lalpa thlarau taksa leh thlarau thisen kan ei a, kan in → Isua “kan dawng” a, a member kan ni a, a dik em? Awle! Pathian chu Thlarau a ni → Isua dawngtu chu: 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a tui leh Thlarauva piang, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a chanchin ha thutak aanga lo piang, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian atanga lo piang! Amen.
hei" piantharna "Mi thar hi Adama atanga leilung a siam a ni lo va, kan nu leh pa thisen atanga lo piang a ni lo, duhthusam a ni lo, mihring duhzawng a ni lo, Pathian atanga lo piang a ni. "Pathian" chu thlarau a ni → keini Pathian atanga piangte hi kan ni." ani " thlarau mihring ", he kei thar hi". thlarau mihring "Thlarau taksa →" thlarau "Isua Thlarau a ni," thlarau "Isua thlarau a ni," . taksa "Isua taksa a ni → Kristaa awm reng a ni a, Krista nen Pathianah leh kan thinlungah a inthup a ni. Krista a lo lan hunah, he mahni thar hi". thlarau mihring ” Krista nen ropui takin an inlar a, hei hi i hrethiam em?

(2) Pathian Thlarau nangmahah a awm chuan tisa mi i ni lo vang

zawt: Pathian Thlarau tih awmzia chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pathian Thlarau chu Pa Thlarau, Isua Thlarau leh Thutak Thlarau Thianghlim a ni! Thuhmahruai (Galatia 4:6) .
zawt: Pathian Thlarau, “Thlarau Thianghlim” chu kan thinlunga a cheng chu eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlim chu kan thinlungah "a cheng" → chu chu "piangthar" kan ni tihna a ni. 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a tui leh Thlarauva piang, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a chanchin ha thutak aanga lo piang, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian atanga lo piang.
zawt: Thlarau Thianghlim hi kan tisaah hian “a awm” lo em ni?
chhanna: Thlarau Thianghlim chu kan tisaah a nung lo vang Kan tisa hi Adama aanga lo chhuak a ni a, nu leh pate aanga lo piang a ni a, pawn lam taksa chu boral leh chhe thei a ni uain thar chu a chhungah a awm thei lo.
chuvangin" Thlarau Thianghlim "Uain bawm hluiah, tisa chhe theiah a nung lo → putar taksa "tisa" chu sual vangin a boral a, a boral a, mahse thlarau "chu chu kan thinlunga cheng Thlarau Thianghlim" chu rinna avanga thiam changin a nung zawk →." Krista In thinlungah chuan in taksa chu sual avângin a thi tawh a, in thlarau erawh chu felna avângin a nung a ni (Rom 8:10). Thlarau Thianghlim "Kan tisa hmuh theihah hian a awm lo va, Pathian Thlarau chu nangmahniah a cheng a, nangmahni piangtharte hi". thlarau mihring "Tisa lam ni lovin, Thlarau lam a ni zawk. Hei hi i hrethiam em?"

zawt: Isua’n tisa leh thisen taksa a nei lo em ni? Taksa taksa pawh a nei em? Mahse Thlarau Thianghlim chu amahah a nung thei tlat!
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak
1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua hi nula thianghlim Mari hnen atanga lo piang a ni a, keini hi Adama atanga lo piang, nu leh pa inpumkhatna atanga lo piang leh mipa thlah kan ni
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua chu van atangin a lo chhuk a, Thlarau Thianghlimin a lo piang chu Thlarau mi a ni.
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua chu Thu tisa a siam a ni a, Pathianin tisaah a siam a, Thlarau tisaah a siam a, a tisa pawh hi thlarau lam a ni a, keini hi hmeichhia aanga piang, duhâmna, mihring duhzâwng, thisen aanga piang kan ni a, lei lam leh pianpui kan ni → So , that which is born tisa chu tisa a ni a; Thuhmahruai (Johana 3:6) .

Pathian chhungkuaa unau zawng zawngte tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Rinna chungah rinna, khawngaihna chungah khawngaihna, chakna chungah chakna, ropuina chungah ropuina i tipung zel ang u. .

(1) Khawvelte hi Pathian thu hmanga siam a ni

Pathian chhungkuaa unau zawng zawngte tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Bible, Johana Bung 1, châng 17-na hi han hawi ila: Dan chu Mosia zâra pêk a ni a, khawngaihna leh thutak chu Isua Krista zârah a lo thleng a ni .

Vawiin hian kan zir chhunzawm zel ang a, kan fellowship ang a, " Krista Thurin bul tanna kalsan "Aih. 6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! "Hmeichhe nungchang" kohhran chuan hnathawktute a tir chhuak thin - an kuta an ziak leh sawi thin thutak hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna leh ropuina chanchin tha a ni. Chaw chu hla tak atangin vanah an rawn keng a, mi thar, thlarau mi, thlarau mi min nih theih nan a hun takah min supply a ni! Nitin mi thar nih zel! Amen. Thlarau lam thutakte kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan leh Krista kalsan tur thurin bul kan hriatthiam theih nan Lal Isua’n kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel a, Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru a hawng zel theih nan tawngtai ila: Thuthlung Hlui chhuahsan leh Thuthlung Thara luh ;

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

(1) Thuthlung Hlui

1 Adama Dân

Lalpa Pathian chuan, "Huana thing rah chu a thlawnin i ei thei a, a chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah erawh chu i ei tur a ni lo, a rah i ei ni chuan i thi ngei ang" (Genesis). 2 Bung 16) -17 knots) a ni.

2 Mosia Dân

Sinai tlâng (Horeb tlâng) Pathianin Israel fate hnênah thuthlung a siam a
Mosia chuan Israel fate zawng zawng chu a ko khawm a, an hnenah, "Aw Israelte u, vawiina dan leh rorelna ka hrilh che u hi lo ngaithla teh u, chu chu in zir theih nan leh in zawm theih nan. Lalpa kan Pathianin Horeb tlangah thuthlung min siamsak a," a ti a .

dan 2 siam a ni : Danin a ruat dan, halral thilhlan, buhfai thilhlan, remna thilhlan, sual thawina, sual thawina thilhlan, heave thilhlan leh wave offering...etc.! Leviticus leh Number 31:21 en rawh
3 Dan leh hrai: Dan leh thupek, hmun thianghlim sak dan tur leh thuthlung bawm, showbread dawhkan, khawnvar, puanzar leh puanzar, maicham, puithiam puan, etc. → (1 Lalte 2:3) En rawh LALPA in Pathian thupêk chu, Mosia Dân ziak angin a kawng zawh ula, a thupêkte, a thupêkte, a rorêlte leh a thuhriattîrte chu zâwm rawh u. Chutiang chuan eng thil pawh ti la, khawi hmunah pawh kal ila, i hlawhtling ang.

(2) Thuthlung Thar

Matthaia..................Thupuan→Thuthlung Thar

dan Mosia hmanga pek a ni a; khawngaihna leh thutak Isua Krista aanga lo chhuak vek an ni. Thuhmahruai (Johana 1:17) .

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hlui: Dan chu Mosia hmanga pek a ni
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Thar: Khawngaihna leh thutak pahnih hi Isua Krista aanga lo chhuak a ni. Engvangin nge “Thuthlung Thar” hian Thuthlung Hluia Thupek Sawm, dan, thupek leh dante hi a hril loh? A hnuaiah hian kan sawi dawn a ni.

chhanna: Isua ringtute chu a thlawna thiam chantir an ni a, a thlawnin chatuan nunna an dawng → hei hi khawngaihna an ti! Thuhmahruai (Rom 3:24-26) .

Dan rorelna leh chibai bukna laka zalenna → Dan kalphung a innghat apiang chu ânchhe dawng a ni. Dan i zawm a, i tih chuan, "I zawm thei ang em? I zawm thei lo a nih chuan eng hlawh nge i hmuh ang? → Hlawh i hmuh chu chibai bukna a ni. Reference (Galatia 3:10-11) Hei hi i hrethiam em? ?
Amaherawhchu thiltih reng reng ti lova Pathian ngaihsak lote thiam changtu Pathian ringtu tan chuan a rinna chu felnaah chhiar a ni ang. Thil chhinchhiah: " " Chauh "A awmzia chu awlsam, rinna chauh rinchhan, ring chauh →" tihna a ni. Rinna avanga thiamchantirna ”→He pathian hi a ni mi fel Rinnaah a innghat a, rinnaah a hruai a ni! Pathianin Pathian ngaihsak lote chu thiam a chantir a, a rinna chu felnaah chawimawi a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Thuhriltu (Rom 4:4-5). Khawngaihna chu rinnain a awm a, Dân chu thiltihin a awm a, Dânah rinna chu a thlawn a ni. Chuvangin khawngaihna avanga a nih avangin thiltihah a innghat lo va, chutiang a nih loh chuan khawngaihna chu khawngaihna a ni tawh lo. Thuhmahruai (Rom 11:6) .

zawt: Thutak chu eng nge ni?

Isuan: "Kei hi kawng leh thutak leh nunna ka ni; keimah chauh lo chu tumah Pa hnenah an kal lo (Johana 14:6), i hrethiam em?

(3) Thuthlung Hluiah chuan bawng leh beram hman a ni Thisen Thuthlung siam rawh

Chutichuan, thuthlung hmasa ber kha thisen tel lova siam a ni lo va, Mosia’n Dan anga thupek zawng zawng mipuite a pek lai khan, velvet sen leh hisop a la a, lehkhabuah chuan bawnghnute leh kêl thisen a theh a, tuiin a theh bawk a mipui zawng zawng chungah, "He thisen hi in hnena Pathian thuthlung thutiam a ni," a ti (Hebrai 9:18-20) a ti a.

(4) Thuthlung Tharah hian Krista ta a hmang a Thisen Thuthlung siam rawh

I hnena thu ka hrilh kha Lalpa hnen atanga ka dawn kha a ni a, Lal Isua an phatsan zan khan chhang a la a, lawmthu a sawi zawh chuan a phel a, “Hei hi ka taksa a ni a, chu chu pek a ni nang” Scrolls: broken), record turin hetiang hian i ti tur a ni Min hre reng ang che." Chaw ei kham chuan no chu a la bawk a, "He no hi ka thisena thuthlung thar a ni , a lo kal hma loh chuan Lalpa thihna kan sawi chhuak a ni. (1 Korinth 11:23-26) tih a ni.

Lal Isuan eng nge min hrilh? → 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua chu nunna chhang a ni, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Lalpa tisa leh thisen ei leh in hian chatuan nunna a thlen ang a, ni hnuhnung berah kan tho leh ang a, chu chu taksa chu tlan a ni ang → Isuan heti hian a sawi: “Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, nangni i nih loh chuan Mihring Fapa sa ei la, Mihring Fapa thisen chu in la, nangmahah chuan tu pawh ka tisa ei a, ka thisen in chuan chatuan nunna a nei a ni. Ka tisa chu chaw a ni tak zet a, ka thisen chu keimahah a awm reng a, kei pawh amahah a awm reng a ni. Reference (Johana 6:48.53-56) leh Reference
(Johana 14:26) Nimahsela, Pain ka hminga a tirh tur, Thlarau Thianghlim chuan engkim a zirtir ang che u a, a duh ang che u a rawn call che a aihtuah i hnena ka sawi zawng zawng kha . Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

(5) Thuthlung Hluia bawng leh beram Thisen Sual a bo thei lo

zawt: Bawng leh beram thisen hian sual a tibo thei em?
chhanna: Sual hi tihbo theih a ni ngai lova, sual tihbo theih a ni ngai lo.
Mahse heng inthawinate hi kum tin sual hriat nawn tirna a ni a; ... Puithiam tin, nitin Pathian rawngbawl tura ding, inthawina khata hlan nawn fo thinte hian sual an la bo thei ngai lo. (Hebrai 10:3-4,11)

(6) Thuthlung Tharah Krista a ni Thisen Chauh vawikhat Mi sual a silfai a, mi sual a la bo thin

chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isuan a ta a hmang a Thisen ,Chauh" vawikhat "Chatuan inremna atan Hmun Thianghlim ah lut rawh - Hebrai 9:12."
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A chhan chu amah chauh ". vawikhat "I inhlan la, a lo thleng ang - Hebrai 7:27."
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Tûnah ni hnuhnûnga lo lang ta". vawikhat ", sual tihbo nan inthawinaah inhlan rawh - Hebrai 9:26
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista atang khan ". vawikhat "Mi tam tak sual phur turin hlan a ni - Hebrai 9:28."
5. A rilru a hah lutuk Isua Krista kal tlang chauhvin " vawikhat "A taksa chu tihthianghlim turin hlan rawh - Hebrai 10:10."
6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista hlan ". vawikhat "Sualte tana chatuan inthawina chu ka Pathian ding lamah a ṭhu ta - Hebrai 10:11."
7. A rilru a hah lutuk A chhan chu a " . vawikhat "Inthawina hian tihthianghlim tawhte chu chatuan atan a ti famkim thin - Hebrai 10:14."

Hetiang hian chiang takin i hrethiam em? Hebrai 1:3 leh Johana 1:17 Kût hi en rawh."
