Chu upa dik lo, pastor dik lo, leh thuhriltu dik lote chuan Krista chhandamna an hriatthiam loh vang leh Krista “chhandamna” an hriatthiam loh vang a ni. thisen hlu tak a ni "Thuthlung Hluia bawng leh beram thisenin sual a silfai angin ka zirtir che → bawng leh beram thisen hian sual a la bo thei ngai lova, chuvangin nitin sualna i inhriat reng a, i sualte puang la, nitin sim la, sim rawh." i mitthi chuan hna a thawk a, nitin A khawngaihna dil rawh. Thisen Sual silfai la, sual thai bo rawh. Vawiin hian inbual la, naktuk ah sil la, naktuk ah sil rawh → "Lal Isua tihthianghlimna thuthlung". thisen hlu tak a ni "A hma ang bawkin hetianga i tih hian khawngaihna Thlarau Thianghlim i hmusit em ni? I hlau lo em ni? Kawng dik lo i zawh tih ka hlau! I hrethiam em? Reference (Hebrai Bung 10, chang 29)

Thil chhinchhiah: Bible-ah chuan tihthianghlim tawhte chu chatuan atan an famkim dawn tih a ziak a (Hebrai 10:14); mi bumna tur tricks ,. tumruh taka tihbuai Lal Isua' " . thisen hlu tak a ni "A pangngai angin enkawl rawh. I hrethiam em?"

zawt: Thil sual ka tih chuan engtin nge ka tih ang?
chhanna: Isua i rin chuan Dan hnuaiah i awm tawh lo va, khawngaihna hnuaiah i awm tawh zawk → Kristaah chuan Dan lak ata chhuah zalen i ni tawh a, thiam loh chantirtu dan reng reng a awm tawh lo. Dan a awm loh avangin sual chu sualah chhiar a ni lo. Dan tel lo chuan sual chu a thi tawh a, sualah a chhiar lo. I hrethiam em? Reference (Hebrai 10:17-18, Rom 5:13, Rom 7:8)→Reference". paul "Tisa bawhchhiatnate hmachhawn dan tur min zirtir dan→". Tisa leh thlarau indonaah "Sual nun hua la, chatuan nunna atan nun thar chu vawnghim rawh. Hetiang hian i ti ang." suahsualna Tin, engtikah nge en mahni chu a ni boral of; en mahni chu a ni nung tan. Reference (Rom 6:11), hei hi i hrethiam em?

(7) Thuthlung Hlui dan hi thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni - (Hebrai 10:1)
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan leh thupekte hi thil lo thleng tur thlalak a ni - (Kolossa 2:16-17)
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Adama chu mi lo kal tûr entîrna a ni a—(Rom 5:14) .

(8) Thuthlung Thar dan lem dik tak chu Krista a ni

zawt: Dan hi thil tha thlalak a nih chuan tunge ang tak tak?
chhanna: " " thil awm hmasa ber "A hmel chu a ni tak zet." Krista ! Sawmi taksa Mahse, a ni Krista , dan angin A tawi zawngin sawi rawh chu chu Krista ! Adama hi entîrna, thlalak, lem → Krista hi Pathian nihna hmêl dik tak a ni!

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Adama chu entîrna a ni a, Adam hnuhnung ber “Isua” chu an lem dik tak a ni a;
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan chu thil tha thlalak a ni a, a tak tak chu Krista a ni;
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan leh thupekte chu thil lo thleng tur thlalak a ni a, a pianphung erawh chu Krista a ni;

Danin a phut dikna chu hmangaihna a ni! Dan thupek ropui ber chu Pathian hmangaih a, nangmah ang bawka i vengte hmangaih hi a ni Isuan Pa a hmangaih a, Pathian a hmangaih a, nangmah angin i vengte a hmangaih → Isuan kan tan a nunna a hlan a, a taksa leh nunna chu Keini kan ni a taksa peng hrang hrangte. Chuvangin, Dan thupui khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni a, Dan lem dik tak chu Krista a ni! Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai (Rom 10:4, Matthaia 22:37-40) .

(9) Thuthlung Hlui dante kha lungphek-ah ziah a ni

Exodus 24:12 LALPA chuan Mosia hnenah, "Tlângah hian ka hnênah lo chho la, hetah hian awm la, mite i zirtîr theih nân lung phêk te, ka dân te, ka thupêkte ka ziakte chu ka pe ang che," a ti a ."

(10) Thuthlung Thar dante hi thinlung lungphek chungah a inziak a

“Chumi ni hnua an hnena thuthlung ka siam tur chu hei hi a ni, Lalpa thu chhuak: Ka dante chu an thinlungah ka ziak ang a, an chhungah ka dah ang” (Hebrai 10:16 )

zawt: "Thuthlung Thar" ah Pathianin kan thinlungah "dan" a ziak a, kan chhungah a dah → Hei hi dan zawm a ni lo maw?
chhanna: Dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni a, Dan lem dik tak chu Krista a ni! Pathianin kan thinlungah Dan a ziak a, keimahniah a dah → [Krista] keimahniah a dah a, kei pawh Kristaah ka awm.

(1) . Krista chuan dan a hlen chhuak a, dan a zawm → Dan chu hlen chhuakin Dan pakhat mah bawhchhia lovin ka zawm a ni.
(2) . Krista hian sual a nei lo va, sual pawh a nei thei lo → Kei Pathian atanga lo piang, Krista thu, Thlarau Thianghlim leh tui, sual ka nei lo va, sual pawh ka sual thei lo. Pathian piang apiangin sual an nei ngai lovang (1 Johana 3:9 leh 5:18) .

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu ka ngaithla a, ka ring a, Thu ka vawng tlat→" kawng "Pathian a ni. Isua Krista chu Pathian a ni! Amen."
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Ka vawng tlat". kawng ", Thlarau Thianghlimin a veng nghet tlat". kawng tha tak a ni " ,chu chu Krista vawng reng la, Pathian vawng reng la, Thu vawng reng rawh ! Amen
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni a, Dan lem dik tak chu Krista → Krista I vawngtha Krista, . vawngtha Tao, chu chu Hrisel takin awm rawh Dan chu a hmu ta. Amen! Dan jot khat emaw, jot khat emaw pawh tihtawp theih a ni lo va, engkim hlen chhuah vek a ngai → Kan hmang ". lehkhathawn "Lalpa hmanrua, hmang rawh". lehkhathawn "Dan zawm, line khat pawh bawhchhiat loh chuan engkim a thleng famkim vek ang. Amen!

Kan hman thin ". lehkhathawn "Lalpa dan, dan leh thupekte hi zawm harsa a ni lo, a harsa lo! A dik em? → A thupekte kan zawm hian Pathian kan hmangaih a, a thupekte pawh zawm a harsa lo. (1 Johana 5) Bung 3) , i hrethiam em?
I kal chuan". vawngtha "Tablet-a ziah a ni". thumalte Dan zawm a harsa em?A vawn a har em em a, A chhan chu Lehkhain mi a that thin dan i zawm chuan Dan bawhchhiatna hi Sual a ni ngei ang dan chibai bukna a ni, lehkhabu dan chu thlalak a ni si a." Hlimthla "A ruak a, i man thei lo va, i chelh thei lo bawk. I hrethiam em?"

(11) Thuthlung hmasa chu a hlui tawh a, a lo upa tawh a, a tlahniam zel a, a bo thuai dawn a ni.

Tunah chuan thuthlung thar kan sawi a, thuthlung hmasa chu a hlui tawh a, a hlui tawh leh chhe mek chu a bo thuai dawn a ni. Thuhmahruai (Hebrai 8:13) .

(12) Krista chuan chatuan thuthlung siam nân amah a hmang a Thisen Kan hnenah thuthlung thar siam rawh

Thuthlung hmasaah hian tlin lohna awm lo sela, a hnu lama thuthlung zawnna tur hmun a awm lo ang. (Hebrai 8:7)
Mahse, chatuan thuthlung thisen avanga kan Lalpa Isua, beram vengtu ropui tak, mitthi zing ata kaihthawhtu remna Pathian hnenah (Hebrai 13:20)

zawt: Thuthlung hmasa ber chu thuthlung hlui a nih avangin Thuthlung Hlui tih a ni → A tlin lohnate chu engte nge ni?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung hmasa ber chu thlalak a ni a, Adama chu entîrtu a ni a, khawvel hi milem a ni a, thlalak zawng zawng chu a liam vek a ngai a ni. Hun tawp lamah chuan thil a lo upa tawh ang a, a bo vek tawh dawn a, chuvangin thuthlung hmasa lama awm kha a awm tawh lo thuai ang.
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung dan hmasa ber chu elementary school chak lo leh tangkai lo tak a ni--(Galatia 4:9)
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung hmasa dan leh thupekte chu a chak lo va, a tangkai lo va, engmah a tihlawhtling lo - (Hebrai 7:18-19)
A sawi mai ni lovin " Thuthlung Thar 》Thuthlung hlui, hlui leh chhe mek chu a bo dawn ta tih erawh chu Thuthlung Hlui hi thlalakna, elementary school chak lo leh tangkai lo, chak lo leh tangkai lo, engmah tihlawhtling lo → Isua Krista chuan beiseina tha zawk → Isua Krista a rawn hruai lut ta a ni chatuan atan Amah a hmang a, thuthlung thisen chuan kan hnenah thuthlung thar a siam a ni! Amen.

articles.title: Krista Thurin kalsan tanna (Lecture 3)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa unau zawng zawngte tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Hebrai Bung 6, châng 2-na Bible hi hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: Baptisma channa te, kut nghahna te, mitthi thawhlehna te, chatuan rorelna te .

Vawiin hian kan zir chhunzawm zel ang a, kan fellowship ang a, " Krista Thurin bul tanna kalsan "Aih. 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! "Hmeichhe nungchang" kohhran chuan hnathawktute a tir chhuak thin - an kuta an ziak leh sawi thin thutak hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna leh ropuina chanchin tha a ni. Chaw ei tur chu hla tak atangin van atanga phurh luh a ni a, a hun takah min pe chhuak thin a, chutiang chuan kan thlarau nun chu nitin a hausain a tharin a lo awm zel dawn a ni! Amen. Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel a, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru a hawng zel ang a, chutiang chuan thlarau lam thudikte kan hre thei ang a, kan hmu thei ang a, Krista kalsan tur thurin bul tanna pawh kan hrethiam thei ang. Lehkha, dan, thlalak, thiam loh chantirna dan te chu kalsan rawh .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

zawt: Engvangin nge → Baptisma zirtirna te, kut nghahna te, mitthi thawhlehna te, chatuan rorelna te hi kan chhuahsan ang?
chhanna: 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a “Baptisma” → Krista thihnaah hian vawi khat chauh baptisma kan chang a;

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Kut nghah, mitthi thawhlehna → Kan thi a, kan phum a, Krista nen vawi khat chauh kan tho leh a;

3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Tin, level zawng zawng tan chatuan rorelna zirtirna → Krista chu kan sualte avangin vawi khat chauh danin ro a rel a, dan chu vawi khat chauh a hlen chhuak → Krista nen kan thi a, vawi khat chauh rorel kan ni a, level tin tan rorelna tam tak emaw, chatuan rorelna emaw a awm thei lo zirlai. Chuvangin hengte hi a bul tanna a ni a, an kal vek a ngai → Hei hi i hrethiam em?

Dân chu thlalak tih loh chu, dânte, lehkha, tisa dânte

(1) Isuan Dan hnuai ata min tlan

Nimahsela, hun kim a lo thlen chuan Pathianin a Fapa, hmeichhe laka piang, Dan hnuaia piang chu a tir a, fapa anga pawm kan nih theih nan Dan hnuaia awmte tlan turin. Galatia 4:4-5 ah hian kan hmu a

zawt: Dan hnuaia awmte hian Pathian fapa nihna an nei em?
chhanna: Aih . "Letter, ordinance, or statute" tih dan chuan mi a dem a, lehkha chuan mi a that → Letters of the law, a chhan chu ordinance ka zawm theih loh avangin, thiam loh min chantir a, min ânchhe min lawh a, min rorelsak bawk. Chuvang chuan lehkha chuan thihna a thlen a, Dan hnuaia awm i nih chuan mithi i ni a, Pathian fapa nihna i nei lo. I hrethiam em?

(2) Isuan dan chu a thai bo a, a la bo a, kraws-ah a khenbeh a

...Krista nên a tinungtîr che u a, kan dodâltu leh kan dodâltu dânte kutziak chu a thai bo a, kawng ata a hruai bo a, kraws-ah a khenbeh a ni. Kolossa 2:13-14 ah hian kan hmu a

zawt: Dan pakhat tihbo a, lak bo a, kraws-a khenbeh tih hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Krista nên a nungpui che u → "Pathian fate, mi fel leh vâna mi, bâwih ni loin piangthar che u" → Dan-a inziak inrelbawlna, min beitu "Dan" te pawh a thai bo vek bawk a ni The "paper evidence". min tibuaitu → chu finfiahna a ni a, min beitu leh min rorelsaktu leh thiam loh min chantirtu finfiahna chu lakchhuah a ni a, kraws-ah khenbeh a ni. I hrethiam em?

Chuvang chuan Dân lehkhate hi thihna atân a ni a, Dân dân leh tisa rorêlna → chu putar tân a ni. chhiahhlawh "Misualte tan din a ni lo". mi fel "Fapa din - 1 Timothea bung 8 chang 9 en rawh. Krista chuan kan "Pathian atanga piang thar" kan tan dan leh thupekte chu a thai bo ta a ni. Isua chuan dan leh thupek zawm tur lehkha kan hmu ang tih a hlau hle a, chuvangin ani blotted out and removed them from the cross . Dan tel lova bawhchhiatna a awm a, sual hi dan leh thupek tel lo chuan thiam loh chantir theih a ni lo va, chuvangin sual chu sualah ngaih a ni lo, a chhan chu Paula sawi angin Pathian piang thar chuan sual a ti lo , ani pawhin sual a ti lo va, nangmah leh nangmah i inchhir thei lo va, hei hi i hrethiam em?

(3) Dan laka zalen

zawt: Engvangin nge dan atanga inthiarfihlim?
chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan awm lohna hmunah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo - Rom 4:15
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan tel lo chuan sual hi sual anga ngaih a ni lo - Rom 5:13
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan tel lo chuan sual chu a thi tawh si a - Rom 7:8

Paula sawi angin → Chuti a nih chuan, eng nge kan sawi theih ang? Dan hi sual a ni em? A ni lo tak zet! Mahse dan ni lo se chuan sual hi eng nge a nih ka hre lo ang. Danin, "I duhâm tur a ni lo" a tih loh chuan duhâmna chu eng nge a nih ka hre lo vang. Mahse, sualna chuan thupek hmangin keimahah duhâmna chi hrang hrang a tichak a; Dan tel lovin ka dam hma chuan thupek a lo thlen chuan sual chu a lo nung leh a, ka thi ta a ni. Rom 7:7-9 en rawh. Note: Dan thupek a lo thlen chuan sual chu a nung leh ta → Dan tel lo chuan sual chu a thi tawh a, Dan i duh a, dan i zawm chuan → i " tih a ngai a ni. suahsualna "zavai nung I thih chuan i thi ang. Paula hmanga Pathianin a sawi kha i hrethiam em?

zawt: Dan lakah engtin nge kan tlanchhuah theih ang?
chhanna: Kraws-a khenbeh Krista taksa hmanga dan ata chhanchhuahna→Krista chauh tan Mi zawng zawng an thih chuan mi zawng zawng an thi → Chutichuan, ka unaute u, nangni pawh Krista taksa avângin Dân lakah in thi tawh... Rom 7:4 → Nimahsela kan dân kan phuar avângin Dânah thi tawh kan nih avângin, tûnah chuan kan zalên ta a ni Lalpa rawng kan bawl theih nan dan ( Dan laka zalen, fapa ni tawhte chauhvin Lalpa rawng an bawl thei a ni Dan lak ata zalen lo leh sual bawih i nih chuan Lalpa rawng i bawl thei lo vang, thlarau thar (thlarau: emaw, Thlarau Thianghlim tia lehlin) ang zelin, hlui ang ni lovin; ritual tih dan tur. Rom 7:6 en la, i hrethiam em?

(4) Dan leh thupekte hi elementary school chak lo leh tangkai lo tak tak an ni

zawt: Engvangin nge elementary school hlauhawm leh tangkai lo tak?
chhanna: Danah hian thupek (regulation) a awm avangin tisa rinchhanin kan zawm thei lo va, danin min rorel ang a, thi turin thiam loh min chantir ang a, chuvangin elementary school hlauhawm leh tangkai lo tak a ni → Tunah chuan Pathian i hre tawh a, a ni thei bawk Pathianin a hriat che tih a sawi a, engvangin nge i la mamawh? Galatia Bung 4 Châng 9 en rawh

(5) Dan chu engmah tihlawhtling lovin a lo chhuak ta

zawt: Engvangin nge danin engmah a hlen chhuah loh an tih?
chhanna: Dan thupek kan zawm theih loh avangin, a chak lo va, a tangkai lo hle a, elementary school hlauhawm leh tangkai lo tak a ni a, Dan hi a tangkai lo va, engmah a tihlawhtling lo a, Isuan "a thai bo a, a paih bo a, a ti bo ta a ni" thihna hmangin. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? →A hmaa ordinance kha chak lo leh tangkai lo a nih avangin tihbo a ni ta (dan chuan engmah a tihlawhtling lo), beiseina tha zawk a lo awm ta a, chu chuan Pathian kan pan thei ta a ni. Hebrai 7:18-19 en rawh

(6) Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni

Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni a, chu thil lem dik tak a nih loh avangin, kum tin inthawina inang chiah hlanin hnaihtute chu a ti famkim thei lo. Hebrai 10:1

zawt: Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni tih hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Genesis-a "Adama" tih hi "Jehova Pathian" anpui leh a ang taka siam a ni em? Awle! Chuti a nih chuan “Isua” hi Pathian Engkimtithei, Chatuan Pa leh Remna Lal a ni em? Isuan Philipa hnenah a ti a! Mi hmu apiangin Pa an hmu tawh - Johana 14:9-11 en rawh. "Adama" hi mihring tia koh a nih chhan chu tisa la lo piang lo "Isua" lem leh a ang taka siam a nih vang a ni lawm ni? chuvangin" Adam "Premonition chu virtual leh shadow a ni! Image tak tak chu". Isua ", Adam hnuhnung ber tia koh! A dik em? Chuti a nih chuan dan chu tisa dan a ni a, tisa mite tana din a ni → Hebrai 7:16 " Isua "Puithiam a lo ni ta a, tisa rorel dan ang ni lovin, tawp chin nei lo (original, indestructible) nunna thiltihtheihna ang zelin a lo ni ta zawk a ni. → Chuvangin, "Adama chu entîrna a ni a, hmêl a ni a, Dân pawh chu thlalak, a lo la awm tûr mawina a ni. Thil hlimthla chu. Adama leh dan chu " Hlimthla ", thlalak chu hun kal zelah a che ang a, a ruak ang a, engmah lovah a kir leh ang. Adama leh dan, chu chu Thuthlung Hlui chu zawi zawiin a upa tawh ang a, engmah loah a bo ang → Hebrai 8:13 en la, chuvangin dan chu i zawm thei lo ang." , a tir chuan a " Hlimthla "Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni a, thil anpui dik tak a ni lo. Dan lem dik tak chu Krista a ni! Hei hi i hrethiam em?"

(7) Dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni a, anpui dik tak chu Krista a ni

zawt: Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a nih avangin, Dan anpui dik tak chu tu nge ni ang?
chhanna: Dân anpui chu Krista a ni a, Dân tâwpna chu Krista a ni → Dân tâwpna chu Krista a ni, amah ring apiangin felna an chan theih nân. Rom 10:4 en rawh;Dan thupekte leh thupekte hi a hnu lama thil thleng a ni a, a pianzia erawh chu Krista ang a ni tak zet → Chuvangin, ei leh in chungchangah emaw, kût emaw, thla tharah emaw, tumahin ro an relsak che suh ang che; emaw, Sabbath-ah emaw a ni thei. Chûngte chu thil lo thleng tûr thlalakte an ni a, a pianphung erawh chu Krista a ni. Kolossa 2:16-17 en rawh.

Thil chhinchhiah: Kristaa i awm reng chuan dan anpui tak, thil awmzia leh anpui dik takah i awm tihna a ni → Krista chuan dan chu a hlen chhuak a, keini pawhin dan kan hlen chhuak a ni. Dan leh sual bawhchhia suh. "Thlarau" danah i awm loh avangin dan i bawhchhia lovang, Adama-ah i awm a nih chuan thlalak hnuaiah i awm a ni, " rul "Thlem tur che chuan Dan i bawhchhia ang a, Dan i bawhchhia ang a, Dan bawhchhiat chu sual a ni. Chuti a nih chuan, i hrethiam em?"

Fuihna:

Chuvangin Krista thurin bul tanna lam hi kan kalsan mai tur a ni→ 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Inchhirna leh thiltih thite chu hawisan la, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Primary school hlauhawm leh tangkai lo tak chu chhuahsan la, engmah tihlawhtling thei lo dan chu kalsan la, thil tum lam pan nghal la, famkimna lama hmasawn tum rawh duh lo Primary school tan tirh lamah khan ka sualte ka inpuang a, nitin ka sim a, ka thiltih tha lote chu ka inchhir thin; duh lo Dan leh hrai primary school chak lo leh tangkai lo takah a kir leh tawh a, a bawih nih leh a duh tawh bawk. duh lo Ui chhuak ang maiin a inher a, a ei leh a; Vawk chu i tan a thianghlim lo a ni, a chhan chu a kephah pahnih a nei a, mahse a cud a chet loh vang a ni. " " vawk ” tih hian Thuthlung Hlui leh Thuthlung Thar thliar hran thiam mah se, a hmin chu an ei lo. I thu hriatte nena inmil rinna nei lo , an tân hlâwkna a awm lo va, an bawlhhlawh reng a ni. Leviticus bung 11 châng 7 leh 2 Petera bung 2 châng 22 en rawh.I hrethiam chiang em?

A THA E! Vawiin hian hetah hian kan examination, fellowship, leh sharing kan zo ta a, issue lo awm tur: Krista Thurin chhuahsan tanna, Lecture 4-na “Mihring Hlui kalsan la, Mi thar inbel rawh” tih hi i lo share ang u.

Chanchin |ha transcript insem, Pathian Thlarauvin a chêttîr Isua Krista Hnathawktute, Unaupa Wang*Yun, Unaunu Liu, Unaunu Zheng, Unaupa Cen... leh thawhpui dangte chuan Isua Kohhran chanchin ha hna thawh hi an thlawp a, an thawk ho bawk Krista. Isua Krista chanchin tha, mite chhandamna, chawimawina leh an taksa tlanna tur a phalna chanchin tha chu hril rawh. Amen! →Philipi 4:2-3-a Paula te, Timothea te, Euodia te, Sintika te, Clementa te leh Paula nena thawk ho mi dangte kan tih angin, an hmingte chu nun chungnung zawk bu-ah hian a awm a. Amen!

Hla: Lalpa, Ka ring

Unau tam zawkin an browser hmanga zawn chhuah - Lal Isua Krista Kohhran - min rawn zawm tur leh Isua Krista chanchin tha hril tura thawhhona tha tak nei turin kan sawm a che u.

QQ 2029296379 ah zawhfiah theih a ni

Lal Isua Krista khawngaihna te, Pathian hmangaihna te, Thlarau Thianghlim fuihna te chu in zavaia hnenah awm reng rawh se! Amen

articles.title: Krista Thurin bul tanna kalsan (Lecture 2)
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa unau zawng zawngte tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Hebrai Bung 6, châng 1-na Bible hi hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: Chuvangin Krista thurin bul tanna kalsanin famkimna lama hmasawn zel kan tum tur a ni a, lungphum dang phum tawh lovin, thiltih thi ata simna leh Pathian rinchhan ang chi hi.

Vawiin hian ka zir chhunzawm zel ang a, ka fellowship ang a, ka share bawk ang ". Krista Thurin bul tanna kalsan "Aih. 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! "Hmeichhe nungchang" kohhran chuan hnathawktute a tir chhuak thin - an kuta an ziak leh sawi thin thutak hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna leh ropuina chanchin tha a ni. Chaw ei tur hi hla tak atangin van atanga phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min pe chhuak thin a, chutiang chuan kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk ang a, ni tin a thar zel ang! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel a, Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru a hawng zel theih nan tawngtai ila. Krista zirtirna bul tanna, → thiltih thite sim leh Pathian rinchhan ang chite hi kan kalsan tur a ni tih hrethiam rawh .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Isua Krista chanchintha rinna hian sual lak ata min chhuah zalen thin

---Isua Krista Chanchin |ha---

(1) Isua Krista chanchin tha lo intanna

zawt: Isua Krista chanchin tha lo intanna chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pathian Fapa Isua Krista chanchin ha bul tanna—Marka 1:1. Isua chu Chhandamtu, Messia leh Krista a ni a, a chhan chu a mite sual lak ata chhandam a duh vang a ni. Amen! Chuvangin Isua Krista hi Chanchin Tha bul tanna a ni I hrethiam em? Matthaia 1:21 en rawh

(2) Chanchin |ha rinna hian sual lak ata min chhuah zalen

zawt: Chanchin |ha chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Kei Paula pawhin ka dawn chu nangmahni hnenah ka hlan e: pakhatnaah chuan Krista chu Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin a thi a, a phum a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a ni thum niah a kaihthawh tih hi Korinth 1 en rawh Lehkhabu 15 châng 3-4. Hei hi tirhkoh "Paula"-in Jentailte hnena "Korinth kohhran" hnena a hril chanchin tha chu Keini Jentailte hian " kan mamawh chauh a ni. lehkhathawn "He chanchin tha hmang hian chhandam i ni ang. A dik em?"

(3) Isua Krista chu mi zawng zawng tan a thi

zawt: Tute nge kan sual avanga thi?
chhanna: Krista hmangaihna hian min chêttîr tih a lo lang a, a chhan chu, " kan ngaihtuah a ni; Krista "Mi pakhat." tan Mi tam tak an thih chuan an thi vek a; Hei hi Bible-in kan sualte avanga Krista thihna chu a ni lawm ni? →1 Petera 2 Bung 24 Amah ngeiin kan sualte chu a taksaah thing chungah a phur a, sual laka kan thi a, felna avanga kan nung theih nan...! Isua Krista chu mi zawng zawng tan a thi a, mi zawng zawng a thi a, mi zawng zawng chu keimahni kan ni, keini sual vanga thite chu felna atana kan nung theih nan. Amen! Dik? “Keini” mi fel lo “Isua” thlakna a ni → Pathian chuan sual hre lo (sual nei lo: a original text is to know no sin) chu kan tan sualah a siam a, chutiang chuan kan felna kan lo ni thei ang Pathian chu Amahah a awm. 2 Korinth 5:21 hi en la, i hrethiam em?

(4) Mitthite chu sual lakah an chhuak

zawt: Engtin nge sual kan pumpelh theih ang?
chhanna: avang Mitthite chu sual lak ata an chhuak . Rom 6:7 en rawh → Hetah hian “thi tawhte chu sual lak ata chhuah zalen an ni” a ti. Sual laka fihlim turin ka thih thleng nghah a ngai em? Ni lo, entirnan, vawikhat chu pa pakhat a awm a, a fapain sual a ti a, dan anga thi tura hrem a ni! Fapa pa chuan hmanhmawh takin danah a fapa thiam loh chantirtu dan zawng zawng leh sawichhiatna thu zawng zawng zawng turin a kal a, a thai bo a, a paih chhuak ta a, chutah chuan pa chu a fapa avangin danin a rel a, sual a lo ni ta a, a fapa tan a thi ta a ni . Chuta tang chuan fapa chu sual lak ata leh Dan rorelna ata a chhuah zalen ta a ni. Tunah chuan fapa chu mi fel a ni ta! Misual ni lovin, misualte chu Dan hnuaiah an awm. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Chutiang bawk chu Isua Krista, Van Pa Fapa → Isua, Van Pa Fapa mal neih chhun leh duh tak chu tisaah a lo chang ta a ni.” tan "Sual kan lo nih avangin mi fel kan lo ni ta a ni". tan "Mi fel lote tan chuan Pathian felna → Mi pakhat, Krista kan lo nih theih nan". tan "Mi zawng zawng an thi vek a, mi zawng zawng an thi → Mi zawng zawng hian nang leh kei hi kan huam vek em? Chutah chuan, Thuthlung Hluia mite, Thuthlung Thara mite, piang lo, piang lo, Adama tisa atanga lo chhuak zawng zawng te, leh bawhchhiatna zawng zawng te pawh a huam tel vek a ni." thi tawh → mitthite chu sual lakah an chhuak. lehkhathawn "Isua Krista a thi a, ani chu ka nihna hlui a ni ( lehkhathawn ) a thi tawh a, tunah chuan ka dam tawh lo! ( lehkhathawn ) kan thi vek → A thi tawh chu sual lakah a chhuak tawh a, mi zawng zawng chu sual lak ata chhuah zalen an ni tawh. Amah ringtu chu thiam loh chantir a ni lo va, a ring lo apiang chu thiam loh chantir a ni tawh a, a chhan chu Pathian Fapa mal neih chhun hming a rin loh vang a ni → Pathian Fapa mal neih chhun hming chu Isua a ni, " Isua hming "I mite sual lak ata chhandam tihna a ni. Johana Bung 3 Châng 7-18 leh Matthaia Bung 1 Châng 21 en rawh. Isua Krista chu kan sualte avângin kraws-ah a thi → i sual lak ata a chhandam che a ni. I " I ring suh "danin thiam loh a chantir ang, chuvangin". suahsualna "A rel tawh. Chuti a nih chuan, i hrethiam em?"

(5) Krista chuan sual zawng zawng lak ata min tlan

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua thisen hian sual zawng zawng ata min tifai thin--Johana 1:7 en rawh
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isuan sual zawng zawng ata min tlan chhuak a--Tita 2:14 en rawh
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathianin kan bawhchhiatna zawng zawng a ngaidam che u (keini) - Kolossa 2:13 en rawh

A hnuaia tarlan te hi tunlai khawvel pum huap kohhran zirtirna dik lote chu a ni

zawt: Tunah hian upa leh pastor tam takin hetiang hian an zirtir a:
1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua thisen chuan ka “rin hma” sualna ata min tithianghlim a;
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Ka rin hnuah" sual ka la ti lo va, vawiinah emaw, naktuk emaw, naktuk emaw sualte pawh ka la ti lo em ni?
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Tin, ka sual thup, ka thinlunga sualte pawh
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Ka sual apiangin ka thianghlim thin Isua thisen hian chatuan thiltihtheihna a nei → Hei hi i ring em? Engtin nge an zirtîrnate chu Pathian thâwk khum Bible thutak ata a kal bo?
chhanna: Pathianin Bible hmangin min fuih a, “A hnuaiah hian chipchiar takin sawifiah rawh,” a ti a.
1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A Fapa "Isua" thisen chuan sual zawng zawng a tifai a - 1 Johana 1:7
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isuan sual zawng zawng ata min tlan chhuak a--Tita 2:14 en rawh
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathianin kan bawhchhiatna zawng zawng a ngaidam che u (keini) - Kolossa 2:13 en rawh

Thil chhinchhiah: Pathian thâwk khum Bible thutak chuan eng nge a sawi → 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A Fapa Isua thisen chuan min tithianghlim a engpawh sual, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Ani chuan min tlan chhuak thin engpawh sual, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathianin a ngaidam che (kan) . engpawh Bawhchhiatna → sual zawng zawng silfai la, sual zawng zawng laka fihlim la, bawhchhiatna zawng zawng ngaidam rawh → Isua’ Thisen " " sual zawng zawng silfai vek rawh "Isua ka rin hmaa sualna leh Isua ka rin hnua sualnate a huam tel lo em ni? Sual thup leh ka thinlunga sual awmte a huam tel em? Chu zawng zawng a huam tel em ni, a dik em? Entîr nân, Genesis aangin." | Thuthlung Thar chu a silfai ta em ni? Ni e, Genesis-ah hian engtikah nge i lo lan? , chu chu khawvel tawp hun a ni a, chu history hun laiah chuan i tel ve lo a ni lawm ni?

Chuvangin Isuan: "Kei hi a hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung ber ka ni; kei hi a bul leh a tawp ka ni; kei hi Rapha, Omega Pathian ka ni," a ti a. Pathian chuan kum sangkhat chu ni khat angin a hmu a, Amah su Mihring sualte a ngaidam tawh avangin vanah ropuina dinglamah a thu ta a - Hebrai 1:3 en rawh. Nangmah rawn zawt lovin mite chu an sualte ka tithianghlim a. , dik? Historic-a i taksa inlan kum za emaw vel chhunga i sualnate chu i inthiarfihlim tawh em? A silfai vek tawh a ni lawm ni? Chutichuan Krista nen kan inpumkhat tur a ni → a thihna angah te, a thawhlehna angah te → chutiang chuan, Isuan a sawi! A tir atang khan ka hnenah i awm a - Johana 15:27 en rawh.

Thilsiam aanga khawvel tawp thleng hian Isua chu kan hnenah a awm a, mite chu an sual ata a tifai hin → a ram kan luh hmain kan zavaiin kan thianghlim a, kan tithianghlim a, thiamchantir kan ni.

"Nitin i sim a, i inpuang a, i thiltih thite i sim a nih chuan" i tan ka hlau → Isua i dil ngei dawn avangin " Thisen "Nitin i sualte tifai la, Isua i dawng ang'." Thisen "sual silfai tur leh Krista thuthlung tihthianghlim nan ran leh beram thisen angin". Thisen "A pangngai angin hetianga sual silfai hi hlimna leh Pathian ngaihsakna a ni tih i ngaihtuah a. Hetianga i tih hian khawngaihna Thlarau Thianghlim i hmusit tihna a ni. I hrethiam em?

Chuvangin an tihsual ata chhuakin Bible lamah i kir leh a ngai a ni. I hrethiam em? Hebrai 10:29 en rawh

(6) Thihna anpuia Krista nena inpumkhat kan nih avangin a thawhlehna angah pawh Amah nen kan inpumkhat dawn a ni

zawt: Krista a thi tih kan "ring" a, mahse tunah chuan kan la dam em? Chuvangin thil sual kan ti chhunzawm zel dawn a ni! Sual lakah i la fihlim lo em ni? Thil sual ka tih chuan engtin nge ka tih ang? Chu chu buaina chu a ni em?
chhanna: Keini Krista Isuaa baptisma changte kha a thihnaah baptisma kan chang tih in hre lo em ni? ... A thihna angin amah nen kan inzawm tawh a nih chuan a thawhlehna angin amah nen pawh kan inzawmkhawm ang; Kan ni " baptisma a chang "Krista thihnaa dah kan nih hi Krista nena kan chhiar dan a ni". inzawmna "Kraws-a khenbeh → thihna ang chiaha Amah nena inpumkhat, i hmang". inrintawkna "Tu" baptisma a chang "A thihna angin Krista hnenah inpumkhat rawh → chutiang chuan nangni". lehkhathawn "Nangni ngei pawh in thi tawh! Mi upa chu a thi tawh a, mi sual chu a thi tawh! → In thi tawh a, in nunna chu Pathianah Krista hnenah thup a nih avangin. Kolossa 3:3 en rawh."

Putar chu a thi tawh a, misual chu a thi tawh tih i ring em? Tunah chuan keimah hi ka nung tawh lo va, keimahah Krista a lo nung tawh a ni. Krista". tan "Kan thi a, mitthi ata kaihthawh leh "piang thar" kan ni a, " tan "Kan nung → Nung hi keimah ka ni lo, Adama ka nung, mi sualte ka nung; Krista." tan Ka nung a, Krista ka nung a, Pa Pathian ropuina ka nung chhuak! Tunah chuan Kristaa ka awm tawh a, tupawh Pathian atanga lo piang chuan sual a ti lo va, sual pawh a ti thei lo. Amen! Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Paula sawi ang khan → Krista nen khenbeh ka ni tawh a, keimah hi ka nung tawh lo va, Krista chu keimahah a nung a, tuna tisaa ka nun hi Pathian Fapa, min hmangaihtu leh min hmangaihtu rinnain ka nung a ni Keimah ka inhnial a. Galatia 2:20-ah kan hmu.

(7) Sual en la, i thi tawh

zawt: Isua kan rin a, kan pianthar hnuah, kan nihna hlui bawhchhiatnate hi engtin nge kan tih ang?
chhanna: Nangmahah Pathian Thlarau a cheng a nih chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi i ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo. Rom 8:9 → Pathian Thlarau, Thlarau Thianghlim chu kan thinlungah a nung a, chu chu Krista ruala thawhleh leh mihring thara piangthar kan ni tihna a ni.” new me ", Pathian piang thar chu". thlarau lam mi "Tisa putar atanga lo piang ni lovin. articles.title: Sabbath Ni ruk hna thawh leh ni sarih chawlh
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen.

Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Pathianin thil siam hna chu ni ruk chhungin a zo a, ni sarih → ni thianghlim atana ruat niah a chawl tih hrethiam rawh .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

(1) Pathianin lei leh van hi ni ruk chhungin a siam a

Ni 1-na: A tir lamah chuan Pathianin lei leh van a siam a. Leilung hi pianphung nei lo leh engmah lo a ni a, thim tak chu tuikhuah chungah a awm a; Pathianin, "Eng awm rawh se," a ti a, eng a lo awm ta a ni. Pathian chuan êng chu a ṭha tih a hmu a, êng chu thim aangin a thliar hrang ta a ni. Pathian chuan êng chu "ni" a ti a, thim chu "zan" a ti bawk. Zan a awm a, zing a awm bawk a, hei hi ni hmasa ber a ni. --Genesis 1:1-5 ah hian kan hmu

Ni 2-na: Pathian chuan, "Tui inkarah hian boruak awm rawh se, chung tui leh chunglam tui inthen nan boruak a siam ta a ni," a ti a. Tin, chutiang bawk chu a ni. --Genesis 1:6-7 ah hian kan hmu a

Ni 3-na: Pathian chuan, "Van hnuai tui chu hmun khatah awm khawm sela, ram ro chu lo lang rawh se," a ti a. Pathian chuan ram ro chu "lei" a ti a, tui khawlkhawm chu "tuifinriat" a ti bawk. Pathianin a tha tih a hmu a. Pathian chuan, "Lei hian thlai chi hrang hrang, thlai chi hrang hrang leh thing chi hrang hrang, a chhunga chi nei thei chi hrang hrangte chu lo chhuak rawh se, chutiang chu a ni ta a ni," a ti a. --Genesis 1 Bung 9-11 Kût

Ni 4-na: Pathian chuan, "Chhun leh zan inthliarna tur leh hunbi te, ni te, kumte chhinchhiahna atan vanah êng awm rawh se; leilung êng pe turin vanah êng ni rawh se," a ti a. --Genesis 1:14-15 ah hian kan hmu a

Ni 5-na: Pathian chuan, "Tuiah hian thil nung tam tak awm sela, savate pawh lei chungah leh vanah thlawk rawh se," a ti a --Genesis 1:20

Ni 6-na: Pathian chuan, "Lei hian thil nungte chu an chi hrang hrangin lo piang chhuak rawh se; ran te, rannung te, ramsa te, an chi hrang hrangin a lo awm ta a ni," a ti a. ... Pathian chuan, “Kan anpuiin mihring i siam ang u, tuifinriata sangha chungah te, boruak sava chungah te, leia ran chungah te, lei zawng zawng chungah te, leh leilung zawng zawng chungah te thuneihna nei rawh se leia rawp zawng zawng a siam a ni. --Genesis 1:24,26-27 ah hian kan hmu a

(2) Thilsiam hna chu ni ruk chhungin zawhfel a ni a, ni sarihnaah a chawl a ni

Lei leh van awm zawng zawng hi siam a ni. Ni sarih-naah chuan thilsiam siamna kawnga Pathian hnathawh chu a zo ta a, ni sarih niah chuan a hnathawh zawng zawng a chawlhsan ta a ni. Pathianin ni sarih ni chu mal a sawm a, a tithianghlim ta a ni; --Genesis 2:1-3 ah hian kan hmu

(3) Mosia Dan → Chawlhni

“Sabbath ni hi hre reng ang che u, ni ruk chu in thawk ang a, in hna zawng zawng in thawk tur a ni a, ni sarih ni erawh chu LALPA in Pathian tan Chawlhni a ni , i chhiahhlawh mipa leh hmeichhia, i ran vulh leh i Khawpui chhunga mikhual chuan hna engmah a thawk tur a ni lo ni.Chuvangin LALPAN Sabbath ni chu mal a sawm a, a tithianghlim ta a ni.--Exodus Bung 20 châng 8-11

Aigupta ramah chuan bawih i ni tih i hre reng tur a ni a, chuta tang chuan LALPA in Pathianin kut chak tak leh ban phar chhuakin a hruai chhuak che u a ni. Chuvangin LALPA in Pathianin Chawlhni serh turin thu a pe che u a ni. --Deuteronomy 5:15-ah hian kan hmu a

Mosia Dân Thupêk Sâwmah chuan Israel fate chu "Sabbath" hre reng tur leh serh thianghlim turin an ti a, ni ruk an thawk a, ni sarih niah an chawl a ni.

chhanna: Aigupta ramah chuan bawih an ni tih hre reng ang che, chuta tang chuan Lalpa Pathianin kut chak tak leh kut phar chhuakin a hruai chhuak a ni. Chuvangin Pathian Jehova chuan Israel fate chu Sabbath "serh" turin thu a pe a. "Bawi tan chawlhna a awm lo va, saltanna atanga chhuak → Pathian khawngaihna hmang rawh. ( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) Nova’n Rainbow Thuthlung a siam

Pathian chuan: "Kei leh nang leh in hnena thil nung zawng zawng inkara ka chatuan thuthlung chhinchhiahna a awm. Chhumah chuan ruahpui ka dah a, chu chu kei leh lei inkara thuthlung chhinchhiahna a ni ang. - Genesis," a ti Genesis Bung 9 Châng 12-13.Hriat tur: Rainbow Thuthlung → chu remna thuthlung a ni → "chatuan thuthlung" a ni → Isuan kan hnena a siam "thuthlung thar" a entir a, chu chu chatuan thuthlung a ni.

( 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) Abrahama Rinna Thuthlung

LALPAN a hnênah, “He mi hi i ro luahtu a ni lo vang; " Tin, ani chuan a hnenah, "I thlahte pawh chutiang chu an ni ang," a ti a. Abrama chuan LALPA chu a "ring" a, chu chu LALPAN a tan chuan felnaah a ngai ta a ni. --Genesis 15:4-6 ah hian kan hmu a. Note: Abrahama thuthlung → "rinna" thuthlung → "thutiam" thuthlung → "rinna" hmanga " thiamchantirna".

( 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Mosia Dan Thuthlung

"Thupek Sawm, Dan leh Rorelna" → Mosia chuan "Israel mi zawng zawng" a ko va, an hnenah, "Aw Israelte u, vawiina dan leh thupek ka pek che u hi ngaithla teh u, in zir theih nan leh in zawm theih nan. The Lalpa Kan Pathian chuan Horeb tlangah hian thuthlung a siam a He "thuthlung" hi kan pi leh pute nen ni lovin, tunlaia hetia nung mekte nen hian thuthlung siam a ni - Deuteronomy 5:1-3.

[Thil chhinchhiah]: "Thuthlung Hlui" →a huam 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Adama Dan Thuthlung, 2 Nova Rainbow Thuthlung Remna thuthlung hian Thuthlung Thar a entir a, 3 Abrahama Rinna-Tiam Thuthlung, 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mosia Dân Thuthlung chu Israel fate nêna siam a ni a.

Kan tisa chak lohna avang hian "Dan felna" kan tihlawhtling thei lo a, chu chu dan "thupek, thupek, leh rorelna" tih hi kan tihlawhtling thei lo tihna a ni.

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Regulations hmasa kha a chak lo va, a tangkai lo → chuvangin tihtawp a ni

A hmaa thupekte chu a chak lo va, a hlawk lo hle a, Reference - Hebrai 7:18 → Isaia 28:18 Thihna nena in thuthlung chu "tihchhiat a ni ngei ang", Hades nena in thuthlung chu a ding reng lo vang.

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan hian engmah a tihlawhtling lo → tihdanglam a ngai

(Dan chuan engmah a tihlawhtling lo) chutiang chuan Pathian hmaa kan luh theihna tur beiseina tha zawk a rawn luh tir ta a ni. Hebrai 7:19 → Tunah chuan puithiam hna a lo danglam tawh a, Dan pawh hi tihdanglam a ngai a ni. --Hebrai 7:12 ah hian kan hmu

3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Inremna hmasa lama chhiatna awmte → Thuthlung thar siam rawh

Thuthlung hmasaah hian tlin lohna awm lo sela, a hnu lama thuthlung zawnna tur hmun a awm lo ang. Chuvangin, Lalpa chuan a mite chu a zilhhau a, heti hian a sawi (a lehlin chuan: Chutichuan Lalpa chuan thuthlung hmasa lama tlin lohnate chu a kawhhmuh a ni): “Israel chhungte leh Juda chhungte nen thuthlung thar ka siam hun tur ni a lo thleng dawn a, . an pi leh pute kuta ka vuan a, ka hruai ang khan ni lovin, Aigupta ram ata ka chhuah khan anmahni hnenah thu ka thlung a, ka thuthlung an zawm loh avangin, Lalpa chuan a ti.

Thuthlung Thar

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Isuan a thisen ngeiin kan hnenah thuthlung thar a siam a

I hnena thu ka hrilh kha Lalpa hnen atanga ka dawn kha a ni a, Lal Isua an phatsan zan khan chhang a la a, lawmthu a sawi zawh chuan a phel a, “Hei hi ka taksa a ni a, chu chu pek a ni nangmahni hmân lai lehkhabu zial: chhe tawh) "Hei hi ka hriatrengna atan i ti tur a ni," a ti bawk a, no chu a la a, "He no hi ka thisenah thuthlung thar a ni. Hei hi i in apiangin i tih tur a ni , hriatrengna atan." keimah. ”--1 Korinth 11:23-25-ah hian kan hmu a

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Dan tawpna chu Krista a ni

“Chutiang ni hnua an hnena thuthlung ka siam tur chu hei hi a ni, Lalpa chuan a ti: Ka dante chu an thinlungah ka ziak ang a, an chhungah ka dah ang,” a ti a tin, an bawhchhiatnate pawh ngaihdam a ni tawh a, sualte tana inthawina dang a ngai tawh lo. --Hebrai 10:16-18→ Lalpa chuan heti hian a sawi bawk: “Chutiang ni hnuah chuan Israel chhungte nen thuthlung ka siam tur chu hei hi a ni: Ka dante chu an chhungah ka dah ang a, an thinlungah ka ziak ang anmahni ta a ni Pathian chu ka mite an ni ang fel lohnate chu hre reng suh u,” a ti a.

"Thuthlung thar" kan sawi avangin "thuthlung hlui" chu "hlui" angin kan ngai a, mahse a hlui leh tlahniam zel chu a bo thuai dawn a ni; --Hebrai 8:10-13 ah hian kan hmu

( 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Isua chu Thuthlung Thar Inremtu a ni

Hemi avang hian thuthlung thara palai a lo ni ta a, a thihnain thuthlung hmasa hun laia miten sual an tihte chu a inremna a nih avangin, kohte chu chatuan rochan tiam chu an dawng thei ta a ni. Tupawh thutiam siamtu chuan thutiam hnutchhiahtu (a thuziak bulpui chu thuthlung nen a inang) thih hma chu a nghak tur a ni a, a chhan chu thutiam chu a thih hnuah chauh a thawk thei a ni a la tangkai dawn em ni? --Hebrai 9:15-17 ah hian kan hmu

Ka fate u, in sual loh nan heng thu hi ka ziak che u a ni. Tupawhin sual an tih chuan Pa hnenah thurawn petu kan nei a, Isua Krista mifel chu . --1 Johana bung 2 chang 1

A tha e! Vawiin hian ka inpawlna hi in zavaia hnenah ka hlan duh a ni. Amen

articles.title: Inthenna Eng leh thim a inthen
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen

Bible hi Genesis Bung 1, châng 3-4-ah hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: Pathianin, "Eng awm rawh se," a ti a, eng a lo awm ta a ni. Pathian chuan êng chu a ṭha tih a hmu a, êng chu thim aangin a thliar hrang ta a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir dawn a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem bawk ang "inthenhrang" Aih. 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! hmeichhe ṭha tak [Kohhran] chuan thutak thu, an kuta ziak leh sawi, kan chhandamna leh ropuina chanchin tha hmangin hnathawktute a tir chhuak thin. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Eng chu thim aangin a inhen tih hrethiam rawh.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

eng leh thim a inthen

Bible, Genesis Bung 1, châng 1-5 te hi i zirho ang u, chhiar ho ila: A tir lamah chuan Pathianin lei leh van a siam a. Leilung hi pianphung nei lo leh engmah lo a ni a, thim tak chu tuikhuah chungah a awm a; Pathianin, "Eng awm rawh se," a ti a, eng a lo awm ta a ni. Pathian chuan êng chu a ṭha tih a hmu a, êng chu thim aangin a thliar hrang ta a ni. Pathian chuan êng chu "ni" a ti a, thim chu "zan" a ti bawk. Zan a awm a, zing a awm bawk a, hei hi ni hmasa ber a ni.

(1) Isua chu êng dik tak, mihring nun êng a ni

Chutah Isuan mipui hnenah, "Kei hi khawvel êng ka ni. Tu pawh mi zuitu chu thimah a kal ngai lo vang a, nunna êng a nei zawk ang - Johana 8:12."

Pathian chu eng a ni a, Amahah chuan thim a awm lo. Hei hi Lalpa hnen atanga thuchah kan hriat leh in hnena kan rawn thlen leh chu a ni. --1 Johana 1:5

Amahah chuan nunna a awm a, he nun hi mihringte êng a ni. ...Chu êng chu êng dik tak a ni a, khawvela cheng zawng zawngte chu a ti eng vek a ni. --Johana 1:4,9

[Note]: A tir lamah chuan Pathianin lei leh van a siam a. Leilung hi pianphung nei lo leh engmah lo a ni a, thim tak chu tuikhuah chungah a awm a; Pathian chuan: "Eng awm rawh se", tichuan êng a awm → "Eng" tih hian nunna a kawk a, nunna êng → Isua chu "eng dik tak" leh "nunna" a ni → Mihring nun êng a ni a, nunna chu a ni Amahah chuan, he nun hi mihring a ni → Isua zuitu apiang chu thimah an kal ngai lovang, nunna êng → "Isua nunna" an nei zawk ang! Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Chuvangin Pathianin van leh lei leh engkim a siam → Pathianin: “Eng lo awm rawh se”, a ti a, êng a lo awm ta a ni. Pathianin êng chu a ha tih a hmuh chuan êng chu thim aangin a thliar hrang ta a.

(2) Isua chu Eng Fapa a ni tih i ring a

Johana 12:36 Eng fate in nih theih nan êng chu in neih chhungin ring rawh u. ” Isuan he thu a sawi zawh chuan anni chu a kalsan a, a inthup ta a.

1 Thessalonika 5:5 Nangni zawng zawng êng fate, ni fate in ni. Zan mi kan ni lo va, thim mi kan ni hek lo.

Nimahsela, thim ata a êng mak takah a kotu che u ropuizia in puang chhuah theihna turin hnam thlan, lal puithiamte, hnam thianghlim, Pathian mite in ni. --1 Petera 2:9

[Note]: Isua hi "eng" a ni → "Isua" kan zui → êng kan zui → êng fa kan lo ni ta! Amen. → Mahse, thim ata a êng mak takah kohtu che u ṭhatnate “chanchin ṭha” in puan theih nân hnam thlan, lal puithiam, hnam thianghlim, Pathian mite in ni

→Lal Isua Krista chhandamna. → Lal Isuan: "Khawvelah hian eng angin ka lo kal a, mi ring apiang thimah an awm reng loh nan. Reference - Johana 12:46."

(3)Thim

Thim zingah chuan eng chu a eng a, thim erawh chuan eng chu a dawng lo. --Johana 1:5

Tupawhin êngah ka awm tih sawi mah se, a unaupa hua a nih chuan thimah a la awm a ni. A unau hmangaihtu chu êngah a awm reng a, amahah chuan tlukna tur a awm lo. Nimahsela, a unau huattu chu thimah a awm a, thimah a kal a, a kalna tur a hre lo, thim chuan a mit a tihdel avangin. --1 Johana 2:9-11

Khawvelah êng a lo thleng tawh a, mihringte hian êng aia thim an hmangaih a, a chhan chu an thiltih sual a nih avangin Hei hi an thiam loh chantirna a ni. Thil sual ti apiangin êng chu an hua a, êngah an lo kal lo va, chutilochuan a thiltihte chu sawisel a ni ang. --Johana 3:19-20

[Thil chhinchhiah]: Thim zingah êng a eng a, mahse thimah chuan êng a dawng lo → Isua chu "Eng" a ni. "Isua" pawm loh → tih awmzia chu "eng" pawm loh tihna a ni. →Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "I mit chu i taksa khawnvar a ni. I mit a fiah chuan →" i thlarau mit a lo inhawng → Isua i hmu", i taksa pum pui a eng ang; i mit a thim a, i " Isua hmu lo la", i taksa pum pui chu a thim ang. . Chuvangin, nangmah leh nangmah inenfiah la, chutilochuan i chhungah thim a awm lo ang. I taksa pum puiah hian eng a awm a, thim engmah a awm lo a nih chuan, eng ang maiin i eng vek ang of a lamp,” tih hi chiang takin i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai-Luka 11:34-36

A tha e! Vawiin hian ka inpawlna hi in zavaia hnenah ka hlan duh a ni. Amen

articles.title: Buaina chinfel dan: Paula, Petera, Johana, Jakoba leh Dan
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen

Rom bung 7 châng 6-ah hian kan Bible i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u: Nimahsela, min phuartu dana kan thih aang khan tunah chuan Dan lak ata kan zalen ta a, chutiang chuan Lalpa rawng kan bawl theih nan, thlarau thar (thlarau: emaw Thlarau Thianghlim tia lehlin) ang zelin kan rawng kan bawl thei ang ritual tih a ni.

Vawiin hian Jentailte nen kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Dan chhuahsan rawh - emaw Dan zawm rawh". Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! hmeichhe ṭha tak [Kohhran] chuan an kuta thutak ziak leh sawi hmangin hnathawktu ** a tir chhuak thin a, chu chu kan chhandamna leh ropuina chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk theih nan hla tak atangin van atangin ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Jentail-te leh Juda-te pawhin Dân ata an inthiarfihlim tur a ni tih hrethiam la, Kristaah chuan Pathian lam hawiin an nung tur a ni.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】Jakoba leh Dân

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Jakoba chu danah a thahnemngai hle a

"Jakoba". Mosia chu kalsan la, in zirtir bawk a, "In fate serh tan suh la, dante pawh zawm suh. Mi zawng zawngin i lo kal tih an hre vek ang. Engtin nge in tih ang?"

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Jakoba hian a ngaihdan ang zelin Jentailte hnenah thupek 4 a pe a

"Chuvangin → "Ka ngaihdan chuan" Pathian thu awih Jentail-te hi tibuai suh u; an hnenah lehkha thawn la, → 1 milem bawlhhlawhna te, 2 uirena te, ran chil 3 te, thisen 4 te laka inthiarfihlim turin thupek pe rawh. Reference - Tirhkoh Tirhkohte 15:19-20

3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Jakoba chuan Paula chu dan zawm turin a hrilh a

Kan sawi ang hian ti mai rawh! Hetah hian mi pali kan awm a, duhthusam kan nei vek a ni. Anmahni chu hruai la, an lu an tan theih nan fee chu pe rawh. Chutiang chuan mi zawng zawngin i chanchin an hriatte chu thu dik lo a ni tih leh nangmah ngei pawh mi nungchang tha tak leh dan zawmtu i ni tih an hre vek ang. --Tirhkohte 21:23-24

4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan pakhat i bawhchhiat chuan dan zawng zawng i bawhchhia a ni.

Tupawh Dan zawng zawng zawm a, hmun khata tlu lut apiang chu a bawhchhiat vek avangin a sual a ni. Thuhmahruai-Jakoba Bung 2 Châng 10

zawt: Tunge chauhvin dan hi a din?

chhanna: Dan siamtu leh roreltu pakhat chauh a awm a, chu chu chhandam thei leh tichhe thei "Pathian fel" a ni. Midangte rorel tur hian tu nge i nih? Thuhmahruai-Jakoba 4:12

zawt: Thlarau Thianghlimin keimahni nen thutlukna a siam vang em ni? A nih loh leh "Jakoba" hian a ngaihdan aangin Jentailte tan thupek 4 a siam em?

chhanna: thlarau thianghlimin a sawi chu → Inconsistent lo a ni lo

Thlarau Thianghlimin chiang takin a sawi a, hun hnuhnungah chuan mi thenkhat chu rinna ata an tlansan ang a, thlemna thlarau leh ramhuai thurin an zui ang. Hei hi dawthei, thir lum hmanga an chhia leh tha hriatna halral tawhte inngaihluhna vang a ni. Inneihna an khap a, ei tur an insum a, chu chu Pathianin thutak ringtu leh hretute tan lawmthu sawina nena dawng turin a siam a ni. Pathian thil siam zawng zawng hi lawmthu sawina nena kan dawn chuan engkim hi Pathian thu leh mihring tawngtainain a tithianghlim thei lo. Thuhmahruai - 1 Timothea Bung 4 Châng 1-5 leh Kolossa 2 Châng 20-23

→A ngaihdan ang chuan Jakoba hian Jentailte tan "thupek 4" a din a → chung zinga 3 chu ei leh in nena inzawm a ni a, 1 chu tisa nena inzawm a ni. →Tisa chaklohna avanga tih theih loh thil a awm→Pathian fate "Jentail" te chu an zawm theih loh thupekte "vawn" turin Pathianin a ngen dawn lo. "Jakoba" hian a hmain a hrethiam lo va, mahse a hnuah → "Jakoba Lehkhabu Ziak"-ah chuan Pathian duhzawng a hrethiam ta → Heti hian ziak a ni: "I vengte chu nangmah i inhmangaih angin i hmangaih tur a ni." dan. Dan chu tuin nge hlen? Tuin nge dan zawm? Krista, Pathian Fapa a ni lo’m ni? Krista chuan Dan chu a hlen chhuak a, Dan chu a zawm ta Kristaah ka nung ~ A hlen chhuah chuan keini pawhin kan hlen chhuak ang tih ka ring a, a zawm chuan keini pawhin kan zawm ang. Amen, hei hi i tan a chiang em? ...Dan zawng zawng zawm a, hmun khatah tlu lut apiang chu engkim bawhchhiatnaah a sual a ni. --Thuziak-Jakoba 2:8,10

【2】Petera leh Dân

---I zirtirte kawngah hian tuar theih loh nghawngkawl dah suh---

Pathian pawhin anmahni leh keimahni thliar hran lovin an thinlung a tithianghlim a, mite thinlung hre chiangtu, Thlarau Thianghlim min pek ang bawk khan a hriattir a; Tûnah hian engvângin nge Pathian chu kan pi leh pute emaw, keimahni pawhin kan tuar theih loh, a zirtîrte kawngah nghawngkawl nghah tûrin kan thlêm ang? Lal Isua khawngaihna avanga chhandam kan ni a, anmahni ang bawk hian Hei hi kan rin dan a ni. ”Inkhawmpui-Tirhkohte 15:8-11

zawt: "Tuar theih loh joke" chu eng nge ni?

chhanna: Ringtu tlemte chauh, Pharisai pawla telte chauh an ding chhuak a, " → 1 Jentailte serh tan la, thupek i pe tur a ni → 2 "Mosia dan zawm rawh u" an ti a, Reference - Tirhkohte 15:5

【3】Johana leh Dan

--Pathian thupek zawm--

A thupekte kan zawm chuan Amah kan hre tih kan hria. Tupawh, “Amah ka hria,” tia a thupek zawm lo chu dawthei a ni a, thutak chu amahah a awm lo. Thuhmahruai - 1 Johana Bung 2 Châng 3-4

Pathian kan hmangaih a, a thupekte kan zawm chuan chumi hmang chuan Pathian fate kan hmangaih tih kan hre thei ang. Pathian thupekte zawmin kan hmangaih a, a thupekte pawh hi phurrit a ni lo. Thuhmahruai - 1 Johana 5 chang 2-3

[Thil chhinchhiah]: Pathian thupek kan zawm hian kan hmangaih a ni

zawt: Thupekte chu eng nge ni? Mosia Thupek Sawmte kha a ni em?

chhanna: 1 Pathian hmangaih la, 2 Nangmah angin i vengte hmangaih rawh → Heng thupek pahnih hi Dan leh Zawlneite zawng zawng khaikhawmna a ni. "Reference - Matthaia Bung 22 Châng 40 → Dan khaikhawmna chu "Krista" tih a ni - Reference Rom Bung 10 Châng 4 → Krista chu "Pathian" a ni → Pathian chu "Thu" a ni → A tir lamah chuan "Thu" a awm a, tin "Thu" chu "Pathian" a ni → Pathian chu "Isua" a ni → Ani chuan "a ṭhenawmte chu amah angin a hmangaih" a, a nun "kawng" min pe a, chutiang chuan dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni → kan zawm hian dan thlarau → "kawng" kan vawng tlat → zawm mai rawh Pathian "thupekte" → "Thupek zawm" tih awmzia chu "thupek zawm" tihna a ni.Pathian fa piang thar, Kristaa nungte hian thu an zawm a, mi thattu thu/dan chunga innghat tu pawh an ni lo ânchhe dawng vek an ni.Galatia 3:10-11 en rawh.

【4】Guarantee a ni Luo leh Dan

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a dan laka thi tawh

Chutichuan, ka unaute u, Pathian tana rah kan chhuah theih nan midangte ta in nih theih nan Krista taksa hmangin "Dan lakah thi" in ni ta a ni. --Rom 7:4 ah hian kan hmu

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a danah thi rawh

Dan avang hian Pathian tana ka nung theih nan "Dan hnenah ka thi" a ni. --Galatia 2:19 ah hian kan hmu a

3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Min phuartu danah thi → dan ata zalen

(1) Mihring tisa hlui duhzawng leh duhzawng sualte chu inthiarfihlim rawh

chhanna: Tisa thiltih chu a chiang hle: uirena, bawlhhlawhna, bawlhhlawhna, milem biakna, dawithiamna, huatna, inhnialna, inhuatna, thinrimna, pawl hrang hrang, inhnialna, thurin dik lo, leh inhuatna , zu ruih, lawmna, etc.. Ka sawi tawh che u a, tunah hian ka hrilh che u a, hetiang thil titute hian Pathian ram an luah lo vang. --Galatia 5:19-21 ah hian kan hmu a

Chung zingah chuan kan awm vek a, tisa châknate chu kan inhlim a, tisa leh thinlung duhzâwngte kan zui a, kan pianphungah chuan mi zawng zawng ang bawkin thinurna fa kan ni. --Ephesi 2:3

Chutichuan, in taksa peng leia awmte chu that rawh u: inngaihna te, bawlhhlawhna te, châkna sual te, châkna sual te, duhâmna (chu chu milem biakna nên a inang). Tunah erawh chuan heng zawng zawng hi i bânsan tur a ni a, thinurna te, thinurna te, sualna te, sawichhiatna te, leh i kâ aṭanga ṭawngkam bawlhhlawh te nên. dawt sawi suh u, mihring hlui leh a thiltihte chu in paih bo tawh a ni - Kolossa 3:5-9

Kan Bible hi 1 Chronicles 139-ah hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Keton-a buhrawlhna hmun an thlen chuan (2 Samuela 6:6-ah Nagon-a) Uza chuan bawnghnute a tlu avângin lawng chu chelh turin a kut a phar a.

Bawngpa chu a tlu a, Usa Yi chuan Thuthlung Bawm chu chelh turin a kut a phar a. 》Tawngtaina: Van Pa duhtak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. " " Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak “Thudik thu, an kutchhuak, i chhandamna Chanchin Tha chu van atangin rawn hruai a ni a, kan thlarau nun a tam theih nan! Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng reng a, Bible hrethiam tur leh thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh hriat theihna turin kan rilru a hawng zel→ Bawnghnute a tlu hnua Thuthlung Bawm thlawp tura a kut phar Uza vaukhânna kha hrethiam rawh. .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi Lal Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

1 Chronicles 13:7, 9-11-ah hian kan hmu a

Abinadaba in ata Pathian bâwm chu an la chhuak a, tawlailir tharah an dah a. Uza leh Ahio chuan tawlailir chu an khalh a. ... Keton buh hrualna hmun an thlen chuan (2 Samuela 6:6-a Nagon a ni) Uza chuan bawnghnute an tlu avângin lawng chu chelh turin a kut a phar a. LALPA chu a thinrim hle a, lawng chungah a kut a phar avangin a vuak a, Pathian hmaah a thi ta a ni. Davida chu Lalpan Uza a thah avangin a mangang hle a, chu hmun chu vawiin thleng hian Perez-Uza a ti ta a ni.

(1) Israel fate chuan Mosia Dan an nei a, dan leh thupek angin an che a

zawt: Bawngpa chu a tlu a, "a zuang" → Uza-a'n a kut a phar a, Thuthlung Bawm a chelh chu a dik lo em ni?

"Chutichuan puithiam, Levi-hote chuan LALPA, Israelte Pathian thuthlung bâwm chu la chhuak turin an inserh ta a. Levia fate chuan Mosia hmanga LALPAN thu a pêk ang ngeiin Pathian bâwm chu an kekawr ipteah an phur a." .Reference - 1 Chronicles 15 Bung 13-15

chhanna: Nimahsela Kohatha thlahte chu tawlailîr emaw, bawngpa emaw pawh pêk a ni lo, hmun thianghlim hna thawkin, thil thianghlimte chu an kekawr ipteah an phur a ni. Numbers bung 7 châng 9 en rawh --- Riahhmun chhuah hun a lo thlen chuan Arona leh a fapate chuan hmun thianghlim leh a bungrua zawng zawng chu an khuh zo vek tawh a, chutah chuan Kohatha fapate chu phur turin an lo kal a, mahse an phurh phal a ni lo thil thianghlimte chu khawih la, chuti lo chuan An thi ang. Biak bûka chûng bungrua chu Kohatha fapate chuan an phur tûr a ni. Number 4:15→

Note: "Thuthlung Bawm" hian Hmun Thianghlim leh Pathian lalthutphah a entir a ni! A chawi sang tur a ni a, tiang leh kekawrte chungah chawi tur a ni → Jeremia 17:12 Kan hmun thianghlim hi a tir ata chawimawina lalṭhutphah a ni. "Thuthlung Bawm" chu tawlailir thara dah a nih chuan mite chu tawlailir aiin an sang zawk a ni. Pathian chuan bawngpa "hlauthawng" leh Uza "hrem" hmangin Israel fate leh Lal Davida chu a vaukhân a, Uza thil thleng hnuah Lal Davida chu a inngaitlawm zual sauh sauh a → Kei pawh ka mithmuhah chuan ka inngaitlawm ang a, ka inngaitlawm ang - 2 Samuela Bung 6 Châng 22. Chuvangin Pathian chuan, “Davida chu keimah ang mi a ni—Tirhkohte 13 chang 22 en rawh. Keini ngaithlatute pawh hi inngaitlawm tur a ni a, Pathian tirh hnathawkte aiin kan sang thei lo ang!

(2) Jentail-te hian dan an nei a, chu chu chhinchhiahna 1999-a hma la tura chhia leh tha hriatna dante an nei a ni.

chhanna: Philistia mite "chu chu Jentail-te" chuan Mosia Dân an nei lo va, Mosia Dân thupek angin an che a ngai lo va, Jentail-te erawh chuan "anmahni dân" an nei a, chu chu chhia leh ṭha hriatna dân a ni , dan thilte chu an nihna ang zêlin ti rawh - Rome Josua 2:14 en rawh → Anni chuan, “Israel-te i hruai duh chuan Pathian Bâwm chu ruak taka thawn kîr leh tur a ni lo va, a hnênah inremna hlan a ngai a ni offering? "Khawiah nge inremna thilpekte chu?" Chu hri chu mite leh in lalte chungah pawh a lo thleng ta ... Tunah chuan tawlailir thar siam la, tawlailir-ah chuan bawnghnute pahnih chu khin la, bawnghnute chu LALPA hnen atangin rawn hruai haw rawh bawm pakhatah dah la, bawm chu thawn bo rawh 1 Samuela 6:3-4, 7-8.

(3) Dan chu tisa avanga chak lo a nih avangin a tih theih loh thil a awm

Dân chu tisa avângin a chak lo va, thil a ti thei lo avângin, Pathianin a Fapa ngei chu sual thawina atân tisa sual angin a rawn tir a, tisaah sual chu thiam loh a chantîr a, chutiang chuan Dân felna chu keimahni tute zîngah a lo thlen famkim theih nân tisa angin nung suh , Thlarau Thianghlim zuitute chauh. Rom 8:3-4 ah hian kan hmu a

Thil chhinchhiah: Israel fate chuan Mosia Dan an nei a, Jentailte pawhin anmahni dan an nei ve bawk → Mahse khawvela mi zawng zawng hian dan bawhchhiain Pathian ropuina an tisual a, an tlachham vek tawh - Rom 3:23 en rawh. Tisa chak lohna avang chuan mihringin Dan felna chu a hlen chhuak thei lo va, Pathianin a Fapa chu tisa sual ang chiaha awm turin a tir a, tisaah sual thawina a lo ni ta a, chutiang chuan Dan felna chu a thiam loh phah ta a ni tisa zui lo , Thlarau Thianghlim zuitute chauhah hian a thleng famkim thei a ni. Amen! Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

A THA E! Vawiin hian ka inpawlna hi in zavaia hnenah ka hlan duh a, a bul tanna Lal Isua Krista khawngaihna te, Pa Pathian hmangaihna te, Thlarau Thianghlim infuih tharna te chu in zavaia hnenah a awm reng a ni! Amen

articles.title: Nadaba leh Abihu chuan mei mak tak mai an hlan a
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen

Leviticus Bung 10, châng 1-3-ah Bible hi hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Arona fapa Nadaba leh Abihua te chuan anmahni rimtui bawm an la ṭheuh a, meiin an khat a, rimtui an theh a, LALPAN thu a pek loh mei dang LALPA hmaah an hlan a.

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Mei mak tak mai". Tawngtai rawh: Van Pa duhtak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Kan chhandamna chanchin ha chu a ni, an kut hmanga thutak ziak leh sawi chhuaktu hnathawktu a tirh avangin Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi a ni. Kan thlarau nun hausak zawk nan van atangin chhang rawn kengin a hun takah min pe chhuak thin a ni. Amen! Lal Isua hnenah thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che→ Mei mak tak hlan tih awmzia chu i hrethiam em?

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi Lal Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Mei pangngai, . fán huǒ tia lam a ni a, Chinese tawng a ni a, khawvel mite rilru lama an duhzawng tihna a ni.

hrilhfiah : Khawvel mite rilru lama an duhna.

Source: Yuan Dynasty Zheng Tingyu-a "Nin Zi Ji" bung khatna: "I apprentice-in sum a hman nasat loh chuan ka pum chhungah mei pangngai a kang ang. Ka pu ang maiin thlipui karah ka kawr chhungah ka thup ang a, leh." ka pu thla eng tak chu a tiang tip-ah chuan entawn rawh."

Leviticus 10:1-3 Arona fapa Nadaba leh Abihua te chuan anmahni rimtui bawm an la a, meiah an khat a, rimtui an dah a, LALPA hmaah mei danglam tak an hlan a, chu chu LALPAN thu a pek loh chuan a awm a mei LALPA hma ata lo chhuak la, hal la, LALPA hmaah an thi ang. Tichuan Mosia chuan Arona hnênah, "LALPA'n heti hian a sawi: 'Min hnaihtute zîngah ka thianghlim ang a, mipui zawng zawng mithmuhah chuan chawimawiin ka awm ang,'" a ti a.

Bible hrilhfiahna:

chhanna: Mei mak tak chuan tisa châkna leh châknate a entîr a - tisa lam, khawvêl lam, bawlhhlawh, sual, thianghlim lo → "Nang leh in fapate inkhâwmna puan inah in luh hunah uain emaw, zu ruih emaw in in tur a ni lo, chutilochuan Thihna i in tur a ni lo; hei hi a ni ang." mi thianghlim leh mi thianghlim in thliar hrang theihna turin in thlah kal zelah kumkhuain dan siam rawh u, Leviticus 10:9-10 en rawh.

Thil chhinchhiah: Tunlai kohhran tam tak chuan thil thianghlim leh thil pangngai, thil thianghlim leh thianghlim lo hi an thliar hrang lo → an zavaiin "an duh ang ngeiin thil bawlhhlawh, dawidim leh bawlhhlawh te, thuthlung hlui leh thuthlung thar thliar hran a awm lo, a awm bawk." dan hnuaia thil awmte inthliarna a awm lo" Khawngaihna leh khawngaihna inthliarna a awm lo va, mihring hlui leh mihring thar inkara inthenna a awm lo va, Adama ta leh Krista ta inthenna a awm lo, inthenna a awm lo tisa leh thlarau inkârah, mi sual leh mi fel inṭhenna a awm lo va, êng leh thim inṭhenna a awm lo va, thianghlim leh thianghlim inthliarna a awm lo, thliar hran lova thianghlim chu "mi sual" tihthianghlimte hlan loh hi a ni " Pathian hnenah → Nadaba leh Abihu-te'n Pathian hnena "mei mak tak" an hlan ang khan, chu chu Lalpan thupek a pe lo. Pathian tana inpumpêk, Nadaba leh Abihu-a "thumna" hi entawn tur a ni → rorelna leh the hmêlma zawng zawng kang ral vek tur mei halraltu Hebrai 10:27, 2 Thessalonika 2:8 leh Thupuan 20 en rawh.
