articles.title: Mosia hmai khuh puanzar chu
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unaute tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Bible hawngin 2 Korinth 3:16 hi i chhiar ho ang u: Mahse an thinlungin Lalpa lam a hawi veleh chuan puanzar chu a la bo ta a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Mosia Hmai Puanzar". Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. lawm"" Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak "An kuta thutak thu ziak leh sawi hmanga hnathawkte tirh chhuah → Pathian thuruk finna, hun kal tawha thuruk, kan chhandamna leh ropuina atana Pathianin kum zawng zawng hmaa a lo ruat lawk thu chu! Keini hnenah." through the Holy Spirit It’s revealed.Amen Lal Isuan kan thlarau lam mitte chu ti eng zel sela, thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh theih nan leh kan hriat theih nan Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru min hawng zel ang che→ Mosia’n a hmai puan in a khuh hmaa a entîrna chu hrethiam rawh .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Exodus 34:29-35 ah hian kan hmu a

Mosia chu Sinai tlâng ata Dân lungphêk pahnih kengin a lo chhuk khân Lalpan a biak avângin a hmêl a eng tih a hre lo. Arona leh Israel fa zawng zawngte chuan Mosia hmel a eng tih an hmu a, a hnaih chu an hlau hle a. Mosian anni chu a ko va, tin, Arona leh kohhran hotute chu a hnenah an lo kal a, Mosia chuan a bia a. Chutichuan, Israel mi zawng zawng chu an rawn hnaih a, Sinai tlânga LALPA thu a hrilh zawng zawng chu an hnênah thu a pe a. Mosia’n an hnena thu a sawi zawh hnu chuan a hmai chu puan in a khuh a. Nimahsela, Mosia chu LALPA hmaah thu sawi tura a lo kal chuan puanzar chu a phelh a, a lo chhuah chuan Lalpa thupek chu Israel mite hnenah a hrilh ta a. Israel fate chuan Mosia hmel eng chu an hmu a. Mosia chuan a hmai chu puanzarin a khuh leh a, Lalpa biak tura a luh chuan puanzar chu a phelh ta a.

zawt: Engvangin nge Mosia chuan a hmai chu puanzarin a khuh?
chhanna: Aron leh Israel fa zawng zawngin Mosia hmel eng mawi tak an hmuh chuan a hnaih chu an hlau hle a

zawt: Engvangin nge Mosia hmel mawi tak chu a eng?
chhanna: Pathian chu eng a ni si a, LALPAN a hnenah thu a sawi a, a hmai a ti eng a → Pathian chu eng a ni a, a chhungah thim a awm lo. Hei hi Lalpa hnen atanga thuchah kan hriat leh in hnena kan rawn thlen leh chu a ni. 1 Johana 1:5

zawt: Mosia’n a hmai puanzar a khuh hian eng nge a entîr?
chhanna: “Mosia chuan puanzarin a hmai a khuh” tih hian Mosia chu Dân lem dik tak ni lovin, lungphek chunga ziak dân enkawltu a nihzia a târ lang a ni. Tin, miten Mosia an rinchhan thei lo va, Mosia dan an zawm thei lo tih a entir bawk a, Pathian ropuina an hmu thei lo → Dan hi a tir lamah chuan Mosia hmanga hrilh a ni a, khawngaihna leh thutak chu Isua Krista aanga lo chhuak a ni. Thuhmahruai--Johana 1:17. “Dan” hi “khawngaihna leh thutak” lama min hruaitu training master a ni. Amen—Gal. 3:24 en rawh.

zawt: Dan hi tunge a lan tak tak?
chhanna: Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni a, chu thil lem dik tak a nih loh avangin, kum tin inthawina inang chiah hlanin hnaihtute chu a ti famkim thei lo. Hebrai Bung 10 Châng 1 → “Dan awm dan chiang tak chu Krista a ni a, Dan thupui khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni → Dan thupui chu Krista a ni, tichuan amah ring apiangin felna an chang ang. Reference - Rom Bung 10 Châng 4. He thu hi chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Lung chunga ziak thihna rawngbawlnaah ropuina a awm a, chuvang chuan Israel fate chuan Mosia hmel ropuina, zawi zawiin a bo zel avangin a hmel chu ngun takin an en thei lo va, 2 Korinth 3:7

(1) Dan rawngbâwlna lung-a ziak → chu thihna rawngbawlna a ni

zawt: Engvangin nge lungah dan ziak hi thihna rawngbawlna a nih?
chhanna: Mosia’n Aigupta saltanna in ata Israel fate a hruai chhuah avang khan Israel fate chu thlalerah an tlu ta a, amah ngei pawhin Kanaan ramah "a lut" thei lo va, chu ram chu Pathianin a tiam hnutetui leh khawizuin a luang chhuak a, chuvang chuan dan chu lungah an phun ta a ni. A rawngbawlna hi thihna rawngbawlna a ni. Kanaan ram i luh theih loh emaw, Mosia Dan anga Van Ram i luh theih loh chuan Kaleba leh Josua'n "rinna" nena an hruai chauhvin i lut thei ang.

(2) Dan rawngbâwlna lung-a ziak → chu thiam loh chantirna rawngbawlna a ni

2 Korinth 3:9 Thiam loh chantirna rawngbawlna hi a ropui a nih chuan thiamchantirna rawngbawlna hi a ropui lehzual a ni.

zawt: Engvangin nge dan rawngbawlna hi thiam loh chantirna rawngbawlna a nih?
chhanna: Dan hi miten an sualte an hriat chiantirna tur a ni a, I sual tih i hriat chuan i sualte chu i inrem a ngai a ni dan hnuaia awmte hnena sawi a ni a, mi zawng zawng ka khap nan. Rom 3:19-20 en rawh. Chuvangin Dan rawngbawlna hi thiam loh chantirna rawngbawlna a ni. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(3) Thinlung lungphek chunga rawngbawlna inziak chu thiamchantirna rawngbawlna a ni

Zawhna: Thiam chantirna rawngbawlna enkawltu chu tu nge ni?
Chhanna: Thiam chantirna rawngbawlna, “Krista” chu enkawltu a ni → Miten Krista rawngbawltu leh Pathian thuruk enkawltu angin min ngai tur a ni. Enkawltu laka thil phût chu a rinawm a nih hi a ni. 1 Korinth 4:1-2 Tunlai kohhran tam tak “ . Aih "Pathian thuruk enkawltu, ." Aih Krista rawngbawltute→Mosia Dan an zawm ang~ Thiam loh chantirna enkawltu, thihna rawngbawlna →Mite chu sualah hruai la, misualah lo chang ula, sual tan in ata tlanchhuak thei lova, mite chu dan hnuaiah leh thihnaah hruai rawh u, Mosia’n Aigupta ram ata Israel fate a hruai chhuah a, thlalera dan hnuaia an tlu vek ang khan; a hnuah Felna enkawltu tia koh a ni → "Tuman pu pahnih rawng an bawl thei lo."

(4) Thinlung chu Lalpa hnena a lo kir leh apiangin puanzar chu a hlihsak ang

2 Korinth 3:12-16 Chutiang beiseina kan neih avângin, Israel fate’n boral tûr tâwp lam chu ngun taka an thlîr theih lohna tûra a hmai khuh tuamtu Mosia ang lo takin huaisen takin kan sawi a ni. Mahse an thinlung chu a khauh a, vawiinah pawh Thuthlung Hlui chhiar a nih pawhin puanzar chu a la hlihsak lo. He veil hi kristaah a awm Abolied tawh a ni . Mahse, vawiin thleng hian Mosia Lehkhabu chhiar apiangin puanzar chu an thinlungah a la awm reng a ni. Mahse an thinlungin Lalpa lam a hawi veleh chuan puanzar chu a la bo ta a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah: Engvângin nge khawvêl hmun hrang hranga mite hian tûn laiah puan in an khuh? I fimkhur tur a ni lo maw? An thinlung a khauh a, Pathian hnena kir leh duh lo a nih avangin Setana bum an ni a, Thuthlung Hluiah te, Dan hnuaiah te, thiam loh chantirna rawngbawlna hnuaiah te, thihna rawngbawlna hnuaiah te an awm duh a ni thudik leh thu dik lo lam hawi. I hmai chu puan in khuh rawh → An lo kal thei lo tih a tilang a ni Pathian hmaah Pathian ropuina hmuin , thlarau lam chaw ei tur an nei lo va, tui nung in tur pawh an nei lo → "Ni te chu a lo thleng dawn ta," tiin Lalpa Pathian chuan a puang a, "Leiah hian riltam ka rawn tir ang. Mite chu chhang tlakchham vang ni lovin, an ril a tam ang a, tin." tui tlakchham vang ni lovin, Lalpa aw an ngaihthlak loh vangin an tuihal ang a ni Amosa 8:11-12

(5) Kristaa hmel inhawng takin Lalpa ropuina i hmu thei a

Lalpa chu Thlarau a ni a, Lalpa Thlarau awmnaah chuan zalenna a awm. Keini zawng zawng hian, darthlalang ang maia Lalpa ropuina hmuin, Lalpa Thlarau avângin, Lalpa Thlarauvin, ropuina aanga ropuina dang ang bawkin, hmêl inangah kan inthlâk danglam vek a ni. 2 Korinth 3:17-18-ah hian kan hmu a

A THA E! Chu zawng zawng chu vawiin a inbiakpawhna leh in hnena kan insemna atan a ni. Amen

2021.10.15 khan a ni

articles.title: (5) Chhandamna atan Krista lam hawi rawh;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unaute tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Isaia bung 45 châng 22-na Bible hi hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Lei tawp zawng zawngte u, keimah hi en la, chhandam in ni ang;

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Chhandamna leh Ropuina". Aih. 5. A rilru a hah lutuk Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Hnathawktute a tirh chhuah avangin “hmeichhe ṭha tak” chungah lawmthu kan sawi e anni Thudik thu kuta ziak leh sawi → hian hun kal tawha Pathian thuruk thuruk, chatuan hmaa chhandam leh chawimawi kan nih theihna tura Pathianin a ruat lawk thu finna min pe a ni! Thlarau Thianghlimin min hriattir. Amen! Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh → khawvel siam hmaa chhandam leh chawimawi tura Pathianin min ruat lawk a ni tih hrethiam rawh! Chhandamna zawnga Krista lam thlir hi a ni a; ! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】Chhandamna atan Krista lam hawi rawh

Isaia Bung 45 Châng 22 Lei tawp zawng zawngte u, mi en ula, chhandam in ni ang, kei hi Pathian ka ni a, mi dang a awm lo.

(1) Thuthlung Hlui hun laia Israel fate chuan chhandamna tur chuan dar rul chu an thlir a

LALPA chuan Mosia hnenah, "Rul mei siam la, tiang chungah dah rawh; Tupawh seh chuan rul chu a en ang a, a nung ang," a ti a nunna. Number Bung 21 Châng 8-9

zawt: “Rûl dâr” chuan eng nge a entîr?
chhanna: Dar rul chuan kan sualna avanga ânchhe dawngtu leh misualten thinga an khaihlum tawh Krista a entîr a ni → Thingkungah an khai a, kan sualte chu mimal takin a phur a, chutiang chuan sual chunga kan thih avângin felnaah kan thi thei a ni. A vuaknain i tidam a ni. Thuhmahruai--1 Petera Bung 2 Châng 24

(2) Thuthlung Tharah chhandamna dawng tura Krista lam hawi

Johana 3:14-15 Mosia’n thlalera rul a chawi kai ang khan Mihring Fapa pawh a kai tho tur a ni, amah ring apiangin chatuan nunna an neih theih nan (a nih loh leh amah ring apiangin chatuana nunna an neih theih nan) → Johana 12 Bung 32: Lei ata chawi kai ka nih chuan mi zawng zawng ka hnenah ka hruai ang. ” → Johana 8:28 Chuvangin Isuan: “Mihring Fapa in chawi kai phawt chuan Krista ka ni tih in hria ang → Chuvang chuan ka hrilh a che u, in sualah in thi ang,” a ti a. Krista ka ni tih i rin loh chuan i sualah i thi ang. ” Johana 8:24-ah kan hmu.

zawt: Krista awmzia chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Krista chu Chhandamtu a ni tihna → Isua chu Krista, Messia, leh kan nun chhandamtu a ni! Isua Krista chuan min chhandam a: 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a sual laka fihlim, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan leh a ânchhia laka zalen, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Hades-a Setana thiltihtheihna thim tak ata tlanchhuak, . 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a rorelna leh thihna laka zalen; 5. A rilru a hah lutuk Mitthi zing ata Krista thawhlehna chuan min piang thar leh a, Pathian fa nihna leh chatuan nunna min pe ta a ni! Amen → Krista lam kan thlir a, Isua Krista chu kan nun chhandamtu leh Chhandamtu a ni tih kan ring tur a ni. Lal Isuan min ti → Chuvangin ka hrilh a che u, I sualah i thi ang. Krista ka ni tih i rin loh chuan i sualah i thi ang. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai--1 Petera Bung 1 Châng 3-5

【2】Krista nen inpumkhat la, chawimawiin awm rawh

A thihna angin amah nen kan inpumkhat tawh a nih chuan a thawhlehna angin kan inpumkhat bawk ang;

(1) Kristaah baptisma chang rawh

zawt: Engtin nge a thihna ang chiah hian Krista nen kan inpumkhat theih ang?
chhanna: “Kristaah Baptisma chang” → Keini Krista Isua baptisma changte kha a thihnaah baptisma kan chang tih i hre lo em ni? Thuhmahruai--Rom Bung 6 Châng 3

zawt: Baptisma chan chhan chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a nun thara kan leng theih nan → Chuvang chuan Krista chu Pa ropuina avanga mitthi zing ata kaihthawh a nih ang khan nunna thara kan len theih nan thihnaah baptisma changin a hnenah phum kan ni. Thuhmahruai--Rom 6:4;
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Krista nen khenbeh kan ni a, sual taksa tihboral a nih theih nan, sual lak ata kan chhuah zalen theih nan→ A thihna angin amah nen kan inpumkhat tawh a nih chuan... kan nihna hlui chu amah nen khenbehin a awm tih hriain, sual taksa tihboral a nih theih nan, sual Bawih kan nih tawh loh nan; Note: “Baptisma chang” tih awmzia chu Krista ruala khenbeh kan ni tawh tihna a ni a, hei hi chiang takin i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai--Rom 6:5-7;
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mahni thar inthuam la, Krista inthuam rawh → I rilruah siam thar la, Pathian anpuia felna leh thianghlimna dik taka siam chu inbel rawh. Ephesi 4:23-24 → Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. Kristaa baptisma chang tawh zawng zawngte chuan Krista in inthuam a. Galatia 3:26-27-ah kan hmu

(2) Thawhlehna angin Krista nena inpumkhatna

zawt: Thawhlehna angah engtin nge Amah nen kan inpumkhat theih ang?
chhanna: " " Lalpa Zanriah ei rawh ” → Isuan, “Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, Mihring Fapa sa in ei a, a thisen in in loh chuan nangmah ah nunna i nei lo. Tupawh ka tisa ei a, ka thisen in chuan chatuan nunna a nei a, ni hnuhnungah chuan ka kaitho leh ang. Thuhmahruai--Johana 6:53-54→ I hnena thu ka hrilh kha Lalpa hnen atanga ka dawn kha a ni a, Lal Isua an phatsan zan khan chhang a la a, lawmthu a sawi zawh chuan a phel a, “Hei hi ka taksa a ni a, chu chu pek a ni nang” Scrolls: broken), record turin hetiang hian i ti tur a ni Min hre reng ang che." Chaw ei kham chuan no chu a la bawk a, "He no hi ka thisena thuthlung thar a ni , a lo kal hma loh chuan Lalpa thihna kan sawi chhuak a ni. Thuhmahruai--1 Korinth 11 chang 23-26

(3) I kraws pu la, Lalpa zui la, . Ram chanchin tha hril rawh chawimawi rawh u

Chuvangin mipui leh a zirtirte chu a ko va, an hnenah, "Tupawh ka hnung zui duh chuan amah leh amah a phat tur a ni a, a kraws puin mi zui tur a ni. Marka 8:34," a ti a

zawt: Mahni kraws keng a, Isua zui “tum” chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: kalpel Krista kraws chungchang sawi la, vanram chanchin tha hril rawh

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Ring rawh" Krista nen khenbeh ka ni tawh a, keimah hi ka nung tawh lo va, Krista chu ka tan a "nung" zawk → Krista nen khenbeh ka ni tawh a, keimah hi ka nung tawh lo va, keimahah Krista a nung zawk a ni; nun Tunah hian taksaah ka nung mek Pathian Fapa rinnain ka nung a, ani hian min hmangaih a, ka aia a inpe a ni. Thuhmahruai--Galatia Bung 2 Châng 20
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Rinna" Sual taksa chu a boral a, sual lakah kan zalen ta → Kan mihring hlui kha Amah nen khenbeh a ni tih kan hre si a, sual taksa chu boral a nih theih nan, bawih kan nih tawh loh nan sual tur chuan a thi tawh chu sual lakah a chhuak tawh si a. Rom 6:6-7 ah hian kan hmu
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Rinna" chuan dan leh a ânchhe lak ata min chhuah zalen → Mahse, min phuartu dan laka kan thih aang khan tunah chuan dan lakah kan zalen ta a, chutichuan thlarau (thlarau: emaw, Thianghlim tia lehlin emaw angin Lalpa rawng kan bawl thei ta a ni Thlarau) Kawng thar, tih dan hlui ang ni lovin. Rom 7:6 → Krista chuan Dan ânchhe lak ata min tlan a, kan tân ânchheah siam a ni a, heti hian ziak a ni: “Thing chunga khai apiang chu ânchhe dawng an ni "Galatia 3:13
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a “Rinna” hian putar leh a nungchang a tikhawtlai a ni – Kolossa 3:9 en rawh
5. A rilru a hah lutuk "Rinna" chu Diabola leh Setana lakah a tlanchhuak → Naupangte hian tisa leh thisen taksa inang an chan avangin, amah ngei pawhin thihna hmanga thihna thiltihtheihna neitu, chu chu a tihboral theih nan tisa leh thisen inang chu a pu ve bawk a ni , Diabola, leh dam chhung zawnga thihna hlau tawhte chu chhuah zalen rawh Bawih ni. Hebrai 2:14-15 ah hian kan hmu
6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a “Rinna” chu thim leh Hades thiltihtheihna lakah a tlanchhuak → Thim thiltihtheihna lakah min chhanchhuak a, a Fapa duh tak ramah min sawn a ni
7. A rilru a hah lutuk "Rinna" chu khawvel a tlanchhuak → I thu ka pe ta. Khawvel mi an nih loh avangin khawvelin a hua a, kei pawh khawvel mi ka ni lo. ...khawvelah min tir ang bawkin kei pawhin khawvelah ka tir a ni. Johana 17:14,18 en rawh
8. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a " " lehkhathawn " " Krista nen kan thi a, thawhleh, piang thar, chhandam, leh Amah hnena chatuan nunna nei, van ram ro luah tur chu ka "ring" ang! Amen . Rom 6:8 leh 1 Petera 1:3-5 en rawh

Hei hi Lal Isuan a sawi → A sawi: "A hun a lo thleng ta, Pathian ram chu a hnai ta. Sim ula, Chanchin |ha chu ring rawh u" → A nunna chhanhim duh apiang tan ( or translation: soul part 2) Tupawh keimah leh chanchin tha avanga a nunna hloh chuan a hloh ang. Mihringin khawvel pumpui a hlawh chhuak a, mahni nunna a hloh chuan eng nge a hlawkna? Mihringin a nunna aiah eng thil dang nge a pek theih ang? Thuhmahruai--Marka Bung 8 Châng 35-37 leh Bung 1 Châng 15

Hla: Ropuina Lal i ni

A THA E! Chu zawng zawng chu vawiin a inbiakpawhna leh in hnena kan insemna atan a ni. Amen

articles.title: (4) Kawng dik hrethiam la, chhandam rawh;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unaute tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Kan Bible-te hi 1 Timothea Bung 2 leh chang 4-ah hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: Mi zawng zawng chhandam ni se, thutak hrethiam turin a duh a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Chhandamna leh Ropuina". Aih. 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Tun hmaa an kuta thutak thu ziak leh sawi hmanga Pathian thuruk finna thup, mi zawng zawng hmaa chhandamna leh chawimawi tura Pathianin min ruat lawk thu chu a ni chatuan atan! Thlarau Thianghlimin min hriattir. Amen! Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel tur leh Bible hrethiam tura kan rilru hawng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh → khawvel siam hmaa chhandam leh chawimawi tura Pathianin min ruat lawk a ni tih hrethiam rawh! Thutak hrethiam a, chhandam nih hi a ni; ! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】Kawng dik hrethiam la, chhandam rawh

1 Timothea 2:4 Mi zawng zawng chhandam an nih theih nan leh thutak hriatna an neih theih nan a duh a ni.

(1) Kawng dik hrethiam rawh

zawt: Kawng dik tak chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: "Thutak" chu thutak a ni a, "Tao" chu Pathian a ni → A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, Tao chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Tao chu Pathian a ni. He Thu hi a tir lamah Pathian hnenah a awm a. Engkim amah hmanga siam a ni a, a tel lo chuan engmah siam a ni lo. Thuhmahruai--Johana Bung 1 Châng 1-3

(2) Thu chu tisaah a lo chang ta a

Thu chu tisaah lo changin kan zingah a awm ta a, khawngaihna leh thutak nen a khat a ni. Tin, a ropuina, Pa fa mal neih chhun ropuina chu kan hmu ta a ni. ... Pathian hi tumahin an hmu ngai lo, Fapa mal neih chhun, Pa rilru chhunga awm chauhvin Amah chu a rawn pholang a ni. Thuhmahruai--Johana 1:14,18. Note: Thu chu tisaah a chang → chu chu Pathian tisaah a chang → Nula thianghlim Mariin a rai a, Thlarau Thianghlim atanga lo piang a ni → [Isua hming vuah]! Isua hming → tih awmzia chu a mite sual lak ata chhandam tihna a ni. Amen! Tuman Pathian an la hmu ngai lova, Fapa mal neih chhun “Isua” chauh Pa kawchhunga awm chuan Amah chu a rawn inpuang ta → chu chu Pathian leh Pa puan chhuahna tur a ni! →Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "Mi hriat chuan ka Pa pawh in hre tawh ang. Tun atang chuan in hre tawh ang a, in hmu tawh ang Reference - Johana 14:7

(3) Nun dan

A tir aanga nunna thu bulpui chungchangah chuan hei hi kan hriat, kan hmuh, kan mit ngeia kan hmuh leh kan kut hmanga kan khawih chu a ni. (He nun hi a lo lang ta a, kan hmu ta a, tunah chuan Pa hnena awm leh kan hnena lo lang chatuan nunna chu kan puang chhuak che u tih kan hriattir a ni.) Kan thil hmuh leh hriatte chu kan puang che u a, chutiang chuan Nang pawhin kan inpawlna an nei a ni. Pa leh a Fapa Isua Krista nena kan inpawlna a ni. 1 Johana 1:1-3

(4) Isua chu Pathian nung Fapa a ni

Vantirhkoh chuan, "Hlau suh, Mari! Pathian duhsakna i hmu ta. Nau i nei ang a, fapa i hrin ang a, a hmingah Isua i sa ang. A ropui ang a, Fapa tia koh a ni ang," a ti a Chungnungbera ta; Pathianin a pa Davida lalṭhutphah chu a pe ang a, Jakoba chhûngte chungah kumkhuain a lal ang a, a ram chu tâwp a nei tawh lo vang." Mari chuan vântirhkoh hnênah, "Pasal ka neih loh avângin engtin nge ka chungah hetiang hi a thlen theih ang? " A chhanna chu: “Thlarau Thianghlim chu i chungah a lo thleng ang a, Chungnungbera thiltihtheihnain a khuh ang che u, chuvangin mi thianghlim lo piang tur chu Pathian Fapa tia koh a ni ang. Luka 1:30-35."
Matthaia 16:16 Simon Petera chuan, "Nang chu Krista, Pathian nung Fapa i ni," tiin a chhang a.

(5) Fapa nihna kan chan theih nan Dan hnuaia mite tlan turin Pathianin a Fapa duh tak chu Dan hnuaia piang turin a tir a.

Galatia 4:4-7 Nimahsela, hun kim a lo thlen chuan Pathianin a Fapa, hmeichhe laka piang, Dan hnuaia piang chu a tir chhuak a, Dan hnuaia awmte tlan turin, fapa point hming kan dawn theih nan. Fapa in nih avângin, Pathianin a Fapa Thlarau chu in (original text: kan) thinlungah a rawn tir a, “Abba, Pa,” tiin a au chhuak ta a ni. tin, fapa i nih avangin Pathian chu a ro luahtuah i innghat a ni.

(6) Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chu chhinchhiahna atan leh vanram luh theihna tur certificate atan dawng rawh

Ephesi 1:13-14 Thutak thu, in chhandamna Chanchin Tha in hriat lai khan Krista pawh in rin lai khan, Thlarau Thianghlimin tiam khan chhinchhiahin in awm a. He Thlarau Thianghlim hi Pathian mite (original text: inheritance) a ropuina fak tura tlan an nih hma loh chuan kan rochan thutiam (original text: inheritance) a ni.

(7) Kawng dik hrethiam la, chhandam ni rawh

Johana Bung 15 Châng 3 “Tûnah chuan i hnêna thu ka sawi avângin in thianghlim ta,” tiin Lal Isuan a sawi.

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a A fai tawh: Thianghlim tihna a ni Thianghlim, sual nei lo →Amahah chuan in ring bawk a, thutak thu, in chhandamna chanchin in hriatin, Amah chu in ring a, amahah chuan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahna in siam a ni →“Paula sawi angin,” ka nih theih nan a Jentailte tana Krista Isua chhiahhlawh , Pathian Chanchin |ha puithiam ni turin, Jentailte inthawinate chu Thlarau Thianghlima tihthianghlim a nih theih nan. Thuhmahruai--Rom 15:16
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Silfai tawh, tihthianghlim leh thiam chantir tawh: Chutiang bawkin in zînga ṭhenkhat chu in silfai a, tihthianghlim in ni a, Lalpa Isua Krista hming leh kan Pathian Thlarauvin thiam changin in awm ta a ni. Thuhmahruai--1 Korinth 6:11

(8) Isua chu kawng, thutak leh nunna a ni

Johana Bung 14 Châng 6 Isuan: “Kei hi kawng leh thutak leh nunna ka ni, keimah chauh lo chu tumah Pa hnenah an lo kal lo va → “Krista” hmangin kawng thar leh nung min hawnsak a ni. Kawngpui chuan puanzar chu a paltlang a, chu chu a taksa a ni.

【2】Ro hlu chu leia bêlah dah a nih chuan a inpuang a, a chawimawi bawk

(1) . Chu ro hlu chu lei bêlah a inpuang a ni

He thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi keimahni aanga lo chhuak ni lovin Pathian hnen aanga lo chhuak a ni tih lantir nan leia bêlah he ro hlu hi kan nei a ni. Thil chhinchhiah:" naute "chu chu thutak thlarau a ni , . naute chu chu Pathian Thu , . naute chu chu Isua Krista ! Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? 2 Korinth 4:7-ah kan hmu

(2) . Isua thihna hian kan nihna hlui chu a tichak a, Isua nun chu kan nihna tharah a lantir a ni

Khawi lam zawng zawngah hmelmain min hual vel a, mahse kan tang lo va, kan mangang lo va, tihduhdah kan ni lo va, min thlahthlam si lo va; Isua nunna pawh keimahniah a lan chhuah theih nan Isua thihna chu kan keng tel fo thin. Keini nungte hi kan taksa thi theiah hian Isua nunna a lo lan theih nan Isua avangin thihnaah hlan kan ni fo si a. Hetiang aang hian thihna hi keimahniah hian a thawk a, nangmahah erawh nunna hi a thawk a ni. 2 Korinth 4:8-12-ah hian kan hmu a

(3) . Ro hlu lo lang chhuak hian chatuan ropuina rit tak, tehkhin rual loh chu kan hmu thei a ni

Chuvang chuan kan lungngai lo. Pawn lam taksa chu tihchhiat ni mah se, chhungril taksa chu ni tin tihthar zel a ni. Hun rei lote chhunga kan hrehawm tawrhna leh êng lote hian kan tan chatuan ropuina rit tak, tehkhin rual lohin min thawk ang. 2 Korinth 4:16-17-ah hian kan hmu a

Hla: Thlarau Thianghlim hmanga siam tharna

A THA E! Chu zawng zawng chu vawiin a inbiakpawhna leh in hnena kan insemna atan a ni. Amen

articles.title: (3) Chanchin |ha ring la, chhandam rawh u;
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unaute tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

1 Korinth 15, châng 3-4-ah hian Bible i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u: Kei pawhin in hnena ka pek chu, a hmasa berah chuan, Krista chu Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin a thi a, a phum a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a ni thum niah a kaihthawh tih hi a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Chhandamna leh Ropuina". Aih. 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Tun hmaa an kuta thutak thu ziak leh sawi hmanga Pathian thuruk finna thup, mi zawng zawng hmaa chhandamna leh chawimawi tura Pathianin min ruat lawk thu chu a ni chatuan atan! Thlarau Thianghlimin min hriattir. Amen! Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Khawvel siam hma hian chhandamna leh chawimawina chang turin Pathianin min ruat lawk tih hrethiam rawh! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】Chhandamna chanchin tha

*Jentailte hnena chhandamna chanchin hril turin Isuan Paula a tir*

zawt: Chhandamna chanchin tha chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Pathianin tirhkoh Paula chu Jentailte hnena "Isua Krista chhandamna Chanchin Tha" hril turin a tir → Tunah chuan unaute u, a hmaa Chanchin |ha ka lo hrilh tawh che u, nangni pawhin in lo dawng tawh a, in dinna leh a nih chuan you I ring lo va, ka thu hrilh che u hi i vawn tlat chuan he Chanchin Tha hian chhandam i ni ang. In hnena ka lo hlan chhawn chu hetiang hi a ni: Pakhatnaah chuan Krista chu Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin a thi a, a phum a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a ni thum niah kaihthawh a ni 1-4 a ni

zawt: Krista hian kan sualna avanga a thih khan eng nge a chinfel?
chhanna: 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Sual lak ata min chhuahtir → Krista hmangaihnain min chêttîr a ni tih a lo lang a, a chhan chu "Krista" chu mi zawng zawng tâna a thih avângin, mi zawng zawng chu an thi vek a ni tih kan ngaihtuah a ni - Mitthite chu an zalên avângin Sual - Rom 6:7 → "Krista" chu mi zawng zawng tan a thi tawh a, chuvangin mi zawng zawng an thi tawh → "Thil thi tawh chu sual lakah chhuah zalen a ni a, mi zawng zawng an thi tawh" → Mi zawng zawng chu sual lak ata chhuah zalen an ni. Amen! , i ring em? Ringtute chu thiam loh chantir an ni lo va, ring lote erawh chu thiam loh chantir an ni tawh a, a chhan chu Pathian Fapa mal neih chhun "Isua" hming an rin loh vangin a mite sual laka chhandam turin → "Krista" chu mi zawng zawng tan a thi a, an thi vek a ni .
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan leh a ânchhe laka chhuah zalen--Rom 7:6 leh Gal. 3:12 en rawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

zawt: Tin, phum a nih chuan eng nge chinfel a nih?
chhanna: 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mihring hlui leh a nun hlui ata chhuah zalen rawh--Kolossa 3:9

zawt : Krista chu ni thum niah Bible-in a tho leh ta → Eng nge chinfel a nih?
chhanna: 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Isua Krista chu mitthi zing ata kaihthawh a ni" → "mi thiam min chantir" tih buaina chu a chinfel sak → Isua chu kan sualte avangin mite kutah hlan a ni (or lehlinna: Isua chu kan A bawhchhiatnate chhanchhuah a nih avangin a ni a; kan thiam chantirna atan kaihthawh a ni) Reference---Rom 4:25

Thil chhinchhiah: Hei hi → Isua Krista chuan Paula chu Jentailte hnena [chhandamna chanchin tha] hril turin a tir → Krista chu kan sualte avangin a thi → 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Sual buaina chu a chinfel sak a, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan leh Dan chibai bukna chungchang chinfel a ni a, phum → 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Putar leh a nungchang buaina chinfelna ni thumna-a thawhlehna→ 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a "Kan tan thiamchantirna, piantharna, thawhlehna, chhandamna leh chatuan nunna harsatnate" a chinfel sak a ni. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai--1 Petera Bung 1 Châng 3-5

【2】Mi thar chu inbel ula, mihring hlui chu paih bo la, ropuina chang rawh u

(1) Kan thinlunga Pathian Thlarau a chen hian tisa mi kan ni tawh lo

Rom 8:9 Pathian Thlarau nangmahniah a awm chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi in ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo.

zawt: Engvangin nge kan thinlunga Pathian Thlarau a cheng lai hian tisa mi kan nih loh?
chhanna: "Krista" chu mi zawng zawng tan a thi a, mi zawng zawng an thi → i thi tawh a, i nun "Pathian hnen atanga nunna" chu Krista nen Pathianah thup a ni si a. Kolossa 3:3 → Chuvangin Pathian Thlarau keimahniah a awm chuan mihring thara piangthar kan ni a, "mihring thar" chu "tisa mihring hlui" zinga mi a ni lo → Kan mihring hlui a ni tih kan hria si a was crucified with Him, so that Sual taksa chu tihchhiat a ni tawh a, chutiang chuan sual bawih kan ni tawh lo vang, Rom 6:6, "Sual taksa chu tihchhiat a ni tawh," tih hi en la, he taksaah hian kan tel tawh lo; thihna, eirukna taksa (corruption). Paula sawi ang chiah khan → Ka vanduai lutuk! He thihna taksa lakah hian tuin nge min chhanchhuak thei ang? Pathian hnenah lawmthu awm rawh se, kan Lalpa Isua Krista zarah kan tlanchhuak thei a ni. Hetiang aang hian ka thinlungin Pathian dan ka zawm a, ka tisa erawh chuan sual dan a zawm thung. Rom 7:24-25, hei hi chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(2) Mi upa chu dah bo tawh, putar dah bo tawh tih tawn

Kolossa 3:9 Dawt in indawt suh u, mihring hlui leh a thiltihte chu in thlahthlam si a.

zawt: “Mihring putar leh a thiltihte chu i sawn a ni si a.” Engvangin nge thil hlui leh nungchang hlui tihkhawtlai dan hi kan la paltlang a ngai?
chhanna: Pathian Thlarau chu kan thinlungah a cheng a, tisaah kan awm tawh lo → Hei hian rinnain mihring hlui tisa chu a “bosan” tihna a ni → Kan “mihring thar” nun chu Krista nen Pathianah thup bo a ni a; ” a la awm Ei la, in la, kal rawh! Engtin nge Bible-in "i thi tawh" a tih? mihring hlui chu a thi tawh a; “Mihring hlui hmuh theih” tihkhawtlai hi kan tawn a ngai → “Mihring hlui leh thar”, Pathian atanga piang thlarau mi leh Adama piang taksa mi hlui awm lo se chuan “thlarau leh tisa indona” a awm lo ang. articles.title: (2) Ring la, Thlarau Thianghlimin baptisma chang la, chhandam ni rawh;

articles.content:

Marka bung 16 châng 16-ah hian kan Bible i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u: Tupawh ringa baptisma chang apiang chu chhandam an ni ang Rom 6:3 Keini Krista Isuaa baptisma changte kha a thihnaah baptisma kan chang tih in hre lo em ni?

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Chhandamna leh Ropuina". Aih. 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. An kuta thutak ziak leh sawi hmanga hnathawktute a tirh → hun kal tawha Pathian thuruk thup, Pathianin kum zawng zawng hmaa chhandam leh chawimawi kan nih theihna tura min ruat lawk thu finna min pek avangin Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi a ni Thlarau Thianghlimin kan hnenah a lo inpuang ta a ni.Amena Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh theih nan leh kan hriat theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau lam mit min tivar zel ang che → Khawvel siam hma hian chhandamna leh chawimawina chang turin Pathianin min ruat lawk tih hrethiam rawh! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】A ring a, baptisma chang chu chhandam a ni ang

Marka 16:16 Tupawh ringa baptisma chang chu chhandam an ni ang;

zawt: Tupawh ring a, baptisma chang apiang chu chhandam an ni ang → Chhandam ni turin eng nge i rin?
chhanna: Chanchin tha ring la, chhandam i ni ang! → A sawi: "A hun a thleng ta, Pathian ram chu a hnai ta. Sim ula, Chanchin |ha chu ring rawh u!"

zawt: Chanchin |ha chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Chanchin |ha chu Pathianin tirhkoh Paula chu Jentailte hnena "chhandamna chanchin ha" hril turin a tir → Ka dawn leh ka hrilh che u kha: Pakhatnaah chuan Krista chu kan sualte avangin a thi a, Bible-in a sawi angin a phum a ni tih hi; ni thum niah a tho leh ta a ni. Thuhmahruai--1 Korinth 15 chang 3-4.

Thil chhinchhiah: He chanchintha hi i rin phawt chuan chhandam i ni ang. Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

zawt: Rinnain baptisma chang rawh→hei hian” baptisma a chang "Thlarau Thianghlim baptisma a ni em? A nih loh leh." Tui hmangin silfai tur a ni
chhanna: A ring a, baptisma changtu chu chhandam a ni ang → He " baptisma a chang "Awle thlarau thianghlim baptisma chantirna , a chhan chu " Thlarau Thianghlima Baptisma chang "Piantharna, kaihthawh leh chhandam i nih theih nan! Amen. Baptistu Johana sawi angin → Tuiin ka baptis che u a, ani erawh chuan Thlarau Thianghlimin a baptis ang che u, Marka 1:8 → Tirhkohte 11:16 chang, ka hrechhuak ta a ni." Lalpa thusawi: "Johana chuan tuiin baptisma a chang a, nangni erawh chu Thlarau Thianghlimin baptisma in chang ang." ’; Tui hmangin silfai tur a ni "Tisa bawlhhlawh paih bo tur ngaihtuah lo - 1 Petera 4:21 en rawh." tuiah baptisma a chang ” tih hi chhandamna tur condition a ni lo, . Chauh " " Thlarau Thianghlima Baptisma chang " " Chumi hnuah chauh chuan pianthar leh chhandam i ni thei ang .

zawt: Thlarau Thianghlim baptisma hi engtin nge kan dawn ang?
chhanna: Chanchin |ha ring la, thutak hrethiam la, Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chuan chhinchhiahin awm rawh → Amahah chuan nang pawhin i ring a, thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin i hriat a, amah i rin khan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahna i lo chang ta a ni. He Thlarau Thianghlim hi Pathian mite (original text: inheritance) a ropuina fak tura tlan an nih hma loh chuan kan rochan thutiam (original text: inheritance) a ni. Thuhmahruai--Ephesi 1:13-14. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

【2】Kristaah baptisma chang la, Krista inthuam la, ropuina chang rawh

Rom 6:5 A thihna angin amah nen kan inpumkhat tawh a nih chuan a thawhlehna angin amah nen kan inzawm ve bawk ang;

(1) A thihna angin amah nen kan inpumkhat chuan

chhanna:" Kristaah tuiin baptisma chang rawh Hei hi thihna ang maia Amah nena inpumkhat tur a ni → Krista Isua baptisma chang tawhte chu A thihnaah baptisma kan chang tih i hre lo em ni Reference – Rom 6:3

zawt: Engvângin nge “tuia baptisma” chu thihna leh Krista nêna inpumkhatna chi khat a nih?
chhanna: A chhan chu Krista chu kan sualte avanga khenbeh a nih vang → A pianzia leh taksa a nei a, thing chungah a khai a, "sual taksa" kha kan "sual taksa" a ni → Kristan kan sualte a phur a, "Kan misualte a thlak" avangin ruangte chu thingah an khai a, Pathianin sual nei lote chu thinga khaihin kan sualte "thil" turin a siam → Pathianin sual nei lote chu kan tan sualah a siam a, chutiang chuan amaha Pathian felna kan nih theih nan. Thuhmahruai--2 Korinth 5:21
Chuvangin Krista thihnaa “tui baptisma chang” → kan taksa pianphung siamte chu thinga innghat Krista taksa pianphung neia baptisma chantirna → hei hi “a thihna ang taka amah nena inzawmkhawm” hi a ni. "Tuiah baptisma i chan" hian Krista nen khenbeh i nih thu khawvel hnenah i puang a, i hriattir bawk a ni! Krista nena khenbeh kan nihna "joke" chu a awlsam a, "phurit" chu a êng → hei hi Pathian khawngaihna a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Chuvangin Lal Isuan heti hian a sawi: “Ka nghawngkawl chu a awlsam a, Ka phurrit pawh a rit lo Reference – Matthaia 11:30

(2) A thawhlehna angin amah nen inpumkhat rawh

zawt: Engtin nge Krista nen a thawhlehna ang chiah hian kan inpumkhat theih ang?
chhanna: “Lalpa tisa leh thisen ei leh in” tih hi a thawhlehna ang taka Krista nena inpumkhatna a ni → Isuan, “Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, tisa in ei a, thisen in in loh chuan Mihring Fapa, nangmah ah hian nunna i nei lovang keimahah, kei pawh amahah hian Reference - Johana 6:53-56.

(3) Lalpa Zanriah ei rawh

I hnena thu ka hrilh kha Lalpa hnen atanga ka dawn kha a ni a, Lal Isua an phatsan zan khan chhang a la a, lawmthu a sawi zawh chuan a phel a, “Hei hi ka taksa a ni a, chu chu pek a ni nangni (Ancient Scrolls: Broken), mi hriatrengna atan hetiang hian ti rawh u mi hriatrengna atan." He chhang hi in ei apiangin he no hi in in apiangin Lalpa a lo kal hma loh chuan a thih thu in puang thin. 1 Korinth 11:23-26-ah hian kan hmu a

Chuvangin Krista Isua rinna avangin Pathian fate in ni vek a. Kristaa baptisma chang tawh zawng zawngte chuan Krista in inthuam a. Galatia 3:26-27-ah kan hmu

Tupawh mi zui apiang chu thimah an kal ngai lovang, a nei zawk ang," a ti leh a nunna êng." ” Johana 8:12. Chuvangin mihring thar kan inthuam a, Krista kan inthuam chauh hian kan eng thei a, ropuina kan nei thei a, Pathian kan chawimawi thei bawk! Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

articles.title: Predestination 2 Pathianin Isua Krista zara chhandam kan nih theih nan min ruat lawk a

Thlarau Thianghlimin min hriattir. Amen! A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi Lal Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】Chatuan nunna atana ruat zawng zawngte chuan an ring vek a

Tirh.

Chhanna: Isua chu Krista a ni tih ring rawh! A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

(1) Isua chu Pathian nung Fapa a ni tih ring rawh

Vantirhkoh chuan a hnenah, "Hlau suh, Mari! Pathian duhsakna i hmu ta. I rai ang a, fapa i hrin ang a, a hmingah Isua i sa thei ang. A ropui ang a, Fapa tia koh a ni ang," a ti a Chungnungbera chuan Lalpa Pathianin a ropui ang a, ani chuan Jakoba chhungte chu a lal ang a, a lalram chuan a tawpna a nei lo vang Chungnungbera thiltihtheihnain a khuh ang che a, piang tur chu a thianghlim ang a, Pathian Fapa tia koh a ni ang Luka 1:30- Châng 35 → Isuan, “Tunge ka nih i tih? Simon Petera chuan, "Nang chu Krista, Pathian nung Fapa i ni," tiin a chhang a. ” Matthaia 16:15-16 ah hian kan hmu a

(2) Isua chu Thu tisaa lo chang a ni tih ring rawh

A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, Tao chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Tao chu Pathian a ni. ...Thu chu tisaah a lo chang ta a (chu chu Pathian chu tisaah a lo chang a, Nula thianghlim Mariin a rai a, Thlarau Thianghlimin a piang a, Isua a vuah ta a ni! - Matthaia 1:21 en la), khawngaihna leh thutaka khat, kan zingah a awm ta a ni . Tin, a ropuina, Pa fa mal neih chhun ropuina chu kan hmu ta a ni. ... Pathian hi tumahin an hmu ngai lo, Fapa mal neih chhun, Pa rilru chhunga awm chauhvin Amah chu a rawn pholang a ni. Johana 1:1,14,18-ah hian a lang

Rom 3:25 Pathianin Isua chu Isua thisen leh rinna hmangin inremna atan a din a, a dawhtheihnain a hmaa mihringte sual a ngaihdam avangin, 1 Johana Bung 4 Châng 10 Pathian kan hmangaih vang a ni lo va, Pathianin min hmangaih a, kan sualte inremna ni turin a Fapa a tir a ni , hei hi hmangaihna a ni → “Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe a, amah ring apiang chu an boral lo va, chatuan nunna an nei zawk ang ... Fapa ringtu chuan chatuan nunna a nei a ni Fapa chuan chatuan nunna a nei lo vang ( (original text: chatuan nunna a hmu lo vang), Pathian thinurna chu a chungah a awm reng ang” Johana 3:16,36.

【2】Pathianin fapa nihna chang turin min ruat lawk a

Nimahsela, hun kim a lo thlen chuan Pathianin a Fapa, hmeichhe laka piang, Dan hnuaia piang chu a tir a, fapa anga pawm kan nih theih nan Dan hnuaia awmte tlan turin. Galatia 4:4-7 ah hian kan hmu a.

Kan Lalpa Isua Krista Pathian leh Pa chu fakin awm rawh se! chhanna: Thuthlung Hluia Pathian tirh zâwlneite, Isua tirh tirhkohte, Kristiante, vantirhkohte, etc.

1 Kohte chu

Chu mite chuan an ngaihsak lo va, pakhat chu a lo lamah a kal ta a, pakhat zawk chu sumdawnna lamah a kal ta a ni → Hei hi Isua sawi "thehtu tehkhin thu" a ni → Ṭhenkhat chu hlingah an tla a, hlingte chu a lo thang lian a, chu chu a ni pungkhawm; Hling kara tuhte chu thu hretute an ni a, mahse a hnuah khawvel lungkhamna leh sum bumnain thu chu a chil a, rah a chhuah thei lo → chu chu "rah * rah a chhuah thei lo" tihna a ni Thlarau". Heng mite hi chhandam chauh an ni a, mahse ropuina an nei lo. , lawmman an nei lo, lallukhum pawh an nei lo. Thuhmahruai-Matthaia 13 Bung 7, Châng 22

2 Thutak dodâltute

A dang zawng chuan chhiahhlawhte chu an man a, an hmusit a, an that ta a ni. Lal chu a thinrim hle a, tualthattu te tiboral tur leh an khawpui hal turin sipai a tir chhuak ta a. Matthaia 22:6-7 ah hian kan hmu a

zawt: A dang zawng chuan chhiahhlawh chu an rawn man ta a.
chhanna: Setana leh Diabola ta hnam → Sakawlh leh leia lalte leh an sipai zawng zawngte chu sakawr var chunga thu leh a sipaite do turin an inkhawm ka hmu a. Sakawlh chu an man ta a, sakawlh chhinchhiahna changtute leh a lem chibai buktute bum tumin a hmaa thilmak titu zawlnei der chu sakawlh rualin an man ta a ni. An zinga pahnih chu mei dilah chuan a nungin an paih a, a bak zawng chu sakawr var chunga ṭhutu kâ aṭanga lo chhuak khandaihin an that a, savate chu an sain an khat a; Thupuan 19:19-21

3. Thawmhnaw pangngai ha lo, mi â

Chutichuan, a chhiahhlawhte hnenah, "Inneihna ruai chu a peih tawh a, koh tawhte erawh chu an phu lo," a ti a. Chuvangin kawngpui fork-ah chuan chho la, i hmuh zawng zawng chu ruai theh turin ko rawh. ’ Chutichuan, chhiahhlawhte chu kawngpuiah an chhuak a, an tawn apiang, mi tha leh tha lo chu an ko khawm a, ruai chu mikhualin an khat ta a. Lal chuan mikhualte en tura a rawn luh chuan, chutah chuan mi pakhat, formal dress ha lo chu a hmu a, chuvang chuan a hnenah, "Thian, engvangin nge formal dress nei lovin hetah hian i awm?" ’ Chu pa chu a tawng thei lo. Lal chuan a tirhkoh hnenah, ‘A kut leh ke phuar la, pawn lam thimah paih rawh; ’ Matthaia 22:8-13-ah kan hmu a

zawt: Kawr hak loh hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Mihring thar inbel tur leh Krista inbel tur "piangthar" ni lo → Puan zai thianghlim, eng leh var inbel loh tur (puan thianghlim chu mi thianghlimte felna a ni) Reference - Thupuan 19:8

zawt: Tute nge formal thawmhnaw ha lo?
chhanna: “Kohhranah hian Pharisai mi â, zâwlnei der leh unau der, chanchin ṭha thuchah dik tak hrethiam lo mi an awm → Hetiang mite hi an ni, mi inah rûkrukin hmeichhe hriat lohte tân inah an khung a ni , Duhthusam chi hrang hrangin a thlem a, zir reng rengin kawng dik tak chu an hrethiam ngai lovang Reference - 2 Timothea 3:6-7.

[2] Mi tlemte thlan an ni a, vawi 100, vawi 60 leh vawi 30 an awm.

(1) . Sermon ngaithla rawh mi hrethiam

Mi tam tak koh an ni a, thlan an tlem zawk si a. ” Matthaia 22:14 ah hian kan hmu a

Zawhna: “Tlemte thlan chhuah” tih hian tute nge a sawi?
Chhanna: Thu ngaithla leh hrethiam → Tin, thenkhat chu lei thaah an tlu a, rah an chhuah thin; za khat Hun, a ni sawmruk Hun, a ni sawmthum vawi tam tak. Ngaithla tur beng nei chuan ngaithla se! ” → Lei thaa tuh chu thu ngaithla a, a hrethiam a, chumi hnuah rah a chhuah a, a nei ta a ni za khat Hun, a ni sawmruk Hun, a ni sawmthum vawi tam tak. ” Thuhmahruai-Matthaia 13:8-9,23

(2) A thil tum anga koh, ropuina tura ruat lawkte

Pathian hmangaihtute tan, a thil tum anga kohte tan engkim hi a tha zawngin a thawk ho thin tih kan hria. Ani chu unau tam tak zînga fa tîr a nih theih nân a Fapa anpui anga awm tûrin a ruat lâwk a ni. A ruat lawk tawhte pawh a ko va, thiam a chantirte pawh a chawimawi bawk. Thuhmahruai--Rom 8:28-30

A THA E! Chu zawng zawng chu vawiin a inbiakpawhna leh in hnena kan insemna atan a ni. Amen

articles.title: Dan chu thlarau lam a ni a, kei erawh chu tisa lam ka ni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unaute tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Kan Bible hi Rom bung 7 chang 14-ah i hawng ang u Dan chu thlarau atanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria a, kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh.

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Dan chu Thlarau lam a ni". Tawngtai rawh: Van Pa duhtak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. An kut chhuak thutak ziak leh sawi hmanga hnathawktute a tirh → hun kal tawha Pathian thuruk thup, kum zawng zawng hmaa kan chawimawi tura Pathianin min ruat lawk thu finna min pe turin Lalpa hnenah lawmthu kan sawi e! Thlarau Thianghlimin min hriattir. Amen! Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Dan chu thlarau lam a ni a, kei erawh tisa ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh tih hrethiam rawh. .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi Lal Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

(1) Dan chu thlarau lam a ni

Dan chu thlarau atanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria a, kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni a, sualah hralh ka ni tawh. --Rom 7:14 ah hian kan hmu

zawt: Dan chu thlarau lam a ni tih hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Dan chu thlarau lam a ni → “a” tih awmzia chu ta a ni a, “Thlarau ta” → Pathian chu thlarau a ni – Johana 4:24 en la, chu chu dan chu Pathian ta a ni tihna a ni.

zawt: Engvangin nge dan hi thlarau lam leh Pathian lam a nih?
chhanna: Dan chu Pathianin a din a nih avangin → Dan siamtu leh roreltu pakhat chauh a awm a, chu chu chhandam thei leh tichhe theitu a ni. Midangte rorel tur hian tu nge i nih? Reference - Jakoba 4:12 → Pathianin dan a siam a, mite a rel thin. Chuvangin, "Dan chu thlarau leh Pathian ta a ni." Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

zawt: Tu tân nge Dân chu din a nih?
chhanna: Dân hi mahni tâna siam a ni lo va, Fapa tân siam a ni lo va, mi felte tân pawh siam a ni lo va, "mi sualte" leh "sual bawih" tân siam a ni → mi felte tâna siam a ni lo va, dân bawhchhia leh thu âwih lote tâna siam a ni si a, The Pathian ngaihsak lo leh mi sual, mi thianghlim lo leh khawvel mi, parricide leh tualthattu, uire leh sodomite, rûkbotu leh dawt sawitu, thutiam dik lo sawitu emaw, felna kalh zawnga thil dang emaw. Note: A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, “Tao” chu Pathian a ni → Dan chu “kawng dik kalh zawng leh Pathian dodaltu thil” anga din a ni. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Reference - 1 Timothea Bung 1:9-10 (Khawvela mi â, mi fing nia inngai te ang lo takin, anmahniin dan an siam a, chutah chuan Dan nghawngkawl rit tak chu an kawrfualah an "thun" ta a ni. Dan bawhchhiatna chu a ni sual → Mahni thiam loh chantir, sual man chu thihna a ni, mahni intihhlum)

(2) Kei erawh chu tisa mi ka ni

zawt: Mahse, tisa mi ka ni tih hi eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Thlarau lam thil nungte hi tisa nung leh tisa nung tia lehlin an ni bawk → Bible-ah pawh hetiang hian a inziak a: “Mihring hmasa ber Adama chu thlarau (thlarau: a nih loh leh tisa leh thisen tia lehlin) a lo ni ta a ni Adama chu nunna petu thlarau a lo ni ta a. Reference - 1 Korinth 15:45 leh Genesis 2:7 → Chutichuan "Paula" chuan, Kei erawh chu tisa mi, thlarau nung, tisa nung, tisa mi ka ni, a ti a. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(3) Sual hnenah hralh a ni tawh

zawt: Engtikah nge ka tisa chu sual hnena hralh a nih?
chhanna: A chhan chu tisaa kan awm hian, chu chu “ . dan "leh" piang "tan duhthusam sualte "chu chu mahni hmasial duhna "thihna rah chhuah turin kan taksa peng hrang hrangah hna a thawk → Dumnain nau a pai chuan sual a hring a; sual a lo puitlin chuan thihna a hring thin. Chuvangin". suahsualna " Awle Dan atanga lo piang chu , chuti a nih chuan, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Reference - Jakoba bung 1 chang 15 leh Rom bung 7 chang 5 → Hei hi mi pakhat Adama hmanga khawvelah sual a lut ang chiah a ni a, thihna chu sual atanga lo chhuak a ni a, chuvangin mi zawng zawngin sual an tih avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. Rom 5 chang 12-naah hian. Adama leh Evi thlahte kan ni vek a, kan taksa hi an nu leh pa atanga lo piang a ni a, chuvangin sualah hralh a ni tawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(4) Keimahni tisa zui lova Thlarau chauh zuituteah hian Dan felna chu thleng famkim rawh se . --Rom 8:4 ah hian kan hmu

zawt: Dân felna chu tisa nêna inmil lo tûra vên chu eng nge a awmzia?
chhanna: Dan chu a thianghlim a, thupekte pawh a thianghlim a, a fel a, a tha bawk - Rom 7:12→ en rawh Dan chu tisa avanga chak lo a nih avangin kan tih theih loh thil a awm → Tisa kan awm lai hian nungchang sualte hi "Dan avângin" a lo piang a, chu chu mahni hmasial duhnate a lo piang a ni birth to sin. "Dan i zawm tam phawt chuan sual i hring ang." Sualnain thihna a mamawh → Chuvangin, Danin a phut "thianghlimna, felna leh thatna" chu mihring tisa chak lohna avangin a hlen thei lo → Pathianin a Fapa ngei chu sual tisa ang ni turin a tir a, sual thawina a lo ni ta a ni .Tisaah chuan sual thiam loh chantirna a awm a → Fapa anga pawm kan nih theih nan Dan hnuaia awmte tlan turin. Gal 4:5 en la, Rom 8:3 → en la, tisa anga nung lo, Thlarau anga nungteah hian Dan felna chu a lo thleng famkim theih nan. Amen!

zawt: Engvangin nge Dan felna hian Thlarau neitute chauh a zui?
chhanna: Dan chu a thianghlim a, a fel a, a tha→ danin a phut dikna chu chu chu Pathian hmangaih la, nangmah angin i vengte hmangaih rawh! Mihringin tisa chak lohna avang hian dan felna chu a tuar thei lo va, "Dan felna" chuan Thlarau Thianghlima piangte chauh a zui thei → Chuvangin Lal Isuan pianthar a ngai a ti a, chutiang chuan "Dan felna" chuan Thlarau Thianghlim atanga lo piang Pathian fate a zui thei → Krista chu mi pakhat a ni " tan "Mi zawng zawng an thi → Pathianin sual hre lote a siam a, tan Amahah Pathian felna kan nih theih nan sual kan lo ni ta a ni - 2 Korinth 5:21 → Pathianin Kristaah min siam → "Pathian felna ni rawh se Dan chu thlarau lam a ni a, Pathian ta a ni a ; thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni a, thil awmdan dik tak a ni lo → Dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni a, dan lem dik tak chu Krista a ni → Kristaa ka awm reng chuan a anpui dik takah ka nung a ni dan; ""-ah ka awm loh chuan; dan thlalak (shadow of law) a ni "Chhungril - Hebrai 10:1 leh Rom 10:4 en rawh → Dan anpuiin ka awm reng a: Dan chu a thianghlim a, a fel a, a tha bawk a; Krista chu a thianghlim a, a fel a, a tha bawk. A tha, Kristaah ka awm reng a,." a taksa peng pakhat ka ni a, "a ruh ruh leh a tisa atanga tisa" ka ni bawk a, kei pawh ka thianghlim a, ka fel a, ka tha → chutiang chuan Pathianin a siam "; dan felna chu ” Hei hi tisa anga kal lova Thlarau anga kalteah hian a thleng famkim a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah: He thuziak-a thuchah kan sawi hi a pawimawh hle a, kum sangkhat chhunga i awm leh awm loh nen a inzawm a ni." hmalam "Thawhlehna; Kum sangkhatah a la awm". hnung "Thawhlehna. Kum sangkhat". hmalam "Thawhlehna hian rorel theihna thuneihna a nei → Engvangin nge rorel theihna thuneihna i neih? Dan hmêl takah i awm avângin, Dân thlazar hnuaiah i awm lo va, chuvangin rorel theihna thuneihna i nei → Lalṭhutthleng ropuiah i ṭhu a ni." to judge "fallen evil-doing angels, judgment Hnam tin, mi nung leh mitthite rorel rawh u" → Kum sangkhat chhung Krista nen rorel rawh - Thupuan Bung 20 en rawh Esauva angin.

A THA E! Chu zawng zawng chu vawiin a inbiakpawhna leh in hnena kan insemna atan a ni. Amen

articles.title: Dan hi thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unaute tan remna awm rawh se! Amen

Hebrai bung 10 châng 1-ah hian kan Bible i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u: Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a nih avangin thil lem dik tak a nih loh avangin, kum tin inthawina inang chiah hlanin hnai hnaihtute chu a famkim thei lo. .

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan fellowship a, kan share ". Dan hi thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni 》Tawngtaina: Van Pa duhtak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. An kuta ziak leh sawi thutak hmanga hnathawkte a tir avangin Lalpa hnenah lawmthu awm rawh se → Tun hmaa Pathian thuruk thuruk finna, chatuan hmaa chawimawi kan nih theihna tura Pathianin min ruat lawk dan kha min pe rawh! Thlarau Thianghlimin min hriattir . Amen! Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a nih avangin thil tak tak lem dik tak a ni lo tih hrethiam rawh; Amen .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi Lal Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni

Dan chu thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a ni a, chu thil lem dik tak a nih loh avangin, kum tin inthawina inang chiah hlanin hnaihtute chu a ti famkim thei lo. Hebrai 10:1

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . zawt: Engvangin nge dan hi a awm?

chhanna: Dan chu bawhchhiatna atan dah belh a ni → Chuti a nih chuan, engvangin nge dan chu a awm? Bawhchhiatnate avânga belhchhah a ni a, thutiam pêk thlahte lo kal hun nghah a ni a, palai chuan vântirhkohte kaltlangin a din a ni. Thuhmahruai--Galatia Bung 3 Châng 19

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . zawt: Dan chu mi felte tan a ni em? Nge misualte tan a ni em?
chhanna: Dân hi mi felte tân siam a ni lo va, dân bawhchhia leh thu âwih lote tân, Pathian ngaihsak lo leh mi sualte tân, mi thianghlim lo leh khawvêl mite tân, parricide leh tualthah atân, nawhchizuar leh sodomy, mi rûkbo leh dawt sawitute tân leh chhia chhamtute tân siam a ni si a dik lo takin emaw, felna kalh zawng zawngah emaw. Thuhmahruai--1 Timothea Bung 1 Châng 9-10

( 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . zawt: Engvangin nge dan hi kan zirtirtu a nih?
chhanna: Mahse, rinna avanga chhandamna thu bul chu a la lo thleng lo va, nakin lawka thutak inpuanna thlengin dan hnuaiah kan awm reng a ni. Hetiang hian Dan chu min zirtirtu a ni a, rinna avanga thiamchantir kan nih theih nan Krista hnenah min hruai a ni. Mahse tunah chuan rinna avanga chhandamna thu bul a lo thleng ta a, Lalpa kut hnuaiah kan awm tawh lo. Thuhmahruai - Galatia Bung 3 Châng 23-25. Note: Rinna avanga thiamchantir kan nih theih nan Krista hnena min hruai turin Dan hi kan zirtirtu a ni! Amen. Tunah chuan "kawng dik" a lo lang ta a, "master" dan hnuaiah kan awm tawh lo va, Krista khawngaihna hnuaiah kan awm tawh zawk a ni. Amen

( 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . zawt: Engvangin nge dan hi thil tha lo thleng tur thlalak a nih?

chhanna: Dan thupui chu Krista a ni - Rom 10:4 en rawh → Thil ha lo thleng tur thlalak hian Krista a kawk a, " Hlimthla "A original thil lem dik tak a ni lo." Krista ” tih hi lem dik tak a ni → dan chu thlamuanna a ni a, a nih loh leh kût, thla thar leh Sabbath te hi thil lo thleng tur a ni. Hlimthla , mahse chu pianphung chu Krista a ni - Kolossa 2:16-17 en rawh → "Nunna thing" ang bawkin, ni chu thing chungah oblique-a a eng chuan "thing" hnuaiah chuan thlalak a awm a, chu chu a thlalak a ni thing Fapa, "Thing" chu thil bulpui lem dik tak a ni lo "Nunna thing" chu lem dik tak a ni a, chutiang bawk chu "dan" nen pawh a ni thil tha thlalak a ni! Dan i zawm hian "shadow" chu i vawn tlat a, chu chu suangtuahna leh engmah lo a ni a, i man thei lo va, "shadow" chu hun leh a che vel nen a danglam ang of sunlight. "Naupangte" chu zawi zawiin an upa ang a, an bo thuai ang. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Hebrai 8:13 en rawh

[2] Dan lem dik takah chuan kum sangkhat nen a inzawm tlat a ni hmalam thawhlehna a ni

Sam 1:2 LALPA dan lawmna, chhun a zan a ngaihtuah thin chu a eng a thawl e

zawt: Jehova dân chu eng nge ni?
chhanna: Lalpa dan chu “ . krista dan "→Mosia Dân lung phêka "thupêk, thupek, leh rorêlna" inziakte hi nakin lawka thil ṭha hmêl lantîr vek a ni. "Thlarau" rinchhan chuan zan leh zan i ngaihtuah thei ang→a form zawng rawh." , a bulpui ber zawng la, a lem dik tak zawng rawh→ Dan lem dik tak chu Vawi khatah Awle Krista , dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, Dan hi kan training zirtirtu a ni a, rinna avanga thiam chang Lal Krista hnenah min hruai a → " Hlimthla ", . kristaah a lut ta a ni ! Kristaah chuan “in taksa In, in Ontology (Ontology) a ni In, in A duh tak zet In → danah chuan A duh tak zet 里→Hei hian a ngaihtuah che a ni emaw Thawhlehna "kum sâng hma" emaw, "kum sâng lai" emaw. hnung "Thawhlehna. Mithianghlimte chu kum sangkhat "hma" khan an tho leh a ni." Rorel theihna thuneihna nei rawh "Vantirhkoh tlu tawhte rorel ula, hnam tin rorel rawh u" Krista nen kum sangkhat lal rawh → Tin, lalthutphah te, a chunga mi ṭhute ka hmu a, rorel theihna thuneihna pek an ni. Tin, Isua chungchâng thu hriattîrna leh Pathian thu avânga lu tansak tawhte leh sakawlh emaw, a lem emaw chibai bûk lo emaw, an hmaiah emaw, an kutah emaw a chhinchhiahna nei lote thlarau thawhlehna ka hmu a ., Krista nen kum sangkhat chhung lal rawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai--Thupuan 20:4.

A THA E! Chu zawng zawng chu vawiinah hian kan inpawlna leh kan insemna atan a ni. Amen. Lal Isua Krista khawngaihna te, Pathian hmangaihna te, Thlarau Thianghlim fuihna te chu in zavaia hnenah awm reng rawh se! Amen

articles.title: Thuthlung Vawn Thuthlung Thar nghet taka vawng reng turin Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhan
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen

2 Timothea bung 1 châng 13-14-ah hian kan Bible-te i hawng ang u, i chhiar ho ang u. Krista Isuaa rinna leh hmangaihnain ka hnen ata thu i hriatte chu vawng reng ang che. Keimahnia cheng Thlarau Thianghlimin kawng tha a pek che chu i veng tur a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir a, kan inpawl a, kan insem bawk "Thutiam hlen chhuah". Tawngtai rawh: Van Pa duhtak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Thutak thu hmanga hnathawktute a tir avangin Lalpa hnenah lawmthu kan sawi a, chu chu kan chhandamna chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun hausak zawk nan van atangin chhang rawn kenin a hun takah min pe a ni. Amen! Thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Keimahnia cheng Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhanin, rinna leh hmangaihna nen Thuthlung Thar hi nghet taka vawng turin min zirtir turin Lalpa dil rawh! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi Lal Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Vawiin hian kan zir dun a, kan fellowship a, kan insem bawk "Thuthlung" tih a ni. Aih. 7. A hun takah van lam thlarau lam chaw min pe la, kan nun a tam theih nan. Amen! Khawngaihin! Lal Isuan a chhunzawm zel a ni." kan thlarau mit ti eng a, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru min hawng a, thlarau lam thutak hmu leh hriat theihna min siamsak a, Lal Isuan a thisen ngeiin kan hnenah thuthlung thar min siam tih hrethiam rawh! Lal Isua kha kan thuthlung hmasa aanga min lei chhuah tumin kraws-ah khenbehin a tuar a ni tih hrethiam rawh, Thuthlung thara luh hian kohte chu chatuan rochan tiam chu an dawng thei a ni ! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi Lal Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

【1】Contract a ni

Encyclopedia sawifiahna: Contract tih hian a tir lamah chuan thil hralh, in luah man, lease, etc. nena inzawm document, mi pahnih emaw a aia tam emaw inremna hmanga ziah tihna a ni. Thlarau lam contract leh ziaka contract a awm a, chu chu thil chi hrang hrang a ni thei a, chung zingah chuan: sumdawnna lama thawhpui, thian hnai tak, hmangaihtu, ram, khawvel, mihring zawng zawng, leh mahni nena contract siam, etc. "ziak" i hmang thei contracts" hmanga inrem theihna tur, leh inremna siam nan "language" i hmang thei bawk. Inremna siam tur chuan "silent" contract a ni thei bawk. Tunlai khawtlang nunah "contract" ziaka inremna ziah ang mai a ni.

【2】Lal Isuan thuthlung thar min siam a

(1) Chhang leh grape tui chu no khatah thuthlung siam rawh
Bible [1 Korinth 11:23-26] hi i zirho ang u, hawng hoin chhiar ila: Ka thu hrilh che u kha Lalpa hnen atanga ka dawn kha a ni a, Lal Isuan a phatsan zan khan chhang a la a, mal a sawm a ni. Lawmthu a sawi zawh chuan a tikehsawm a, "Hei hi ka taksa a ni, i tan a chhe tawh a ni. Zanriah ei kham chuan chutiang bawk chuan no chu a la ve tur a ni," a ti a chu thuthlung thar chu ka thisenah a ni. Chuta tang chuan in in apiangin keimah hriatrengna atan hetiang hian ti rawh u." He chhang hi i ei apiangin he no hi i in apiangin Lalpa thihna i sawi chhuak a ni. , a lo kal hma loh chuan. Tin, [Matthaia 26:28] lam hawi la, hei hi ka thisen thuthlung, sual ngaihdamna atana mi tam tak tana leih chhuah chu a ni si a. [Hebrai 9:15] lam hawi leh rawh Hemi avang hian thuthlung thar inkara palai a lo ni ta a, chu chu thuthlung hmasa tiam hnuaia an sual tihte tlanna thihpuiin an dawng thei ang.

(2) Thuthlung Hlui hi thuthlung hmasa ber a ni

(Hriat tur: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thu ziakte kan zir chianna hmang hian Lal Isuan "Thuthlung Thar" chu kan hnenah a din ta a ni. Thuthlung thar nia sawi a nih avangin "Thuthlung Hlui" a awm dawn a, chu chu thuthlung hmasa a ni. The "Previous." Thuthlung" Bible-a chhinchhiah hian a huam ber chu: 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathianin Eden huanah Adama hnenah thupek a siam a, "a tha leh tha lo thing rah ei loh tur thuthlung a ni", chu chu "Ṭawng" dan thuthlung a ni bawk a; 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Tuilêt ropui hnua Nova "rainbow" remna thuthlung chuan thuthlung thar chu a entîr a; 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Abrahama rinna thuthlung "thutiam" hian Pathian khawngaihna thuthlung a entir a; 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mosia Dân Thuthlung chu Israel fate nêna dân thuthlung chiang taka sawi a ni. Deuteronomy 5 châng 1-3 en rawh.

(3) Adama atang chauhvin khawvelah sual a lut a

Pi leh pute hmasa ber Adama chuan Dan a bawhchhia a, thil a tisual a, chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah chu a ei ta a ni! Mi pakhat zarah sual chu khawvelah a lo lut a, sual avanga thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ang bawk khan, mi zawng zawngin thil an lo sual tawh a ni. Mahse, Adama atanga Mosia thlengin thihna a lal a, Adama anga thil sual ti lote pawh a thuneihna hnuaiah an awm ta a ni - "Chu chu Adama anga thil sual ti lote pawh hi keimahni ang, thuneihna hnuaia thi ve ve kan ni" tihna a ni. Rom 5:12-14 en la, sual man chu thihna a ni – Rom 6:23 en rawh; Adama Miin contract a bawhchhia a, thil sual a tih chuan "sual bawih" a lo ni ta a ni " tih hi dan hnuaia thupek pakhat a ni." Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

"Sual" a lal ang bawkin, danin ânchhia a lawh ang a, chu chuan thihna a thlen ang - Rom 5:21 en rawh → Chutiang bawkin khawngaihna pawhin "felna" hmangin a lal a, chu chuan mite chu kan Lalpa Isua Krista chatuan nunna zarah chhandamna a chantir a ni. Amen! Chutiang chuan "thihna" chu "sual" aanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria - "sual" chu mi pakhat, Adama, dan thuthlung bawhchhiatna aanga lo chhuak a ni tih kan hria - Johana 1 Bung 3 chang 3 hi en rawh . . dan ]--[ suahsualna ]--[ boral ] Heng pathumte hi an inzawm tlat a ni chu chuan ro a relsak ang che u. "Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe ta a, amah ring apiang an boral lova, chatuana nunna an neih theih nan. Pathianin khawvel thiam loh chantir turin (a nih loh leh lehlin: khawvel rorel turin a Fapa a tir lo." ; châng 16-18-ah te a awm.

(5) Thuthlung hmasa chu Krista tuarna thihna hmangin chhuah a ni

Pathianin a Fapa mal neih chhun Isua chu tisaah a lo piang a, dan hnuaia mite tlan turin a tir a, chutiang chuan Pathian fa nihna kan chang thei ang! Amen—Gal. 4:4-7 en rawh. 1 Korinth 15:3-4-a chhinchhiah angin, Bible-in a sawi angin, Krista chu kan "sualte" avangin khenbehin kraws-ah a thi a, 1 sual laka min chhuah zalen theih nan-". tan Mi zawng zawng an thih chuan an thi vek a; :13;tichuan phum a nih hnuah, 3 chuan mi hlui leh a nun hlui chu min dah bo a - Kolossa 3:9 leh Galatia 5:24 en rawh. Ni thum niah a tho leh a, 4 thiamchantir kan nih theih nan - Rom 4:25 hi en la, a khawngaihna nasa tak angin, Pathianin mitthi zing ata Isua Krista thawhlehna hmangin min siam thar leh ta! Thuthlung Thar hi i hmu thei ang u. Amen!

Hetiang hian kan pi leh pute Adama hnen atanga lo chhuak sual lak ata kan zalen a, kan zalen ta a ni a hmaa appointment neih tawh a ni "A chhia leh tha thing rah ei lo tura thuthlung. Chu chu Isua kan tan kraws-ah a thi tihna a ni." Chawi Thuthlung Hlui - Thuthlung Hma Adama Dan Thuthlung! Kan putar kha Krista thihnaah baptisma a chang a, a thi a, phum a ni a, Amah nen a tho leh ta! Tuna mi thar piangthar thar hi Adama sual nunah a awm tawh lo va, " a hmaa appointment neih tawh a ni "Thuthlung Hluiah chuan Danin ânchhe a lawh a, khawngaihnaah erawh chuan". Thuthlung Thar 》Kristaah chuan! Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(6) Thuthlung hmasa bera thuthlung hnutchhiahtu chu a thi a, . Thuthlung Thar A taka hman tan rawh

Hemi avang hian "Isua" chu thuthlung thar inkara palai a lo ni ta a, "thuthlung hmasa" laia mite sualte ngaihdamna tura "kan sualte avanga khenbeh" a nih aangin, kohte chu a hlawhtlin theih nan a pui ang Pathian thutiam chatuan rochan chu. Isuan thuthlung a hnutchhiah "thuthlung thar" eng pawh hian thuthlung chhuahsantu (thuthlung bulpui chu thuthlung nen a inang) thih hma chu a nghak tur a ni, chu chu Isua Krista chauh a ni. tan "Mi zawng zawng an thi vek a; mi zawng zawng an thi vek a ni"; mi zawng zawng an thi si a "Kan mihring hlui chu Kristaah baptisma kan chang a, Amah nena kan thihpui kan ring ang bawkin keini pawhin "Contract hmasa kha hlih rawh." "Legal contract" leh testament "chu chu Isuan a thisen ngeia kan hnena a hnutchhiah thuthlung thar" tih hi a dik tihna a ni Thuthlung Thar Official takin hman tan a ni I hrethiam em? , .

Legacy hnutchhiahtu chu a la dam a nih chuan "Putar kha i nei lo". Thihna ring rawh "Krista nen thiin awm rawh, chu chu i mihring hlui kha a la dam a, Adamaah a la nung reng a, thuthlung hmasa dan hnuaiah a la nung reng a ni", chu thuthlung "chu chu - Isuan thuthlung hnutchhiah a tiam tihna a ni". Thuthlung Thar "I nen eng nge inzawmna a neih?" I sawi dik em? Khawvela mi zawng zawng hian "contract leh testament" inzawmna hi kan hrethiam vek a, i hrethiam lo em ni?

(7) Krista chuan ama thisen ngeiin kan hnenah thuthlung thar a siam a

"He chhang hi i ei apiangin he no hi i in apiangin Lalpa a lo kal hma loh chuan a thih thu in puang thin. Amen! A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen, Lalpa chungah lawmthu ka sawi e! " " hmeichhe ṭha tak "Kohhran chuan an kuta ziak leh sawi thutak hmangin hnathawktute a tir a, chu chu kan chhandamna chanchin tha a ni! A hun takah van lam thlarau lam chaw min pe ang a, tichuan kan nun a tam zawk ang. Amen! May the." Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng chhunzawm zel a, thlarau lam thutak kan hmuh leh kan hriat theih nan Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru a hawng zel bawk. Thuthlung Hlui atanga Thuthlung Thar thlenga thuruk chu hrethiam la, I duhzawng hrethiam rawh . Lal Isua Krista hmingin tawngtai rawh! Amen

【1】"Thuthlung Hlui" atanga "Thuthlung Thar" thlengin.

Thuthlung Hlui

Bible [Hebrai 7:11-12] i zirho ang u: Tun hma chuan mipuiten Levia puithiam hna hnuaiah dan an dawng thin a nih chuan Puithiam dang din a ngai tawh lo , Melkisedeka thupek angin nge Arona thupek angin ni lo? Puithiam nihna tihdanglam a nih tawh avangin dan pawh hi tihdanglam a ngai a ni. Chang 16 Puithiam a lo ni ta a, tisa dan ang ni lovin, nunna tawp nei lo (literally, indestructible) thiltihtheihna angin a lo awm ta zawk a ni. Châng 18 Hmasa dân chu a chak lo va, a hlawk lo hle a, châng 19 (dân chuan engmah a tihlawhtling lo) hian Pathian kan pan theihna tûr beiseina ṭha zâwk a rawn keng tel a ni.

(Thil chhinchhiah: Thuthlung Hlui hi thuthlung hmasa ber a ni a, . 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Eden huana thuthlung, Adama'n "Thil tha leh tha lo thing" rah a ei loh tur thu; 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Nova remna thuthlung "rainbow" hian thuthlung thar a entir a; 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Abrahaman "tiam thuthlung" a rinna hi khawngaihna thuthlung a ni a; 4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mosia Dan Thuthlung. Tun hma chuan "Levia puithiam" hna hnuaiah mipuiin "Dan an dawng" famkim thei lo va, chuvangin Pathianin Melkisedeka thupek angin puithiam dang [Isua] a kaitho leh ta a ni! Melkisedeka hi Salem Lal tia hriat a ni bawk a, chu chu Khawngaihna, Felna leh Remna Lal tihna a ni. Pa a nei lo va, nu a nei lo va, thlahtu a nei lo va, a bul tanna a nei lo va, a tawpna a nei lo va, Pathian Fapa nen a inang zawk a ni.

Chuvangin puithiam nihna tihdanglam a nih tawh avangin dan pawh hi tihdanglam a ngai a ni. Isua chu puithiam a lo ni ta a, tisa inrelbawlna ang ni lovin, a hmaa rorelnate chu a chak lo va, a angkai lo hle a, beiseina ha zawk a rawn luhtir ta a ni. Levia puithiamte chu thihnain a dang a, rei tak a daih thei lo tih a lo lang a, a tir lamah chuan mi chak lote chu puithiam atan a ruat a, mahse, Pathianin a fapa Isua chu puithiam lalber atan a ruat a, vawi khat atan a inhlan ta a ni "sual" avanga inthawina tihhlawhtlin nan . Tun atang chuan "sual" avanga inthawina kan hlan tawh dawn lo. I hrethiam em? Tun aang hian Krista Chanchin |ha rinna aanga lo piang, thlah thlan bik leh lal puithiam hna i lo piang ta a ni. Amen

【2】---Thuthlung Thar ah lut rawh---

Bible [Hebrai 8:6-9] hi chhui ila, chhiar ho ila: Tunah chuan Isua chuan rawngbawlna tha zawk a nei ta a, chu chu thuthlung tha zawk, thutiam tha zawk hmanga din a nih ang bawkin. Thuthlung hmasaah hian tlin lohna awm lo sela, a hnu lama thuthlung zawnna tur hmun a awm lo ang. Chuvangin, Lalpa chuan a mite chu a zilhhau a, heti hian a sawi (a lehlin chuan: Chutichuan Lalpa chuan thuthlung hmasa lama tlin lohnate chu a kawhhmuh a ni): “Israel chhungte leh Juda chhungte nen thuthlung thar ka siam hun tur ni a lo thleng dawn a, . an pi leh pute kut ka man a, ka hruai ang khan ni lovin Aigupta ram ata ka chhuah khan an hnenah thuthlung ka siam a, ka thuthlung an zawm loh avangin ka ngaihven lo vang, Lalpa chuan a ti. “Chutiang ni hnua an hnena thuthlung ka siam tur chu hei hi a ni, Lalpa chuan a ti: Ka dante chu an thinlungah ka ziak ang a, an chhungah ka dah ang,” a ti a tin, an bawhchhiatnate pawh ngaihdam a ni tawh a, sualte tana inthawina dang a ngai tawh lo.

(Hriat tur: Lalpa khawngaihna avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! "The Talented Woman" chuan Chanchin |ha thuruk hrethiam tur leh Pathian duhzawng zawm tur leh hmanlai huna "dan thuthlung" atanga insawn turin Unaupa Cen, hnathawktu a tir che a ni thuthlung thara "khawngaihna thuthlung" Amen )

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hlui hi Adama hmasa ber a ni a; Thuthlung Thar Adam hnuhnung ber chu Isua Krista a ni
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hluia mihring hi vaivut atanga siam a ni a; Thuthlung Thar Pathian atanga lo piangte
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hlui mite chu tisa mi an ni a; Thuthlung Thar Thlarau Thianghlim mite
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hluia mite chu dan thuthlung hnuaiah an awm a; Thuthlung Thar mihring chu khawngaihna thuthlung a ni
5. A rilru a hah lutuk Thuthlung Hluia mite chu dan hnuaiah an awm a; Thuthlung Thar Krista taksa avanga dan laka chhuah zalente zinga mi
6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hlui mite chuan dan an bawhchhia a; Thuthlung Thar Krista hmangaihna avanga dan tihlawhtlingtute chanchin
7. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hlui mite chu mi sual an ni a; Thuthlung Thar Mi chu a fel a ni
8. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hlui hun laia mipa chu Adamaah a awm a; Thuthlung Thar Kristaa mite chu
9. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thuthlung Hluia mite hi Adama fate an ni a; Thuthlung Thar mite chu Pathian fate an ni
10. A rilru a hah lutuk Thuthlung Hluia mite chu mi sual thiltihtheihnaah an awm a; Thuthlung Thar mite chu Setana thang ata an tlanchhuak ta a ni
11. A rilru a hah lutuk Thuthlung Hlui hun laia mite chu Hades-ah thim thuneihna hnuaiah an awm a; Thuthlung Thar Pathian Fapa duh tak, êng ram nunna bu-a awmte
12. A rilru a hah lutuk Thuthlung Hlui hun laia mite chu thil ha leh ha lo thinga mi an ni a; Thuthlung Thar Mite hi nunna thinga mi an ni!

Thuthlung Hlui hi Dan thuthlung a ni a, Thuthlung Thar hi khawngaihna thuthlung a ni. Amen, Thuthlung Thar chuan Pathian Fapa chu Puithiam Lalberah a siam a. Puithiamte tihdanglam an nih tawh avangin dan pawh hi tihdanglam a ngai a ni, a chhan chu dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni a, Krista chu Pathian a ni a, Pathian chu hmangaihna a ni! Krista dan chu hmangaihna a ni. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Galatia bung 6 châng 1-2 en rawh. Chuvangin Lal Isuan: "Petera, thupek thar ka pe che u a, inhmangaih tawn rawh u; kei ka hmangaih che ang bawkin nangni pawhin inhmangaih tawn tur a ni! Hei hi thupek hmasa ber chu a ni! Amen. Johana 13:34 leh en rawh." Johana 1:2 Bung 11-naah hian

【3】Thuthlung hmasa ber chu a upa tawh a, a tlahniam zel a, rei lo teah engmah loah a bo dawn a ni

Tunah chuan thuthlung thar kan sawi ta a, thuthlung hmasa chu a hlui tawh a, a hlui leh chhe mek chu a awm tawh lo thuai dawn a ni. Chuvang chuan Thuthlung Hlui hi "thlahrung" a ni a, dan chu thil tha "thlang" a nih avangin a bul tanna lem dik tak a nih loh avangin Krista chu an lem dik tak a ni! Thing hnuaia "thaw" awm ang bawkin, thing hnuaia "thlah" chu êng leh hun kal zelin a bo zauh zauh a. Chuvangin thuthlung hmasa ber-Dan thuthlung chu a bo thuai dawn a ni. Hebrai 10:1 leh Kol. 2:16 en rawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Tunah chuan kohhran tam tak chuan thuthlung Hlui - Mosia Dan thuthlung chu zawm turin dik lo takin an zirtir che u a ni. Tirhkoh "Paula" ang bawk khan dan zawm chu a tangkai lo sawisel a ni "A hmaa hlawkna anga a ngaih chu Krista a hriat hnuah hlohna anga ngaih a ni ang. A chhan chu Mosia dan i zawm chuan tisa chak lohna avangin i ti thei dawn lo a ni danin a sawisel a, chuvangin Paula chuan hlohna a ni a ti". , Pharisai leh lehkhaziaktu professional tak takte hian dan an zawm thei lo va, nangni amateur Jentail-te pawhin i zawm thei lo em ni?

Chuvangin " . thuthlung hlui a ni "Lut" Thuthlung Thar ", Pathian duhzawng hrethiam la, Kristaah nung la, a Fapa duh tak ram thianghlimah chuan! Amen

A tha e! Vawiin hian he thu hi ka rawn share ve dawn a ni. Amen

【 tih a ni. pathum 】 . Keimahni tisa anga awm lo, Thlarau anga awm zawkteah hian Dan felna chu a lo thleng famkim theih nan

Dan atanga zalen i nih atang khan Pathian chuan tisa ang ni lovin "Thlarau" anga kal kan nih avangin dan "dikna" chu a tihlawhtling ta a ni. 1 Ka hmaah pathian dang i nei tur a ni lo.
2 Milem siam emaw, chung lam vâna awm emaw, lei hnuai lama awm emaw, lei hnuaia awm emaw, tuia awm emaw ang chi reng reng i siam tûr a ni lo.

6 I that tur a ni lo.

9 Tu chungah mah thu dik lo i sawi tur a ni lo.
10 I ṭhenawm nupui chu i duhsak tûr a ni lo; ’ “Hêng thute hi LALPAN tlânga mipui zawng zawngte hnêna a sawi chu a ni, mei ata, chhûm ata leh thim ata a sawi chu a ni heng thute hi lungphek pahnih chungah a awm a, ka hnenah a pe a ni.

【pahnih】 dan thupekte chu a ni

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Halral thilhlan Ordinance siam a ni

[Leviticus 1:1-17] Lalpa chuan inbiakna puan in ata Mosia chu a ko va, a hnenah, "Israel fate hnenah thu sawi la, an hnenah: In zinga tu pawhin LALPA hnena thilhlan a rawn ken chuan thilhlan a hlan tur a ni," a ti a beram rual zinga bawnghnute . Halral thilhlan lu chungah chuan a kut a nghat ang a, halral thilhlan chu a sualte inremna atan pawm a ni ang. ... “Miin a thilhlan chu beram emaw, kêl emaw halral thilhlan a nih chuan, sawiselna nei lo berâm a hlan tûr a ni ... “Miin LALPA hnêna a thilhlan chu sava hâlral thilhlan a nih chuan, ṭhuro emaw, no emaw a hlân tûr a ni parva. articles.title: Vawikhat chhandam i nih tawh chuan boral ngai suh, chatuan nunna nei zawk rawh

articles.content:

Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che→ Isuan sual inthawina vawi khat chatuan atan a hlan tih hrethiamtute chu chatuan atan tihthianghlimin, chhandam an ni thei a, chatuan nunna an nei thei bawk.

A chunga tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

chhanna: A chhan chu Krista chuan sualte chatuan inremna a hlan → inremna leh inthawina chungchang → "a titawp" a ni
"I mite leh i khawpui thianghlim tan kar sawmsarih hun ruat a ni. Sual tihtawp nan te, tihthianghlim nan te, tihthianghlim nan te, sual tlanna tur te. → "Krista" avang hian a inthawina pakhat hian tihthianghlim tawhte chu chatuan atan a ti famkim →

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Pathian atanga lo piang thar → mihring hlui ta a ni lo

Bible i zirchiang ang u Rom 8:9 Pathian Thlarau nangmahniah a awm chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi in ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo.

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Ring la, Thlarau Thianghlimin baptisma chang la, chhandam i ni ang
