Bible-a Thuthlung Hmasa Dan

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Eden huanah khan Pathianin Adama hnenah chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah ei lo turin thuthlung a siam a.

Bible [Genesis 2:15-17] hi zir ila, chhiar ho ila: Lalpa Pathian chuan chu mi chu a hruai a, Eden huanah a dah a, a thawk tur leh enkawl turin a dah a. Lalpa Pathian chuan heti hian thu a pe a: "Huana thing rah chu a thlawnin i ei thei a, a chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah erawh chu i ei tur a ni lo, a rah i ei niah chuan i thi ngei ang (Note!" : Rul chuan Evi chu a thlem a, a chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah eiin a sual ta a, chumi avang chuan Adama kaltlangin sual chu khawvelah a lut a, chumi hnuah chuan mi zawng zawng hnenah thihna a lo thleng ta a ni thil tisual a ni. Dan hma chuan sual chu khawvelah a awm a; , sual thiltihtheihna hnuaiah leh thihna thiltihtheihna hnuaiah." Adama hi lo kal tur entîrna a ni a, chu chu Isua Krista a ni.

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Mosia Dân

Bible [Deuteronomy 5:1-3] i zirho ang u: Tichuan Mosia chuan Israel fate zawng zawng chu a ko khawm a, an hnenah, “Aw Israel fate u, vawiinah hian dan leh hrai ka hrilh che u hi ngaithla ula, zir rawh u vawng reng rawh u.

( Thil chhinchhiah: Pathian Jehova leh Israel mite inkâra thuthlungah hian: Lung phêka ziak Thu Sâwmte, leh a vaiin dân leh thupek 613-te a tel a ni. Dan thupek zawng zawng i zawm a, i zawm chuan malsawmna i dawng ang "I chhuah hunah malsawmna i dawng ang a, i luh hunah pawh malsawmna i dawng ang." -Deuteronomy 28, chang 1-6 leh 15-68 en rawh)
Bible [Galatia 3:10-11] hi i zirho ang u: Dan thiltiha innghat apiang chu ânchhe hnuaiah an awm a ni: “Dan bu anga awm reng lo apiang A chhunga thuziak zawng zawng titu chu ânchhe dawng a ni." Dan hmangin Pathian hmaah tumah thiam chang an awm lo tih a chiang a; Pathian Lehkha Thu chuan, "Mi fel chu rinnain a nung ang," a ti si a.
[Rom 5-6] hi kir leh la, chhiar ho rawh: Tisa kan awm lai khan Dan atanga lo piang duhna sualte chuan kan taksa peng hrang hrangah hna a thawk a, thihna rah a chhuah thin. Nimahsela, min phuartu dana kan thih aang khan tunah chuan Dan lak ata kan zalen ta a, chutiang chuan Lalpa rawng kan bawl theih nan, thlarau thar (thlarau: emaw Thlarau Thianghlim tia lehlin) ang zelin kan rawng kan bawl thei ang ritual tih a ni.

( Thil chhinchhiah: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thute kan zir chian hian Judate dan thiam ber tirhkoh [Paula] hmangin Pathianin dan felna, dan siamte, thupekte leh hmangaihna nasa tak "thlarau" a rawn pholang tih kan hmu thei a: Anyone who is based on the practice of dan, ânchhe hnuaiah an awm vek a ni: “Dan bua ziak zawng zawng anga awm reng lo chu ânchhe dawng a ni,” tih hi a chiang a ni. A chhan chu tisaa kan awm lai khan duhthusam sual, dan atanga lo piang, "duhthusam sual" te hi châkna a ni a, châknain nau a pai tawh chuan sual a lo piang a, sual a lo puitlin chuan thihna a hring chhuak thin - refer Jakoba 1 bung 15 Kût thlengin.

[Sual] a lo pian dan chiang takin i hmu thei: "Sual" chu tisa châkna avânga lo awm a ni a, tisa châkna "dân aṭanga lo piang châkna sual" chu pêng chhûnga inṭan a ni a, châkna chu a inṭan a ni member-te. Hetiang aang hian [sual] hi [dan] avang hian a awm a ni. Hei hi chiang takin i hrethiam em?

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan tel lo chuan sual hi sual anga ngaih a ni lo - Rom 5:13 en rawh
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan tel lo chuan sual chu a thi a ni. A chhan chu vaivut atanga siam miten Dan an zawm chuan Dan avang hian sual an hring ang dan. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) Eden huana "Adama" tih thupek avanga "tha leh tha hriatna thing rah ei loh tur" tih ang bawk khan Evi chu Eden-ah rul chuan a thlem a, Evi tisa duhna ". dan atanga lo piang sual" An taksa peng hrang hrangah hna thawh a duh a, ei tur atana tha thei rah te, mit êng leh mit tilawm, chhia leh ṭha hriatna, mit tilâwm thilte, mi fing tirtu. Hetiang hian Dan bawhchhiain thil an tisual a, danin ânchhe lamin an awm ta a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) Mosia Dân hi Horeb Tlânga Pathian Jehova leh Israel mite inkâra thuthlung a ni a, a vaiin thupêk, dân leh hrai sâwm 613 a tel a, Israel-te chuan dân an zawm lo va, an vai hian dân an bawhchhia a, an sual a, an zâwm a ni Mosia Dân ziakte hnuaia awmin, ânchhe leh thutiamte chu Israel fate chungah a leihbuak vek a - Daniela 9:9-13 leh Hebrai 10:28 en rawh.

( 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) dana min phuar tura thi Krista taksa hmangin tunah chuan dan leh a ânchhia lak ata kan zalen ta a ni. articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Remna, thian duh tak, unau leh unaute u! Amen. Vawiin hian kan zir ang a, kan inpawl ang a, kraws lo chhuahna kan insem ang

hmân lai rom kraws

kraws-a khenbeh a ni , a chhan nia sawi a ni Phoenicia mite Invention, Phoenician Empire hi hmân lai Mediterranean tuipui chhak lam biala khawpui-ram tenau hrang hrangte hming tlangpui a ni a, a chanchin hi BC kum zabi 30-na aṭanga chhut theih a ni. Hrehawm tawrhna hmanrua kraws chu thingphel pahnih emaw pathum emaw a ni tlangpui---a nih loh leh quadrilateral cross a nih chuan pali pawh ni se, a pianzia inang lo tak tak a ni. Ṭhenkhat chu T-shaped an ni a, ṭhenkhat chu X-shaped an ni a, ṭhenkhat chu Y-shaped an ni bawk. Phoenicia mite thil siam chhuah ropui tak pakhat chu kraws-a mite tihhlum hi a ni. A hnuah, Hetiang kalphung hi Phoenicia mite aangin Grik, Assuria, Aigupta, Persia leh Rom-ho hnenah an lo kal ta a ni. A bik takin Persia Lalram, Damaska Lalram, judah a ni Lalram, Israel Lalram, Carthage leh hmân lai Rome, hel, thurin kalh, sal, leh khua leh tui nei lote tihhlum nân an hmang fo ṭhîn .

He hremna râpthlâk tak hi thinghnah aṭanga lo chhuak a ni. A tirah chuan tang chu thingah an khih a, an rilru a na hle a, chu chu thil awlsam tak leh ngilnei lo tak a ni. A hnuah thing frame siam a ni a, kraws, T-shaped frame leh X-shaped frame te pawh a tel. X-shaped frame hi "Saint Andrew's frame" an ti bawk a, a chhan chu X-shaped frame-ah hian mithianghlim chu a thi a ni.

Hmun hrang hrangah tihhlum chungchang chipchiar tak chu inang lo deuh mah se, thil awmdan tlangpui chu a inang vek a ni: tang chu vuak hmasak a ni a, chutah chuan thahna hmun thlenga thing frame phur tura nawr luih a ni. A châng chuan thingphel chu a rit lutuk a, mi pakhat tan chuan sawn a harsa hle. Thihhlum a nih hma hian tang chu a thawmhnaw hlihsak a ni a, a kawrfual chauh a la awm. Gravity vanga ruang a tlak hniam loh nan tang kutphah leh ke hnuaiah hian wedge ang maia thing hnah a awm a. Tichuan, leia hawnna nghet tak buatsaih tawhah chuan kraws chu dah lut rawh. Thihna tikhawtlai turin tâng pakhat chu a châng chuan a ke ruhte chu a tikehsawm ṭhîn. Tâng tuar thiamna a chak poh leh hrehawm tawrhna chu a rei zawk thin. Zahngaihna nei lo ni kang chuan an vun hlim tak chu a hal a, rulhut te chuan an seh a, an thawmhnaw chu a hip a, boruaka leivut chuan a tithi a ni.

Kraws-a khenbeh hi batch hrang hranga tih a ni tlangpui a, chuvangin hmun khatah kraws eng emaw zat an phun fo thin. Misual tihhlum a nih hnuah pawh mipui hmuh theih turin kraws-ah a inkhai chhunzawm zel a, mipuite pholan zawhah chuan kraws leh misual phum dun chu tih dan phung a ni. A hnuah chuan kraws-a khenbehnaah hian hmasawnna engemaw zat a awm a, chu chu thingphel chungah tang lu hnuai lam hawia dah a ni a, chu chuan tang chu a hriatna a hloh thuai thei a, a takah chuan tangte natna chu a tiziaawm thei a ni.

Tunlai mite tan chuan kraws-a khenbehna hrehawmzia hi ngaihtuah chian a harsa hle a, a chhan chu a langsar berah chuan mi pakhat tiang chunga khin mai mai hi hremna rapthlak tak a ni lo niin a lang. Kraws-a tang chu riltam leh tuihal vangin a thi lo va, thisen chhuak vangin a thi hek lo—nail-te chu kraws-ah an hnawt lut a, a tâwpah chuan tâng chu thaw halh vangin a thi ta a ni. Kraws-a khenbeh mipa chuan a kut a phar chauhvin thaw a la thei a ni. Mahse, chutiang dinhmunah chuan, nail-te khalh luh avanga natna nasa tak nen chuan, taksa ruh zawng zawng hian rei lo teah hnungzang tihtlem chakna nasa tak a siam ang a, chuvangin rilru chhunga boruak khat chu a chhuak thei lo vang. Thawhlelhna ti chak turin mi chak ber berte keah rit phurh an phuar fo thin a, chutiang chuan thawk turin an kut an phar thei tawh lo. Scientist-te inremna chu, kraws-a khenbeh hi ni engemaw zat chhung zawi zawiin mi pakhat a tihhlum theih avangin tihhlum dan danglam tak a ni tih hi a ni.

Rome-a kraws-a khenbeh hmasak ber tur chu Lal pasarih hun tawp lama Targan-a lal lai kha a ni tur a ni. Rome chuan a tâwpah chuan sal helna pathum chu a titawp ta a ni. Tin, hnehna apiang chu thisen chhuak thahnain a zui a, mi sang tam tak khenbeh an ni bawk. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Pathian atanga lo piang apiang chu kan hria , . 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a a sual lo vang , . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thil sual tih a ni lo , . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thil sual a ti thei lo → Pathian atanga lo piang a nih vang a ni → misual tihna a ni Amah hmu ngai lo leh Isua Krista chhandamna pawh hre lo . Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen.

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Tupawh Pathian atanga lo piang chuan engtikah mah sual a nei lovang

1 Johana 3:9 hi i zirho ang u: Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan thil a tisual lo va, Pathian thu chu amahah a awm reng a, a sual thei lo va, Pathian atanga piang a nih avangin. Bung 5, châng 18-na lam hawi ila, Pathian hrin apiang chu a sual ngai lo vang tih kan hria (hmanlai lehkhabu zial a awm: Pathian laka piang chuan a humhim ang), mi sual chuan a sual ang a tichhe thei lo .

[Thil chhinchhiah]: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thute kan chhui hian → Pathian atanga piang tu pawh kan record a ni 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Engtikah mah i sual lo vang, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a thil sual a awm lo, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a I sual thei lo → Za zela za, dik tak, leh sual i ti lo ngei ang → Hei hi Pathian 【 thudik 】 . "Mihring" principle a ni lo . →Sual chu eng nge ni? Tupawh sual chuan dan a bawhchhia a ni - Johana 1 Bung 3 Châng 4 → Pathian hrin apiangin dan a bawhchhia lo vang a, dan a bawhchhiat loh chuan → "a sual lo vang". Amen? Hetiang hian chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Tunlai Kohhran tam tak chuan hrilhfiahna dik lo Hêng châng pahnihte hian unaute chu a hruai sual a ni. New Interpretation leh version dangte ang chi → ringtute chuan "habitually emaw continuous emaw" sual an ti lovang tih hriatthiam a ni. Pathian “thutak” famkim chu thutak inzawm angin hrethiam mai rawh. [thutak] chu "mihring" → logical thinking nen a inmil loh avangin Pathian "thutak famkim" chu mihring "relative truth"-ah an thlak a → "rul" chuan Evi chu Garden of-a "ei theih loh" ei turin a "thlem" ang bawkin Eden.Thil tha leh tha lo thing chunga rah chu a inang vek → "I ei ni chuan i thi ngei ang" → Hei hi 100%, chiang leh famkim a ni → "Rul" fing tak chuan Pathian thupek "absolute" chu a thlak danglam ta a ni a "relative" one → "I ei I thih chuan i thi lo mai thei." I hmu em, "rul" pawh hian hetiang hian mi a thlem a, Bible-a Pathian "thutak" chu "mihring thurin"-ah a thlak danglam a, chu chu zirtirna che leh chanchin tha kal dan dik tak atanga thlemna che a ni. I hrethiam em?

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Engvangin nge Pathian atanga lo piang apiangin thil an tihsual loh?

A chhanna chipchiar tak chu hetiang hi a ni:

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Isua chu kan sualte avangin kraws-ah a thi → kan sual ata min chhuah zalen theih nan - Rom 6:6-7 en rawh
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan leh a ânchhe laka zalenna→Rom 7:6 leh Gal 3:13 en rawh
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan hnuaiah ni lovin, dan awm lohna hmunah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo → Rom 6:14 leh Rom 4:15 en rawh
leh phum a ni
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Mihring hlui leh a nungchangte chu dah bo rawh→Kolossa 3:9 leh Ephesi 4:22 en rawh
5. A rilru a hah lutuk Pathian piang "mi thar" hi mihring hlui ta a ni lo → Rom 8:9-10 en rawh. Note: Pathian atanga lo piang "mi thar" chu Krista nen Pathianah thuruk a ni a, Adama thil sual titu putar ta "ta a ni lo" → Khawngaihin lo kir leh la, zawng rawh → "Pathian atanga lo piang mi thar" ka rawn share che kha in detail in the previous issue hi mipa ta a ni lo".
6. 6. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathianin kan nun chu a Fapa duh tak ramah a sawn ta → Kolossa 1:13 en rawh → Kei pawh khawvel mi ka nih loh ang bawkin khawvel mi an ni lo – Johana 17:16 en rawh.
Note: Kan "nunna thar" hi a Fapa duh tak ramah a awm tawh a, tisa rorelna danah a tel lo va, dan a bawhchhia hek lo. I hrethiam em?
7. A rilru a hah lutuk Kristaah kan awm tawh → Tunah chuan Krista Isuaa awmte tan thiam loh chantirna a awm tawh lo. Krista Isuaa nunna Thlarau dan chuan sual leh thihna dan ata min chhuah zalen ta si a - Rom 8:1-2 en rawh → Pathian thlante chungah tuin nge puhna thlen thei ang? Pathianin thiam a chantir em (a nih loh leh thiamchantirtu chu Pathian a ni em) - Rom 8:33

[Thil chhinchhiah]: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thu point 7 hmang hian Pathian atanga piang zawng zawng→ 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Engtikah mah i sual lo vang, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a thil sual a awm lo, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian thu chu amaha a awm reng avangin a sual thei lo va, Pathian atanga piang a nih avangin a sual thei lo. Amen! Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Halleluia a ni! Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

( 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Mi tisual apiangin Amah an hmu lo va, Isua pawh an hre lo

"Isua hming" i hria em? →"Isua hming" tih awmzia chu a mite sual lak ata chhandam tihna a ni! Amen.

→ “Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe a, amah ring apiang an boral lo va, chatuan nunna an neih zawk nan. a hnuaia mi ang bawk hian), amah hmanga khawvel chhandam a nih theih nan Amah ringtu chu thiam loh chantir a ni lovang : 1.1. Kraws-a Isua thihna chuan sual ata a tlan chhuak ta che → I ring em? I rin loh chuan i rin lohna sual ang zelin thiam loh chantir i ni ang. I hrethiam em?

Chuvangin a hnuaiah hian tih a ni → Tupawh amaha awm reng chuan thil a tisual lo; Ka fate te u, thlem suh u. Felna titu chu a fel a ni, Lalpa a fel ang bawkin. Thil tisualtu chu Diabola mi a ni a, Diabola chuan a tir atangin thil a tisual tawh si a. Diabola hnathawh tichhe turin Pathian Fapa a lo inlar a. Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan sual a ti lo, Pathian thu chu amahah a awm reng a, a sual thei lo, Pathian laka piang a nih avangin. Chuta tang chuan tute nge Pathian fate leh tute nge Diabola fate tih a lo lang chhuak thin. Tupawh felna ti lo chu Pathian mi a ni lo va, a unau hmangaih lo chu Pathian mi a ni hek lo. Johana 1 Bung 3 Châng 6-10 leh Johana Bung 3 Châng 16-18 en rawh

articles.title: Thlarau Thianghlimin Pathian fate kan ni tih kan thinlungin a hriattir a
articles.author: admin
articles.content:

Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! " " hmeichhe ṭha tak "Thutak thu, an kuta ziak leh sawi, in chhandamna chanchin tha, in chhandamna chanchin tha tak hmangin thawktute tir chhuak rawh. Chhang chu van hla tak atangin rawn hruai a ni a, a hun takah min pe thin a, kan thlarau nun a tam theih nan!" Thlarau Thianghlimin Pathian fate kan ni tih kan thinlungin a hriattir a

( 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . Thutak thu hi ngaithla rawh

Bible zir ila, Ephesi 1:13-14 hi i chhiar dun ang u: Thutak thu, in chhandamna chanchin tha in hriat hnu leh Krista in rin hnu chuan Thlarau Thianghlim thutiam pawh in dawng ta a ni. Tin, a ropuina, Pa fa mal neih chhun ropuina chu kan hmu ta a ni. ... Pathian hi tumahin an hmu ngai lo, Fapa mal neih chhun, Pa rilru chhunga awm chauhvin Amah chu a rawn pholang a ni. Thuhmahruai--Johana 1 Bung 1-2, 14, 18. → A tir aanga nunna thu bulpui chungchang, kan mit ngeia kan hriat, kan hmuh, kan hmuh, leh kan kut hmanga kan khawih chungchang → "Lal Isua Krista" tih hian 1 Johana 1: Bung 1 hi a kawk a ni. →

【 tih a ni. Isua hi Pathian nihna anpui dik tak a ni 】 .

Pathian ropuina êng → "Pathian nihna ang chiah" a ni a, a thiltihtheihna thupek hmangin engkim a vawng tlat a ni. Mihringte sualna ata a tlenfai hnu chuan vanah Lalber dinglamah a thu a. Vântirhkoh hming aiin a hming pu chu a ropui zâwk avângin, anni chu a phak lo hle a ni. Thuhmahruai--Hebrai 1:1-4.

【 tih a ni. Isua chu kawng, thutak leh nunna a ni 】 .

Toma chuan a hnenah, "Lalpa, i kalna tur kan hre lo, chuti a nih chuan engtin nge kawng chu kan hriat theih ang?" Pa keimah kaltlangin tih loh chu Kal rawh

( 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a ) . i chhandamna chanchin tha chu

1 Korinth châng 153-4 "Chanchin |ha" ka hril bawk che u kha: pakhatnaah chuan, Krista chu kan sualte avângin a thi a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin a lo phum ta a; Note: Isua Krista chu kan sualte avangin a thi → 1 sual ata chhuah zalen, 2 Dan leh Dan ânchhe laka chhuah zalen, phum a ni → 3 putar leh a thiltihte paih bo → ni thum niah a tho leh → koh Mi thiam changin Pathian fate anga pawm kan ni ta! Pawn lam taksa chu mahni hmasial duhna avangin a chhe zauh zauh a, vaivut-ah a kir leh ta a; [Mi thar] Thlarau Thianghlim siam tharna hmangin ni tin puitlingah kan lo thang lian a, Krista famkimna sang taka khat, hmangaihnaa Krista nen kan insiam hin. Amen! Ephesi 4:13-16 en rawh

Chuvangin, Pathian atanga lo piang "mi thar" → Adama "mihring hlui" chu a inthen a, a dah bo a, a kalsan a ngai a ni, a chhan chu "mihring hlui" chu "mihring thar" → sualte ta a ni lo mi hlui tisa chu "mi thar"-ah dah a ni lo vang → Reference 2 Korinth 5:19. → Thuthlung thar a din hnuah heti hian a sawi: “An sualte leh an bawhchhiatnate chu ka hre reng tawh lo vang. "Hebrai 10:17 en rawh → "Thuthlung Thar" i zawm tur a ni." "Mi thar" chu Kristaah a nung → a thianghlim a, sual a nei lo va, sual a ti thei lo .

Chutiang chuan Pathian atanga lo piang, Thlarau Thianghlima nung "mithar" chuan Thlarau Thianghlimin a che → putar taksa thiltih sual zawng zawng chu a that vek tur a ni. Chutiang chuan putar tisa sualna avangin nitin i sualte chu "i puang tawh lo" ang a, i sualte tifai leh thai bo turin Isua thisen hlu tak chu i tawngtai ang. Thu tam tak sawi tawh mah ila, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Lal Isua Thlarauvin fuih che rawh se → Bible hrethiam turin in rilru hawng rawh, Pathian piang "mi thar" chu "mihring hlui" ta a ni lo tih hrethiam rawh. . Amen

A THA E! Vawiin hian ka inpawlna hi in zavaia hnenah ka hlan duh a ni. Amen

articles.title: Piantharna (Lecture 3) 11
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Remna, thian duh tak, unau leh unaute u! Amen.

Johana bung 1 châng 12-13-ah Bible hi hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Amah chang apiangte hnenah Pathian fa nih theihna thuneihna a pe a, a hming ringtute hnenah. Chungte chu thisen atanga piang lo, châkna aanga piang ni lo, mihring duhzâwnga piang ni lo, Pathian laka piangte an ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir dawn a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem bawk ang "Piantharna". Aih. 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Thu sawi la, tawngtai rawh: Abba Van Pa duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang tha tak". biakin "An kuta thutak thu ziak leh sawi hmanga thawktute tir ula, chu chu i chhandamna chanchin tha a ni. Chhang chu van hla tak atangin rawn hruai a ni a, kan thlarau nun a tam theih nan a hun takah min pe thin a ni! Amen." .Thlarau lam thudik kan hriat theih nan leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua dil rawh → 1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a tui leh Thlarauva piang, . 2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a chanchin ha tak aanga lo piang, . 3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Pathian atanga lo piang→an zawng zawng chu pakhat atanga lo chhuak an ni a, Pathian fate an ni vek ! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen.

1. Pathian atanga lo piang

Zawhna: Thisen pianna, passion pianna leh mihring duhzawng pian chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Mihring hmasa ber Adama chu thlarau ("thlarau" emaw "tisa") nei mi nung a lo ni ta a ni - 1 Korinth 15:45.

LALPA Pathian chuan lei vaivut atangin mihring a siam a, a hnar chhungah nunna thaw a thaw lut a, thlarau nung a lo ni ta a, a hming chu Adama a ni. Genesis 2:7 ah hian kan hmu a

[Hriat tur:] Leivut atanga siam Adama chu thlarau nei mi nung a lo ni ta a, "chu chu tisa leh thisen nei mi nung → tisa leh thisen taksa a nei a, sualna a nei a ni duhzawng leh duhzawngte, Pathianin Adama chu "mihring" a ti a, chuvangin, Adama atanga lo chhuak zawng zawng → thisen, duhthusam leh mihring duhzawng atanga lo piang a ni! Hei hi i hrethiam em?

Zawhna: Pathian atanga lo piang chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

A tir lamah chuan Thu a awm a, Thu chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Thu chu Pathian a ni - Johana 1:1
"Thu" chu tisaah a chang → chu chu "Pathian" chu tisaah a chang a, "Pathian" chu thlarau → chu chu "Thlarau" tisaah a lo chang a, Thlarau Thianghlim aangin nula thianghlimin a rai a, a lo piang a, a hmingah Isua an vuah a ni! Matthaia 1:21, Johana 1:14, 4:24 en rawh

Isua hi Van Pa hnen atangin a piang → Vantirhkoh zawng zawng zingah, Pathianin tu hnenah nge: Ka Fapa i ni a, vawiinah hian ka hrin che? An zînga tu nge: A Pa ka ni ang a, ani chu ka fapa a ni ang? Hebrai 1:5

Zawhna: Engtin nge Isua kan lo dawnsawn?
Chhanna: Isua hi Pathian Fapa a ni tih kan ring a, a taksa kan ei a, Lalpa thisen kan in chuan kan chhungah "Isua Krista nunna" kan nei ang! Johana 6:53-56 en rawh

Pa Jehova chu Pathian a ni a, Fapa Isua chu Pathian a ni a, Thlarau Thianghlim Thlamuantu pawh Pathian a ni! Isua kan lo lawm hian Pathian kan lo hmuak a, Pathian tirh kan lo hmuak hian Pa Thianghlim kan lo hmuak thin! Thlarau Thianghlim tiam dawng tur chuan Isua neih hi a ni a, Fapa "Isua" i neih chuan Pa i nei a ni. Amen! 1 Johana 2:23-ah hian en theih a ni

Chuvangin, tiam Thlarau Thianghlim chang apiangin Isua an lo dawngsawng a, Pa Thianghlim an lo dawngsawng thin! I chhungah "mi thar" a piang thar → Hetiang mi hi "Adama" thisen atanga lo piang a ni lo va, duhthusam atanga lo piang lo, mihring duhzawng atanga lo piang lo, Pathian atanga lo piang a ni.
Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

2. Pathian atanga piang (a mi ni lo) Adama taksa atanga lo piang

Bible zir ila Rom 8:9 Pathian Thlarau nangmahniah a awm chuan tisa mi ni lovin Thlarau lam mi in ni. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo.

Note: "Pathian Thlarau" → chu Jehova Thlarau, Pa Thlarau, Krista Thlarau, Isua Thlarau, Thlarau Thianghlim leh Thutak Thlarau Thianghlim a ni! Thlamuantu leh Hriak thihna tia koh a ni bawk.

Pathian Thlarau, Krista Thlarau chu nangmah ah Thlarau Thianghlim a cheng a nih chuan! "Mihring" chu nangmah ah a piang thar a - Rom 7:22 en rawh. He "mihring" hi Isua taksa, Isua thisen, Krista nunna, thlarau mi a ni He "mihring thar" hi Krista taksa a ni! Amen

Nang "mihring thar" chu "mihring hlui" Adama taksa taksa, "mihring thar" thlarau taksa thi thei lo zinga mi i ni lo; I pianthar "mihring thar" chu Thlarau Thianghlim, Krista leh Pa Pathian ta a ni! Amen

Krista nangmahah a awm a nih chuan taksaa "mihring hlui" chu sual vangin a thi → Krista nen a thi a ni; Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? Rom 8:9-10-ah hian en rawh

3. Pathian atanga lo piang apiangin an sual ngai lovang

1 Johana 3:9 hi han hawi ila, Pathian laka piang chuan thil a tisual lo va, Pathian thu chu amahah a awm reng a, a sual thei hek lo, Pathian laka piang a nih avangin.

Zawhna: Engvangin nge Pathian atanga piangte hian thil an sual ngai lo?
Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

1 Pathian thu chu thinlungah a awm reng si a - Johana 3:9
2 Nimahsela Pathian Thlarau chu nangmahniah a awm a, tisa mi in ni lo - Rom 8:9
3 Pathian piang thar chu Isua Kristaah a awm reng - 1 Johana 3:6
4 Nunna Thlarau dan chuan sual leh thihna dan ata min chhuah zalen ta - Rom 8:2
5 Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo - Rom 4:15
6 Pathian Thlarauva silfai, tihthianghlim, thiam chantir - 1 Korinth 6:11
7 Thil hlui chu a liam ta a;

"Mihring hlui" chu Krista nen khenbeh a ni → thil hlui chu a liam ta;

"Mi thar" chu Krista nen an khawsa a, tunah chuan Kristaah a awm reng a, Thlarau Thianghlim hmangin silfai, tihthianghlim leh thiamchantir a ni tawh → engkim hi a thar (mihring thar tia koh) a lo ni ta!

Zawhna: Kristian (mi thar) te hian sual an ti thei em?
Chhanna: Pathian atanga lo piang tumahin thil an tisual lovang; 1 Johana 3:8-10, 5:18-ah hian en theih a ni

Zawhna: Thuhriltu henkhatin Kristiante hian sual an la ti hin an ti a, eng thil nge thleng?
Chhanna: Mi (Pathian atanga piang) sual thei tia sawitute chuan Krista chhandamna hi an hrethiam lo. A chhan chu thil sual titute chu pianthar an ni lo va; Krista Thlarau nei lo chu Krista ta a ni lo.

(Krista nangmah ah a awm chuan:)

1 "Mihring putar" taksa chu sual vangin a thi tawh → Mihring hlui chu a thi tawh tih "ring" chu sual lakah a fihlim - Rom 6:6-7
2 Dan atanga zalen → Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo - Rom 4:15
3 Mihring hlui leh a thiltihte chu paih bo rawh → Pathian Thlarau nangmahniah a awm chuan tisaah (thiltih hluiah) in awm tawh lo - Rom 8:9, Kol 3:9
4 Dan tel lo chuan sual chu chhiar tel a ni lo → "Thuthlung Thar" Pathianin i sualna leh bawhchhiatnate chu a hre reng tawh lo vang Pathianin a hre reng lo! - Rom 5:13, Hebrai 10:16-18
5 Dân tel lo chuan sual chu a thi tawh si a (Rom 7:8) → Krista taksa avângin sual lakah te, Dân lak ata te, mihring hlui leh a thiltih lakah te inthiarfihlim tawh che u a ni. I thi tawh - Kol. Sual laka thi tawh leh Krista Isua Pathian tana nung anga inngai - Rom 6:11
6 Taksa chu sual avângin a thi a, thlarau erawh chu felna avângin a nung a ni (Rom 8:10)

Zawhna: Sual taksa hi engtin nge a thih?
Chhanna: Krista thihpui ring rawh → mihring hlui thihna chu tawng la, zawi zawiin dah bo rawh → taksa thi, thi thei taksa, taksa chhe thei tak nei la, pawn lam taksa chu zawi zawiin a boral ang a, a chhe vek ang (Ephesi 4:21). -22) Adama taksa sual Leivut ata a ni a, vaivut ah a kir leh ang. --Genesis 3:19 en rawh

Zawhna: Mi tharte hi engtin nge an awm?
Chhanna: Krista nen nunpui rawh → Mi thar (thlarau mi piang thar) chu Krista Isuaah a awm reng a, nangmahah (mi thar) chu ni tin mihringah a lo thang lian zel a, Krista dinhmunah a lo thang lian zel a ni. Leilung bêlah "ro hlu" dah a nih chuan he thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi Pathian aanga lo chhuak a ni tih a tilang ang a, Isua thihna chu a tichak a, Isua nun → chanchin ha hril te, thutak hril te, mi tam tak hruaina te pawh a lantir bawk ang felna a ni! Krista nen thawhlehna leh taksa tlanna chu tawng ve rawh. "Mihring thar" thlarau nun hian tehkhin rual loh chatuan ropuina rit tak a chang dawn a, Krista a lo lan hunah chuan i taksa pawh a lo lang ang (chu chu taksa chu tlan a ni tawh tihna a ni), tichuan mawi zawkin i tho leh ang! Amen. 2 Korinth 4:7-18-ah hian en theih a ni

7 Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan thil sual a ti lo, Pathian thu chu amaha a awm reng avângin, Pathian laka piang a nih avângin a sual thei hek lo. 1 Johana 3:9 , 5:18-ah kan hmu a

Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

A THA E! Vawiin hian hetah hian "Piantharna" kan rawn share dawn a ni.
Pathian hnenah i tawngtai ho ang u: Abba Van Pa duhtak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Thlarau lam thutakte kan hmuh leh hriat theih nan, Bible kan hriatthiam theih nan leh piantharna kan hriatthiam theih nan, 1 tui leh Thlarau atanga piang, 2 Chanchin tha thu dik atanga piang, 3 Pathian atanga piang, kan thlarau mitte ti eng reng chungin kan rilru hi hawng reng ang che! Isua Kristaa awm reng chu a thianghlim a, sual a nei lo va, sual a ti lo. Pathian atanga piang tumahin thil an tisual lovang, Pathian atanga piang vek kan ni si a. Amen
Lal Isua Krista hmingin! Amen

Isua Krista hnathawktute Unaupa Wang*Yun, Unaunu Liu, Unaunu Zheng, Unaupa Cen... leh hnathawktu dangte chuan Krista chanchin tha hnathawh hi an thlawp a, an pui a, he chanchintha ringtute nen an thawk ho bawk! He rinna thu hriltu leh mi thianghlimte hming hi nunna bu-ah hian ziah a ni Amen Reference Philippi 4:1-3

Isuan, “Kei hi kawng leh thutak leh nunna ka ni;

"Pathian" chu tisaah a lo chang ta - Johana 1:18

Kan (mihring hlui) taksa taksa hi a hmain Adama atanga lo piang a ni a;kan (mihring thar) thlarau taksa hi Adam hnuhnung ber "Isua" atanga lo piang a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?
Amahah chuan thutiam Thlarau Thianghlimin chhinchhiahna i nei a, chu chu thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin tha i hriat lai khan Krista pawh i rin lai khan. Ephesi 1:13 ah hian kan hmu a

2. Krista Isua chanchin tha atanga lo piang i ni

Zawhna: Chanchin |ha chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Chipchiar takin kan sawifiah a ni

1 Isuan, "Lalpa Thlarau chu ka chungah a awm a, hriak mi thih avangin;
Mi retheite hnena Chanchin |ha hril turin mi ko la;

Pathian pawmtlak kum Jubilee puan chhuahna. Luka 4:18-19 ah hian kan hmu a

3 Paula chuan (he Chanchin Ṭha hi in ringin chhandam in ni ang) ka hlan che u kha a ti a: pakhatnaah chuan, Krista chu kan sualte avângin a thi a, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin phum a ni a, a pathumnaah chuan, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin Van chu a tho leh a ni. 1 Korinth 15:3-4-ah kan hmu

Zawhna: Chanchin |hain engtin nge min hrin?
Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

Kan sualte avangin Krista chu Bible sawi danin a thi a

(1) Kan taksa sual tihboral a nih theih nan - Rom 6:6
(2) Thi tawhte chu sual lakah an chhuak tawh si a - Rom 6:7

1 Korinth 15:51-54, Thupuan 19:6-9

Ka thian duh tak, unau leh ka unaunu te hnenah thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen.

Johana bung 3 châng 5-6-ah Bible hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Isuan, "Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, tui leh Thlarau atanga piang a nih loh chuan Pathian ramah a lut thei lovang. Tisa atanga piang chu tisa a ni a, Thlarau atanga lo piang chu thlarau a ni," a ti .Amen

articles.title: Harsatna sawifiah: Thlarau thliar hran

articles.content:

Thlaraute chu hrethiam rawh

(1) Thutak Thlarau Thianghlim

Bible i zir ang u Johana 14:15-17 “Mi hmangaih chuan ka thupekte chu in zawm ang a, Pa hnenah ka dil ang a, ani chuan Thlamuantu dang (or Translation: Thlamuantu; chu chu a hnuaiah) a pe ang che u kumkhuain nangmahni hnenah, Thlarau dik tak, khawvelin a pawm theih loh chu, amah chu a hmu lo va, a hre lo va, nangni erawh chuan amah chu in hre zawk a ni, nangmahniah a awm reng a, nangmahniah a awm dawn si a.

[Thil chhinchhiah]: Lal Isuan: "Mi hmangaih chuan ka thupekte in zawm ang. Tin, Pa hnenah ka dil ang a, chatuan in hnena awm turin anpuitu dang a pe ang che u, chu chu thutak Thlarau a ni → Thutak Thlarau chu a lo thleng ta." , "thutak zawng zawng" ah a hruai ang che!Johana 16:13 en rawh.

→ Thutak Thlarau Thianghlim → Thlarau Thianghlim chu thutak a ni tih hi a hmain ka lo hrilh tawh che u a, ka lo hrilh tawh bawk che u a ni! → Pathian chu thlarau a ni: "Pathian Thlarau, Jehova Thlarau, Isua Thlarau, Krista Thlarau, Pathian Fapa Thlarau, Lalpa Thlarau leh Thutak Thlarau hi "Thlarau pakhat" an ni. → chu chu Thlarau Thianghlim thutak a ni! Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(2) Mihring thlarau

Genesis Bung 2 Châng 7 LALPA Pathian chuan lei vaivut aṭangin mihring a siam a, a hnarah nunna thaw a thaw lut a, nunna thaw a lo ni ta a, a hming chu Adam a ni. → "Thlarau" tih awmzia chu tisa leh thisen tihna a ni , . Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Thuhriltu 3 Bung 21 "Mihring thlarau" chu a chho tih tuin nge hria ang → Mihring "thlarau" chu Chanchin |ha ringtu leh chhandamtu thlarau angin a tho chhuak a, mahse chanchin ha "ring lo" te tan erawh chuan, an taksa angin leivutah an kir leh a, an "thlarau" chu lung inah an awm a, chu chu Hades→ Krista kaltlangin a ni thlarau ] Tân ina awm thlaraute hnênah Chanchin Ṭha hril rawh u. thlarau "Pathian nun, "Chanchin |ha" chhandamna hi hmanlai hunah a la puan loh avangin. Hei hi chiang takin i hrethiam em? Reference - 1 Petera Bung 3 Châng 19 leh 4 Bung 5-6.

(3) Vantirhkoh tlu tawh thlarau

Isaia 14:12 "Aw arsi êng, zîng Fapa, engah nge vân ata i tluk? Engati nge hnamte hnehtu hi leiah hian tihchhiat i nih? Thupuan 12:4 A hmui chuan van arsite chu a hrual a. A. A." hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu leiah a tla thla ta a ni.

Thil chhinchhiah: Vanah "arsi eng, zing fapa" leh a hruai "thuma ṭhena hmun khat" chu vantirhkoh → leiah a tla → "dragon, rul, Diabola, Setana" a lo ni a, vantirhkoh hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat tlu tawh → lo ni ta " Thil tihsual thlarau , . Chuti a nih chuan, chiang takin i hrethiam em?"

→ Khawiah nge[. thlarau ] Isua Krista chu tisaah a lo kal tih puang la, chu chu Pathian hnen ata a lo kal tihna a ni; Fan" thlarau "Isua i phat chuan Pathian mi i ni lo. Hei hi a ni." Krista dodaltu thlarau . 1 Johana 4:2-3 en rawh.

A langsar ber chu tunlai kohhran tam takah → zâwlnei derte "thlarau" chuan Isua i "rin" hnuah "ni tin i sualte i puang chhuak a, i sualte silfai nân a thisen hlu tak i dîl ang →" tiin a zirtîr che a ni Amah tithianghlimtu thuthlung thisen chu thil pangngaiah chhiar rawh →Hei hi a ni Thil tihsual thlarau . Chutiang "ringtute" chuan chanchin ha kal dan dik tak chu an la hrethiam lo va, an tihsual avanga bum an ni. An chhungah "Thlarau Thianghlim" an nei tak tak a nih chuan "Pathian Fapa thisen" chu thil pangngaiah an ngai ngai lovang, hei hi a chiang a ni, i ti! Dik? → "Pianthar" i nih chuan → midang zirtir che i mamawh lo, a chhan chu "hriak thihna" hian i tih tur a zirtir dawn che a ni! Chuvangin, an hnen ata i lo chhuak tur a ni → Chanchin |ha hriltu leh thudik sawitu "Lal Isua Krista kohhran"-ah "luh" tur a ni → chutiang chuan: thawhleh, piantharna, chhandamna, nunna nei, ropuina dawng, lawmman dawng , lallukhum dawng la, nakin lawkah thawhlehna mawi zawk! Amen. I hrethiam em? Thuhmahruai - Hebrai 10:29 leh Johana 1:26-27.

(4) Vantirhkoh rawngbawlna rilru

Unaute hian "Ngun takin ngaithla la, hriatthiamna nen ngaithla rawh u" - Pathian thu hrethiam tur chuan! A tha e! Vawiin hian ka inpawlna hi in zavaia hnenah ka hlan duh a ni. Amen

Isua hmangaihna chuan tumah boral a duh lo, . Chuvangin Mi zawng zawng chhandam ni rawh se

(1) Isua hmangaihna chuan tumah boral a duh lo

Bible zir la, 2 Petera 3:8-10 hi i chhiar ho ang u → Unau duh takte u, thil pakhat in theihnghilh loh tur a awm: Lalpa tan chuan ni khat chu kum sangkhat ang a ni a, kum sangkhat chu ni khat ang a ni. Pathian fapate chauhvin Pathian ram chu in luah thei ang a, Pa vâna mi rochan chu in hrethiam em? Thuthlung Hluiah chuan." "→Chumi niah chuan vante chu thawm ri nasa takin a liam ang a, thil zawng zawng chu meiin a tichhe vek ang a, lei leh a chhunga thil awm zawng zawng hi a kangral vek ang. Keini erawh chu a thutiam anga "Pathian piang" kan ni. Van thar leh lei thar thlir chungin, Lalpan a tiam chatuan ram → felna a chenna hmuna luh Amen.

(2) Mi zawng zawng chhandam ni sela, kawng dik hrethiam rawh se

A chhan chu Chanchin Tha hi Pathian thiltihtheihna a nih avangin ringtu zawng zawng a mamawh a ni! Amen. →Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun "Isua" chu an hnenah a pe ta a, chutichuan amah ring apiang an boral lova, chatuan nunna an neih theih nan. A chhan chu Pathianin a Fapa "Isua" chu khawvel thiam loh chantir turin (a nih loh leh lehlin: khawvel rorel turin; a hnuai lam ang bawk) ni lovin, khawvel hi Amah hmanga chhandam a nih theih nan a tir a ni. →Mi zawng zawngin sim rawh u→Chanchin tha ring la, thudik hrethiam rawh→Lalpa duhzawng unaute u, Pathian hnenah lawmthu kan sawi fo tur a ni; Amen! articles.title: Isua hmangaihna: Nausen hian chanchin ha thutak a pholang
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ka chhungte duhtak, unaute leh ka unaunu te tan thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen.

2 Korinth 5:14-15 hi Bible hawng ila, chhiar ho ila: Krista hmangaihna chuan min nawr lui si a, mi zawng zawng tan mi pakhat a thi a, mi zawng zawng tan a thi tih kan ngaihtuah a, nungte chu anmahni tan an nung tawh lo va, an tana thi leh kaihthawh a nih avangin; nung.

Isua'. duh phurna (excitation) a ni Keini, "Nausen" hian chanchin ha thutak chu kan puang chhuak hin

Bible-a 2 Korinth 5:14-15 hi i zirho ang u: Krista hmangaihna hian min nawr lui tlat si a, mi zawng zawng tana mi pakhat a thih aangin mi zawng zawng an thi vek niin kan ngai a; an tâna thi leh tho leh kha. Khawi lam zawng zawngah hmelmain min hual vel a, mahse kan tang lo va, kan mangang lo va, tihduhdah kan ni lo va, min thlahthlam si lo va; Isua nunna pawh keimahniah a lan chhuah theih nan Isua thihna chu kan keng tel fo thin.

[Thil chhinchhiah]: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thu ziakte kan zir hian Krista hmangaihnain min chêttîr tih kan hmu a, a chhan chu Isua chu mi zawng zawng tâna a thih avângin mi zawng zawng tân a thi a, mi zawng zawng tân a nung a ni! Amen. He thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi Pathian hnen atanga lo chhuak a ni tih lantir nan kan nei a, mahse kan tang lo .Thil paih bo a ni lo va, tihhlum a ni lo. Isua nunna pawh keimahniah a lan chhuah theih nan Isua thihna chu kan keng tel fo thin. Amen!

(1) Nausen chuan chanchin tha a puang chhuak

Chanchin |ha chu eng nge ni? Bible hi i zir ang u Luka 24:44-48 Isuan an hnenah, “In hnena ka awm laia ka hrilh che u kha hei hi a ni: Mosia Dânah te, Zawlneite leh Sam buah te, “Ka chungchâng sawi zawng zawng hi,” tiin a inziak a a lo thleng tur a ni,” tiin Isuan Pathian Lehkha Thu an hriatthiam theih nan an rilru a hawng a, an hnenah, “Krista chu a tuar a, mitthi zing ata a tho leh a, chu chu simna leh sual ngaihdamna a ni tur a ni,” a ti a a hmingin hnam zawng zawng hnenah thu hril a ni a, heng thu hi hretu in ni si a. tichuan, Bible-in a sawi angin a ni thum niah a tho leh ta a ni.

[Thil chhinchhiah]: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thute kan zir chian hian "Lalpa Isua" ngei pawhin: "Mosia Dan, Zawlneite leh Sam-a ka chanchin ziak zawng zawng hi Pathian Lehkha Thu, Krista Amah tih ang hian a thleng famkim vek tur a ni," a ti tih kan chhinchhiah a ni ni thum niah a tuar ang a, mitthi zîng ata a tho leh ang a, simna leh sual ngaihdamna chu Jerusalem aangin hnam tin hnênah a hmingin hril a ni ang. Chûng thilte hriatpuitu in ni! Amen.

tin, Jentailte hnena chhandamna chanchin hriltu tirhkoh "Paula" → Kei pawhin in hnena ka hrilh che u kha: pakhatnaah chuan, Pathian Lehkha Thu angin kan sualte avangin Krista a thi tih, → 1 sual lak ata kan chhuah zalen theih nan, 2. Breaking dan leh dan chibai bukna--Rom 6:6-7 leh Rom 7:6 en rawh. Bible-in 1 Petera Bung 1:3-5-a a sawi angin - "Isua Krista mitthi zing ata thawhlehna" hmangin kan piang thar → "keini", Amen! Chutichuan, beiseina nung kan neih theih nân, rochan chhe thei lo, bawlhhlawh lo leh bo thei lo, vâna in tâna dah khâwm kan neih theih nân. Nangni rinna avanga Pathian thiltihtheihnain a vawn tlat chuan chhandamna inbuatsaih chu hun hnuhnung bera puan chhuah tur chu i dawng ang. Hei hi Lal Isuan → tirhkoh Paula, Petera leh tirhkoh dangte chanchin ha hril chu a ni. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(2) Ro hlu kawng dik tak chu a lo lang ta

Bible i zir ang u Johana Bung 1:1-2 A tir lamah chuan Thu a awm a, Thu chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Thu chu Pathian a ni. He Thu hi a tir lamah Pathian hnenah a awm a. Châng 14 Thu chu tisaah a lo chang a, khawngaihna leh thutakin a khat a, kan zîngah a awm ta a. Tin, a ropuina, Pa fa mal neih chhun ropuina chu kan hmu ta a ni. Châng 18 Fapa mal neih chhun, Pa kawchhunga awm chauh lo chu tumahin Pathian an hmu ngai lo. 1 Joh. (He nunna hi a lo lang tawh a, kan hmu ta a, tunah chuan Pa hnena awm leh kan hnena lo inlar chatuan nunna chu in hnenah kan puang tih kan hriattir a ni.) Thianghlimna Thlarau angin, mitthi zing ata thawhlehna hmangin, Thiltihtheihna nasa tak nei Pathian Fapa nia inpuan a ni. Rom 1:4 en rawh.

[Thil chhinchhiah]: A tir lamah chuan Tao a awm a, Tao chu Pathian hnenah a awm a, Tao chu Pathian a ni. He Thu hi a tir lamah Pathian hnenah a awm → tisaah a lo chang a, Nula thianghlim Mariin a rai a, Thlarau Thianghlimin a piang a, a hmingah Isua an vuah ta a ni! Amen. Tirhkoh Johana chuan a ti a! A tir aanga nun dan bulpui chungchangah chuan kan mit ngeiin kan hre tawh a, kan hmu tawh a, kan hmu tawh a, kan kut ngeiin kan khawih tawh bawk. (He nun hi a lo lang tawh a, kan hmu ta a, tunah chuan Pa hnena awm leh kan hnena lo inlar chatuan nunna chu in hnenah ka hlan ta tih ka hriattir a ni). Vawikhat chu Krista nen kan thawhleh hnuah → Pathian Fapa duh tak Isua Krista taksa leh nunna kan dawng → he thiltihtheihna ropui tak hi keimahni atanga lo chhuak ni lovin Pathian atanga lo chhuak a ni tih “tihtir” turin he “ro hlu” hi leia bêlah dah kan nei a ni. ...Isua thihna chu kan chhungah kan keng reng a, chutiang chuan Isua nunna pawh keimahniah a lo lang thei ang. articles.title: Krista hmangaihna: kan Pa Vana mi ro luahtuah min siam
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ka chhungte duhtak, unaute leh ka unaunu te tan thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen. Kan Bible hi Hebrai bung 9 châng 15-ah i hawng ang u Hemi avang hian thuthlung thara palaitu a lo ni ta a, a thihnain thuthlung hmasa hun laia miten sual an tihsualte chu a inremtir a, kohte chu chatuan rochan tiam chu dawng turin a ti thei ta a ni.

Vawiin hian kan zir dawn a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem bawk ang "Isua Hmangaihna". Aih. panga I tawngtai ang u: Abba duh tak, Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! hmeichhe ṭha tak [Kohhran] chuan hmun hla tak aanga chaw rawn keng a, a hun taka min pe turin hnathawk a tir a, chutiang chuan kan thlarau nun a hausa zawk ang! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel ang a, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru a hawng zel ang u. Krista chu thuthlung thar palai a lo ni ta a, thuthlung hmasa lama mite tlan tura a thih aangin, a kohte chu Pa Abba-in a tiam chatuan rochan chu rochung turin a siam ta a ni. . Amen! A chunga tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Isua hmangaihna chuan Pa chatuan ro luahtuah min siam a ni

(1) Fapaten rochan chu an rochun a;

Han hawi la, Genesis 21:9-10 chhiar rawh → Chutichuan Sari chuan Aigupta mi Hagari chuan Abrahama fapa a nuihzat lai a hmu a, Abrahama hnenah chuan, “He bawihnu leh a fapa hi hnawt chhuak rawh! Isaaka." Tunah chuan Galatia bung 4 châng 30-na hi han en teh. Mahse, Bible hian eng nge a sawi? Chutah chuan: "Bawihnu leh a fapa chu hnawt chhuak rawh u! Bawih fapa chu hmeichhe zalên fapa chu ro luahtu a ni lo vang," a ti.

Thil chhinchhiah: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thute hi kan chhui chiang a, "bawihnu" Hagariin fapa a hrin chu "thisen" anga piang a ni tih kan chhinchhiah a, chu chu zalenna hmeichhe "Sarah"-in a hrin chu thutiam angin a piang a ni. Hengte hi thuthlung pahnih → Thuthlung Hlui leh Thuthlung Thar "hmeichhia" pahnih an ni. thuthlung hlui a ni →Naupang lo piangte hi "thisen" atanga piang an ni a, dan hnuaiah chuan "bawi, sual bawih" an ni a, ro luah tur "an luah thei lo" a, chuvangin tisa fate chu hnawhchhuah an ngai a;

Thuthlung Thar →"Hmeichhe zalen" atanga piang fate hi "thutiam" emaw "Thlarau Thianghlim atanga piang" emaw atanga piang an ni. Tisa anga piang → "Kan tisa hlui chu tisa atanga lo piang a ni" chuan Thlaraua piang → "Pathian piangte" an tiduhdah dawn a, chuvangin tisa atanga piangte chu kan hnawtchhuak tur a ni a "Hmeichhe zalên aṭanga piang" tih chu Thlarau Thianghlim → "mipa thar" chuan Pa ro luah rawh se. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? Vawi tam tak ka ngaithla ngei ang tih ka hrethiam lo! Amen.

Kan mihring tisa hlui hi kan nu leh pate atanga lo piang, vaivut atanga siam, "Adama" anga siam, tisa anga piang → sual atanga piang, dan hnuaia piang, sual bawih kan ni a, van ram ro luah thei lo kan ni . →Sam 51:5 en la, ka nuin nau a pai tirh atangin sual, sualah ka piang a. → Chuvang chuan kan mihring hlui hi Kristaah baptisma changin amah nen khenbeh a ngai a, sual taksa tihchhiat a, he thihna taksa ata a tlanchhuah theih nan. "Hmeichhe zalen" → 1 tui leh Thlarau Thianghlim atanga piangte, 2 Isua Krista chanchin tha atanga lo piang, 3 Pathian atanga piang "mithar" ni, Van Pa ro ro luah rawh se . Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(2) Danah innghatin, thutiamah a innghat lo

Bible i zirchiang ang u Galatia 3:18 Rolu chu Dan avanga lo awm a nih chuan a tiam a ni lo va, Pathianin a tiam aangin Abrahama hnenah ro a pe a ni. leh Rom 4:14 Dan zawmtute chauh hi ro luahtu an nih chuan rinna chu a thlawn a, thutiam chu a bo ta a ni.

Note: Dan ang leh thutiam aangin ni lovin, a hmaa ka unaute hnenah ka lo share tawh a, lo kir leh la, chipchiar takin lo ngaithla teh u! Vawiinah hian a pawimawh ber chu, Van Pa rochan rochun dan tur chu unaute hriatthiam tir hi a ni. Danin Pathian thinurna a tiharh avangin, tisa anga piangte chu sual bawih an ni a, Dan atanga lo chhuakte chauh an rochun thei lo → "tiam anga piang" emaw, "Thianghlim atanga piangte" emaw; Thlarau" tih hi Pathian fate leh Pathian fate chauhvin an Pa Vana mi ro rochun an luah thei a ni. Dan zawmtute chu sual bawih an ni a, ro luah thei lo an ni → dana mi an ni a, thutiam an ni lo → dana mite chu Krista aangin an inhen a, khawngaihna ata an tlu hin → Pathianin malsawmna a tiam chu an hlihsak ta a ni. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

(3) Kan Pa Vâna mi rochan kan ni

Deuteronomy 4:20 LALPAN Aigupta ram ata, thir meipui ata a hruai chhuak che u a, tûn laia in awm ang hian in roluah tûr hnamah a siamsak che u a ni. Bung 9 Châng 29 Dik tak chuan, anni chu i mite leh i rochan, i thiltihtheihna leh i kut phar chhuakte an ni. Ephesi 1:14 hi han hawi leh teh.He Thlarau Thianghlim hi Pathian mite (original text: inheritance) a ropuina fakna atana tlan an nih hma loh chuan kan rochan thutiam (original text: inheritance) a ni. Hebrai 9:15 Chumi avâng chuan thuthlung thara palai a lo ni ta a, chutichuan, kohte chuan thuthlung hmasa hnuaia sualte ngaihdam nâna thi tawhin, chatuan rochan tiam chu an dawng thei ang.

Thil chhinchhiah: Thuthlung Hluiah → Pathian Jehova’n Israel fate chu Aigupta ram ata leh thir meipui ata, Dan hnuaia sual bawihte chu a hruai chhuak a → Pathian rochan atana mi bik ni turin a hruai chhuak a, Amaherawhchu, Israel mi tam takin Pathian an “rin” loh avangin. ringlo zawng zawngte chu Bankruptcy thlaler → ni hnuhnûnga awmte tân vaukhânna atân a thawk a ni. "Rinna" → "Thlarau Thianghlim" thutiam hmanga fa kan neihte hi Pathian mite → Pathian rochan chu a ropuina fakna atana tlan a nih hma loh chuan kan rochan finfiahna a ni. Amen! Isua chu thuthlung thar palai a nih avangin kraws-ah khenbeh a ni a, kan sualte avângin a thi → kan sualte ngaihdamna. a hmaa appointment neih tawh a ni "Chu chu dan thuthlung a ni a, chu chuan dan hnuaia awmte chu → sual ata leh dan ata tlanna an ni → kohte chu luh phalsak an ni. Thuthlung Thar "Chatuan rochan tiam chu dawng rawh." . Amen! Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

A tha e! Vawiin hian ka inpawlna hi in zavaia hnenah ka hlan duh a ni. Amen

articles.title: Dan awm lohna hmunah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Pathian chhungkuaa ka unau duh takte tan remna lo awm rawh se! Amen.

Bible hi Rom Bung 4 leh chang 15-ah hawngin, i chhiar dun ang u: Dân chuan thinurna a tithinur si a, Dân awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo. .

Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang [kohhran] chuan hnathawktu a tir chhuak thin - an kuta thutak thu ziak leh sawi hmangin, chu chu kan chhandamna chanchin tha a ni → a hun takah ei tur min pe turin van atanga hla tak atangin chhang a rawn keng a, chutiang chuan Thlarau lam kan ni nun a tam zawk! Amen. Lal Isua hnenah kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen la, chutiang chuan i thusawi, thlarau lam thudik tak takte chu kan hre thei ang a, kan hmu thei ang→ Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo tih hrethiam rawh; .

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

(1) Dan leh sual inzawmna

Zawhna: Dan "first" a awm em? A nih loh leh "first" a ni em?
Chhanna: A hmasa berin Dan a awm a, chutah chuan sual a awm. →Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo; Amen! →"Sual thiltihtheihna chu dan a nih avangin" →Dan thiltihtheihna thuneihna chu [bawhchhiatna, sual leh mi sualte thunun hi a ni chiang hle em? --1 Korinth 15:56 leh Rom 4:15 en rawh.

Zawhna: Sual chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Dan bawhchhiat hi sual a ni → Tupawh sual chuan dan a bawhchhia a ni; 1 Johana 3:4 en rawh

Zawhna: "Sual" tih chhan chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Tisa kan awm lai khan "dan" avang hian sual chu "piang" a ni. →Tisa kan awm lai khan Dan atanga lo piang châkna sualte chuan kan taksa peng hrang hrangah hna a thawk a, thihna rah a chhuah si a. Rom 7:5 en rawh

→ "Tisa châkna sual, châknate hian taksa peng hrang hrangah hna a thawk" → Châknate chu a lo pian chuan sual a hring a, sual a lo puitlin chuan thihna a hring a ni. Jakoba 1:15 en rawh

Zawhna: Kan sual taksa hi khawi atanga lo chhuak nge?
Chhanna: Kan taksa sual hi kan pi leh pute [Adama] atanga lo piang a ni. → Hei hi mi pakhat, Adama hmanga khawvela sual a luh ang chiah a ni a, thihna chu sual atanga lo chhuak a ni a, chuvangin mi zawng zawngin an sual avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. ...Mahse, Adama atanga Mosia thlengin thihna a lal a, Adama anga sual ti lote pawhin an lal a ni. Adama chu mi lo kal tur entîrna a ni. Rom 5:12,14 en rawh

(2) Dan, sual leh thihna inzawmna

Zawhna: "Thihna" hi "sual" atanga lo chhuak a nih avangin engtin nge thihna lak ata kan tlanchhuah theih ang?
Chhanna: Thihna laka tlanchhuah i duh chuan sual lak ata i tlanchhuak tur a ni → Sual laka tlanchhuah i duh chuan dan lak ata i tlanchhuak tur a ni.

Zawhna: Sual hi engtin nge kan pumpelh theih ang?
Chhanna: Kristaa mi pakhat chu mi zawng zawng tan "thi" a, mi zawng zawng an thi tih "Ring" rawh. →"Thi tawh chu sual lakah a chhuak ta"--Rom 6:7 en rawh

→"Ring" tih leh mi zawng zawng thi, "Ring" tih leh mi zawng zawng chu sual lak ata chhandam an ni. Amen!

Mihringin kan kal lo va, rinnain kan kal zawk → Mihringin ka tisa chu a nung a, rinnain ka putar chu khenbehin Krista nen a thi ta a ni. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? 2 Korinth 5:14 en rawh.

Zawhna: Dan lakah engtin nge kan tlanchhuah theih ang?
Chhanna: Krista taksa avanga ka phuarna dan lakah kan thi tawh a, tunah chuan Dan lakah kan zalen ta → Chutichuan, ka unaute u, nangni pawh Krista taksa avangin Dan lakah in thi tawh .Nimahsela kan thih atang khan min phuartu danah chuan tunah chuan dan lak ata kan zalen ta a, chutichuan Lalpa rawng kan bawl theih nan thlarau thar (thlarau: emaw Thlarau Thianghlim tia lehlin) ang zelin, inkhawm dan hlui ang ni lovin. Rom 7:4, 6 en rawh

(3) Dan awm lohnaah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo

1. 1. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan awm lohna hmunah chuan bawhchhiatna a awm lo : Danin thinurna a tiharh avangin (a nih loh leh lehlin: mite hremna a tuar tir thin a ni); Rom 4 Interval Châng 15-na
2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan tel lo chuan sual chu a thi tawh si a --Rom 7:8 ah hian kan hmu
3. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan tel lo chuan sual hi sual a ni lo : Dan hma chuan sual hi khawvelah a awm tawh a, mahse Dan tel lo chuan sual hi sualah a ngai lo. Rom 5:13 ah hian kan hmu
4. 4. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Dan i neih chuan Dan anga rorelsak i ni ang : Dan tel lova thil sual titu chu Dân tel lovin a boral bawk ang; Rom 2:12-ah hian kan hmu

[Hriat tur]: Pathian atanga lo piang naupangte hian "Krista dan" an nei a, chu dan khaikhawmna chu Krista a ni - Rom 10:4 en rawh → Krista dan chu "duh" ! I vengte chu nangmah angin hmangaih rawh ! Amen. A chhan chu " thiam loh chantirna" dan tel lo chuan sual leh sualna a awm lo vang . Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? chuvangin Pathian thu hi thuruk a ni Pathian fate hnenah chauh puan chhuah a ni! "Pawn lam mi" ngaithlatute erawh chuan an hre a, mahse an hrethiam lo; 1 Johana 3:9 leh 5:18 en rawh.

A THA E! Vawiin hian ka inpawlna hi in zavaia hnenah ka hlan duh a ni. Amen

articles.title: Dan hmanga a nih chuan thutiam a ni lo
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Ka chhungte duhtak, unaute leh ka unaunu te tan thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen.

Galatia bung 3 châng 18-ah hian kan Bible-te i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u: Rolu chu Dân avânga a nih chuan, a tiam avângin a ni lo va; .

Vawiin hian kan zir dun ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem ang "Dan hmanga a nih chuan thutiam a ni lo". Tawngtai rawh: Abba duh tak, Van Pa Thianghlim, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! Hmeichhe nungchang [kohhran] chuan van hmun hla tak aangin chaw phur turin hnathawk a tir a, kan thlarau nun hausak zawk nan a hun takah chaw min sem hin! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh hmuh theih nan leh Pathianin Bible-a malsawmna min tiamte kan hriatthiam theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit a ti eng zel a, kan rilru a hawng zel theih nan tawngtai ila→ Dan hmanga a nih chuan thutiam a ni lo; "Rinna" hmang hian Thlarau Thianghlim tiam chu chhinchhiahna angin kan dawng a, chu chu Pa ro rochun kan nihna finfiahna a ni. Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Dan hmanga a nih chuan thutiam a ni lo

(1) Pathianin Abrahama thlahte chu ro luah tûrin a tiam a

Bible-a Galatia bung 3 châng 15-18 te hi i zir chiang ang u, i chhiar ho ang u: Unaute u, mihringte ṭawng hman tlanglawn angin ka sawi ang: Mihringte inkara thuthlung ni mah se, a lo din tawh chuan → "a ni" tihna a ni Pathian leh mihring inkara din a ni tawh" "Literary covenant tha" chu kalsan leh belhchhah theih a ni lo. Chu thutiam chu Abrahama leh a thlahte hnenah a ni. →Pathianin Abrahama leh a thlahte chuan khawvel hi danin an luah ang tih a tiam si a, rinna felna avang zawkin. --Rom 4:13 en rawh → Pathian chuan mi tam tak sawinain "in thlah zawng zawng" a ti lo va, "in thlah pakhat," "mi pakhat" a sawi zawk a, chu chu Krista a ni.

(2) Rinna a innghah apiangin Van Pa ro luah tur chu an rochun ang

Q: Rinna lama innghat eng nge ni
Chhanna: "Chanchin |ha thutak" ringtu apiang chu "rinnain" an ni a, rinna ringawt a innghat a, putar thiltih ah innghat lo → "Isua Krista chanchin tha" 1 rinna aanga lo piang a ni , Tui leh Thlarau Thianghlim atanga piang 2, Pathian piang atanga lo piang 3! Chumi hnuah chauh chuan Pathian ram kan luah thei ang a, chatuan nunna kan chang thei ang a, kan Pa Vana mi rochun kan luah thei ang. Chuvangin, "Rinna" a innghatte hi Abrahama thlah an ni tih i hriat a ngai a ni. --Galatia bung 3 chang 7 en rawh.Ka sawi tum chu Pathian thuthlung lawk hian Abrahama leh a thlahte'n khawvela "Pathian ram" an luah tur thu Pathian thutiam a kawk a ni. --Genesis 22:16-18 leh Rom 4:13 en rawh

(3) Pathian thutiamte chu danin a tihlawhtling thei lo

Kum 430 hnuah pawh danin a hlihsak thei lo. Mi zawng zawngin thil an tihsual a, Pathian ropuina an tlakchham avangin – bung 3 chang 23 en rawh. Dan ang chuan →_→ khawvela mi zawng zawng hian "sual" an ti vek tawh a, "sual" hnathawh chu "thihna" a ni. Chu chu, mi an thih a, vaivuta an lo kir leh hunah chuan Pathianin malsawmna a lo tiam lawk chu a thlawn mai dawn lo’m ni?

Chuvangin, Pathianin a hmaa thuthlung a siam chu kum za li leh sawmthum hnuah pawh danin a hlihsak thei lo va, chu thutiam chu a bo ta a ni. A chhan chu rochan chu "Dan hmanga a ni lo" tih a nih chuan Pathianin a thutiam aangin a rochan chu Abrahama hnenah a pe a ni. →_→Dan zawmtute chauh hi ro luahtu an nih chuan "rinna" chu a thlawn ang a, "thutiam" chu a bo vek ang.

(4) Dan chuan thinurna a chawk tho a, mi a hrem thin

Dan chuan thinurna a tithinur si a (a nih loh leh lehlin: hremna a ko thin); →_→ tih awmzia chu Isua Krista hmanga tlan kan ni tihna a ni a, chu chuan → 1 sual laka zalenna → 2 dan laka zalenna → 3 mihring hlui Adama lak ata zalenna → 4 Pathian piang "mithar" aangin ramah min sawn ta a ni Fapa duh tak a ni. Hetiang hian Dan hnuaiah i awm tawh lova, dan leh sual i bawhchhia lovang a, rorelna danin anchhe lawh i ni tawh lovang. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em? .

(5) Dan avanga khawngaihna ata tlu

Zawhna: Dan chu eng nge ni?
Chhanna: Dan thiltih avanga thiam changte.
Chuvangin, "rinna" avang hian mi chu ro luahtu a ni a, chuvangin khawngaihna avang hian thutiam chu thlah zawng zawng tan chauh ni lovin, rinna entawntute tan pawh a thleng ngei ang; Abrahama chu. --Rom 4:14-16 en rawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Inring: Dan thiltiha innghat apiang chu ânchhe dawng a ni, a chhan chu Dan thiltih avanga Pathian hmaah tumah thiamchantir theih an ni lo. Dan behchhana mite chu Krista lakah an inthiarfihlim a, khawngaihna ata an tlu tawh a ni. Pathianin malsawmna a tiam chu anmahniin a ti bo ta a ni. Chuvângin, Pathianin malsâwmna a tiamte hi "rinna"-ah a innghat lo va; Amen. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

9. 9. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Sual laka thih chu sual laka zalenna a ni: Kan mihring hlui kha Amah nen khenbeh a ni tih kan hria a, sual taksa tihboral a nih theih nan, sual rawng kan bawl tawh loh nan; ...Sualah a thi a mahse vawi khat chu Pathian tan a nung a; Chutichuan, sual lakah thi tawhah in inngai tur a ni a, Krista Isuaah chuan Pathian tan nung zawkah in inngai tur a ni. Amah chang apiangte hnenah Pathian fa nih theihna thuneihna a pe a, a hming ringtute hnenah. Chungte chu thisen atanga piang lo, châkna aanga piang ni lo, mihring duhzâwnga piang ni lo, Pathian laka piangte an ni. Johana 1:12-13 en rawh
Tupawh Pathian laka piang chuan thil sual a ti lo, Pathian thu chu amahah a awm reng a, a sual thei lo, Pathian laka piang a nih avangin. Chuta tang chuan tute nge Pathian fate leh tute nge Diabola fate tih a lo lang chhuak thin. Tupawh felna ti lo chu Pathian mi a ni lo va, a unau hmangaih lo pawh a ni hek lo. 1 Johana 3:9-10-ah kan hmu

Chaw chu hla tak aangin vanram thlenga phurh luh a ni a, van lam thlarau lam chaw chu a hun takah min pe a, kan nun a ti hausa zawk a ni. Amen! (1) Dan siamtu leh roreltu pakhat chauh a awm

Bible [Jakoba 4:12] hi en la, chhiar ho ila: Dan siamtu leh roreltu pakhat chauh a awm a, chu chu chhandam thei leh tichhe thei a ni. Midangte rorel tur hian tu nge i nih?

Lalpa Pathian chuan, "Huana thing rah chu a thlawnin i ei thei a, a chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah erawh chu i ei tur a ni lo, a rah i ei ni chuan i thi ngei ang," tiin thu a pe a Bung 15- Châng 17-na chhinchhiahna.

2. 2. A rilru a hah lutuk chuan a rilru a buai em em a Judate Mosia Dân - Pathian Jehova chuan Sinai Tlângah "Thupek Sâwm" a pe a, chu chu Horeb Tlângah a ni. Exodus 20 leh Leviticus-ah te. Mosia chuan Israel fate zawng zawng chu a ko khawm a, an hnenah, "Aw Israelte u, vawiina dan leh rorelna ka hrilh che u hi lo ngaithla teh u, chu chu in zir theih nan leh in zawm theih nan. Bible [Johana 1:17] kan hawng a, kan chhiar dun a: Dan chu Mosia zâra pêk a ni a, khawngaihna leh thutak chu Isua Krista zârah a lo thleng a ni. Amen

Vawiin hian kan zir dawn a, kan fellowship ang a, kan insem bawk ang "Khawngaihna leh Dan". Tawngtaina: Abba Pa Thianghlim duh tak, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen, Lalpa hnenah lawmthu sawi rawh! "Hmeichhe nungchang" chuan hnathawktu a tir chhuak thin - an kuta thutak thu ziak leh an sawi, kan chhandamna chanchin tha hmangin! Chaw chu hla tak aanga phurh chhuah a ni a, kan nun a hausa zawk theih nan van lam thlarau lam chaw chu a hun takah min pe chhuak hin. Amen! Thlarau lam thudikte kan hmuh leh hriat theih nan leh Dan chu Mosia kaltlangin a lo inhlangkai a ni tih kan hriatthiam theih nan Lal Isuan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel sela, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru a hawng zel ang u. Khawngaihna leh thutak chu Isua Krista aanga lo chhuak a ni ! Amen.

A chunga tawngtaina te, tawngtaina te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

(1) Khawngaihna hian hnathawh a ngaihsak lo

(2) Khawngaihna hi a thlawna pek a ni

[Matthaia 5:45] Chutiang chuan in Pa vana mi fate in lo ni thei ang, mi tha leh sual chungah a ni a chhuah tir thin a, mi fel leh mi fel lo chungah ruah a surtir thin a ni. Sam 65:11 I kumte chu khawngaihnain lallukhum i khum a;

(3) Krista chhandamna chu rinnaah a innghat a;

Bible [Rom 3:21-28] hi i chhui chhuak ang u, i chhiar ho ang u: Nimahsela tunah erawh chuan Dân leh zâwlneite hriatpuina neiin Dân ni lovin Pathian felna chu a lo lang ta a ni: Isua rinna avânga Pathian felna chu Krista Ringtu zawng zawng hnenah, thliar hran lohvin. Mi zawng zawngin thil an tisual a, Pathian ropuina an tlachham si a; Pathianin Isua chu Isua thisen zarah leh mihring rinna hmangin Pathian felna lantir nan a dintir a, a chhan chu amah ngei pawh a nih theih nan tun hmaa miten an tihsualte chu dawhthei takin a tuar a ni mi fel nia hriat a ni a, Isua ringtute pawh thiamchantir a nih theih nan. Hetiang hi a nih chuan engtin nge i chhuang theih ang? Inchhuang tur a awm lo. Engtin nge thil awm lo chu kan hman theih ang? Meritorious method a ni em? Ni lo, Lalpa rin dan a ni. Chuvangin (hmanlai lehkhabu zial a awm: a chhan chu) kan chiang a ni: Mi chu rinnain thiamchantir a ni a, dan zawm a ni lo .

( Thil chhinchhiah: Mosia dan hnuaia awm Judate leh Dan nei lo Jentail-te pawh tunah chuan Pathian khawngaihna avangin thiamchantir an ni tawh a, Isua Krista chhandamna rinna avanga zalen takin thiamchantir an ni ta! Amen, rawngbawlna ha tak a ni lo va, Lalpa rin dan a ni zawk. Chuvangin, mi chu rinna avanga thiamchantir a ni a, dan zawmnaah a innghat lo tih kan chhui chhuak ta a ni. ) .

[Exodus 20:2-17] "Kei hi LALPA in Pathian ka ni, Aigupta ram ata, saltanna in ata hruai chhuaktu che u chu "Ka hmaah pathian dang in nei tur a ni lo." eng pawh nangmahni tan in siam tur a ni lo. "I ṭhenawm in chu i duh lo vang i ṭhenawm nupui emaw, a chhiahhlawh emaw, a bawihnu emaw, a bawngpa emaw, a sabengtung emaw, a thil neih eng pawh chu i duh lo vang," a ti a.

[Deuteronomy 28:1-6] “LALPA in Pathian aw chu ngun taka in ngaithla a, a thupek zawng zawng, vawiina ka pek che u hi in zawm a, in zawm chuan, ani chuan leia mi zawng zawng aia chungnung zawkah a dah ang che LALPA in Pathian aw chu awih rawh u, hêng malsâwmnate hian a zui ang che u a, in chungah a lo thleng ang: Khawpuiah malsâwmin in awm ang a, in taksa rahah te, in lei rahah te, in rahahte malsâwmna in dawng ang i bawnghnute leh i beram note chu malsawm an ni ang.

articles.title: Bible|Eng sual nge? Thihna thlen lo sual?
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen.

1 Johana bung 5 châng 17-ah Bible i hawng ang u, i chhiar dun ang u: Fel lohna zawng zawng hi sual a ni a, thihna thlen lo sual a awm bawk. .

Vawiin hian kan zir ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan share ang ". Thihna thlen lo sual chu eng nge ni? 》Tawngtai: Abba duh tak, Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! "Hmeichhe nungchang" chuan an kut hmangin hnathawktute a tir chhuak a, ziak leh hril, thutak thu hmangin, chu chu i chhandamna chanchin tha a ni. Kan thlarau nun hausak zawk nan hla tak atangin van atanga ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Thihna thlen lo sual chu "eng sual nge" tih hrethiam rawh? Chutichuan Thlarau Thianghlima innghahnain taksa thiltih sual zawng zawng kan tihlum a, rinnaah zung kan kai a, Adama din ai chuan Isua Kristaah zung kaih leh din kan nih theih nan. . Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Zawhna: Eng thil sual nge tih? Thihna thlen lo sual a ni em?

Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

【1】Pathian leh mihring inkara thuthlung dan pawn lama sualte

Hmanlai inneihna dan a awm loh lai ang bawkin, unaupain a farnu a lak chu sual a ni lo unaupa leh a hnuah ka nupui a lo ni ta a ni. Genesis 38-ah pawh Juda leh Tamari chanchin, chu chu a pasalṭha leh Tamari inkara inngaihzawnna leh inngaihzawnna sualna chungchang ziak a awm bawk.

Johana 2-ah pawh Jentail nawhchizuar pakhat Rahabi a awm bawk a, ani pawh hian dawt sawi sual a ti a, mahse Jentail-te chuan Mosia Dan an neih loh avangin sualah an ngai lo. Chungte chu dan anga thuthlung pawn lama sual a nih avangin sual anga ngaih a ni lo. Dân chuan thinurna a tiharh avângin (a nih loh leh lehlinna: mite hremna a tuartîr avângin); --Rom 4:15 en rawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

[2] Tisa thil tihsualte

Bible-a Rom 8:9 hi zir ila, chhiar ho ila: Pathian Thlarau nangmahniah a awm chuan tisa mi ni tawh lovin Thlarau lam mi in ni tawh ang. Tupawh Krista Thlarau nei lo anih chuan Krista ta a ni lo.

Note: Pathian Thlarau, chu chu Thlarau Thianghlim chu in thinlungah "a cheng" a nih chuan tisa mi in ni lo → chu chu, kawng dik tak chu in "ngaithla" a, in hrethiam a, Krista chanchin tha chu in ring → tihna a ni Thlarau Thianghlimin baptisma chang → chu chu "mi thar" piang thar leh chhandam chu "mihring hlui" taksaa mi a ni lo tihna a ni. Hetah hian mi pahnih → pakhat chu Pathian Thlarau atanga piang a ni a; Tisa lama "mihring hlui" bawhchhiatna hmuh theihte chu Pathiana Krista nena inthup "mihring thar" chungah dah a ni lo vang. Lalpan a tih angin: "An "mihring hlui" bawhchhiatnate chu an "mi thar" lakah vawng tlat suh! Amen - 2 Korinth 5:19 en rawh.Hei hi chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Tirhkoh "Paula" chuan Korinth kohhran chu heti hian a zilhhau a, "In zingah inngaihzawnna a thleng tih hriat a ni. Chutiang inngairena chu Jentailte zingah pawh a awm lo, tu emaw chuan a pasalnu... inngaihna thiltih sual titu leh uirena hrem a ni ang Chutiang mi chu in zîng ata hnawt chhuak ula, a thlarau chu Lal Isua ni-a chhandam a nih theih nân "a tisa tichhe turin" Setana hnenah pe rawh - chutiang mi chu a ni "mihring putar" leh Pathian biak in tihchhiat duh chuan Lalpan a hrem ang a, a taksa chu a tichhe vek ang a, chutiang chuan a nunna chhandam a nih theih nan Kolossa 3:5 Chuvangin, leia awmte chu that rawh u. duhâmna sual, duhâmna sual, leh duhâmna (duhamna chu milem biakna nên a inang a ni). initiated in us.Isua nun hi keimahniah hian lang chhuak rawh se → Ropuina, lawmman leh lallukhum petu che hi Pathian a ni bawk a, keimahniah hian i hrethiam em!

Tu pawh Kristaa a awm chuan thilsiam thar a ni a; ...Hetiang hian Pathian chu Kristaah chuan khawvel hi amah nen a inremtir a, an bawhchhiatnate chu an chungah chhiar lovin, he inremna thuchah hi kan kutah a nghat a ni. --2 Korinth 5:17,19 en rawh.

Rom 7:14-24 Tirhkoh "Paula" a piangthar a, tisain thlarau a do ang khan keimah ah hian thil tha a awm lo tih ka hria a, chu chu ka tisaah a ni. A chhan chu thil tha tih tum chu keimah ah a innghat a, mahse ka tih tur erawh a ni lo. Chuvangin, ka duh loh thil tha chu ka ti lo; Ka tih duh loh thil ka tih chuan keimah ni lovin, keimahah sual a nung zawk a ni. Mihring tisa hlui kha kraws-ah khenbeh a ni a, Krista nen a thi ta a ni. Tirhkoh "Paula" sawi ang khan! "Sual" lakah thiah ka inngai a, "dan" avang hian dan lakah thi ka ni - Rom 6:6-11 leh Gal. 2:19-20 en rawh. Pianthar leh chhandam a nih hnua "mihring thar" chu "mihring hlui" tisa sualte zinga mi a ni lo tih a sawifiah a ni. Lalpa chuan a ti! Hriat tawh suh la, mi hlui tisa sualna chu "mi thar" chungah puh suh. Amen! Tichuan, "An sualna leh an bawhchhiatnate chu ka hre reng tawh lo vang," a ti ta a, tunah chuan heng sualte hi ngaihdam a ni tawh a, "sual" avanga inthawina hlan a ngai tawh lo. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? --Hebrai 10:17-18 en rawh

(Warning: Lal Davida pawhin tisa lamah uirena leh tualthahna a ti a, tisa lamah khandaih chhiatna chu a chhungte chungah a lo thleng ta a ni. 4 Dan tel lo chuan sual hi sualah ngaih a ni lo → Dan a awm hma chuan sual hi khawvelah a awm tawh a, mahse Dan tel lo chuan sual hi sualah a ngai lo. --Rom 5:13 ah hian kan hmu

(Rom 10:9-10 Jentail-te hian Dan an nei lo. Isua Krista ringawt ringin thiam changin chatuan nunna an nei thei a ni. Mahse Judate hian Mosia Dan an nei a, an sualte sim hmasain tuiah baptisma an chang hmasa tur a ni .Chhandam an nih theih nan leh nunna an neih theih nan Isua ringin Thlarau Thianghlim baptisma an chang tur a ni !

articles.title: Bible
articles.author: admin
articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen.

1 Johana bung 5 châng 16-ah Bible hawng ila, i chhiar dun ang u: Tupawhin a unaupa thihna thlen lo sual a tih lai a hmuh chuan a tan a tawngtai tur a ni a, Pathianin nunna a pe ang a, mahse thihna thlentu sual a awm chuan a tan tawngtai tur ka ti lo. .

Vawiin hian kan zir ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan share ang ". Thihna thlentu sual chu eng sual nge ni? 》Tawngtai: Abba duh tak, Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! "Hmeichhe nungchang" chuan hnathawktu a tir chhuak thin - an kut hmangin thutak thu, i chhandamna chanchin tha chu an ziak a, an sawi thin. Chaw ei tur chu van hla tak atangin an rawn keng a, a hun takah an rawn pe che a, chutiang chuan i thlarau nun a hausa zawk ang! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Thihna thlentu sual chu eng nge ni tih hrethiam rawh? Chanchin |ha ringin kawng dik hrethiam ila, thihna thlentu sual lak ata zalen ila, Pathian fa nihna kan chang thei ang a, chatuan nunna kan chang thei ang. ! Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Zawhna: Thihna thlentu sual chu eng sual nge ni?
Chhanna: Bible-a 1 Johana 5:16 hi han en ila, chhiar ho ila: Tupawh a unaupa thihna thlen thei lo sual a tih lai a hmuh chuan a tan a tawngtai tur a ni a, Pathianin nunna a pe ang a thihna thlentu sual, I He sual hi tawngtai tur a ni an ti lo.

Zawhna: Thihna thlentu sualte chu engte nge ni?
Chhanna: A hnuaia sawifiahna chipchiar tak

【1】Adama’n contract a bawhchhiatna sualna

Genesis Bung 2 Châng 17 Nimahsela, chhia leh ṭha hriatna thing rah chu i ei tûr a ni lo, a rah i ei ni chuan i thi ngei ang!

Rom 5:12, 14 Mi pakhat zarah sual chu khawvelah a lo lut a, mi zawng zawngin sual an tih avângin sual avângin thihna a lo thleng ang bawk khan. ...Mahse, Adama atanga Mosia thlengin thihna a lal a, Adama anga sual ti lote pawhin an lal a ni. Adama chu mi lo kal tur entîrna a ni.

1 Korinth 15:21-22 Mi pakhat avanga thihna a lo awm avângin mitthi thawhlehna pawh a lo thleng ta a ni. Adamaah chuan mi zawng zawng an thi ang hian Kristaah chuan mi zawng zawng tihnun an ni ang.

Hebrai 9:27 Mihringte chu vawi khat thi tura ruat a ni a, chumi hnuah chuan rorelna a lo thleng ang.

(Hriat tur: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thute kan chhui hian Adama "thuthlung bawhchhiatna sual" chu thihna thlentu sual a ni tih kan chhinchhiah a; Pathian fapa Isua Krista chuan amah "thisen" hmangin mi sualte a silfai tawh a ni. These who [ring rawh] thiam loh chantir i ni lo vang → Chatuan nunna ring lote chu thiam loh chantir an ni tawh - Isua "thisen" chuan mi sual a silfai tawh a, nang [ring lo] → thiam loh chantir i ni ang a, rorelna a awm ang thih hnuah → "I sawi dan chuan dan hnuaiah i awm "I thil tih avang hian rorel i ni ang." Hei hi chiang takin i hrethiam em?)

【2】Dan hnathawh atanga innghat sual

Galatia 3 Bung 10 Dan thiltih titu apiang chu ânchhe hnuaiah an awm a, “Tupawh Dan bua ziak zawng zawng ti zawm lo chu ânchhe lawh hnuaiah a awm a ni,” tih ziak a ni si a.

( Thil chhinchhiah: A chunga Pathian Lehkha Thute kan zir chianna hian, dan hmanna chu a nihna anga ngai, dan thupek zawm avanga thiam changa inchhuang, inngaihtlawmna chhinchhiahna anga dan kalphung ritual regulation ngaihventu, . dan chu a nunna anga vawngtu, leh "Dan anga kal" "Dan felna" anga nung lote chu Pathian zahngaihna leh lawmman ngaihsak lote chu danin anchhe dawng dawn a ni; khawngaihna chu chibai buk a ni. Chuvangin, i hrethiam em?

Mi pakhat sual avanga thiam loh chantir nih chu thilpek angin a tha lo a, rorelna chu mi pakhatin thiam loh a chantir a, thilpek erawh chu sual tam takin a thiam a ni tih a lo lang ta a ni. Mi pakhat bawhchhiatna avanga chu mi pakhat zarah thihna a lal chuan, khawngaihna tam tak leh felna thilpek dawngtute chuan mi pakhat Isua Krista hmangin nunah an lal leh dawn em ni? ...Dan chu pawn lam aangin dah belh a ni a, chu chu bawhchhiatna a tam theih nan; Thihnaah sualin ro a rel ang bawkin khawngaihnain felna hmangin kan Lalpa Isua Krista zarah chatuan nunna a lal a ni. -Rom 5 chang 16-17, 20-21 en rawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em?

Tirhkoh "Paula" sawi ang khan! Mahse min phuartu dan avanga kan thih atang khan tunah chuan dan lakah kan zalen ta...--Rom 7:6 en rawh.

Dân avângin Pathian tâna ka nung theih nân Dânah ka thi ta a ni. --Gal 2:19 en rawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? ) .

【3】Isua thisena din thuthlung thar tihbo sualna

Hebrai 9:15 Chumi avang chuan thuthlung thar palaitu a ni a, kohte chuan chatuan rochan tiam chu an dawng thei ang a, thuthlung hmasa sualte chu thiin an inrem thei ang. Amen!

(I)Khawvela mi zawng zawng hian thil sual leh contract bawhchhiatna kan ti vek a

Mi zawng zawngin sual an lo tihsual tawh avangin...--Rom 3:23 Chuvangin mi zawng zawngin Pathian thuthlung an bawhchhia a, Jentail leh Judate pawhin thuthlung an bawhchhia a, an sual ta a ni. Rom 6:23 Sual man chu thihna a ni. Isua, Pathian Fapa chu "thuthlung hmasa"-a mihringin sual a tihte ngaihdamna turin kan sualte avangin a thi a, chungte chu "Adama-in thuthlung a bawhchhiatna sualna" leh Juda-te'n "dan of Mosia". Isua Krista chuan Dan ânchhe lak ata min tlan a, Dan leh a ânchhe lak ata min chhuah zalen ta a ni - Gal 3:13 en rawh.

(II) Thuthlung Thar zawm lo mahse Thuthlung Hlui zawmtute

Hebrai 10:16-18 "Hei hi chu ni hnua an hnena thuthlung ka siam tur chu a ni, Lalpa chuan a ti: Ka dante chu an thinlungah ka ziak ang a, an chhungah ka dah ang," a ti a an sualte leh an bawhchhiatnate chu a hre reng tawh lo vang." Tunah chuan heng sualte hi ngaihdam a ni tawh a, sual inthawina dang a ngai tawh lo. (Mahse, mite chu hel leh rilru khauh tak, an tisa bawhchhiatnate hriatreng dan tur zawngin an bei fo thin. Lalpa thusawi chu an ring lo! Lalpan tisa bawhchhiatnate chu an hre reng dawn lo tih a sawi. Tisa bawhchhiatnate chu an hre reng dawn lo tih a sawi Krista nen khenbeh an ni e.Engvangin nge i hriatrengna chu i ring em ni, Lalpa thisen nena thuthlung siam kha i ring em? i hrethiam em?

Krista Isuaa rinna leh hmangaihnain ka hnen ata thu i hriatte chu vawng reng ang che. Kan chhunga cheng Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhanna hmanga i hnena hlan "kawng tha" chu i "vawn" tur a ni. Thu thianghlim tehfung → Thutak thu i hre tawh a, chu chu thu tha, i chhandamna chanchin tha a ni! Thlarau Thianghlim rinchhan la, nghet takin vawng reng rawh, Thuthlung Hlui Mosia Dan zawm leh turin ka hrilh lo che u a ni. I hrethiam em? --2 Timothea 1:13-14 en rawh

(III) An thuthlung hmasa zawm tura lo hawte

Galatia 3:2-3 Hei chauh hi ka zawt duh che u a ni: Dân thiltih avângin Thlarau Thianghlim in dawng em? Chanchin |ha hriat vang a ni em? Thlarau Thianghlim insiamtir i nih atang khan famkimna atan tisaah i la innghat em? Chutiang khawpa hriat loh i ni em?
Krista chuan min chhuah zalen a. Chuvangin ding nghet la, saltanna nghawngkawl chuan mi man tawh suh. --Plus bung 5, chang 1 en rawh.

( Thil chhinchhiah: Isua Krista chuan thuthlung hlui ata min tlan a, kan hnena thuthlung thar din turin min chhuah zalen ta a ni. "Thuthlung hmasa ber" dan zawm tura kan kir leh chuan, Pathian Fapain ama thisen hmanga min hnena thuthlung thar a siam chu kan kalsan tihna a ni lo maw? Chutiang khawpa hriat loh i ni em? Keini tunlai mite tan pawh tehkhin thu a ni a, hmân lai Qing Dynasty, Ming Dynasty, Tang Dynasty emaw Han Dynasty emaw dan zawm chu a pawi em? Hetianga hmân lai dânte hi i vawng tlat a nih chuan, tûn lai dânte i bawhchhia tih i hre lo em ni?

Gal 6:7 Bum suh u, Pathian chu nuihzat a ni lo vang. Miin a tuh apiang chu a seng bawk ang. Sual bawihte nghawngkawlah chuan man leh tawh suh. I hrethiam em? ) .

【4】Isua rin loh sualna

Johana 3:16-19 Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe ta a, amah ring apiang an boral lova, chatuana nunna an neih zawk nan. A chhan chu Pathianin a Fapa khawvelah a tir a, khawvel thiam loh chantir turin (a nih loh leh lehlin: khawvel rorel turin; a hnuai lam ang tho) ni lovin, khawvel hi Amah hmanga chhandam a nih theih nan a tir zawk a ni. Amah ringtu chu thiam loh chantir a ni lo va, a ring lo apiang chu thiam loh chantir a ni tawh a, a chhan chu Pathian Fapa mal neih chhun hming a rin loh vang a ni. Khawvelah êng a lo thleng tawh a, mihringte hian êng aia thim an hmangaih a, a chhan chu an thiltih sual a nih avangin Hei hi an thiam loh chantirna a ni.

( Thil chhinchhiah: Pathian Fapa mal neih chhun hming chu Isua a ni a, Matthaia 1:21 en la, fapa a hring ang a, nang pawhin a hmingah Isua i vuah tur a ni, a mite sual lak ata chhandam tur a ni. Dan hnuaia awmte tlantu tur, putar Adama’n contract a bawhchhiatna sual lak ata min chhandam tur leh Pathian fapa nihna min neih theihna tura min siamtu tur chu Isua Krista a ni! Amen. Amah ringtute chu thiam loh chantir an ni lo vang → chatuan nunna an chang lo vang! Ring lote chu thiam loh chantir an ni tawh. Chuvangin, chiang takin i hrethiam em? ) .

articles.title: Sual Adama siam leh Eden huana tlu
