articles.content:
Unau zawng zawngte thlamuanna awm rawh se! Amen.

Genesis Bung 3 17-ah Bible kan hawng a, chang 19-na chuan Adama hnenah: " I nupui thu i awih a, thing rah, ei lo tura thu ka pek che kha i ei avângin, lei chu anchhe dawng a ni, nangmah avângin i dam chhûng zawngin i thawhrim tûr a ni. ...i hmai thawmhnaw thawmhnaw hmangin i pianna leiah i kir leh hma loh chuan i chhang i ei ang. Leivut in ni a, vaivut lamah i kir leh ang. " "

Vawiin hian kan zir ang a, kan fellowship ang a, kan share ang ". Adama siam leh Eden huana tlu 》Tawngtai: Abba duh tak, Van Pa, kan Lalpa Isua Krista, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnenah a awm reng avangin lawmthu kan sawi e! Amen. Lalpa chungah lawmthu kan sawi e! "Hmeichhe nungchang" chuan hnathawktute a tir chhuak thin - thutak thu, an kuta ziak leh sawi, i chhandamna chanchin tha hmangin. Kan thlarau nun hausak zawk nan hla tak atangin van atanga ei tur phurh chhuah a ni a, a hun takah min supply a ni! Amen. Thlarau lam thutak kan hriat leh kan hmuh theih nan kan thlarau mit ti eng zel turin Lal Isua ngen la, Bible hrethiam turin kan rilru hawng zel turin ngen ang che → Thilsiam Adama chu "chak lo" a ni a, awlsam takin a tlu thei tih kan hrethiam a, chutiang chuan Pathianin Isua Krista, Pathian piangah kan nung thei ang. . Amen!

A chunga tawngtaina te, dilna te, tawngtaina te, lawmthu sawina te, malsawmna te! Hei hi kan Lalpa Isua Krista hmingin ka dil a ni! Amen

Thilsiam Adama chu Eden huanah leiah a tlu a

(1) Adama chu lei vaivut atanga siam a ni

LALPA Pathian chuan lei vaivut atangin mihring a siam a, a hnar chhungah nunna thaw a thaw lut a, thlarau nung a lo ni ta a, a hming chu Adama a ni. --Genesis 2:7 en rawh
Pathian chuan: “Kan anpuiin mihring i siam ang u, tuifinriata sangha chungah te, boruak sava chungah te, leia ran chungah te, lei zawng zawng chungah te, mi tin chungah te thuneihna nei rawh se leia rûm ṭhîn, Pathianin mihring chu ama anpuiin a siam a, amah anpuiin mipa leh hmeichhia a siam a ni a ti a. Pathianin mal a sawm a, an hnenah, “Chi tam ula, lo pung ula, leilung hi luah khat ula, thuhnuaiah awm ula, tuifinriata sangha te, boruaka sava te, leia thil nung che vel zawng zawng chungah thuneihna nei rawh u .”—Genesis Bung 1 châng 26-28 en rawh

(2) Adama chu vaivut ata siam a ni a, a tlu a

Bible pawhin hei hi a ziak a: "Mihring hmasa ber Adama chu thlarau (thlarau: a nih loh leh tisa anga lehlin) nei nung a lo ni ta a ni" tih hi a ni a; --1 Korinth 15:45 en rawh

Lalpa Pathian chuan chu mi chu Eden huanah chuan hna thawk tur leh vawng turin a dah a. Lalpa Pathian chuan, "Huana thing rah chu a thlawnin i ei thei a, a chhia leh tha hriatna thing rah erawh i ei tur a ni lo, a rah i ei ni chuan i thi ngei ang!" 2 15 - Section 17-na a ni.

Rul chu LALPA Pathianin ramsa siam zawng zawng aiin a fing zawk a. Rul chuan hmeichhia hnenah chuan, "Pathianin huana thing rah reng reng ei phal a ni lo tih a sawi tak tak em?"...Rul chuan hmeichhia hnenah chuan, "I thi ngei dawn lo, Pathianin chu chu in the-ah a hria a ni," a ti a a rah in ei nî chuan in mit a lo inhawng ang,” a ti a.—Genesis 3:1,4-5.

Chu thing rah chu chaw atan a tha a, mit a ti lawmawm tih hmeichhia chuan mi a ti fing tih a hmuh chuan a rah thenkhat chu a la a, a ei a, a pasal hnenah a pe a, ani pawhin a ei ve bawk a. --Genesis 3:6 ah hian kan hmu

(3) Adama chuan dan a bawhchhia a, danin ânchhe a lawh ta a ni

Lalpa Pathian chuan rul hnenah chuan, "Hetiang i tih avang hian ran leh ramsa zawng zawng aia ânchhe dawng i ni a; i dam chhung zawngin vaivut i ei tur a ni," a ti a
Tin, hmeichhia hnenah chuan, "Naupai laiin i hrehawmna chu ka tipung ang a, fa hrinnaah i hrehawmna chu a tam ang. I duhzawng chu i pasal tan a ni ang a, i pasal chuan ro a rel ang che," a ti a. - Genesis 3 bung 16
Tin, Adama hnenah chuan, "I nupui thu i awih a, ei loh tura thu ka pek che thing rah i ei avângin, lei chu i anchhe ânchhe dawng a ni a; i dam chhûng zawngin a rah ei tur i hmuh theih nân i thawk chhuak tûr a ni," a ti a ." Hling leh hling i tan a lo thang ang; lovah i ei ang a; vaivuta i kir leh hma loh chuan i hmai thawmhnaw hmangin i chhang i ei ang, vaivut ata i lo piang a, i lo kir leh ang. Leivut ."--Genesis 3:17-19 ah hian kan hmu a

(4) Sual chu Adama atang chauhvin khawvelah a lut a

Mi pakhat zarah sual chu khawvelah a lut a, sual avanga thihna a lo thleng ang bawkin, mi zawng zawngin thil an tihsual avangin thihna chu mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo thleng ta a ni. --Rom 5:12 ah hian kan hmu
Sual man chu thihna a ni si a; -- Rom 6 Bung 23
Mi pakhat hmanga thihna lo thleng a nih avangin mitthi thawhlehna pawh mi pakhat kaltlanga lo thleng a ni. Adamaah chuan mi zawng zawng an thi ang hian Kristaah chuan mi zawng zawng tihnun an ni ang. --1 Korinth 15:21-22 ah hian kan hmu a
Destiny ang chuan mi zawng zawng hi vawi khat thi tura ruat an ni a, thih hnuah rorelna a awm ang. --Hebrai 9:27-ah hian kan hmu

( Thil chhinchhiah: Issue hnuhnung berah khan vanah Eden huanah khan Pathianin a siam "Arsi Eng, Zing Fapa" Lucifer-a chu a mawina avangin thinlungah a chhuang hle a, a finna chu a tichhe ta a ni tih ka lo share tawh che u a ni a mawina, leh duhâmna lama a sumdâwnna nasa lutuk avângin pawngsual a ni a, thil sualin a khat a, vântirhkoh tlu tawh a lo ni ta a ni. A sualna te, duhâmna te, sualna te, thikna te, tualthah te, bumna te, Pathian huatna te, thuthlung bawhchhiatna te, etc. avang hian a thinlung zahthlak tak chuan a pianzia chu zahthlak tak, dragon sen lian tak leh hmân lai rul ha leh ke hrual hrual neiah a thlak ta a ni.
